How to protect important things when you leave home?

story:
Luxurious comfort for your entire body like never before experienced; The Coziest Pillow is a full-body pillow uniquely designed to follow the natural contours of the body for full and flexible support. Cuddle with it, read with it, sleep with it.. so many possibilities! Made of only the highest quality materials and manufacturing practices for a reliable, safe, and luxurious cozy experience. The Coziest experience.

WARNING: May change the way you think about comfort forever.

 

Surround yourself and snuggle in like a Koala, support your arms and legs for a cozy squeeze, elevate your legs or arms in various positions, or bend the pillow into seated or reclined positions.

Sleep, nap, read, relax, or watch a flick in total and maximum comfort with The Coziest Pillow!

Popcorn, check. Netflix, check. The Coziest Pillow, check.

 

Regular pillows only support your head and neck, leaving the rest of your body to be neglected and unsupported while you’re in your favourite sleeping or lounging position.

The mix of the unique U-Shape design, and the perfect balance of stiffness and softness of the special Microgel filling enables The Coziest Pillow user to experience fully personalized and fulfilling rest, supporting countless different comfortable positions and individual needs. 

 

Supreme comfort isn't the only thing The Coziest Pillow is great for; due to it's unique traits and ergonomics, it can be great for general wellbeing. The Coziest Pillow is also perfect for expecting mothers during pregnancy to help with discomfort.

 

Helps eliminate tossing and turning

 

Aids with support as well as improves blood circulation for those who need it most

 

Meticulously developed using only the highest quality materials and manufacturing practices, The Coziest Pillow ensures the safest, most reliable, and most luxurious cozy experience possible. All materials used from the cover to the filling are STANDARD 100 certified and tested by OEKO-TEX® to ensure safety and industry leading quality free of harmful substances and in accordance with good environmental practices.

The Premium quality Sateen cotton cover that comes with every Coziest Pillow can be unzipped and machine washed. 

 

The filling used in The Coziest Pillow is not your average regular filling; the special Microgel filling offers the absolute perfect balance of stiffness and softness for your touch, shaping and forming into many different positions you may desire to use it in. This is what maximum coziness feels like, and you may not want to stop feeling it!

 

The Coziest Pillow’s inner casing is also machine washable and can be unzipped to allow for filling adjustment for a custom cuddling experience.

 

All of the materials in The Coziest Pillow are 100% hypoallergenic making them suitable for even sleepers with the most sensitive of skin.

 

When you get a Coziest Pillow today you won’t just be making your life more comfortable, because for every Coziest Pillow redeemed by backers, we’ll also be donating a regularly designed pillow with the same high quality materials of The Coziest Pillow to people in need. 

Let's make the world a cozier place, together.

story:
There are few movements in life that you can stare at and free your mind. 

 

Sometimes just Looking at something beautiful gives us some sort of meditation.

 

The Wind is a glue connection of all nature Elements. It is the only force that can touch and move those phases and wind always blows, reminding us the beauty of nature.

 

A state of the art solid bamboo handcrafted ornament

 

 

BODY

For Making the wind wheel we chose bamboo. It's strong structure, light weight and high density, what's make the product light but stable.

 

The circle unit is 10mm thickness which helps to stabilize the wind wheel. the wings are 5mm  what's makes the wind wheel light, so it can spin with the slight wind breeze.

 

The slots of each wing are 10mm wide, what's give the wings enough space to change the angle and open itself when spinning.

 

The wind wheel is designed to spin clockwise as the diagram of the 5 elements. After it's natural spin from the wind it spins back counter-clockwise, as the direction of our solar system spin.

 

light breeze

 

SIZES

So it can fit in every area desire

  • 7" 
  • 9"

 

COLOR OPTIONS

With special painting technique, the wind wheel is high resistance even for the outdoors.

  • Dark maple 
  • Light beech
  • Vivid color 
  • Pastel color

 

WIRE

The main attaching string is polyester wire 1 mm thickness. strong but still light with special sewing and tying technique.

The hanging wire is much thinner with almost no resistance so It doesn't prevent the wind wheel from spinning even with light breeze. all High resistance for years to come.

current wire options:

  • Red
  • Yellow
  • Natural

 

BEADS

Wooden beads

 

 

    ADD-ONS

    There are unique supplements you can add to the wind wheel

    • 5 tassels for the wings (yellow/red)
    • Glass Candle holder
    • Chimes iron bell
    • Authentic chinese ornament  

     

    WOOD BURN SYMBOLS

    The icons we created, symbols in a delicate way both the 5 elements and the original Chinese character. The original characters can appear inside the wind wheel at the back of the each wing for more interesting vision.

     

    PACKAGE & ASSEMBLE 

    Recycled carton  pack

     

    set up the windwheel

     
     

    Every corner at home is a place of energy. Unique objects find their way in a detailed way to every place at our home.

     

    But moving objects are magical...

     

    Every time we open a window and we see the hanging lamps or curtains moving they catch the eye and we feel nature entering our home.

     

    The wind wheel is an energy core entering the home, A jewelry for your living space and a  Unique visual masterpiece powered only by wind.

     

    The delicate way that we shape our gardens is a quest by itself. Facing nature's rough temper, changing seasons and plants behavior we find the way to make our gardens personal and relaxing for our life needs.

     

    What makes garden decor even more serious issue.
    We always looking for decorations to harmonize naturally with our special creation.

     

     

    The wind wheel is a living flower for your garden and patio, A keeper that always move, raises the energy and make the garden come alive.

     

    Even at the dark.

     

    evening with candle holder

     

    sunny morning

     

    10 minutes in the afternoon 

     
     
     

    The color edition of the wind wheel was actually the original idea. At the beginning of the project I thought I'll use the same colors that represent the 5 elements Chinese diagram, each wing with Different color, But after I saw how much good it looks natural, I have abandoned the idea.

     

    But the paint barrels I've bought was still in front of my eyes, and I just had to give it a try.. The outcome was magnificent and eye catching. the first thing I did was to hang the colorful toy in my kid's room, but after realizing the real potential I hang it above my baby boy's playpen

     

    He was so thrilled from his new toy, He could not stop looking at it. And for me as a parent i found so much advantage:

    • No annoying squeaking plastic and motor sound 
    • no need to starch a handle 
    • no changing batteries

    A spin of the mobile gives more than 10 minutes of spinning. Since then the plastic baby mobile got into the cupboard and never used again.

     

    It's a Lucky charm which makes home, garden and every living space come alive.

     

    natural motion baby mobile 

    first time with  a new friend

    enjoying the new toy

     

     

     

    FRESH BREEZE

    Funding 5,000$

    With your funding at this point we will be able to make:

    • 1 Size 
    • 1 Color
    • 1 Wire color
    • 1 add on

    the design will be chosen at the end of the campaign.

     

     

    COLORS OF THE WIND

    Funding 15,000$

    At this point we will be able to make:

    • 1 Sizes
    • 2 colors
    • 1 wire color
    • 3 add-ons

    the designs will be chosen at the end of the campaign.

     

     

    WIND OF CHANGE

    Funding 45,000$

    At this point we will be able to make:

    • 2 sizes
    • 3 colors 
    • 2 Wire colors
    • 4 add-ons
    • Wood burn symbols

    the designs will be chosen at the end of the campaign.

     

     

    GENTLE STORM

    Funding 125,000$

    At this point we will be able to make:

    • 3 Sizes + 11"
    • 4 Color
    • 3 wire colors
    • 4 add-ons
    • Wood burn symbols

     

     

    At the beginning of 2016, I had an idea for a vertical wind wheel that can be made from a conservation cans.

     

    this idea was converted to wood with a similar proportion. soon enough the picture started to be more and more realistic, and the natural motion wind wheel was born. 

     

    Today, after more than a year of measuring, cutting and many testing. we finally found the best model, best materials, a wonderful factory and the best suppliers for starting mass production.

     

     

    We believe that the simple things in life are those who matters,

    the moments that we share with ourselves and our love ones

    at home are important more than anything in this world. 

    The quest in our design studio is to put perfection as a first priority to achieve the most effective products for enriching home design mission.

    Natural motion wind wheel is our first product.

     

    We are listening to all our backers

    ​

    Contact us on facebook

    ​

    Contact us on our new homepage 

     

     

    Wind wheels has always been a part of humans landscape. The simple but yet so sophisticate axis wheel, is actually the first whether forecast.

    Always in sight the magical wheel tells us about the wind strength and direction. we look listen and remember that nature forces is here all the time.

    Today in the modern world the human mind is full of events and thought. and this unique basic sense is forgotten.

    We forgot how to breathe.

    We all need to take a moment for ourselves. Can you remember the last time you sat at your home without mobile device or the tv on for more than 5 minutes. Not all people have the ability to create moments of relaxation. That's why we found our self yearn for silence in our lives.


    But each time we see natural motion such as swaying brunch, moving curtains, hanging mobile decorations, flying kite or wind wheel, Strong familiar feelings
    embrace us like we were little children and a deep breath is entering our body.
     

    Our minds need to be reset. Looking at natural motion helps to concentrate in breathing, relax and clear the mind.The wind wheel lets you take a moment to pause and remember, That we are still living in nature.

    We are humans, not machines.

    Just breathe.

     

    "It's all about me.

    My time, My soul, My life

    Just me and nature in a perfect harmony

    Together, Unite."

story:
A better kitchen knife.

How much time do you spend in your kitchen struggling with dull, clunky knives? We set out to make that time a lot more enjoyable by creating a better everyday knife.

By making the knives by hand, with high-end materials, we get around the compromises that are inherent in a lot of mass-produced knives; like thick edges and soft steel made to take a beating - and instead tune up the features that make a knife great.

Stainless, Carbon and Damascus steel.

The Swift comes in three different steel options, all highest quality, fine grain tool steel from Sweden.

These are all very similar in performance and their main difference is that one is a stainless steel. The other is a carbon steel that comes with a forced patina that will continue to develop, and the third is a pattern welded carbon steel Damascus.

The choice is a matter of personal preference.

What makes the Swift special?

A blade that actually cuts better.

The reason why a knife might feel dull is not only its edge. It’s the grind geometry and thickness just behind the edge that really determines how a knife cuts.

A thinly ground convex geometry reduces friction and resistance in contact with the food. The difference in performance is very noticeable and once you try that – you usually don’t want to go back.

A sharp knife.

A great reason for having a sharper knife: It makes your food taste and look better.

A blunt knife crushes the cell structure making vegetables and meat bleed out their juices while a sharp knife will make clean, good looking cuts that keep the juices and flavors intact.

Perfect size.

The most useful knife is the one you’re comfortable reaching for at all times. It should be quick and effortless, so size is important - especially in the home kitchen were space is limited.

This is why we gave the Swift a 160 mm (6.3”) long blade; it gives you great precision while being large enough to handle most tasks.

Steel that’s harder.

Not only does a hard steel keep sharp longer, it’s also needed to support a thin edge.

Each knife is individually heat treated to a hardness of 63 HRC as compared to regular knives that come in anywhere between 53-59 HRC which is much softer.

Softened corners are kind to your fingers.

A thing that troubles many chefs is sharp corners that give blisters. With a chamfered spine and choil The Swift gives you a more comfortable time cooking.

A Straightforward, Functional Handle.

Simple is not easy. We developed innumerable ideas to arrive at an ergonomic handle that looks great and feels good in your hand. It is shaped so it allows you a variety of grips that does not lock you in a fixed position.

Materials are FSC certified Teak wood. While being one of the most expensive lumbers on the market, it’s great for handles thanks to its durability and natural oils. This is accompanied by bolsters and spacers in Bakelite and G10.

Versatile Blade Shape.

Rock, chop, slice and use the tip for intricate work.

The Swift lets you effortlessly cut just about anything, from crispy vegetables, fresh fish or a juicy steak.

Design - Functional, flexible, timeless

A kitchen knife is such an intimate object that we use so frequently in our daily life. That’s why when designing it - you have to get everything just right.

We make high-end knives for a living and with years of experience and research, we know small details can mean big improvements. So for the Swift, we wanted to take all that knowledge and pour it into one single knife.

Completely Handmade.

The Swift is not mass-produced in some anonymous factory. We ourselves make the knives, by hand and with great care, one piece at a time in our workshop in Gothenburg, Sweden.

This close presence in the process is our way of guaranteeing that you get a knife that’s at its best.

Hand Forged Damascus Steel - Limited.

Apart from the main collection, 100 additional exclusive Damascus steel Swifts will be made.

We love to forge and we think the Swift looks very good with a pattern welded blade. This Knife is for you who really appreciates the craft, the quality in details and the unique pieces that the long forging process creates.These limited editions comes with a numbered collector’s certificate.

Unlike the industrially mass-produced sintered Damascus steel, we make our own Damascus steel by forging together two different types of steel by hand, into a solid piece of about 200 layers. This produces a unique and livelier pattern with sharper contrasts. A better looking steel.

The pattern is formed by the forging process and each little wave form you see is an actual trace of a hammer blow so throughout one blade there are thousands of these. The biggest waves are the latest traces and the smallest waves date back to the beginning of the forging, and are highly compressed by the hammering and folding operations. So there’s a macro and a micro level to the pattern.

This is our second project.

After delivering our first project we have received a lot of great reviews from our backers and here’s just a few testimonials that we got after our last campaign.

Who we are.

We’re two passionate designers and craftsmen that together create knives designed to improve your everyday life. We believe that with genuine craftsmanship and visionary thinking it´s possible to create real long lasting value.

With over three decades of joint experience in metal design and fabrication, we’re devoted to the handmade revolution and every opportunity to make things extraordinary.

Why Indiegogo?

We want to share the Swift with you, and by using Indiegogo we can keep a better price by skipping the high markup any traditional retailing adds. That’s generally half of the retail price.

Also, by using Indiegogo we get the means to collect the materials needed and then make the Swift in a concentrated run, which helps us provide you with maximum value.

Risks and challenges

We have done our best to schedule production and delivery dates based on estimates.

Since we ourselves make the knives in our workshop, we don’t have to rely on other producer’s or factories time schedule which is a good thing.

Still unexpected bumps can happen along the way that could delay production or delivery timing and we promise to communicate this to you with full transparency.

We look forward to sharing our project with you and thank you for your support!

The biggest waves are the latest traces and the smallest waves date back to the beginning of the forging, and are highly compressed by the hammering and folding operations. So there’s a macro and a micro level to the pattern.This is our second project.After delivering our first project we have received a lot of great reviews from our backers and here’s just a few testimonials that we got after our last campaign.Who we are.We’re two passionate designers and craftsmen that together create knives designed to improve your everyday life. We believe that with genuine craftsmanship and visionary thinking it´s possible to create real long lasting value.With over three decades of joint experience in metal design and fabrication, we’re devoted to the handmade revolution and every opportunity to make things extraordinary.Why Indiegogo?We want to share the Swift with you, and by using Indiegogo we can keep a better price by skipping the high markup any traditional retailing adds. That’s generally half of the retail price.Also, by using Indiegogo we get the means to collect the materials needed and then make the Swift in a concentrated run, which helps us provide you with maximum value.Risks and challengesWe have done our best to schedule production and delivery dates based on estimates.Since we ourselves make the knives in our workshop, we don’t have to rely on other producer’s or factories time schedule which is a good thing.Still unexpected bumps can happen along the way that could delay production or delivery timing and we promise to communicate this to you with full transparency.We look forward to sharing our project with you and thank you for your support!

story:
Toilets are an unavoidable source of daily frustration. The seats are either a complete mess or always left up. We all know we should lift and lower the toilet seat, but not everybody does. It’s a vicious, messy cycle...until now. 

Meet Lifty Loo™ a modern, convenient, antimicrobial toilet seat handle that stays firmly fixed to your toilet seat. 

In your own home, the antimicrobial handle is a convenient way to lift and lower the seat. It serves as a reminder for those who tend to forget and acts as a fun training tool for kids. 

In a public restroom, Lifty Loo™ is a sanitary, civilized nudge for users to lift and lower the seat. This results in less mess, and a win for everyone. We know some people may never use their hands in public spaces, so Lifty Loo™ is durable enough to lift with your foot. 

Lifty Loo™ is the best bathroom accessory you never knew you needed. Simply peel the adhesive strip, stick Lifty Loo™ to your seat, and lift! A single Lifty Loo™ stays semi-permanently fixed to your seat, and will not damage the wood or plastic if it needs to be removed. It encourages users to raise and lower the toilet seat by providing a convenient and sanitary antimicrobial handle. 

Lift More. Less Mess.

LIFTY LOO™ IS INTENDED TO STAY ON YOUR TOILET SEAT. IT IS NOT FOR SINGLE USE, OR MEANT TO BE CARRIED WITH YOU. SHOULD YOU NEED TO REPLACE IT, THE ADHESIVE WILL NOT LEAVE RESIDUE. 

IT'S SIMPLE, BUT IT WORKS!

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT

After many rounds of prototypes and hours of testing, we've finally developed the perfect shape! Now we're ready to release Lifty Loo™ into the wild, giving the Kickstarter community the first chance to enjoy the convenience and cleanliness that Lifty Loo™ brings! Just peel, stick, lift, and enjoy!

story:
Thank you for taking a look at our project, The Omega House!

Project:

The project incorporates disaster resistance, energy efficiency, water conservation, extended family cohabitation and modern design into one package. As you can see we are still at the stage where the idea is on the page, but we are working now to bring it out of 2D and into construction.  We expect to have the project completed by spring of 2014!

This project is the application of design choices, construction choices, material choices, and system choices to produce a prototype residence that minimizes energy use, water use, provides disaster resistance, longevity, minimal maintenance, and a minimal reliance on outside infrastructure, while preserving modern comfort. The concept is to produce and build a structure with net zero energy use, which can be modified to fit various living requirements, and provides modern comforts all from methods and products, which are currently available!

You may have seen some projects on zero energy use homes, which tend to be smallish (on the order of 1500 sf). This project has slightly loftier goals. With this project, we want to find a way to construct approximately 3500sf living space that can mitigate family fighting, resist natural disasters, and operate with the occasional shortage of resources. The good news is, the design is completed, we have blue prints, we are only a few short steps from receiving building permits and we are about to begin construction. That is where your support comes in. While we realize that this is going to be a home to live in, it is also an opportunity to gather data on how the components and design reflect the goals of minimal resource usage. We are not asking to have you help fund the entire project, just the estimated increase in the costs associated with the design innovations we plan to implement.

We expect to house a family of 6-8 with a mother-in-law section to allow for a "+2" residence of extended family. Removal of the basement or the mother in-law sections provides for customization for smaller families. We have investigated a construction envelope of Insulated Concrete Forms (ICF) and we have an envelope of thermal insulation of about R-48, where a larger “R” means less heat loss or gain from the interior so the heating and cooling system requirements are minimized. Most modern homes have R values of R12-R20 in the walls and R30-R42 in the roof. The design of the house includes an orientation and construction which maximizes the passive solar heating available in the winter. We have a large number of windows with a southern exposure which allows for the best orientation with respect to capturing the sun’s warmth. A large thermal mass floor made of concrete is included to retain the winter solar gain as well as roof eaves that minimize the solar heat in the summer.

We have included a roof made of Structural Insulated Panels (SIP) thick enough to match the R48 envelope to maintain the highly insulating envelope integrity. On top of the SIPs insulation we also plan to install a metal roof to help reflect the sun’s heat in the summer and minimize the damage from weather. Solar hot water heating will minimize energy use on heating water and solar photovoltaic cells provide the first source of an expandable generating system to supplement the demand side management implementation of reduced energy usage.

To further reduce the interior climate control requirements, the house is built on an enclosed, conditioned crawl space, which also allows for easy access to the plumbing, electrical, data communication and climate control distribution systems. Added to the design are the system choices, where climate control is through a ground source heat pump with electrical backup, zoned area heat design and wood stove heating redundancy. LED lights and solar tubes will minimize energy spent on lighting, while the 70% sun light penetration will provide natural light through much of the winter day.

Rainwater harvesting will be implemented to provide water to both the toilets and local landscape irrigation and low flow water systems will minimize water use. The design also accommodates a move to gray water harvesting, if and when it is desired.

The foundation is a standard reinforced concrete with footings designed to minimize travel in all directions and a post tension slab on top of the crawlspace to prevent cracking and weakening from ground movement and earthquakes. Ties from the roof are connected through the concrete walls down to the foundation footings to prevent roof loss and increase structural integrity in high wind situations (like tornadoes), and a basement, which also provides a shelter from dangerous weather. The high strength of the prototype envelope will also help prevent damage from other weather conditions like hail, wildfires and ice storms all potential dangers in Oklahoma, where we plan to erect the prototype. We have also designed the prototype will be resistant to organic disasters, like pests. Mice and vermin should have a tough time getting into the structure where we feel termite problems will be minimized.

Contributions and Perks:

What will your support do? Your financial contributions will help offset the costs of incorporating all the systems listed above into a single prototype residence. We hope that by building one of these homes the design flaws will be determined and we can make improvements for those interested in building similar homes in the future. Perks for your generosity range from placing your initials in brick pavers on the property to DVD tours of the finished construction and ultimately receiving a set of drawings and license to build the prototype yourself. We estimate that after fees and taxes the goal amount will supplement the $425,000 we plan to contribute to building the prototype. Given preliminary estimates, we think this prototype will cost in the neighborhood of $750,000 to complete. Thank you for taking the time to read this description and for your generous support in taking this project from the drafting board to the driveway!

story:
Designer of the Year (Metropolis Magazine) 

With an understanding of our current, fast and modern way of living our design philosophy is to only produce solid wood furniture that is completely collapsable. All our furniture pieces can be packed away when you need to move. We believe that sustainable solid wood furniture is the future of furniture production.

We need 3 days to produce one Triangle Chair.

Handcrafted with love.

Rather than wasting and buying a new piece every other year, your investment should be done only once and done correctly. Our mission is to make well designed, comfortable, beautiful furniture that you can carry with you wherever you go.

Our Triangle collection represents a new way of living. It is a combination of modern design, natural materials and a high level of practicality.

Man always returns to nature. That’s why our furniture is based exclusively on natural materials of the highest quality. Solid wood furniture represents exclusivity and classic in furniture design. We are always trying to make a relation between traditional and modern design. In that way we combine the power of the past with visions of the future.

There’re many reasons why assembling furniture is better solution than the regular furniture:  

  • You can put it in your closet when you no longer need it.

  • Easy to move to a new apartment. 
  •  Cheap and fast shipping anywhere in the world.

We’re always trying to find the best way for our assemblable structure. All our models looks great even when they’re dismantled.

We invested a lot of time and energy to have 5 key segments in every piece of our furniture. 

  • Best Design 
  • High quality materials 
  • Assebling structure 
  • Comfort 
  • Stability 

All our models of dismantling furniture can be assembled within minutes. Digital cutting and demanding programs allow us to make parts that fit into each other with maximum precision. Besides mechanical cutting, all parts of our furniture are hand sanded, painted or stained.

For our production, we're using ash tree. Ash tree is considered to be the best for furniture production. It is very strong and gives numerous processing capabilities and possible finishes. 

First-class finishing of our wooden elements is something that we pay special attention. All parts are carefully processed before applying the final protective strain.

Solid wood furniture fits easily into all types of interior designs and gives warmth and joy to the space.

Our chief designer, French architect Charlie Pommier made sure that every piece of our furniture has a unique, beautiful and distinctive design developed in France.

 If you like our concept and want to change the philosophy of furniture production, please back this project. 

Thank you all! We can't do it anything without your help!

story:
No need to worry about over or underwatering your plants. 

Add natural light to the living space.   

Sunlight dictates your circadian rhythm, which directs our body’s biological clock and tells you when to sleep and when to be awake. 

With increased exposure to computer, tablet, and phone screens today, our circadian rhythms have been completely thrown off. 

The smart LED light not only provides the perfect lighting for your plants, it also simulates the cycle of the sun helping you 

This is the lowest maintenance, easiest way to grow plants. 

 Set the EcoQube Glo down.

 Sit back and watch your plants blossom. 

Water and nutrients are absorbed directly by the plant making it the most efficient way for plants to thrive.

 

 

 

 

LED: 3W 4000K White LED in Aluminum heatsink housing 

Bamboo Wood Base

Hydroponic clay medium allows plants to effectively root.

story:
The Goods 

Built by a team at Harvard University, Sluice combines cutting edge tech, user friendly software, a sleek design, and cost effective manufacturing to create a product that's accessible to anybody with an interest in crypto currency.

When you buy a Sluice, you're not just supporting the network that lets cryptocurrency transactions function, but you can also make real passive income. Right now, cryptocurrency prices are at a record high, growing upwards of 400,000% over the past two years in the case of Ethereum. During the same time, transactions in cryptocurrency have exploded, taking them from novelty products to some of the largest currencies in the world. Sluice is designed to make a very complex investment – cryptocurrency mining – easy enough for any investor to add to their portfolio.

What is a Cryptocurrency Miner?

A "miner" is basically a turbo-charged computer solving millions of math equations every second. When these computers are linked together they form a network that allows Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies to function. As a thank you to these miners, every cryptocurrency pays the miners in Bitcoin/Ethereum/Litecoin/whatever for every couple billion equations that they solve. Basically, they're called miners because they discover crypto coins at random as they "dig" through millions of math equations. 

Generally, these crypto currency miners are giant super computers which take up entire warehouses and require full time IT staff to take care of. But Sluice aims to use the power of distributed networking to change that.

Setup

You don't need to be a computer programmer to use Sluice. In fact, Sluice can be used with almost no computer skills at all. Sluice™ is engineered to be set up  in 15 minutes or less and work with almost any home wifi network. Simply download the Sluice Setup software from our website or backer emails, connect your Sluice to a computer via usb, follow some simple instructions, and you're good to go. After being set-up Sluice can be powered off any standard outlet and run for years without you doing anything. 

Our Goals

We built Sluice™ with the hopes of bringing it to every home in the country. We want to do to the mining industry what IBM did for computers, shrinking gigantic mining computers down to be portable and affordable. 

If this project is successfully funded we hope to redesign the case, shrink the final product down by up to 40%, and lessen the power it draws. We think we can use scalable manufacturing to produce Sluice in plenty of time to ship every unit out by July.

Rewards & Pricing 

Our model for pricing is to add up each of the individual components at retail cost, then price so that we have no profit (excluding 1-2% brought on by rounding). Our hope is that buying in bulk will allow us to lower the price of each component by 5-15% and thus allow us to make every backer's products and have a little bit left over for ourselves and those who helped us manufacture the product.

The contributions towards the thank you notes and shirts will hopefully help us to cover any unforeseen business expenses which might arise.

We know this is a lean model, and we aren't doing this project to get filthy rich. But we have analyzed pricing more than any other aspect of this project and are confident that we can do this.

International Backers

Many backers from outside the US have reached out to us with concerns about compatibility with foreign plugs and 240v systems. Accomodations for such differences are built into the product and as such, Sluice should function in any major country. We are thinking right now that we will include power cords based on the final destination of each box (barring some location whose cords aren't widely available). Then the final case will be configured with a universal female power port that the cord can be plugged into. This kind of port is the standard for many types of electronic equipment and is shown below on a power supply unit. 

Note: The voltage difference will be accounted for by hardware within the box, which means that if you move to a 120V country, you'll have to send your sluice in to our repair department to get some parts swapped before you can use it. We are rather certain that this is the plan and that European, Australian, Canadian, and East Asian backers will be able to use their Sluice right out of the box.

Specs

Prototype Size: 12"x12"x6.4"
Projected Final Size 11.25"x 6" x 6.4"
Coins Mined: Ethereum, Zclassic*, Pirl*
Software: Proprietary
Power Draw: 200-250 W
Power Cable: Interchangeable
Data Cable: USB
Internet Connectivity: Wi-Fi
Ethereum Hashrate: ~29 MH/s

*these alt coins are subject to change based on profitability during the final production run, but we plan for Sluice to toggle between Ethereum and at least two other coins based on the relative profitability of each.

story:
THE INSPIRATION

Hosting a get-together for friends and family is good fun and often these events occur spontaneously. This is when fast and effortless action is needed in order to create a setting, where everybody can comfortably sit around the same table or within the same space. Boxix is designed to enable the smooth interaction, allowing the guests and the hosts to concentrate on each other without an unnecessary hassle.

Boxix is a unique innovation, which consists of a set of six stools that are identical in height and design. When attached to each other, the cube-shaped entity gives a strong, sleek impact and also serves as an individual seat or a side table to compliment the interior decoration. This also solves the age-old problem of storing the extra chairs: with Boxix, there is no need to move or hide the additional furniture since the stools will be ready at hand when needed.

 

THE SPECS

The product measurements are 45 cm x 45 cm x 45 cm (17,7” x 17,7” x 17,7”), weight 21 kg (46 lbs) and it comes in four different colors:
Polar Pearl  - Grizzly Brown - Arctic Black Night - Natural Birch

Boxix is 100 % from Finland: designed by four Finnish designer students, made from locally-grown birchwood and manufactured in a woodshop in Myrskylä, Finland, combining traditional craftsmanship and high technology woodworking.


THE INSTRUCTIONS

Deattaching the stools is easy. The structure will allow you to remove as many stools as needed, keeping the rest of the stools tight firmly together. In order to put the whole cube together, there is a simple pattern to remember. Please see the video and image below to get the hang of it.

 

THE AWARDS

Boxix was awarded with the main prize in the annual Habitare Design Competition in 2015. The design was praised for it's convincing idea that helps to expand the interior space, especially in crowded households that have been increasing throughout the modern time.

Please click here to read more about the award.

 

THE TIMELINE

April 2015
Product development begins

June 2015
First prototype for Habitare exhibitions design competition

September 2015
Grand prize at Habitare exhibitions design competition

June 2016
Zero series production, quality assurance and  product certification

February 2017
Indiegogo launch!

April 2017
Product deliveries begin!
story_txt:
THE INSPIRATION
Hosting a get-together for friends and family is good fun and often these events occur spontaneously. This is when fast and effortless action is needed in order to create a setting, where everybody can comfortably sit around the same table or within the same space. Boxix is designed to enable the smooth interaction, allowing the guests and the hosts to concentrate on each other without an unnecessary hassle.
Boxix is a unique innovation, which consists of a set of six stools that are identical in height and design. When attached to each other, the cube-shaped entity gives a strong, sleek impact and also serves as an individual seat or a side table to compliment the interior decoration. This also solves the age-old problem of storing the extra chairs: with Boxix, there is no need to move or hide the additional furniture since the stools will be ready at hand when needed.
 
THE SPECS
The product measurements are 45 cm x 45 cm x 45 cm (17,7” x 17,7” x 17,7”), weight 21 kg (46 lbs) and it comes in four different colors:Polar Pearl  - Grizzly Brown - Arctic Black Night - Natural Birch
Boxix is 100 % from Finland: designed by four Finnish designer students, made from locally-grown birchwood and manufactured in a woodshop in Myrskylä, Finland, combining traditional craftsmanship and high technology woodworking.


THE INSTRUCTIONS
Deattaching the stools is easy. The structure will allow you to remove as many stools as needed, keeping the rest of the stools tight firmly together. In order to put the whole cube together, there is a simple pattern to remember. Please see the video and image below to get the hang of it.

 
THE AWARDS
Boxix was awarded with the main prize in the annual Habitare Design Competition in 2015. The design was praised for it's convincing idea that helps to expand the interior space, especially in crowded households that have been increasing throughout the modern time.
Please click here to read more about the award.

 
THE TIMELINE
April 2015Product development begins
June 2015First prototype for Habitare exhibitions design competition
September 2015Grand prize at Habitare exhibitions design competition
June 2016Zero series production, quality assurance and  product certification

February 2017Indiegogo launch!
April 2017Product deliveries begin!

story:
What Is paperd.ink

paperd.ink is a 4.2" e-paper development board to showcase calendar, weather, to-do lists, notifications, images, and much more. The beautiful display allows you to get rid of all distractions and work peacefully. Since it's open-source and fully hackable, you can play around and customize it for yourself!

Note: E-paper display is included in all perks, it's not visible in images because it's on the backside. 

E-Paper Is Really Pretty!

 

“e-paper is as if the computer is speaking in an inside voice as opposed to shouting” - this is how one of our early reviewers described e-paper and we couldn’t agree more! We decided to develop something based on e-paper because we were tired of having displays that emit or rather blast backlight on you. This gets irritating to the eye and is quite intrusive. Thus, we fell in love with the e-paper display given its elegance, low power consumption and there’s the je ne sais quoi about the monochrome which has its appeal!

Okay, What Can I Do With It?

  • Want to customize it tailored for your use case? You got it, paperd.ink is open source & hackable!
  • Wanna play around and integrate with custom APIs? Go for it, paperd.ink is customizable and you can program it in Arduino, Micropython, or ESP-IDF.
  • Want to tweak the enclosure and 3D print a rad design? Time to get the creative hat on, try out different designs with the STEP files we’ve kept open for everyone!
  • Sync it with your to-do list, calendar or set it up to show the weather - that’s all you need to have a productive day!
  • Display your best piece of art or pictures of your beloved ones, or have a quote for inspiration - now wouldn’t that be fulfilling!
  • Broadcast important notices wirelessly for everyone to see or use as your home automation dashboard - that would make your life easier! 

The possibilities are endless, limited only by your imagination! You see, paperd.ink is designed based on the feedback and suggestions received from our early respondents who were part of our user research. We kept a minimalist design to help you be more productive and make it versatile.

Hmm, How does it look?

Cool! What Are Its Tech Specs?

 

  • ESP32-WROOM-32 module

  • FCC/CE certified WiFi & Bluetooth for connectivity

  • 4.2" monochrome e-paper display

  • <20uA current consumption in sleep mode

  • CP2104 USB-UART converter onboard for programming

  • MicroSD card slot for storing images, files, etc

  • Piezo buzzer for notifications and alerts

  • 4x tactile buttons for user input

  • Battery charger circuit to keep it truly wireless 

  • Extension header for interfacing and expanding capabilities

ESP32-WROOM-32

ESP32 is one of the most popular microcontrollers, and the heart of paperd.ink. You can program it using the micro USB connection and is well supported by Arduino, Micropython, and ESP-IDF.

  • FCC/CE Certified

  • Dual-core microprocessor @240MHz

  • WiFi 802.11 b/g/n

  • Bluetooth v4.2 BR/EDR & BLE

  • 520 KB of on-chip SRAM

  • Integrated 4 MB SPI flash

E-paper Display

  • 4.2” e-paper 

  • Resolution: 400 x 300 (DPI: 120)

  • Color: Black & White, Monochrome

  • SPI Interface

  • Full refresh: 3s

  • Has support for partial refresh

External Interface

  • UART, SPI, and I2C so you can add external sensors and modules. This makes the board extendable.

  • 8 I/O for controlling any output and receiving any input.

  • Disable ESP32 module using ESP_EN pin to reduce power consumption.

  • Disable the entire board using LDO_EN pin and have virtually no current consumed by the board.

Physical Specs

  • The PCB is 92.1 x 78.1 mm
  • The enclosure is 98 x 82 x 16 mm

Noice! What's The Offer?

  • We're selling two versions of our product - with enclosure and without enclosure. You can download the STEP files from our Github repository to 3D print your own if you decide to go with the latter. Or even design your own!

  • The enclosure would be 3D printed using SLA process in ABS white material.

  • The e-paper display is included in all of the perks!

Why Should I Support You?

paperd.ink embraces the spirit of open source and sustainability. By supporting us, you help us strengthen these values. 

  • We're strong advocates of open source and supporting our project will help foster the community.

  • paperd.ink is super efficient running for months on a single charge with a 2000mAH LiPo battery.

  • All the funds collected will be going into production, testing, and shipping.

BTW, Who Are You?

Hi, we’re Rohit & Prasad - the duo behind paperd.ink! 

We’re two young engineers from India. We’re makers, hackers, tinkerers at heart with a love for open source technologies. paperd.ink is our passion project which we’ve been working on for more than 1.5 years. We have been working hard through thick and thin to make this product a reality ever since the pandemic started right after our soft launch last year. We had a host of issues ranging from problems importing components to test our redesigns, industry shut down due to lockdowns in our country, or finding a way to finance the orders. 

But amidst all this, we were motivated by our early supporters' love and support, which gave us the confidence to keep moving. We have made paperd.ink with craft and dedication focusing on making life easier for our users. With this early trust we receive, we have come this far. We want to thank each one of you, we're two ambitious nerds without much social or financial capital looking to share our work with the world which would not have been possible without the internet and all of you. Thank you!

Fun! What Are Others Saying?

We got super-cool early supporters during our user research last year! Here's what some of them are saying:

“ I've been waiting for this product ever since I saw e-paper for the first time. ” - Jeremy

 

“ Overall, this is very close to what I've wanted. Kudos to you for making it this far. ” - Damon

 

“ It looks super. Just can't wait to start developing on it. ” - Nelson

Any Risks & Challenges?

COVID-19 hit our launch plans badly and continues to remain a threat as the supply chains and logistics network got disrupted. However, we have done our due diligence and are in constant touch with our suppliers, manufacturers, forward agents to have the updated information on everything. We hope and will try our best to deliver this project smoothly.

Other Ways I Can Help?

Can't contribute? No worries! You can always share our campaign, give us feedback or just talk with us, we'd be happy to engage. You can also follow us on social media and shoot us an email.

story:
1. Can DYOB be personalized for two people with individual sides?

Yes, absolutely. This is the essence of Design Your Own Bed! You can pick your own comfort zones and support zones, depending on your body’s needs. Even better, is you can adjust your side of the mattress ANY time your desire! Just make sure to sleep on your side of the bed to avoid any fights.

A true industry first...the Roma Me Mattress has multiple dual comfort therapeutic module components that range from super soft to extra firm. These interchangeable modules can be strategically placed in your mattress housing to eliminate any pain that your body has. Some mattresses allow you to inflate or deflate the pressure thru your entire side, but that doesn’t help if you dislocated your shoulder and have to reduce pressure points in your shoulder area. The Me Mattress ™ allows you to target specific areas that are causing discomfort and adjust that spot until you achieve zero pressure! This is truly Revolutionary!!!

2. How do I redeem my perk?

Upon completion of the campaign, you will receive an email with instructions to go on our configurator and answer the questions. You will enter your unique promo code that is provided in the email upon checkout.

3. What is the delivery period for my Mattress?

The delivery period depends on the variation of the ROMA "ME" Mattress. Depending on your unique configuration, different structure and some layers can be produced quickly while others take longer. However, DYOB secures a delivery period of maximum 3 to 5 days after online configuration. Free Shipping in the USA, delivered to your door.

4. Where and how can I try out the Mattresses?

The best way is to support this campaign and try one out for yourself! Truly, design your own mattress. It’s easy and we will walk you thru the steps! DYOB will launch our virtual fitting app that allows our experts to custom fit you to your mattress. We can make suggestions for your optimal sleep needs. Your body constantly changes. People gain and lose weight, fall down stairs, get in accidents every day. The Roma Me Mattress is primed to help with those daily changes. Our patent-pending modular design is extremely flexible and can be adjusted any time you feel any discomfort. That is the beauty of this mattress. The Me Mattress™ will grow with you and age with you. Literally every component is interchangeable, replaceable and flippable. The combinations are infinite.

5. Is there an adjustment period for my new mattress?

DYOB offers solutions to decrease the “break in” period. Our modular interchangeable design is an Immediate gratificationist’s dream! As you make adjustments to your mattress, you are guaranteed to feel an immediate difference. Have fun with this... you will learn more about your own body and how to manage pain and pressure.

6. Is DYOB the right mattress for those who have back/neck pain?

Yes. That is why our DYOB Configurator has particular questions addressing those needs, such as spine injuries or back pain, reading in bed etc. We help you to design the optimal sleep comfort and support zones to achieve REM sleep. It is important to note that your mattress cannot replace medical treatment. We are working directly with the Chiropractic Association to fit people to their mattress. Our exclusive Bedfittings™ allow the doctors of Chiropractic align your body to your mattress to achieve musculoskeletal support! Total body pressure management!

7. How long can I use my mattress?

We designed this mattress grow with you and be the last mattress you will ever purchase. Every piece is modular. What does that mean….well, every piece is interchangeable and replaceable. This is the only interactive mattress that can be adjusted every time you feel discomfort. Our mattresses have the added benefit that you can unzip and wash the ticking and vacuum out the inside of the mattress to help eliminate allergens.

8. On which surface can a DYOB mattress be used?

DYOB designed mattress systems that can be used on every surface! You can use it on an adjustable frame, a slatted platform bed, a traditional frame, a pallet, or any creative sleep surface DIY’ers create...even the floor. We do prefer combinations that are designed with a surface that optimize airflow. Our engineers are on the forefront of a breakthrough platform that will be industry disrupting again. The reveal is projected for early 2018.

9. What is the structure of the DYOB Mattress?

The DYOB Mattress is designed with nature. The hexagon is used in geometry, crystals, rock formations, chemical bonding, and beehives. Now we brought it back to one of our needs...Sleep! The Roma Me mattress utilizes Body Geometry™ to give you optimal comfort zones and support zones so your body heals from daily activities while you sleep. Heal while you sleep and let your interchangeable mattress components do all the work for you. All our modular therapeutic modules fit together to move with your body to continuously displace pressure and allow for proper musculoskeletal support. Nothing is like it. Remember, when it comes to your sleep, “Its all about me and I deserve the Best™

10. Why Modular?

DYOB’s roots created this modular concept for two main reasons…

1) Customized Comfort to your body on your side of the bed. Utilizing interchangeable and flippable parts so you can properly align your body and time your experience discomfort. 80 % of all Americans will experience back problems in their life. 22 million people in the US have sleep apnea. Just imagine what your life would be like if you could sleep pain free, all night, every night??? Sleep = Success and Happiness! My background in mattress manufacturing for the Health Care Industry as a child gives me the unique experience to actually see all the pain people endure living daily life and as you age. Bed sores, broken bones, brain injuries, gun shot wounds and many other ailments make it impossible to sleep. There are so many problems, but no real products that help... until now.

2) The other focus to go modular is to be environmentally friendly and sustainable. 50,000 mattress are discarded every single day in the US. All of these fill up landfills and take up our land. Our interchangeable modules can be rotated, flipped and adjusted so you can first play with the parts you have, to adjust for the proper support your body desires on any given day. Our cover has the unique ability to be removed so it can be washed for a clean sleep. Also, you can vacuum away any allergens, dead skin, and other debris that collect inside the mattress to help keep your mattress clean and safe.

Every business and every invention has risks. We have fully designed, tested and are ready to go into the manufacturing of our product. We have done our own rigorous testing of materials in accordance with top quality standards. While there is a remote chance we missed something, if anything comes up during the current process of securing required and optional certifications, we will make necessary adjustments in order to conform and re-evaluate our timeline.

story:
Take Control Of Water Leaks

CHK2O (check-two-oh) is a sensor-less water leak detection device that senses leaks anywhere within the home.  It can communicate and be controlled remotely using a smartphone (both iOS and Android) or by logging on to CHK2O's web portal. 

Why Do I Need a Water Leak Detector

Dealing with cleanup and insurance claim hassles makes this system a bargain.  Insurance may pay for the damage, but they will never compensate for the time lost from work or the vacation that was planned for the following day.

For apartment owners it allows for complete control over of all your properties water pipes.  If there is a warning of possible water leak detector you can shut off the water before further destruction happens.  This allows time for you or  your renter to check for a water leak.

CHK2O in the media:

             

Product Features


Easy to Install:


Why CHK2O?

CHK2O (pronounced check-two-oh) was developed in order to provide a new approach to water leak detection in your home, office, or any other space where water leaks can occur.

CHK2O is a patent pending smart water leak detector that measures the pressure of the water within the home in the event of an pipe burst or appliance failure. Failures often range from water heaters bursting, dishwashers or washing machines leaking, or pipes bursting from fatigue or freezing.

CHK2O works by easily attaching to an existing water line and continuously monitoring for a change in water pressure, all without the use of expensive and hard-to-install remote sensors. When a change in pressure occurs due to failed appliances or burst / leaking pipes, CHK2O will stop the flow of water and signal a warning that a leak may be present.

Smartphone App:

A message will be relayed through a mobile app installed on a smartphone or via the web portal. The mobile app and website interface allows 24/7 access to the device and provides remote turn on / shut off of the water, which saves time and money. CHK2O prevents the hassles of clean up with little to no damage, while also providing piece of mind. CHK2O will eliminate the chances of having costly repairs to a water-damaged home and truly takes the worry out of water leaks.

Actual Prototype Value and Printed Circuit Board (PCB)

Functioning product App

Risks and Challenges

As with any large scale manufacturing product problems can occur that deviate from the expected schedule.  Our project management timeline provides a detailed outline of what it will take to get this product to the customers.  We will provide continuous updates to all backers to address if there is a deviation from our project timeline plan.

pending smart water leak detector that measures the pressure of the 
water within the home in the event of an pipe burst or appliance 
failure. Failures often range from water heaters bursting, dishwashers 
or washing machines leaking, or pipes bursting from fatigue or freezing.CHK2O
 works by easily attaching to an existing water line and continuously 
monitoring for a change in water pressure, all without the use of 
expensive and hard-to-install remote sensors. When a change in pressure 
occurs due to failed appliances or burst / leaking pipes, CHK2O will 
stop the flow of water and signal a warning that a leak may be present.Smartphone App:A message will be relayed through a mobile app installed on a 
smartphone or via the web portal. The mobile app and website interface 
allows 24/7 access to the device and provides remote turn on / shut off 
of the water, which saves time and money. CHK2O prevents the hassles of 
clean up with little to no damage, while also providing piece of mind. 
CHK2O will eliminate the chances of having costly repairs to a 
water-damaged home and truly takes the worry out of water leaks.

Actual Prototype Value and Printed Circuit Board (PCB)Functioning product App 





Home = Allows user to go to Home or Away mode
Off/ON= Allows user to completely turn on / shut off home's water

Pressure Reading 
Estimated Flow Reading 
System Shelf Check / calibration

Advanced patent-pending valve design monitors the entire 
home's water line for leaks without using remote sensors. It is 
installed in-line with the home's existing water supply line.





Wireless connectivity allows for communication with mobile devices to send alerts, as well as making for easy installation.





Be up-to-date with CHK2O's industry leading connectivity so that you have control when your on-the-go.



 CHK2O Is Inexpensive With More Features
CHK2O is priced at $225 each with app and web service





How CHK2O Works


 
Prototype Testing

To date our team has collected data in order to map normal home water 
usage. CHK2O can collect and use this data to determine the difference 
between a leak and just turning on your water.  We currently have a 
working prototype being tested in multiple homes.  This provides 
confidence when we ship product to our customers.

By using a special calculation of your home's water pressure CHK2O can 
detect leaks.  When you first install CHK2O detector to your pipes you 
will need to allow for a calibration window before you can detect leaks.
  CHK2O will learn your water home behavior and overtime become more and
 more precise about how your water system is operating.  It will perform
 either manual or auto calibration checks so it always has the latest 
information on water pressure, as well as ensuring the shut off valve 
will not fail.  You will have complete control to operate all functions 
via app or website.  







Data from in home trials  
Project Timeline











CHK2O installation



FAQ's
1) Is it difficult to install CHK2O?  Is a professional assistance necessary?

      CHK2O can easily be installed without professional assistance.  
Installation can be achieved in 5  minutes. Our product will include 
either optional push-to-connect fittings for easy installation (more 
info here) or traditional NPT pipe fitting based on preference.  Check 
out the videos below for more details!
2) If a leak is detected what can be done to prevent water damage?

     CHK2O patent pending design allows for your water to be shut on/off
 with a touch of a button from your smartphone or a website from 
anywhere. You don't have to worry if you are away from your home.  
3)  Would I benefit having a water leak detection device?

     If you live in a home or own a building that has water pipes, you 
never know when a leak or pipe burst may occur.  Water leaks are the 
most common and costly home insurance claim in the nation.  Averaging 
$6,000 per occurance. 
4) Are the backup batteries replaceable?  How long will they last?
The
 backup batteries are standard "AA" size, and can be replaced by simply 
removing the valve unit's cover.  The batteries are expected to last 
approximately 2 weeks without primary power.  The mobile App will notify
 when the batteries require replacement.
5) Which smartphone operating systems will be supported?
iOS and Android will be supported.  Other devices will be able to utilize the system via a mobile-friendly website.
6) Do I need a plumber to install CHK2O?
The
 system has been designed to not require the assistance of a 
professional plumber, especially when the optional push-fit connections 
are included with the order.  As always, if in doubt, seek professional 
assistance.
7) Can the system be deactivated so that if I'm filling my swimming pool or watering the garden, it won't shut off?
Yes. 
 CHK2O can be placed into "Ignore" mode so that the system will not shut
 the water off.  After a period of time, the system will remind you that
 it is in Ignore mode, and ask if you would like to continue to ignore. 
 If you do not confirm, the system will automatically return to 
monitoring the home's water line.
8) What if I'm outside the US and I need metric push-fit connections or British Pipe Threads?
Please send us a note when making your pledge and we will be able to supply the necessary fittings.
9) Where can we go for more information?
    Visit our website www.CHK2O.com for more information. 









Risks and ChallengesAs with any large scale manufacturing product problems can occur that deviate from the expected schedule.  Our project management timeline provides a detailed outline of what it will take to get this product to the customers.  We will provide continuous updates to all backers to address if there is a deviation from our project timeline plan.

story:
It's time to throw away those extension cords, retire that old "Clapper", forget about those pesky Smart Phone apps. Light your home the way you want to!!! Be smarter than a smart home .... Get the Plug Hopper!!!


OUR STORY

Have you ever moved into a new home, condo, or apartment and wondered why the builder didn't install overhead lights? Or you thought to yourself "how were you going to light your room with only one switch/lamp?

Well that was a recurring theme in each place we moved into. Smart Phone light switch apps and the remote control lights are such a hassle. Dealing with connectivity issues or a lost remote when you are trying to turn on a light that is right next to you is anything but convenient.

So we came up with the Plug Hopper. The Plug Hopper allows you to use your current wall switch and syncs more outlets to it. That means you can virtually re-wire your house THE WAY YOU WANT IT without calling an electrician. The best part about it is that you set it up once and then forget about it!


Make your Home a "Street Smart" version of a Smart Home  

Simplify your interaction with your home! The Plug Hopper is the "epitome of simplicity" making your home work for your needs when it comes to lighting a room. Its so easy, simply plug in the base and the receiver/s into their ideal locations and plug in your lamps.

Our current prototypes have 2 frequencies allowing you to have 2 Plug Hopper bases controlling receivers in your home with no interference. 

CLICK the Pledge and sign up to get your Plug Hopper for your home/condo/or rental. It also would make a great gift idea and we plan on having this to market before Christmas.

Design complete, manufacturing prep'd, channel partners ready... All we need is you!!!

Our team has partnered with Mecca11 and their top notch engineers and manufacturing partners and are all ready bring this simple convenience to your living room or bedroom.

We have taken this idea from a concept, thru electrical & industrial design, to 3D Prints, and current working prototypes. We love this product!!! However to make this product cost effective for commercial sales, we need to fund the final step which is to create our plastic molds & certifications to ensure you get the best product for the best price! 

CLICK on one of the Perks and Pre-Order  to get your Plug Hopper for your home/condo/or rental. It also would make a great gift idea and we plan on having this to market before Christmas.

***If you like it, but can't make a contribution at this time... that's okay... you can help by sharing this with your friends and family. That way maybe you can borrow one from them. ***  Its easy, just click on the indiegogo sharing tools above.

The Coolest, Beautiful, and Flexible Power Outlet you have never seem!

We are an innovation company. We always trying to make something different from existing product and make life more interesting. Power Track is very flexible to use. It is allow you to move any of the power outlets to the suitable position for your appliance. Power Track can be even installed in your furniture for better looking and convenience to use.

 

Power Track is suitable to use in your home, garage, office, computer room, and kitchen

 

Power Track has passed the safety test and has CE approval

 

 

Beautiful designed parts

Power Track is very easy to install. Only 4 steps can make your home become more trendy. 

(Installed by certificated person is always recommend)

story:
Laundry day, feeding the parking meter, or paying a bus fair... No matter how technology evolves, we cannot avoid the existence of coins and have to organize it. However, most of the solutions are either inconvenient or ugly.

Therefore, we present "Revov Coin Storage".

 

Offloading your change just got addictive.

Drop off the coins as free as you want, enjoy the satisfaction as it slips in easily.

 

Most Importantly...

The diameter of the slot is 35mm, wider than every coins in any currency. (Even the Toonie fits!)

 

Magnetic Floating Lid!

The most effortless way to open.

The magnetized lid slides aside with your touch

 

Allows you to organize and store your change without the hassle

 

Simple, Fast, and, for some, ADDICTING!

 

 

Made of 100% beech wood

With a unique wood grain that makes each Revov one-of-a-kind

 

Made using CNC (Computer Numerical Control) mechanics

Offering the most precise level of detail and consistency possible

 

Polished by Hand and with Love

 

Here are some comments of Revov

story:
Why you will love the SPIO™ Sprinkler by Weasel Innovation

 

We produce garden solutions from the ground up.®

We know that water is a precious resource and are working to find solutions that balance keeping your garden growing and water use. With the SPIO™ Sprinkler you can target your water use and use the low pressure setting to save water and money.

 

We understand the value of tending your garden. 

 

At Weasel Innovation, we love our green space. We can’t live without it. We value urban gardens, yards, pocket parks and open spaces to play. Our products are developed with conservation in mind. For every product sold during this campaign we will give $3.00 to American Community Gardening  Association. 

 

The Spinner Head has a range of 40 feet and waters in a full-circle pattern. Perfect for medium-sized yards and provides uniform coverage. It's gentle enough for flowerbeds and more delicate plants.

The Pattern Turret Head has 8 patterns that can be adapted for any area. The turret dial is easy to adjust and is good in any situation from vegetable gardens to cleaning your car and other messy jobs.

The Impact Impulse head distributes water in an arc pattern and is designed to cover a larger yard or garden.

The impact head can reach over 75 feet! Which is perfect for watering the far corners of your yard.

The Oscillating Head has two rows of multiple openings to dispense water over your yard or garden. Like raindrops, the oscillating head is perfect for pets, kids and for plants.

Spend more time playing in your yard! 

The SPIO™ Sprinkler by Weasel Innovation® is currently in production.

It was invented by George Burkhardt  (photo above) and developed with the input of many homeowners, gardeners, hobbyists (people just like you)  It was thoroughly tested by the team at Weasel Innovation and is being produced by Garden Weasel®

The SPIO™ Sprinkler will be shipped Summer 2018!

 

Check out the Press!

 

 

What people are saying.

 

 

Stop working so hard - Relax in your yard! 

 

SPIO™ Sprinkler by Weasel Innovation

  • Easy – No more trudging back and forth to the faucet
  • Simple – Turn your faucet up all the way and set to either Low or High
  • Versatile – Select and customize the spray head of your choice from large areas to difficult (odd shaped) small areas
  • Fast – Save time and have more fun during your summer
  • High quality – Weasel Innovation has produced high-quality products since 1975
  • Keeps you dry – Now you can water before or after work & not ruin clothes
  • Saves you money – Stop watering your neighbor’s yard and city streets

Designed for your ease, the SPIO™ Sprinkler by Weasel Innovation is the easy-to-use solution for watering your lawn, garden and keeping life green.

 

Frequently asked questions (FAQ)

 

What Is Weasel Innovation?     

Weasel Innovation is the “weasel works’ arm of Garden Weasel® We produce products that solve day-to -day problems using ideation, design thinking, rapid prototyping and inventor’s submissions.  Think of it as where the new products are made.

 

How does the SPIO™ Sprinkler work?

The  SPIO™ Sprinkler connects to any hose and changes between high, low, and off settings with just a gentle tug on the hose. It comes with one head, and has three easily interchangeable heads depending on your watering needs.

 

How does the pull on and off feature work?

Once connected to the hose, you gently pull the hose to turn it on and off. No more crimping your hose. No more getting soaked, and no more running back and forth to the spigot.

 

How is the SPIO™ Sprinkler different than other sprinklers?

The SPIO™ is not only different from everything on the market, it is better.  For one, it has a pull on off, high low feature that is unique to this product. It also is sturdy, made of high-quality aluminum and what really sets it apart are the four Sprinkler Heads (Spinner, Pattern, Impact and Oscillating) there is one for every lawn and garden configuration.

 

Can the SPIO™ Sprinkler help me become more efficient with my water usage?

Yes. The SPIO™ Sprinkler will help you become more efficient because you can aim where you want your water to go. No longer will you waste water on watering your street or sidewalk, the SPIO™ Sprinkler has extensive reach, and can target specific areas of your lawn or garden.

 

Can the SPIO™ Sprinkler reach into the far corners of my garden/lawn?

This depends on your water pressure, but YES! The Impact Impulse Head distributes water in an arc or full circle pattern and is designed to cover or target a  larger yard. The impact head can reach over 75 feet!

 

How large is the SPIO™ Sprinkler?

The SPIO™ Sprinkler is 8”W x 8”D x 8”H and about two pounds and can easily be carried in one hand.

 

What material is in the SPIO™ Sprinkler? 

The SPIO™ Sprinkler is highly durable for outdoor use.  The sprinkler body is made out of high-quality aluminium with large plastic comfort grips to easily change between the sprinkler heads.

 

Does the SPIO™ Sprinkler have a patent?

Yes! We have a US Patent granted and other US and International patents pending.

 

I'd like to receive updates about the campaign, how do I do that?

If you've contributed (thank you) you're already following the campaign! If not, just hit the Follow button in the upper left corner of your screen, by the share buttons.

 

Where can the SPIO™ Sprinkler be shipped?

We are currently only shipping the product in the United States.

 

Where can I buy the SPIO™ Sprinkler?

Currently the SPIO™ Sprinkler is only available on this Indiegogo campaign. Purchase the SPIO™ Sprinkler by selecting the perk you like and enter your payment information.

 

Why are you running a Indiegogo Campaign?

Weasel Innovation is a group of innovators and makers. We want to broaden our reach, expand our horizons and hear from more people. Individually, Weasel Innovation employees have used and supported crowdfunding to bring new ideas and products to market -- during a meeting we had a moment and said, why don’t we put this on Indiegogo and let the crowd speak? Most of all we are excited about you - the people who use the Indiegogo platform. We want to explore new ideas, new relationships and new opportunities to develop products that are solutions to everyday problems AND that improve your outdoor experience.

 

Who is your charity partner?
We are excited to announce the American Community Gardening Association as our charity partner. The Mission of the American Community Gardening Association is to build community by increasing and enhancing community gardening and greening across the United States and Canada. We certainly can get behind that mission! Weasel Innovation will donate $3.00 from every SPIO™ Sprinkler purchased during this campaign to the American Community Gardening Association to help further their mission. 

 

Weasel Innovation

Weasel Innovation is the groundbreaking  arm of Garden Weasel® We produce products that solve day-to -day problems using ideation, design thinking, rapid prototyping and inventor’s submissions. Our best ideas come from you -  the user of our Garden Weasel® line of products. We produce garden solutions from the ground up®. Tell us what you need to make the most out of your yard, vegetable garden and backyard experience.

To learn more about Weasel Innovation check out our website. http://weaselinnovation.com/

For questions about our campaign please email info@weaselinnovation.com
