story:
UN’UNICA INTERFACCIA PER TUTTI I SISTEMI DI CONTROLLO E PROTEZIONE DELLA TUA CASA?

Si chiama WAND, ed è un sistema che va ben oltre la domotica.
Con la sua capacità di interagire e dialogare con tutti gli oggetti intelligenti presenti in casa, WAND porta la piattaforma OpenHAB su Android.

A SINGLE INTERFACE FOR ALL CONTROL AND PROTECTION SYSTEMS IN YOUR HOME?

It's WAND, a system beyond home automation. With its ability to interact and dialogue with all the smart devices in your home, WAND brings the OpenHAB platform to Android.

 

Non hai più bisogno di spezzettare i sistemi di controllo della tua casa.
Con WAND hai un unico quadro di comando. 

WAND nasce per metterti a disposizione l’intera piattaforma OpenHAB, un open source in cui troviamo grandi brand come Amazon, Nest e KNX.
Dal riscaldamento, all’illuminazione, alla videosorveglianza, al monitoraggio dei parametri di salute, all’analisi della qualità dell’aria: WAND si prende cura della sicurezza della tua casa e della tua famiglia a tutto tondo.

You no longer need to break up your home's control systems. With WAND you have a single access point.

WAND was created to provide you with the entire OpenHAB platform, an open source in which we find big brands such as Amazon, Nest and KNX. From heating, to lighting, to video surveillance system, to monitoring health parameters, to analyzing air quality: WAND takes care of the safety of your home and family.

WAND può contenere tutte le app e le funzioni del tuo cellulare. Messaggistica, posta elettronica, notifiche social, shop, finanza, meteo, servizi, chiamate e videochiamate: scegli le tue app preferite e tienile sempre a portata di mano.

WAND can contain all the apps and functions of your smartphone. Messaging, e-mail, social notifications, shops, finance, weather, services, calls and video calls: choose your favorite app and keep them always available.

Per utilizzare WAND non devi per forza acquistare un nuovo dispositivo mobile. Ti basterà un qualsiasi cellulare android, anche quello che usi di solito oppure un dispositivo che non utilizzi più da tempo, e avrai a portata di mano il controllo della tua casa e del benessere della tua famiglia.
In più, puoi collegare WAND ai sistemi Google Home e Alexa per utilizzare anche i comandi vocali.

To use WAND you don't have to buy a new smartphone. All you need is an android smartphone, even the one you usually use or a device that you have not used for a long time, and you will have control of your home and the comfort of your family. In addition, you can connect WAND to Google Home and Alexa systems to also use voice commands.

WAND ti permette di controllare la tua casa anche da remoto, grazie alla modalità IN/OUT. Puoi impostare azioni di controllo per ridurre gli sprechi e aumentare la qualità della tua vita, quando non sei in casa.
Ad esempio, puoi gestire l’accensione o lo spegnimento dei riscaldamenti e delle fonti di luce. Ma soprattutto, puoi perfezionare la videosorveglianza, attivando sul software il riconoscimento di movimento per scattare fotografie non appena il sensore rileva i movimenti.

WAND allows you to control your home even remotely, thanks to the IN/OUT mode. You can set up control actions to reduce costs and increase the quality of your life when you are not at home. For example, you can manage the switching on or off of heaters and light sources. But above all, you can perfect video surveillance, activating motion recognition on the software to take photographs as soon as the sensor detects movements.

I componenti di WAND sono essenziali e funzionali.
Per questo motivo, il costo di partenza di WAND è minore rispetto a quello di altri sistemi di domotica. Grazie al suo microserver, al suo alimentatore e ai suoi supporti, è intuitivo e facile da usare.
Per metterlo in funzione, bastano una connessione internet e un attacco elettrico.

The components of WAND are essential and functional. For this reason, the starting cost of WAND is lower than that of other home automation systems. Thanks to its microserver, its power supply and its supports, it is intuitive and easy to use. To put it into operation, all you need is an internet connection and an electrical connection.

Nel kit Pro di Wand troverai:

- Smartphone + App Wand
- Raspberry + Memory Card
- Alimentatore
- Cavo di alimentazione 
- Supporti (Flangia e Controflangia)

Inside "Pro Wand kit box":

- Smartphone + App Wand
- Raspberry + Memory Card
- Power Supply 
- Power Cable 
- Wall Mounting Supports

 

 

 

 

Per cominciare a usare WAND non hai bisogno di lavori in muratura.
Si monta come la placca di un interruttore e si configura in automatico il software.
Totale tempo stimato: 5 minuti, orologio alla mano!

To start using WAND you don't need masonry work.
It can be assembled like a switch plate and automatically configures the software.
Total estimated time: 5 minutes, watch in hand!

With its ability to interact and dialogue with all the smart devices in your home, WAND brings the OpenHAB platform to Android.

story:
Heating the old-fashioned way consumes 79% of ALL energy generated in the EU. And 85% of this energy is generated using fossil fuels still to date. The situation isn’t much better in the US and Canada either: in 2016, 17 metric tons of CO2 was released into the atmosphere in the US - per person!

Our heating habits relying on this outdated technology are the main cause of smog in most cities.

Let’s free the world from unnecessary CO2 emission caused by outdated and wasteful heating technologies!

Instead of heating the whole house unnecessarily, create microclimates that focus the heat to smaller spots in the apartment. With this you can already lower your house’s energy consumption by 33% - 40%.

In addition, with POIZO’s directional heat technology and smart control you can even double the savings. Sounds fair to your pocket and to your planet, right?

MULTI-ZONE PERSONALIZED HEATING

Our patent-pending Directional Heat technology provides multi-zone heat projection, allowing users to simultaneously personalize their thermal comfort according to their own unique needs. This means that everyone in the same room can enjoy their own level of comfort at the same time, resulting in better moods and happier coexistence. Also, Poizo prevents energy waste by selectively targeting and heating the areas that need it.

SAFE. AND NO SOUND.

Besides personal thermal comfort Poizo gives you another kind of comfort by being ultimately safe to use.

A 3D sensor constantly monitors the position of the device, and if it senses anything strange (for eg. the appliance tips over) the heating automatically switches off. Poizo automatically lowers the temperature if an unhealthy or dangerous setting is chosen or if it gets overheated. In case of a software disfunction, it switches off completely. 

As the heating happens through projection, Poizo doesn’t have any fans. No fans mean no noise at all. Sounds great, right?

IT’S SMART. AND GETS SMARTER.

Poizo is equipped with machine learning technology that learns each user’s personal comfort and sets heating power accordingly. Through continuously monitoring the changes in the environment, Poizo is able to fine-tune the projected heat to flawlessly ensure each user’s personal preference. 

In addition, the heater’s smart functions are easily controlled via the Poizo mobile app, meaning all the six zones can be simultaneously adjusted by six users and their six smartphones. Let’s just admit: six is the new sexy!

Remember the time when you and your significant other had the first fight over the thermostat settings? Yeah… we all do. In almost every household where more than one person lives, arguments happen from time to time regarding personal comfort. One of you is feeling either hot or cold - losing control over their own thermal comfort...

The reason behind this unease is the way we heat our rooms: ​the most widespread method is called convectional heating: it first heats the air which then will heat our bodies. However, the hot air inside the room will first rise to the ceiling and then return to us much cooler. In essence we first heat the ceiling followed by the whole volume of air in the room before we’d be able to feel some warmth. 

To make matters worse, we usually heat the room to the level where nobody feels cold, but to achieve this we overheat the air and not only in the room where we are at, but in the whole house! This results in increased energy consumption which in turn increases the greenhouse gas emissions: the #1 reason of polar bears starving to death. Your local heating is pretty much a global problem.

Comfortable and healthy heating

  • Infrared waves represent a safe and healthy way to heat - and guess what: it’s the same method our good old Sun uses to heat our planet. As it has been around all time, ever since the first life forms appeared on Earth, no wonder we find the warmth provided by sun rays the most pleasurable. Rest assured, infrared waves have nothing to do with burning your skin, they only provide heat - but no risky tan at all.

  • Traditional heating methods which completely warm up the air in the room, can cause a big drop in air humidity, resulting in constant dry air indoors(below 40% humidity) during the cold season. Low humidity can cause dry skin, irritate nasal passages and throat, and make the eyes itchy. Poizo’s infrared heating method does not dry the air in volumes, which results in a more optimal and natural air humidity indoors with no irritations or other symptoms.
  • Poizo’s Directional Heat Technology makes it possible to aim the infrared waves to the exact direction where they are needed.
  • Poizo provides Multi-Zone Heating with 6 individually controllable heating zones at the same time, allowing each user to set up different heating temperatures simultaneously.

Safe heating

  • ​​It’s common knowledge that most house fires are caused by portable heaters which easily overheat or flip over. Poizo’s infrared technology has allowed us to significantly decrease the surface temperature needed for providing heat. 
  • The device also has 3D sensors built in which immediately recognize if the heater is about to flip over. The sensors cut the power instantly to make an accident even less likely. 
  • Poizo continuously analyzes the temperatures around the device and if for any reason it rises over a range (i.e. the device gets covered with a cloth), the heating power will be lowered.

Smart heating

  • ​​Besides controlling Poizo on the device itself, you can - of course - control it with your smartphone using Bluetooth. 
  • Using the Poizo app each user can create their Personal Comfort Profile allowing the device to learn their individual settings and to use this knowledge to intuitively adjust to their exact thermal needs.

 

The Poizo smart device with its many sensors and the related smartphone app create a true, ever-evolving comfort ecosystem. 

  • ​​By using Poizo, it constantly learns about your behaviour and usage patterns in order to make you feel warm and cozy any time while using the least amount of energy possible. 
  • Your Personal Comfort Profile is not locked to one device or place. This means wherever you go, be it your office or a hotel thousands of miles away, if there is a POIZO device, it will immediately know what temperature and comfort you prefer.
  • No more quarrels: six different users can simultaneously log into one device and set their preferred heating power to the selected zones.

​​The smartphone app also acts like an analytics tool where you can see the power consumption in real time along with information about inside and outside temperature and humidity levels. 

You can set notifications in case you exceed a certain threshold of energy usage to be able to act accordingly. You’ll also receive notification when you get home on a cold winter evening in order to be able to turn on the heating instantly. Also, you can set up an automatic turn off sequence after you leave the area of the device and a certain number of minutes have passed - so it won’t simply turn off when you accidently move out of the zone while at home.

 

We've used an iterative design process from the very early stages by constantly talking to potential users and refining our design and user experience.

Finding the right material is not an easy task. We've looked at around hundred different steel, aluminium, plastic and ceramics to find the perfect one for our fit. It had to be safe in higher temperatures,lightweight and durable. Many form and design were first 3D printed to help match the best material.

Four prototypes from the very early stage where we validated our directional heat technology, all the way to the final shape and form, with much better heating efficiency and directionality. Please see a demonstration video of our prototype heating to 2 independent direction on different heating temperature. We are using infra thermometer to show the surface temperature and globe thermometer to measure the projected infrared heat temperature.

  • ​​a solid background based on previously founding and managing successful software, hardware startups
  • ​​a team of dedicated and super talented electronic & mechanical engineers who have a long history in designing and manufacturing hardware products
  • ​​built 4 different prototypes, all of them tested and verified in controlled environments
  • ​​finished the electronic and mechanical designing process
  • ​​a ready, full list of the BOM along with all the manufacturing suppliers waiting for the green light

We have put together a team of the most talented engineers, designers and everyone in between. Everybody in our team has worked on successful startups, software and hardware products. Our supply chain is ready. 

This extensive knowledge also makes us understand that building a hardware product is hard. We’ve seen things go sideways with other products making us even more cautious about each step we take, learning from everything we can. However we also believe that this is what makes us qualified and prepared for the upcoming challenges.

Our engineering model is very close to be manufacturing-ready, but we still need to finish and optimise our design for the manufacturing model. Thankfully, the team responsible for this have already done similar processes dozens upon dozens of times before. 

We’ve already met with representatives of TÜV Rheinland - one of the best and largest certification body - who have consulted us about the design and the required standards.

We truly believe that we are able to manage these risks and challenges and give you our word that we will keep everyone in the loop as we go along this wonderful journey you are welcome to join.

​​The best way you can help us is to order a POIZO device from the perks which will help us launch this project and start the manufacturing process. However, we do know that not everybody is able to or has a need for a portable space heater at the moment, and there are ways you CAN help, too:

​​​​Please share our dream, this project with others, your friends and family on social media, while talking about weather and about how to feel comfortable at lower temperatures.

story:
People get into emergency situations but they may not have the time or possibility to call for help using their cell phones. So we wanna introduce bembu to you. bembu stands for “bluetooth emergency button” and allows you to call for help with the push of a button!


Key functionalities


* The experts-mode detects up to 4 clicks and many more actions can be configured freely!


1. More safety for you and your loved ones!

Particularly women are often victims of violence and get traumatized, insecure and scared, especially when they are out alone at night or during the dark. bembu gives you safety and selfconfidence back though you have the possibility to call for help at any time.
Also parents no longer have to worry about their kids, because they have the possiblity to inform mum and dad in any situation.
Older or handicaped people have now a stylish alternative to the bulky, ugly solutions on the market.

In case of an emergency situation, bembu can send a message to multiple pre-defined recipients and guarantee the best help by providing your exact position. In this way bembu can inform your family or friends, the rescue services and the police, but also may deter the attacker through an acoustic sound signal, that help is already on the way. bembu is the perfect companion for you and everyone you care about! ... but bembu is a lot more!



2. Your daily smart help!

To make bembu a day to day available companion we added a really cool feature that will help you through your rough day - 1 click and your smartphone catches your attention if you have lost it - THE PHONEFINDER!

In addition bembu has a lot of great passive features too!
bembu is free of electrical smog, it is waterproove, the battery lasts for 6 months ...

For all who want more, there is the experts-mode, which allows you to freely configure many more functions! 



 

How does it work

The functional principle of bembu is as smart as brilliant!

For installation you just need a Smartphone and the bembu-bracelet. You install the free bembu-APP and pair the devices once via Bluetooth. thats it!

When you press your bembu once, the PHONEFINDER will be activcated.
When you double-press bembu it gets you HELP whenever you need it!

All the functions can be comfortably configured in the APP.

The application and bluetooth connection are only activated if the bembu-button is pressed, therefore, it does not drain your battery. The application recognizes the specific input and preforms the desired action.
bembu supports all common bluetooth-standards and almost every smartphone - so bembu will work even on older smartphones as well as on new ones.

To make bembu a reliable emergency notification system, we only use high quality components and materials, as well as we implemented various strategies to send the emergency notifications as quick and as reliable as possible. We provide best european engineering quality!


Stylish and wearable

We know that style and function are equally important. People, especially women, don’t wear big and bulky tech devices. In fact, they don’t wear “devices”, they wear jewelry. So we set out to create a bracelet that is both ... stylish AND functional.


Share your opinion and help us to improve bembu by clicking this image.


To have bembu as a neutral accessory, we designed it as slim and comfortable as possible - but it still looks elegant and sporty at once!


Where we stand

At the moment we have working models and prototypes of the bembu bracelet. All prototypes are vacuum-formed and finished by hand. In order to take production to the next level, we have already contacted all the suppliers and manufacturers we need. We got the best price offers in order to make bembu affordable for everyone. Production costs per item are relatively reasonable, but the molds and minimum order quantity make it really difficult to carry out with our own funds.

Here is where you guys can truly help. All the money we raise will help us manufacture mass quantity of bembu bracelets and bring the application to the next level. Your help will bring bembu to life within 5 months!

What´s the money for..... here are the primary ones:

  • Completing the electrical design
  • Final prototype field tests
  • Bringing the APP to the final level
  • FCC, CE certification
  • Production costs and tooling
  • Initial minimum production run
  • Qualitymanagement
  • Shipping costs



Press and supporters



Perks

Specs

  • Compatible with Android and iOS
  • Compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 BLE 
  • patented Single-button operation
  • Battery life approximately 12 months standby or 500 activations (on average usage about 6 months)
  • Up to 100 meters operating range 

  • Operating-temperatures from -40°C to +80°C




Project timeline

As you can see from the chart below, we have done a lot of work in product development, redesign and testing with different prototypes.



Risks and challenges

It is important to us that our backers feel we are being open and honest about the challenges we face. Getting the quality of fit and finish we require from vendors – we have developed prototypes and are working to identify the vendors who have experience manufacturing precision designs.

The first was to make the button small and fun to use. We've spent tons of hours in our workshop testing dozens of different prototypes, some were made by us and some were ordered from other manufacturers. Finally, we found the best one and started working on the manufacturing plan.

The second challenge was connecting the button inputs to the app. The protocol we are using is very simple but some of the actions we wanted to preform were hard to program. We didn’t give up and after a few months of programing and QA, all the features we presented work prefect! We are proud of the stage we are in, everything works!

The third one is to make our concept work also with iPhones, currently we are trying to figure out the best solution for iOS operation devices, because native sending of SMS messages by one click is not possible! We will keep you guys updated if there will be an iOS APP on the official start or not!

And the last point on our list is the quick-release connector, we still have to prove during our future endurance tests if our current version is stable enough!



How does indiegogo work

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding website! That means people like us, try to fund a project, so we need people like you spending money to be able to realize it! If we reach our funding goal we ensure that everybody who participated gets his bembu (Perk)! If we do not reach the 30.000€ everybody gets his money back like nothing ever happened!

DEUTSCH/GERMAN:

Diese Kampagne ist dazu da Geld zu sammeln um unser Projekt umzusetzen. Nun bitten wir dich uns finanziell zu unterstützen! Wenn wir das Ziel von 30.000€  erreichen dann kriegst du Anfang November deinen bembu (Perk) als Dankeschön zugesendet. Sollten wir die 30.000€ nicht schaffen gibts das Geld zurück als wäre nichts gewesen!



FAQ

Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, ask us directly.

Click... or send us an email to info@bembu.at

You can also find further information at www.bembu.at
story_txt:
People get into emergency situations but they may not have the time or possibility to call for help using their cell phones. So we wanna introduce bembu to you. bembu stands for “bluetooth emergency button” and allows you to call for help with the push of a button!
Key functionalities
* The experts-mode detects up to 4 clicks and many more actions can be configured freely!

1. More safety for you and your loved ones!
Particularly women are often victims of violence and get traumatized, insecure and scared, especially when they are out alone at night or during the dark. bembu gives you safety and selfconfidence back though you have the possibility to call for help at any time.Also parents no longer have to worry about their kids, because they have the possiblity to inform mum and dad in any situation.Older or handicaped people have now a stylish alternative to the bulky, ugly solutions on the market.
In case of an emergency situation, bembu can send a message to multiple pre-defined recipients and guarantee the best help by providing your exact position. In this way bembu can inform your family or friends, the rescue services and the police, but also may deter the attacker through an acoustic sound signal, that help is already on the way. bembu is the perfect companion for you and everyone you care about! ... but bembu is a lot more!





2. Your daily smart help!
To make bembu a day to day available companion we added a really cool feature that will help you through your rough day - 1 click and your smartphone catches your attention if you have lost it - THE PHONEFINDER!In addition bembu has a lot of great passive features too!bembu is free of electrical smog, it is waterproove, the battery lasts for 6 months ...For all who want more, there is the experts-mode, which allows you to freely configure many more functions! 





 

How does it work

The
functional principle of bembu is as smart as brilliant!
For installation you just need a Smartphone and the bembu-bracelet. You install the free bembu-APP and pair the devices once via Bluetooth. thats it!When you press your bembu once, the PHONEFINDER will be activcated.When you double-press bembu it gets you HELP whenever you need it!All the functions can be comfortably configured in the APP.The
application and bluetooth connection are only activated if the bembu-button is
pressed, therefore, it does not drain your battery. The application recognizes
the specific input and preforms the desired action.bembu supports all common bluetooth-standards and almost every smartphone - so bembu will work even on older smartphones as well as on new ones.
To make bembu a reliable emergency notification system, we only use high quality components and materials, as well as we implemented various strategies to send the emergency notifications as quick and as reliable as possible. We provide best european engineering quality!
Stylish and wearable

We know that style and function are equally important. People, especially women, don’t wear big and bulky tech devices. In fact, they don’t wear “devices”, they wear jewelry. So we set out to create a bracelet that is both ... stylish AND functional.


Share your opinion and help us to improve bembu by clicking this image.
To have bembu as a neutral accessory, we designed it as slim and comfortable as possible - but it still looks elegant and sporty at once!


Where we stand

At the moment we have working models and prototypes of the bembu bracelet. All prototypes are vacuum-formed and finished by hand. In order to take production to the next level, we have already contacted all the suppliers and manufacturers we need. We got the best price offers in order to make bembu affordable for everyone. Production costs per item are relatively reasonable, but the molds and minimum order quantity make it really difficult to carry out with our own funds.


Here is where you guys can truly help. All the money we raise will help us
manufacture mass quantity of bembu bracelets and bring the application to the
next level. Your help will bring bembu to life within 5 months!

What´s the money for..... here are the primary ones:

Completing the electrical design
Final prototype field tests
Bringing the APP to the final level
FCC, CE certification
Production costs and tooling
Initial minimum production run
Qualitymanagement
Shipping costs



Press and supporters





Perks



Specs


Compatible with Android and iOS
Compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 BLE 
patented Single-button operation
Battery life approximately 12 months standby or 500 activations (on average usage about 6 months)
Up to 100 meters operating range 

Operating-temperatures from -40°C to +80°C





Project timeline

As you can see from the chart below, we have done a lot of work in product development, redesign and testing with different prototypes.




Risks and challenges

It is important to us that our backers feel we are being open and honest about the challenges we face. Getting the quality of fit and finish we require from vendors – we have developed prototypes and are working to identify the vendors who have experience manufacturing precision designs.
The first was to make the button small and fun to use. We've spent tons of hours in our workshop testing dozens of different prototypes, some were made by us and some were ordered from other manufacturers. Finally, we found the best one and started working on the manufacturing plan. 
The second challenge was connecting the button inputs to the app. The protocol we are using is very simple but some of the actions we wanted to preform were hard to program. We didn’t give up and after a few months of programing and QA, all the features we presented work prefect! We are proud of the stage we are in, everything works!

The third one is to make our concept work also with iPhones, currently we are trying to figure out the best solution
for iOS operation devices, because native sending of SMS messages by one click is not possible! We will keep you guys updated if there will be an iOS APP on the official start or not!And the last point on our list is the quick-release connector, we still have to prove during our future endurance tests if our current version is stable enough!
How does
indiegogo work
Indiegogo is a crowdfunding website! That means people like us, try to fund a project, so
we need people like you spending money to be able to realize it! If we reach
our funding goal we ensure that everybody who participated gets his bembu (Perk)! If
we do not reach the 30.000€ everybody gets his money back like nothing ever happened!

www.bembu.at

story:
BamBols – Reusable Bamboo Mesh Produce Bags to keep produce fresh longer

Reusable Mesh Produce Bags made of viscose from bamboo - reusable, strong, sustainable and help you avoid single use plastic.

A bag that keeps your fruits & vegetables fresh and does not end up in a landfill!

An average American family takes home 29 plastic bags every week in some form. We felt guilty continuing this practice and looked for an effective eco-friendly solution. Unable to find a durable high-quality produce bag, we decided to create Bambols. Bambols offers an effective solution to transport and store your produce. 

Key Features:

Mesh Structure: stretchable, easy identification of contents

Reusable: can be washed and reused many times

Strong: can carry 20 pounds (9 kg) per bag

Breathable: great air circulation keeps produce fresh longer

Tare weight on tag so the cashier can reduce it from the produce weight

Sustainable: Bamboo farm yields 10x more than cotton and grows up to 3 feet/day

Keeps produce fresh and saves space

Bonus: Bamboo crops absorb 5x the amount of greenhouse gases and produce 35% more oxygen than an equivalent stand of trees!                      

BamBols come in two sizes – Medium and Large. We wanted to keep it simple with just two sizes to reduce your decision fatigue as there is one less choice to make about the right bag size and also help us keep our costs down with fewer skews and inventory.

2 sizes to suit your shopping needs

In addition to produce shopping, these multipurpose bags can be used as home organizers, laundry bags for delicates, travel storage organizer bags, etc.

Durability Testing:

We have been testing our prototypes over the past year to iterate and improve our design. We selected a doubling yarn structure, smaller mesh hole size and covered inseam design that would increase the strength of our bag so that it can carry heavy loads, be washed and reused many times. 

Bambols can carry 20 pounds (9 kg approx) each without losing stretch

Recycling Sustainability program:

Finally, when it comes time to replace Bambols (after many many uses), we offer a recycle program if you are unable to properly dispose. Ship us back the bags so we can recycle and in exchange, we will offer you a discount on your next purchase. This way, you will be part of our sustainable community for a lifetime and ensure that any products you purchase from us is not left behind on our planet.

Back us on social media too:

https://www.facebook.com/Goodkarmamart/

https://www.instagram.com/goodkarmamart/

Green shopping Starter Pack:

Starter Pack: Mesh Bags + Tote Bag

Our foldable GOTS Certified Organic Cotton Tote Bag along with our Bamboo Mesh Bags will help you completely avoid plastic for all your shopping needs. The sleeves help compartmentalize your items and when folded, can easily be stored in your backpack/ work bag or your car glove box.

Our Team:

Good Karma Mart is a group of likeminded people collaborating to bring high quality sustainable products to replace plastic products in our day to day life. Our supply chain only includes ethically sourced raw materials and certified factories that pay a livable wage and have met government waste management standards. 

Why do we need your support?

We can't do this without you. The funds we raise here will go towards stitching of the bags as well as logistics. Our Indiegogo backers will be among the first to receive Bambols  and the Cotton Tote bags in hand. We simply can't do this without your support. A big thank you for taking the time to consider our project.

Care Instructions:

Hand or Machine wash, line dry

Shipping:

We offer FREE shipping to all our backers in the U.S.A.

Project Timeline

June & July 2020 - Manufacturing and Stitching

August 2020 - Shipping

 www.goodkarmamart.com 

Long-lasting design

We have been testing our prototypes over the past 3 months to iterate and improve our design. We selected a doubling yarn structure, smaller mesh hole size and covered inseam design that would increase the strength of our bag so that it can carry heavy loads, be washed and reused many times.

Reusability and recyclability

Our bags are reusable. We are providing a ship back program through which we will repair and reuse bag materials for future product manufacturing and provide a discount to the consumer for future purchases

Sustainable materials

Bamboo is an eco-friendly and sustainable crop and is naturally organic. It is self-generating and requires little water, no pesticides and no irrigation. It typically grows well in poor soil that is unusable for other crops, and it is often planted to restore degraded soils. All our packaging material will be biodegradable and will not end up in a landfill or oceans.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our Manufacturing Factory will be WRAP Certified (World Wide Responsible Accredited Production) and SA8000 - Socially Accountable and Ethically Correct Company Certified

Sustainable Distribution

All packaging is 100% Biodegradable - no plastic or polyester is used in the production of our products

Something else

The factories in our supply chain in India pay livable wages and DO NOT operate under sweatshop environment. In the future after establishing our costs involved, we look forward to partnering with an NGO to plant trees to complete the product life cycle and become net zero impact to the planet.

story:
What is Static Energy™Drink?

Static Energy™is the consumer’s solution to the long and short-term effects of most energy drinks. Unlike other energy drinks, this beverage seeks to give the end user the energy needed without the horrendous aftertaste, jitters, or crash. This energy drink has one Goal and its to help you reach YOURS! You want a boost of energy; you get a boost of energy!

Static Energy™Drink: The solution

What do you do when all the products available in your local stores, which claim to give you an energy boost, simply makes you jittery and also makes your heart feel as if its going to pulsate out of your chest? What do you do after you get a quick boost of energy, but once you lose your wings, the crash is not worth the initial boost you felt? The answer is quite simple, look for a new source. You seek out a new source that is able to provide you the energy you need to put in those extra hours in the studio or at work, more effort in the gym, or to just simply stay awake after a long day without the additional placebo effects.

As typical workaholics who get less than 5 hours of sleep on average each night, it was imperative for the Static Energy™ Drink Group to develop the perfect formula for a beverage that would provide added alertness and focus while stimulating the mind.

What is the goal of Static Energy™ Group?

The goal of Static Energy™ is to bring a fresh taste into the energy drink market with the intent of using natural sweeteners in the formulation process. We aim to have a product that is among one of the few energy drinks made with natural sweeteners while accommodating the customers need to find what they are consuming enjoyable. The main foci in the formulation of this drink are to be without side effects as well as being an enjoyable refreshment.

Why//How/When is indiegogo?
Why - indiegogo gives people like us, with unique and specific dreams, a chance to make them come to life with help from supporters like you.
When - Now. We have just 60 days to raise $20,000.

How will your money be used?

With your support, funds will help bring Static Energy™ to life by allowing us to hire the top professionals in the beverage industry known as PowerBrands(developed Gatorade, Pepsi, Sierra Mist, Mountain Dew, rapper 50 cents new energy shot: Street Kings Energy and more) to Research & Develop our beverage, Packaging: which is the shape and design of the can itself, Label Design: meaning our logo could possibly change for the better, Product Formulation, and last but not least, Produce prototypes to generate interest and awareness prior to manufacturing.

How Do I Help?

If you've never used indiegogo before, here is the scoop. We need help getting our project off the ground, so we reach out to people like yourselves that may share a similar interest in makin Static Energy™ come to life so you have a new and effective energy drink to enjoy.
We have 60 days to reach our goal. If we don't reach it the money that was pledged will be refunded to your account.. If we do reach it, we get to keep it and make Static Energy™yours and our reality. If we go beyond it we are going to be able to do it faster and better (so that's what we are really hoping for).
Read over the incentives on the right-hand side and decide which perks you are interested in. The benefit to you is that the more you offer the better the value because the prizes are cumulative.
Anything helps, so even if you can't reach our lowest reward level you can make it up to us. Every dollar counts.. so donate a dollar if that's all you can do :) The other big way you can help is to tell EVERYONE about this page and what we are doing. The more we get this networked the greater chance we have at succeeding. We mean it EVERYONE! We have big dreams. Without you, we will remain where we are. With your help, we can build an effective brand and become a staple in an ever-growing market.

Please remember that you will be refunded if we don't reach our goal. If we do, we will be funded in September when the project ends. We bet 20,000 people could spare $1 dollar.

Thanks everyone! We really appreciated your Support! Remember to follow us on twitter @staticenergyusa and like our facebook fanpage facebook.com/staticenergydrink
Cheers,

Ray, Stef, & Fritz

story:
What the media is saying about us:

Download the press kit here

 

 

Ever knocked over your phone while struggling with cables, glasses of water and books? That's why the traditional nightstand is no good anymore.

Periquette redesigns the nightstand for the modern lifestyle.

 

 

All the things you need, right where you need them, in a tidy minimal space. Boom.

 

 

Your Periquette is as unique as you. Customize it to ensure it fits 100% your needs.

 

 

Produced on demand. We only use what we need. No stock goes to waste. Never.

 

Oh, and Periquette nightstand is really affordable. Custom made design furniture has never cost less!

 

 

 

 

 

These are all the accessories that you will be available to place freely on your nightstand. Missing one you need? Please let us know! Our intention is to be always designing new accessories to improve this nightstand and future products.

 

 

 

Combine the four available colors with the three available finishes as you want. There are so many combinations!

 

 

Colors (columns): Black, White, Mustard and Lime.

Finishes (rows)

Light: oak veneer + light felt

Dark: wallnut veneer + dark felt

White: white painted wallnut veneer + light felt

 

 

 

 

Prices converted to € at checkout. Prices in USD are estimations.

Choose your reward and back this project! This is what will happen:

  1. We will give you a unique coupon code.
  2. After the campaign is successfully funded we'll start working on setting up the customizer platform and all the machinery we need to start production.
  3. Once all of this is ready, we will contact you so you can use the code to access the platform where you'll customize and order the Periquette nightstand you've purchased here.

 

**UPDATE** ORDER PERIOD EXTENDED

Every reward during campaign time will be valid for a lifetime. No matter what it says on the perk description, this applies.

Get your wall organizer at special launch price. Order it whenever you need it.

You'll be able to place your order from expected delivery date (Dec 2019) until Dec 2049.

 

 

Back us now and you will get a custom message engraving for free (exclusive crowdfunding ID or choose your message), to make your Periquette even more unique.

 

 

 

 

Indiegogo price from 49€/59$ Early Bird, 69€/74$

Retail price 99€/109$

Base board size 380x380x6 mm (width x height x depth)

Total weight 1,5 kg

Max. shelf size 380x200mm (width x depth)

Max. shelf load 5 kg 

Materials

Base Laser cut MDF with wood veneer, 6mm thick

Pockets & drawers Laser cut Cotton felt

Small parts 3D printed PLA bioplastic

 

 

 

 

So, why are companies not using the latest technology to produce goods in a more sustainable way? We've found two reasons: they avoid substantial changes to the production line and they only care about economical costs. We are not a traditional company.

 

 

We have spent 5 years finding a way to combine our passion for technology, our design engineering know-how, and our ecological awareness. Periquette is the result.

By taking advantage of the new technologies of production, communication and distribution, we are able to create a platform in which you choose the product, customize it, and ―only after you place the order― we produce and send it to you.

 

 

As for the  future, our intentions are to grow locally wherever there's a big enough community of Periquette users. We don't want to create one huge factory and ship internationally, and we don't need it either. Our dream is to create small factories in every continent/country, this way we can produce locally and ship our goods nearby.

Our mission is to make products that suit 100% your needs because we produce them just for you.

It's like craftsmanship feat. 21st century tech.

 

 

 

September 2018

We start to look for new ways to make a living doing what we love.

January 2019

Periquette idea sparks. We start working on designing the first product, creating the brand and prototyping ideas.

April 2019

The third prototype hits the mark. Work on the crowdfunding campaign starts while we keep improving the product.

June 2019

First photoshoots of the product and filming of the pitch video. Also, first investors notice us and request meetings. We attend, but finally decide that we prefer the crowdfunding way.

August 2019

Product, brand, pictures and video are ready. We start to show Periquette and get feedback from potential users.

September & October 2019    **NOW**

Crowdfunding campaign is on! Time to make this happen.

November 2019

Purchase and set up the machinery and the customizing platform, order raw materials, and everything else to get the production and logistics lines ready.

December 2019

First nightstands are delivered. We will be producing and delivering them in backing order. First come, first served.

 

 

 

We are Luis Herram and Carles Marquina, two designers from Valencia, Spain.

 

 

We studied Industrial Design Engineering and Product Development at the UPV. Since we graduated 5 years ago we've been trying to make a living doing what we love: creating innovative products that solve people's problems.

Along the way we've made a lot of mistakes learnt tons of stuff, acquired new skills and enjoyed various design honors such as exhibiting in the Stockholm Furniture & Light Fair, selling hundreds of our products worldwide, being featured in the world's most prestigious design publications and receiving the A' Design Award in the Furniture and Homeware design category.

If you're curious and want to know more about our past, here you have the good ol' companies that we've founded: Smallgran product design studio and Peim branding agency.

Periquette is our new and most ambitious adventure. We believe this is much more than a new product design or an emerging furniture brand, Periquette is a revolutionary new model of consumption that can open the world to more sustainable ways to produce home goods.

 

 

 

This is the fifth product we produce, and our very first crowdfunding campaign. With every product we get better at setting accurate expectations and delivering on our promises. However, there's always a chance for things to fail. If that's the case, we promise you we'll communicate with full transparency and we'll work to solve them in the way that better satisfies you.

Supply Chain Risk: a machine or tool breaks, we get the wrong materials, or things like these. This happens from time to time and may affect how long it takes to create our products.

Shipping Risk: global shipping and logistics is hard. Once we reach certain threshold we plan to outsource that stuff to experts. But even they may suffer uncontrollable mishaps.

Huuuuge success: if the best thing happens and we get a ton of amazing backers that decide to support us (like, several thousands of 'em), that'd change our plans. We're a very very small company. We've planned for the worst but, no matter how much we plan it, we can't be ready for the best due to lack of funds. If this happens, our current plans will change, and we'll need to wait for the campaign funds to operate. Thus it may take us a bit longer to set up all the production basics. In that case, we'll let you know our new plans as soon as we have them, we'll create a virtual queue for all the units you've ordered and we will start to produce and ship them in the same order you've backed us: first come, first served.

 

 

 

We don't want to produce our goods before selling them. And we don't want to create a company before knowing if the world wants it. Crowdfunding is perfect for this.

Additionally, crowdfunding gives us the freedom to create this company just as we envision it and generate a community of people willing to help us grow in a way that's meaningful to all of us.

For now, we're just two guys in a basement. After this campaign, our highest expectation is to be two guys in a very small factory, with a growing community that supports our activity. Crowdfunding makes possible to achieve this without the need of external investors. And we want to keep all of what we do between you and us.

 

 

 

Periquette can change the way we produce our furniture. Back now and help us show the world there is a better alternative. Thank you for your support.
story_txt:
What the media is saying about us:Download the press kit here  Ever knocked over your phone while struggling with cables, glasses of water and books? That's why the traditional nightstand is no good anymore.Periquette redesigns the nightstand for the modern lifestyle.  All the things you need, right where you need them, in a tidy minimal space. Boom.  Your Periquette is as unique as you. Customize it to ensure it fits 100% your needs.  Produced on demand. We only use what we need. No stock goes to waste. Never. Oh, and Periquette nightstand is really affordable. Custom made design furniture has never cost less!     These are all the accessories that you will be available to place freely on your nightstand. Missing one you need? Please let us know! Our intention is to be always designing new accessories to improve this nightstand and future products.   Combine the four available colors with the three available finishes as you want. There are so many combinations!  Colors (columns): Black, White, Mustard and Lime.Finishes (rows)Light: oak veneer + light feltDark: wallnut veneer + dark feltWhite: white painted wallnut veneer + light felt    Prices converted to € at checkout. Prices in USD are estimations.Choose your reward and back this project! This is what will happen:
We will give you a unique coupon code.
After the campaign is successfully funded we'll start working on setting up the customizer platform and all the machinery we need to start production.
Once all of this is ready, we will contact you so you can use the code to access the platform where you'll customize and order the Periquette nightstand you've purchased here.
 **UPDATE** ORDER PERIOD EXTENDEDEvery reward during campaign time will be valid for a lifetime. No matter what it says on the perk description, this applies.Get your wall organizer at special launch price. Order it whenever you need it.You'll be able to place your order from expected delivery date (Dec 2019) until Dec 2049.  Back us now and you will get a custom message engraving for free (exclusive crowdfunding ID or choose your message), to make your Periquette even more unique.    Indiegogo price from 49€/59$ Early Bird, 69€/74$Retail price 99€/109$Base board size 380x380x6 mm (width x height x depth)Total weight 1,5 kgMax. shelf size 380x200mm (width x depth)Max. shelf load 5 kg MaterialsBase Laser cut MDF with wood veneer, 6mm thickPockets & drawers Laser cut Cotton feltSmall parts 3D printed PLA bioplastic    So, why are companies not using the latest technology to produce goods in a more sustainable way? We've found two reasons: they avoid substantial changes to the production line and they only care about economical costs. We are not a traditional company.  We have spent 5 years finding a way to combine our passion for technology, our design engineering know-how, and our ecological awareness. We don't want to create one huge factory and ship internationally, and we don't need it either. Our dream is to create small factories in every continent/country, this way we can produce locally and ship our goods nearby.Our mission is to make products that suit 100% your needs because we produce them just for you.It's like craftsmanship feat. 21st century tech.   September 2018We start to look for new ways to make a living doing what we love.January 2019Periquette idea sparks. story:
Summary

The GripClip is the brainchild of three old friends; Kevin Hutton, Robin Gupta and Ben Pereira.

Kevin Hutton,

From since as far back as I can remember I was always artistic and design oriented. Years ago when going off to university to decide the direction of my life, I foolishly decided to leave design and creativity by the wayside to pursue Finance. Why? Because A) I can do it and B) it “made sense”; I could get a decent job and go on with life. This proved to be a silly decision that resulted in years of unhappiness and misdirection. I was unhappy but could never really put my finger on why. Fortunately I never completely gave up design and creativity and continued it on the side. I thought this would be “just for fun” yet every time I sat down “for fun” I was happy….very happy. After 37 years I decided to just be me. Be the person I was born to be and not deny myself. The GripClip for me is my proverbial foot being put down and is the beginning of many great ideas to come out of the mind of a much happier person. I guess the big lesson from all of this is to stay true to you.

Robin Gupta,

Love, laughter and creation are all sustenance for the soul. Without them we are but empty vessels. 

Taking creation seriously, we came up with The GripClip. Designed to be the best solution for one's jingling change. This is a project that I'm proud of, but i am also pround to be part of a team that has the experience, knowledge, and that soulful need to create great and wonderful things. 

Benny Pereira,

I believe that every life has a story and in life you make choices. These choices define you and set the course for the direction of your life. My life is about trying new things, new ideas, for I know these are instruments that lead us into new avenues, new dimensions of our own minds. Without trying what your heart desires, one can never know what each of our spirits are capable of. For all my own life, I took many directions, tried different avenues not knowing. But not knowing gave me the ability to create. In being part of the Grip Clip, this creativity act leaps into endless opportunities.

What You Get

What inspired the GripClip was the annoyance of having change floating around in our pockets, making that very embarrassing jingling sound when we walk. Also, we have found that we tend to keep cash separate from our cards so we thought to ourselves “what if we could design a money clip that also holds our change together and stop it from jingling?”. The GripClip is a twp piece detachable money clip:

- Stainless Steel Money Clip to hold your bills.

- Neodymium powered "sticky stick" the magnetically holds your change    tightly together.

Neodymium magnets are safe and some of the strongest rare earth magnets in the world! The pulling power of the magnet in the GripClip is roughly 3lbs!

What We Need

Our funding goal is $4,000.00.

Machining costs - $2000.00

Plastic Injection - $800.00

Packaging - $200.00

Inventory - $1000.00

 

Where do the funds go if you dont hit your target?

We are on fixed funding so if we do not hit our target your money will be refunded. We cannot do this without your help! Thank you!

 

The Impact

  • A unique money clip that holds ALL your cash in a nice compact package
  • No more jingling change when you walk or search through your bag
  • Own a product that will be the first of many other great ideas and products to come from Kev, Rob and Ben.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out and about the GripClip!
  • Dont forget to use the indiegogo share tools!

story:
If we reach our goal the Cool Grip will be made in the USA so please support us and keep manufacturing in the United States.

 

 

The smart, safe, simple way to microwave food. Cool Grip never gets hot, keeps spills and boil overs contained while preventing burns.

 

                        Securely holds bowls and plates of nearly any size.

 

What is Cool Grip?

Cool Grip is an innovative microwaveable tray that never gets hot in the microwave, is safe to handle without oven mitts and helps keep spills, boil overs and messes contained. It stores easily in the microwave and is dishwasher safe.

 

Where did Cool Grip come from?

Cool Grip came about after my nieces visited me during their winter break and I microwaved a ton of spaghettio's, ravioli and soup food for them. And over and over, I'd burn my fingers on hot bowls and have messy, spilled food everywhere -- inside the microwave and out. There has to be a better way, I thought. After the nieces left and I scoured the kitchen, I did find a better way. And Cool Grip was born.

Cool Grip is an easy-to-store, dishwasher safe tray that makes microwaving food safe and clean and makes transporting hot food simple. It's a useful, practical kitchen product that's had its share of interest from some of the biggest kitchen product companies in the nation and was a finalist in the TeleBrands Inventors Day Competition. The economy, however, had a hand in keeping Cool Grip from physically getting to market and getting on store shelves. Plus, I definitely want to manufacture this product in the U.S.A., but it's a bit more costly to do that than to send it overseas for production.

That's why I need your help.

Safe for kids while keeping your kitchen clean.

Why do I want it?

You want Cool Grip because it is a practical kitchen product. We're all busy, and the microwave is used by every member of the family to heat meals-on-the-go, after school snacks and everything in between. Kids and adults alike can use it to safely microwave and carry food, eliminating spills, burns and messes -- both inside the microwave and around the kitchen. It's dishwasher safe and easily stores right inside the microwave so it's ready for the next person who needs it. Use Cool Grip, and there's no need to use oven mitts or dishtowels to remove hot bowls and plates -- simply grab the handy handles and go.

Perfect for the dorm, because all college students live on ramen noodles.

Quick and useful facts about Cool Grip

· Never gets hot

· Made of food-safe and dishwasher-safe plastic

· BPA-free and safe for all foods

· Deep reservoir keeps spills and boil overs contained

· Just 3ʺ high and just under 12ʺwide -- fits nearly any size microwave

· Holds virtually any size bowl or plate regardless of shape or depth

· Heat your frozen pre packaged meals

· Stores easily in the microwave when not in use

· Comfortable, slotted handles for easy carrying

· Sits flat on any surface (tabletop, TV tray, counter or your lap)

· Perfect for any kitchen, dorm or workplace

· Expected delivery date is April 2013

Why do you need funding?

In this economy, companies are reluctant to provide funding for new products at all, especially those that aren't created inside their own organization. Even though we came amazingly close to having the product produced by large manufacturers, it didn't come to fruition. I'm encouraged and driven by these companies' interest in the product. They all said Cool Grip is a viable, smart product because it's a simple solution to a common problem.

I also am committed to having Cool Grip manufactured in the U.S.A., but it's costly to do that. The injection molding process is very expensive, especially in the United States. With your help, I can give the project to a Midwestern injection molding company and help keep manufacturing jobs stateside and create new jobs at the same time.

Our goal of 8,000 pre-orders will get the Cool Grip up and running right here in the U.S.A.

What do I get?

For each $10 you pledge, plus $5.00 for shipping & handling you'll receive one Cool Grip to make your life cleaner, quicker and safer.
Sorry backers, but we have no control over the shipping cost. But if you order two Cool Grips, the shipping is the same price as ordering one. Get one for work and one for home, or give one to someone you love -- it makes a great gift for anyone!

Thank you!

Any support you can provide is greatly appreciated!

We believe we have reduced the risk of this project failing due to the fact that we have:

• Solved a common problem that everyone has experienced
• Spent over a year testing tray designs until deciding on the great model seen in our video
• Patent has been filed for and is pending
• Interviewed multiple companies before finding dependable manufacturers that produce quality products
• Filed for our trademark
• Designed a website to showcase the Cool Grip
• Created a Facebook page to stir interest
• Brought on an experienced Sales Rep. with contacts from major retailers
• Secured space to handle any inventory needed

We believe we have done our homework and that has put us in a spot to succeed. We haven’t rushed this project and have thoroughly researched every aspect and for that reason we have eliminated many pitfalls that a lot of new projects fall in to. We hope after you review our project you will agree and feel confident in backing the Cool Grip.

We haven’t rushed this project and have thoroughly researched every aspect and for that reason we have eliminated many pitfalls that a lot of new projects fall in to. story:
SimuLight Adapter allows you to use a lower cost, standard size Compact Florescent Light (CFL) bulb in recessed or track lighting that requires much more expensive CFL flood lights.

SimuLight Adapter Will:

  • Save You Money

  • Help the Environment

  • Improve the Appearance of Your Light Fixtures

 

SimuLight Adapter - The Genesis

SimuLight Adapter was conceived when we came to the realization that complying with the light bulb requirements in recently enacted energy legislation was going to cost us an arm and a leg.

We were faced with replacing the low cost, incandescent flood light bulbs we have all used for years with much more expensive Compact Florescent Light bulbs (CFLs) or Light Emitting Diode bulbs (LEDs). The chart below demonstrates that this represents a significant increase.

 

If you look at the CFL bulbs that means paying on average $2.95 versus $8.05. For LEDs it is a difference of $19.40 versus $33.80.

 

The Concept

The basic challenge in the development of the SimuLight Adapter was to devise a way that a reasonably priced, standard size CLF or LCD bulb could be used in place of a much more expensive Flood Light CFL or LCD bulb in recessed or track lighting.

The solution was to develop a low cost, reusable, plastic shell that would enclose a standard sized bulb, amplify and focus the light, to achieve the same output as a Flood Light.

 

 

    

The Savings

The next challenge was to design and produce a product that would fulfill the performance objectives AND make economic sense.  Here is a quick look at how the numbers play out for CFL bulbs.

 

On the first usage the savings is slightly over $2.00 for each fixture you have. However, since the SimuLight Adapter is reusable, and durable, you only have to purchase a new bulb when you need to change the light, so the savings increases to $5.00, every time you change a bulb in the future!

 

A Lot of Bulbs = A Lot of Cash

Most houses that have recessed or track lights have more than one. Many newer homes have quite a few (we found a guy who had 72!). The chart below illustrates how the savings can add up over time if you have multiple fixtures in your home.

 

 

SimuLight - Good for the Environment

As our project progressed, we began to also see an opportunity to reduce the environmental impact of disposing of hundreds of millions of flood light bulbs every year. Since SimuLight Adapter is reusable, you don't end up contributing all that extra glass to the waste stream every time you change a bulb!

 

More Expensive Bulbs =>=> Unattractive Lighting

To avoid the relatively high cost of CFL and LED flood light bulbs, many people are opting to use the standard CFL and LED bulbs in recessed or track lighting fixtures. The results are very unattractive light fixtures, which is unfortunate since you invest in these type of light fixtures as much for design and appearance as for the functional light.

   

 

Set the Mood or Color Your World

SimuLight Adapter is shipped with a Frosted Cap as the standard lens cover. Since lighting can do so much to set the right mood we wanted to also provide some other, fun options.

  • A clear cap that simulates a spotlight, and provides an overall brighter light output. 
  • Several colored caps that can be used for holidays or other special occasions. 

Several of these are available as part of our rewards and if you need others they are available on our website. 

 

 

Who Are We?

We are a small group of business professionals with combined experience of over 60-years. Our expertise covers such critical as; Engineering, New Product Development, Marketing, Sales Finance and General Management.

Why Indiegogo?

Beyond raising funds, Indiegogo allows us to assess our demand, build a stronger relationship with our early adopters, and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.

Use of Funds

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put SimuLight Adapter into production.

What Do I Get If I Back This Project?

Most importantly you get the satisfaction of knowing you helped this project become a reality and helped rid the world of ugly lighting. Since that may not be enough for some of you, we also offer some pretty great rewards.
story_txt:
SimuLight Adapter allows you to use a lower cost, standard size Compact Florescent Light (CFL) bulb in recessed or track lighting that requires much more expensive CFL flood lights. 
SimuLight Adapter Will:


Save You Money


Help the Environment


Improve the Appearance of Your Light Fixtures


 
SimuLight Adapter - The Genesis
SimuLight Adapter was conceived when we came to the realization that complying with the light bulb requirements in recently enacted energy legislation was going to cost us an arm and a leg.
We were faced with replacing the low cost, incandescent flood light bulbs we have all used for years with much more expensive Compact Florescent Light bulbs (CFLs) or Light Emitting Diode bulbs (LEDs). The chart below demonstrates that this represents a significant increase.

 
If you look at the CFL bulbs that means paying on average $2.95 versus $8.05. For LEDs it is a difference of $19.40 versus $33.80.
 
The Concept
The basic challenge in the development of the SimuLight Adapter was to devise a way that a reasonably priced, standard size CLF or LCD bulb could be used in place of a much more expensive Flood Light CFL or LCD bulb in recessed or track lighting.
The solution was to develop a low cost, reusable, plastic shell that would enclose a standard sized bulb, amplify and focus the light, to achieve the same output as a Flood Light.
 
 
     
The Savings
The next challenge was to design and produce a product that would fulfill the performance objectives AND make economic sense.  Here is a quick look at how the numbers play out for CFL bulbs.
 

On the first usage the savings is slightly over $2.00 for each fixture you have. However, since the SimuLight Adapter is reusable, and durable, you only have to purchase a new bulb when you need to change the light, so the savings increases to $5.00, every time you change a bulb in the future!
 
A Lot of Bulbs = A Lot of Cash
Most houses that have recessed or track lights have more than one. Many newer homes have quite a few (we found a guy who had 72!). The chart below illustrates how the savings can add up over time if you have multiple fixtures in your home.
 
 
SimuLight - Good for the Environment
As our project progressed, we began to also see an opportunity to reduce the environmental impact of disposing of hundreds of millions of flood light bulbs every year. Since SimuLight Adapter is reusable, you don't end up contributing all that extra glass to the waste stream every time you change a bulb!

 
More Expensive Bulbs =>=> Unattractive Lighting
To avoid the relatively high cost of CFL and LED flood light bulbs, many people are opting to use the standard CFL and LED bulbs in recessed or track lighting fixtures. The results are very unattractive light fixtures, which is unfortunate since you invest in these type of light fixtures as much for design and appearance as for the functional light.
    
 
Set the Mood or Color Your World
SimuLight Adapter is shipped with a Frosted Cap as the standard lens cover. Since lighting can do so much to set the right mood we wanted to also provide some other, fun options.

A clear cap that simulates a spotlight, and provides an overall brighter light output. 

Several colored caps that can be used for holidays or other special occasions. 
Several of these are available as part of our rewards and if you need others they are available on our website. 
 

 
Who Are We?
We are a small group of business professionals with combined experience of over 60-years. Our expertise covers such critical as; Engineering, New Product Development, Marketing, Sales Finance and General Management.
Why Indiegogo?
Beyond raising funds, Indiegogo allows us to assess our demand, build a stronger relationship with our early adopters, and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.
Use of Funds
We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put SimuLight Adapter into production.
What Do I Get If I Back This Project?
Most importantly you get the satisfaction of knowing you helped this project become a reality and helped rid the world of ugly lighting. Since that may not be enough for some of you, we also offer some pretty great rewards.

story:
_______________________________________________________________________

TÜRKÇE

Tarafsız ve adil bir seçim için, gönüllüleri destekleyin! #secimsenin 

Türkiye, tarihinde ilk kez halkın oyları ile Cumhurbaşkanını seçmeye hazırlanıyor. Yaklaşık 55 milyon seçmenin oy kullanmasının beklendiği bu seçimde, yurt içinde ve yurt dışında 200 bine yakın sandıkta oy kullanılacak. Hedefimiz, Cumhurbaşkanlığı seçiminde sandıklarda yerini alacak bağımsız sandık gözetmenlerimizin sayısını çoğaltmak, her sandıktan doğru bilgi almamızı sağlayacak iletişim ağını yaygınlaştırmak; her ilde, her ilçede en sağlıklı veriyi elde etmek için bütün imkanları seferber etmek!

Sandıkları takip ediyoruz!

Indiegogo kampanyamıza yapacağınız her bağışla, seçim süreci boyunca gönüllülerin yanında yer alarak sandığınızın, oylarınızın en yakın takipçisi olabilirsiniz. Kampanyamıza bağışta bulunarak, seçim sonuçlarının güvenli olarak sağlanması için hazırlanan yazılıma, sandık gözetmenlerinin faydalanacağı eğitim modüllerine, bilginin tarafsız ve şeffaf dağılımını esas alan bilgi ağına doğrudan katkıda bulunabilirsiniz.

Gönüllüleri desteklemeyi seçin, oylarınızı yakından izleyin! 

Antalya'nın Oyları, ABD'nin Oyları, Ankara'nın Oyları, Almanya’nın Oyları, Eskişehir’in Oyları, Fransa'nın Oyları, İzmir'in Oyları, ABD'nin Oyları, Adana'nın Oyları, Bursa’nın Oyları, Hollanda’nın Oyları, Rize'nin Oyları, İsviçre’nin Oyları, Kanada'nın Oyları, Ağrı'nın Oyları, Avusturya'nın Oyları, Yalova'nın Oyları, İngiltere’nin Oyları... Türkiye'nin Oyları ile 29 ilde, Gurbetin Oyları ile 10 ülkede sandık gözetmeni olarak oyların en yakın takipçisi olacağız. Siz de gönüllü sponsoru olarak daha fazla gönüllüye, daha fazla sandığa ulaşmamıza yardımcı olabilirsiniz. Gönüllü sponsoru olarak desteklediğiniz her gönüllü adına, memleketinizdeki, bulunduğunuz bölgedeki veya oy verdiğiniz sandıktaki haber ve tutanakları sizlere aktaracak, seçim analiz ve sonuç bildirimlerini sandıklarını sahiplenen bütün destekçilerimiz ile paylaşacağız.

Tarafsız bilgi ve iletişim ağını destekleyin! 

Indiegogo kampanyamızda bilişim veya eğitim sponsoru olarak, seçim sonuçlarının güvenli bir şekilde toplanması ve aktarılması için hazırlanan yazılıma, sandık gözetmenlerinin faydalanacağı eğitim modüllerine, bilginin tarafsız ve şeffaf bir şekilde dağılımını esas alan iletişim ağına katkıda bulunabilirsiniz. Eğitim veya bilişim sponsoru olarak katkıda bulunan destekçilerimiz, seçim sonuç bildirim raporunu e-posta ile alacak ve sosyal medyada yayınladığımız bilgilendirici mesajlarda katkılarını belirten özel bir teşekkür alacaklar.

Seçimde yanımızda olun!

Indiegogo kampamızda seçim sponsoru olarak, seçim gününde sandık başında görev alacak bir çok gönüllünün yemek ve ulaşım gibi ihtiyaçlarını karşılayabilirsiniz. Seçim sponsoru olarak katkıda bulunan destekçilerimiz, seçim sonuç bildirim raporunu da e-posta ile alabilecekler.

Gönüllüleri destekleyin, Türkiye'nin en yaygın vatandaş girişiminin başarıya ulaşmasına katkıda bulunun! 

Türkiye’nin Oyları nedir? Türkiye'nin Oyları, yurt içinde ve yurt dışında oy kullanacak olan seçmenleri temsil eder. Yerel seçimlerde gönüllü sandık gözetmenliği platformlarının edindiği tecrübelerin ülke geneline yayılması hedefiyle kurulmuştur. Tarafsız ve bağımsızdır. 2014 yerel seçimlerinde Ankara'nın Oyları gönüllüleri hiç bir kurum veya kuruluştan destek almadan, 3200 gönüllü ile sandıklarda gözetmenlik yaptı, ortalama 1, 200,000 oy ile seçim sonuçlarını etkileyebilecek nitelikte hata tespit etti. Analiz sonuçlarını kamuoyu ile paylaştı, YSK ve AYM’ye yapılan itiraz başvurularının delillerini oluşturacak çalışmalara imza attı.  Türkiye'nin bütün illerinde Türkiye'nin Oyları, yurt dışında ise Gurbetin Oyları, Cumhurbaşkanlığı seçimlerinde sandıkların yer alacağı her bölgede daha fazla gönüllüye ulaşmak üzere çalışmalarına devam etmektedir.  

♥ Indiegogo bağış kampanyasının yanı sıra, çalışmalarımızı desteklemek için yapabileceğiniz pek çok şeyden sizleri haberdar etmek isteriz. Bağış kampanyamızın daha çok kişiye ulaşması için sosyal medyada paylaşabilir, çalışmalarımızdan anında haberdar olmak için bizi Facebook ve Twitter üzerinden takip edebilirsiniz. Türkiye'nin Oyları gönüllüsü olarak bulunduğunuz şehirde gönüllü sandık gözetmeni olmak için bizimle iletişime geçin! 

Bu kampanya bağışları ABD Federal Kanunlarına göre bir vakıf (501c3) olarak kurulmuş TAGP (http://www.geziplatform.org/) tarafından toplanıp kampanya amacı doğrultusunda kullanılacaktır. Yapılan tüm harcamaların fatura ve gerekçeleri bu sitede paylaşılacak, ve TAGP tarafından da yasal olarak beyan edilmesi zorunlu olan yıllık vergi beyannamesinde görülecektir. 

_______________________________________________________________________

ENGLISH

Support our volunteers for a fair and transparent election! 

For the first time in its history, Turkey is getting ready to elect a president with popular vote. Around 55 million voters are expected to cast votes in 200,000 ballot-boxes across Turkey and abroad. Our goal is to increase the number of our scrutineers, to expand our communications network that will enable us to receive accurate information from each and every ballot-box; and to get the most reliable data from all provinces and districts.

With every donation you make to our Indiegogo campaign, not only will you be supporting our volunteers throughout the presidential election, but you can also closely watch your ballot-box and vote. By donating to our campaign, you can directly contribute to the software that's being developed to provide reliable election results, the training modules used to train scrutineers, and the information network that is based on the impartial and transparent dissemination of information.

Choose to support our volunteers, watch your votes closely!

Antalya'nın Oyları, ABD'nin Oyları, Ankara'nın Oyları, Almanya’nın Oyları, Eskişehir’in Oyları, Fransa'nın Oyları, İzmir'in Oyları, ABD'nin Oyları, Adana'nın Oyları, Bursa’nın Oyları, Hollanda’nın Oyları, Rize'nin Oyları, İsviçre’nin Oyları, Kanada'nın Oyları, Ağrı'nın Oyları, Avusturya'nın Oyları, Yalova'nın Oyları, İngiltere’nin Oyları... By sponsoring volunteers, you can help us gather more volunteers, and stand with our volunteers from their training until the day of election. Every volunteer you support will instantly deliver you the most accurate news from your hometown, the region of your residence, or the ballot-box where you cast your vote.

Support the impartial information and communication network! 

Through our Indiegogo campaign, you can contribute to the software that's being developed to collect and deliver reliable election results, the training modules used to train scrutineers, and the information network that is based on the impartial and transparent dissemination of information. Those of our supporters who contribute as training or IT sponsors, will receive the election result notification report via e-mail and will receive an expression of thanks indicating their contribution in the notifications messages we post on social media.

Stand with us in the election!

By becoming an election sponsor in our Indiegogo campaign, you can meet the needs of many volunteers who will serve as scrutineers at polling places, such as food and transportation. Our supporters who make contributions by becoming an election sponsor will also receive the election result notification report via e-mail.

Support our volunteers and help Turkey's widest citizens' initiative succeed!

What is Türkiye'nin Oyları? Türkiye'nin Oyları represents the electorate who will cast their votes in Turkey and abroad. It was established to disseminate throughout the country, the experience and know-how gained in local elections by volunteer scrutineer platforms . It is impartial and independent. Ankara'nın Oyları volunteers, observed polling places in the 2014 local elections with 3200 volunteers without support from any organization or institution and analyzed 11500 return-sheets Ankara wide and detected errors concerning 1,200,000 votes that effect the results of the elections. It shared results of the analysis with the public, and produced reports that make up the evidence presented in the appeals filed with the Supreme Council of Elections and the Constitutional Court. Türkiye'nin Oyları, together with individual platforms in all provinces of Turkey and with support from Gurbetin Oyları, is working to increase the number of volunteers in all electoral regions where polling stations are located.

♥ Aside from the Indiegogo fundraising campaign, we would like to inform you about many other things you can do do to support us. You can share our fundraising campaign on social media to help us reach more people and you can follow us on Facebook and Twitter to get instant information about our activities.

If you too would like to join Türkiye'nin Oyları volunteers to take your place among the scrutineers, just contact us!

Donations will be collected by TAGP http://www.geziplatform.org/ which is a 501c3 non-profit located in San Francisco. All expenses in accordance to our goals will be documented through paid invoices published on this site.
