story:
DropLED Pro - The Indestructible LED Drop Light

If you’ve ever used a droplight (worklight, trouble light, whatever you wanna call it), you’ve had one fail on you. It's frustrating, and it costs you valuable time. When Jesse Kaufman moved his auto repair shop in next to our small LED firm, (where we're designing the brightest, most efficient LED light bulbs) he asked us if we could replace his constantly failing droplight. When we did, we were both amazed. (Watch Jesse's testmonial video.)

Over the last six month, he has beaten it mercilessly, and we have refined every aspect of it, such that it is now practically indestructible, perfect for the harsh environment of a repair shop.

The Drop LED Pro is a specially designed LED bulb that fits right into a standard lampholder, but performs like nothing you've ever seen.

It's the Brightest
The DropLED Pro is the Brightest lighting tool you’ll find, delivering 1100 (Photopic) lumens, twice as much light as a 75 watt “Rough Service” bulb. At 4000°K color termperature, it produces 1700 (Scotopic) lumens, for vastly better color definition and three times the eye response. It's also omnidirectional, putting out light in 270 degrees, exactly where you want it. You will see your work in total detail.

Safest
If you haven’t burned yourself on a droplight, you probably haven’t worked very much. A Rough Service bulb runs 295°F, while the DropLED Pro is a cool 135°F, so you can grab it with your bare hand.

What’s more, RS filaments are over 2500°F, and have caused explosions that cost millions in damages. Let’s not even get into the dangers of CFLs.

Most Valuable
The DropLED Pro is built for a 50,000 hour lifetime, and we have other models in the oven at the Energy Star test labs to prove it. We warrant the light for 5 years for light output (in case you leave it on 24/7)  and for 3 years against failure (in case you do the kind of things we do to it every day). We calculate the potential savings at up to 100x the cost.

 

One thing we're sure of, your lamp holder will fail long before the DropLED Pro. After the forklift, we tossed this one 20' up in the air and it blew apart when it hit. You can see the gravel marks on the body, and the globe was crushed too, but functionally, the DropLED was unphased.

 

LED
At a mere 12 watts, it will also save you over $500 in electricity, but its brightness and safety make it more valuable than money can define. Every mechanic we’ve shown it to wants one, and we are ready to deliver.

Lighting Tool in the World
The DropLED Pro works in any country, from 90-240v AC. The DLP drastically outperforms every other light out there, and it's value only increases the further you get from the US. Read this document Comparing the Drop LED Pro with other lights.   (Order the LeMans - for international delivery)

 

IndieGoGo Helps Us Both

If you're reading this, you probably run a small business, so you know what it costs to get one off the ground. We'd like to build the DropLED without selling off the company, and your support is key. Pledging now will get you the DropLED Pro, and make it available for every mechanic who’s tired of of expensive, wasteful, weak and dangerous drop lights. It will allow us to:

  • Pay off initial tooling and testing expenses
  • Build our first production run

Who is Lumen LED?

We’re tiny now, but Lumen’s engineers have decades of experience with LEDs, in aerospace and hi-tech applications. They have designed and delivered for BART, Hughes, Intel, KLA-Tencor, Lawrence Labs, Maxtor, NASA, Quantum, Seagate, and Sun Microsystems, among others. When we complete our full line of Energy Star qualified lights, we’ll be on the road to saving billions of dollars in wasted energy every year.

 

How You Can Help

We truly appreciate your support. If a DropLED Pro will help you, help us by buying one (or more) right now! Even if you don’t use a drop light, you can help us by

  • Sharing this with your mechanic, tradesmen, and friends (Use the Indiegogo share tools!)
  • Donating the minimimum, and gettng a sticker!
  • Blogging about us, or referring us to other media
  • Volunteering in any way you can

 

Thanks
We want to thank all of you for supporting us, and give a special shout out to all the mechanics and shops that helped us torture test this thing.

Jesse and the gang at Treds
Azaria and KC at Aamco Oakland
Robert Gross - Rolls Royce Expert
Paulo at Roger's Autoworks
Gary at Guaranteed Auto Service
The Pit Crew at Insta-Lube
Aman at Imperial Truck Repair

Thanks also to J and Larry for the video, great work!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
“Mini Mongol Ger” is the 11 times reduced version of the actual Mongol ger [gher] and can be self assembled and dismantled.

In order to keep the light, convenient and simple natures of the ger, the products are developed by a plastic material used for food and groceries that is harmless to the body.  Now you have a chance to experience the most valuable Mongolian culture that is inherited from our ancestors and continued to the modern ages by assembling and dismantling the Mongol ger by yourself.
Studies show that Mongol Ger was designed around 3000 years before our BC and until this day, the wonders of the Mongol ger still maintains focus of many researchers.

 

Be the first who gets it in the world!

Support us on Indiegogo and be the first who gets it in the world!

  • You can easily assemble this 11 times reduced Mongol ger by the steps 
  • Assemble the only accommodation that ensures the best architectural technology with no nails and glue
  • Consist of 150 pieces

Feel free contact us: minimongolger@gmail.com

  • Experience the cultures of nomadic lifestyle
  • Give as an amazing gift to someone you love
  • Provide warm atmosphere for you and your family by assembling it together

We grew up in a Mongol Ger from birth to our adult years which allowed us with a knowledge and experience to develop the Mini Mongol ger by the exact steps of assembling, without losing its meanings and reasons.  Our team is formed from over 10 members who are very successful in their own sectors that came together under one vision. The consultant working for our team is an expert who has been studying the Mongolian culture and lifestyle for all his life,  world respected and honored Ph.D  Dulam Sendenjav.

With your support, we are able to decrease the manufacturing costs and make our products to its lowest possible cost. Our team has many new modern ideas to improve the product which can be completed with your help.

We see that crowdfunding is the most suitable method to raise funding therefore are submitting our proposal to indiegogo.com. Please support our project by sharing our information to others.

Our product models are manufactured at our own production facilities. We guarantee high quality of our products. We offer domestic and international tracking.

What is the Mini Mongol Ger?

“Mini Mongol Ger” is the 11 times reduced version of the actual Mongolian ger and can be self assembled and dismantled.

Does the Ger has a choice of color?

There is no color choice.

Children of what age can assemble the Ger?

Kids from 3 years old to grown-ups of all ages can assemble the Ger.

Which materials are used?

The Mini Mongol Ger does not include a single nail and glue, are developed by a plastic material used for food and groceries that is harmless to the body.

How big is a ger?

The Mini Mongol Ger  is reduced 11 times from an actual Mongol ger, it has 30 cm diameter and consists of 150 pieces.

How long does it take to assemble and dismantle a Ger?

It can be assembled/dismantled within 30-40 minutes.

What is your official website?

www.minimongolger.com

Where will you ship?

We offer domestic and international tracking. However, please note:  Every country has its own shipping regulations and rules. Once the final Mini Mongol Ger is manufactured and packaged, if your country, (for some reason) says we cannot ship it there, then you will be issued a full refund.

If any other questions, how can I reach out to?

minimongolger@gmail.com

story:
Meet "MIRROReins"

Hi, we are Christian and Mic...happy to meet you on our campaign page!

Boring Bathroom? Nothing really fancy? Squeaky Speaker Sound?

Well, we were highly unsatisfied with that situation as well and became very passionate to put it to an end!

With your help we will be able to launch the world's first smart lifestyle mirror on the market!

With MIRROReins you can:

  1. ...not only display your reflection but the digital reflection of YOUR areas of interest! YOUR favorite CONTENT at a glance! 
  2. ...experience richer music in your bathroom thanks to built-in stereo speakers!
  3. ...have a slim and clean designed mirror with hidden magic power!


MIRROReins dimensions & specs:

  • SIZE: Does the mirror fit into your bathroom? Most certainly, because with 80 x 60cm (35.43 x 23.62 inch) it comes in standard size.
  • MOTION SENSOR: Is the screen always on? No, thanks to the hidden, built-in motion sensor. The display will only turn on if you're close by.
  • INTEGRATED DISPLAY: How big is big? With 21" it has "just the right size for sufficient information and at the same time for your reflection.
  • ON/OFF SWITCH: Do you want to see yourself in full beauty? Just use the external on/off switch for the display.
  • OPERATING SYSTEM: Another new system? No. Thanks to the Android operating system there are almost no limits for further development.
  • INPUT-DEVICE: Fingerprints on the screen? No way! An magic air mouse is included with delivery of MIRROReins. Configure your MIRROReins or control other Android Apps with this awesome device.
  • RESOLUTION: Don't like a fuzzy display? No worries, thanks to the Full HD display you can see everything crystal clear and not pixelated.
  • POWER: Is the processor fast enough? Absolutely! Thanks to a powerful Quad core processor you get plenty of power for future improvements


    • Challenges (extract):

    Apart from the commercials (e.g. the first engineering partner disappointment) the had to overcome the following obstacles:

    • Mirror glass (size? mirrorized? foiled?)
    • Screen (brightness vs. mirror effect)
    • Heat development vs. moisture / bathroom steam
    • Sound quality: Speaker / amplifier selection (believe us, it's tougher than it "sounds")
    • Configuration of MIRROReins - focused on usability

    History:


    What happens when you get your MIRROReins?

    1. Time to get excited :-) 
    2. Choose vertical/optical mounting (both is possible)
    3. Connect to power and MIRROReins will awake
    4. Use remote control to connect to your home WiFi  and log in into your Mirrorized-account (one time only)
    5. Now go to www.mirrorized.de and proceed with the last step:
     

      6. Easy-peasy, done! 
      7. MIRROReins is now ready to get you Mirrorized!


    MIRROReins FEATURES to choose from:



    How can YOU support the bathroom evolution?

    Utilizing our background in Telecommunications, IT & Web we invested a lot of passion, brainpower and time over the past 18 month to get this close to production.

    But only with your support we can continue to work on the dream and help your bathroom to be converted into a real WOW-experience, ready for the 21st century!

    You can support best by choosing a perk:

    Please bear in mind that potential toll fees in your country are not included in the price.


    Why do we need your support?

    Well, we need to hit the funding limit of 650.000€ to finance: 

    • the first MIRROReins order
    • a production tool for the mass production
      (according to our special design requirements)
    • the software/app optimization (as designed) 

    If Indiegogo gets absolutely mirrorized and we hit 899.000€ we will be eternally thankful and reward you by adding "voice control" for free.


    Timeline & Outlook

    11/2013 Idea for MIRROReins after being highly unsatisfied with our bathroom experience

    12/2013 Hands-on creation the first prototype/feasibility study

    05/2014 - 09/2014  Working with first Engineering partner & HW vendor - huge disappointment, back to square one.

    07/2014  Founding of Mirrorized GmbH

    08/2014-12/2014  Testing of various prototypes regarding reuse as a basis for our purposes

    09/2014 Market screening for new potential Engineering partner & HW vendor

    09/2015 Market screening for SW Development

    10/2014 - today:  Work with new Engineering partner & HW & SW vendor

    11/2014-10/2015  Development/testing/optimization of final prototype

    Outlook:

    NOW: 11/2015-12/2015  Indiegogo campaign MIRROReins

    01/2016-03/2016  Start optimization of SW

    01/2016-02/2016  Implementation of necessary tool for mass production

    03/2016  Quality-milestone: Testing first mass production prototype

    04/2016  Order of first batch of MIRROReins

    06/2016  Start to deliver the first MIRROReins mirrors! 

    07/2015 Be very happy and excited to see the awesome output of last year's work


    Other ways to support the bathroom evolution:

    You think MIRROReins is a very cool product that should go to market? but for whatever reason you don't want to invest money. No Problem, you can still help the movement:

    • ...with your PASSION for MIRROReins!
    • ...by SPREADING THE WORD about this campaign (Facebook, Twitter, mouth-to-mouth, mail, the indiegogo tool,...)
    • ...by providing feedback on MIRROReins. We assure you it's highly appreciated! 

    That's all folks! Thank you very much for your attention and time! 
    It's been a crazy but very exciting ride so far....with your help we & MIRROReins can ride on...with YOU!

story:
Resumen / Summary / Crowfunding MYKERS

Lanzamos la campaña de Crowfunding después de dos años autofinanciando nuestra idea para conseguir un carro de la compra Make your life easier que permita suprimir las bolsas de plástico y que nos ayude a hacer la compra más fácil y agradable para todos. Two hard years working on Mykers to get shopping more easy. Nous avons déjà dépense tout le Budget de nos familles en Mykers....

Si crees que nos estamos cargando el planeta con el desecho del plástico y no te gusta cargar con las bolsas de la compra, apoya nuestro proyecto good for the environment and Smart for shopping process para hacer que MYKERS salga al mercado. Nous sommes fiers de Mykers et avec ton soutien on sait qu’on y arrivera à lancer au marché.

Qué necesitamos y que ofrecemos / Needs & Offer / Et puis?

Necesitamos recaudar on cherche 25k€ para terminar el desarrollo de producto, validar los últimos prototipos y poder ofrecer MYKERS a gente como tú. Helps us to reach the goal on euros.

Eres nuestro motor, tu es notre meilleur pot por eso te ofrecemos varios incentivos para que participes en nuestra campaña, regalos, pero sobre todo formar parte de nuestro proyecto. Las personas como tú hacen cosas increíbles. Aides nous à réussir l’objective et faire du bien.

Tenemos un gran plan / Nous avons un bon plan / We are very Cool

Hemos diseñado un Plan (Great Plan) para sorprenderte durante la campaña, si te unes a nosotros y participas te sentirás orgulloso de haber participado en Mykers y lo recordarás para el resto de tu vida. Au contraire, ta vie suivra sans l´émotion d’avoir fait partie d’un grand Projet.

Gracias / Merci / Thanks

mykers.com
story_txt:
Resumen / Summary / Crowfunding MYKERS
Lanzamos la campaña de Crowfunding después de dos años autofinanciando nuestra idea para conseguir un carro de la compra Make your life easier que permita suprimir las bolsas de plástico y que nos ayude a hacer la compra más fácil y agradable para todos. Two hard years working on Mykers to get shopping more easy. Nous avons déjà dépense tout le Budget de nos familles en Mykers....
Si crees que nos estamos cargando el planeta con el desecho del plástico y no te gusta cargar con las bolsas de la compra, apoya nuestro proyecto good for the environment and Smart for shopping process para hacer que MYKERS salga al mercado. Nous sommes fiers de Mykers et avec ton soutien on sait qu’on y arrivera à lancer au marché.
Qué necesitamos y que ofrecemos / Needs & Offer / Et puis?
Necesitamos recaudar on cherche 25k€ para terminar el desarrollo de producto, validar los últimos prototipos y poder ofrecer MYKERS a gente como tú. Helps us to reach the goal on euros.
Eres nuestro motor, tu es notre meilleur pot por eso te ofrecemos varios incentivos para que participes en nuestra campaña, regalos, pero sobre todo formar parte de nuestro proyecto. Las personas como tú hacen cosas increíbles. Aides nous à réussir l’objective et faire du bien.
Tenemos un gran plan / Nous avons un bon plan / We are very Cool
Hemos diseñado un Plan (Great Plan) para sorprenderte durante la campaña, si te unes a nosotros y participas te sentirás orgulloso de haber participado en Mykers y lo recordarás para el resto de tu vida. Au contraire, ta vie suivra sans l´émotion d’avoir fait partie d’un grand Projet.
Gracias / Merci / Thanks
mykers.com

story:
SCORRI IN BASSO PER LA VERSIONE IN ITALIANO

 

0-OUT Water Filter: clean and tasty water from your tap    

The course of tap water and the overconsumption of plastic have a drastic impact on the quality of the water we drink. The more we consume plastic, the more we pollute our environment, eventually threatening our own health. To interrupt this cycle, we have created 0-OUT, the ultimate water filter that delivers 1000 liter KM zero clean and tasty water directly through your kitchen tap.

 

Why 0-OUT?

 

 

 

Numbers speak clearly: 

  • 750 plastic bottles a year, consumed in average by a family of three, out of which only 7% is recycled. It will take up to 450 years for non-recycled waste to degrade;  
  • 5 grams of plastic a week, ingested approximately by one person, 89% of which from drinking water; 
  • additives and microplastics inevitably infiltrate the common tap water, leaving the water full of harmful substances and with a bad taste;
  • as today to buy bottles of water is a waste of money and time.

0-OUT is set to drastically decrease the use of single-use plastics at home and  at the office, while

getting rid of all harmful elements and allow you to drink healthier and tastier water

 

Why do we need to use a tap water filter?

What are the main characteristics of 0-OUT?

0-OUT is characterized by a Double Filtering Action:

  • Spyral Technology: retaining the majority of heavy metals, preventing the metallic aftertaste  of tap watered and enhancing the quality of the water we drink filtrating 99% of contaminants; 
  • Activated Carbons: removing chlorine, particles and organic compounds, blocking the microplastics up to 10X more than the standard size while making tap water fresh and odour-free. 
  • IOS and Android Mobile App: we also develop a mobile app, enabling you to real-time monitor filter consumption, plastic bottles and money-saving.

 

0-OUT filter design and colours

Product features: 

  • BPA Free Material
  • Patented Ionix Spiral
  • Bluetooth litre-counter system
  • Double filtering action
  • Silver filtering material

0-OUT filter is available in 4 different colours: orange, chrome, black, white.
Choose your favourite one!

 

 

Product specifications

Weight: 450 GR
Pressure: 3 BAR
Cartridge life-span: 1000 LT
Cartridge replacement cost: € 25 
Available colors: ORANGE / CHROME / BLACK / WHITE
Wireless connectivity: BLUETOOTH
Battery life: 3 months using BT 2 times per day 
Compatible OS: ANDROID / IOS

 

How many and what kind of elements do 0-OUT filter?

The 0-out device allows to purify water from over 140 substances, such as:

  • PESTICIDES (glyphosate, bentazone, etc.),
  • HEAVY METALS (mercury, cadmium, arsenic, copper, nickel, etc.),
  • MICROPLASTICS,
  • CHLORINE.

These substances are abated following the standards NSF 42, NSF53 and NSF401.

 

How can we install and use 0-OUT?

Using 0-OUT is as easy as drinking a glass of water!
The filter can be easily installed in less than 10 seconds, without the help of an expert. 
It adapts to any kind of tap, it's small and lightweight.
Once installed, thanks to the dual ways out system, you can choose among using filtered or unfiltered water, preventing the waste of clean water.

 

Why is it convenient?

Considering that a family of four consumes about 830 LT a year, we calculated that using 0-OUT can save up to $ 1.000 and 500 water bottles every three years!

Why not use the saved money to go on holiday?!

 

What are the main differences between 0-OUT and other tap water filter?

 

What are the technical characteristics of the filter?


 

  • Antibacterial materials: the carbon block is implemented with silver to avoid the proliferation of bacteria and microalgae after long periods of
    inactivity, but has no effect on the elimination of potential bacteria present in the water supply.
  • Double action filter, chelating resins: the chelating resins reduce the presence of heavy metals, including iron and copper, which alter the taste of water.
  • Double action filter, activated carbon filter: the activated carbon filters reduces chlorine and eliminates odours and flavours. It also blocks the microplastic up to ten
    times more than the standard size.
  • BPA free material: entirely made with BPA (Bisphenol A) free material. BPA free material is usually used to make baby bottles.
  • Switch filtered / unfiltered water: if not needed, it can be easily switched to unfiltered water mode to save filters.
  • Retains microplastic: the activated carbon filters microplastic up to 0,5 micrometers: ten times smaller the standard size.
  • Live update on the state of the filters: smart system monitors the state of wear of the filters and updates you when they need to be replaced.
  • Bluetooth connection: it connects to your phone using Bluetooth technology.
  • Mobile App: monitor the state of the filter, replace it by accessing our online shop, check how much you are saving.

 

When and where can you use 0-OUT?

 

0-OUT was born to be used everywhere you want: 

  • Kitchen and Home: it can be mounted in less than 10 seconds on every type of kitchen tap. With few simple moves it can change the way we consume tap water forever, delivering directly to people homes the freshest and cleanest water they ever had; 
  • Office and Work Environment: one of our goals is to get rid of the environmental and economic costs of bottled water. Once implemented within work environments, companies, institutions, the filter will help save money while fostering sustainable workplaces.

 

What about the birth of 0-OUT?

 

We want to develop a product which filters harmful elements, heavy metals, chlorine, microplastics, bacterias, making water healthier and tastier. 
To achieve our goal, we worked alongside Dr. Claudio Minero, Professor of Analytical Chemistry at the University of Turin, to make sure we developed the most efficient tap water filter and we teamed together to monitor the results of our research and design a powerful and long-lasting filter.
At the end of our research and work, we achieved our goal and created a filter with our patented technology.

Would you like to discover more about 0-OUT? 

Find out more about 0-OUT here.

Click here and download now our digital kit!

 

Perks

 

 

Partners and Social Proofs

 

 

Media Reviews

 

                       

 

                     

 

                     

 

                                               

 

                                  

 

Who we are?

For over 45 years Pea&Promoplast has created innovative products and developed promotional and editorial campaigns for the biggest European multinationals. In the last years, we have gone through an industrial and digital transformation whose objective is to reduce the environmental impact of our products and those of millions of consumers. 
In light of this priority, we are focusing on the creation of sustainable devices that will impact our world for the better.
0-OUT is one of the life-improving devices that we created to decrease the consumption of plastic bottles while delivering clean and tasty tap water. 

 

Risks and Challenges

Our goal is to create a product which: 

  • filters heavy metals, harmful elements, microplastic, chlorine and bacteria, making tap water healthier and tastier;
  • it's lightweight, small and easy to install;
  • help people reducing the consumption of plastic and saving money.

Being a company which produced the greatest part of its products by using plastics, we want to show and demonstrate we really want to make a radical change and do something important to support the plastic-free cause. 

 

 VERSIONE IN ITALIANO

 

0-OUT Water Filter: acqua buona e pulita dal tuo rubinetto

Il percorso dell’acqua del rubinetto e il consumo eccessivo della plastica hanno un impatto considerevole sulla qualità dell’acqua che beviamo. Più plastica consumiamo, più inquiniamo l’ambiente, mettendo a rischio la nostra salute. Per interrompere questo ciclo, abbiamo creato 0-OUT, il filtro dell'acqua per eccellenza che eroga 1000 litri di acqua buona e pulita a KM 0 direttamente attraverso il tuo rubinetto.

 

 

Perché 0-OUT?

I numeri parlano chiaramente:

  • 750 bottiglie di plastica all'anno, consumate in media da una famiglia di tre persone, di cui solo il 7% viene riciclato. Ci vorranno fino a 450 anni perché i rifiuti non riciclati si biodegradino;
  • 5 grammi di plastica a settimana , approssimativamente ingeriti da una persona, l'89% dei quali dall'acqua potabile;
  • gli additivi e le microplastiche permeano inevitabilmente nell'acqua del rubinetto, lasciando l'acqua piena di sostanze nocive e con un cattivo gusto;
  • al giorno d'oggi acquistare bottiglie d'acqua è uno spreco di tempo e denaro.

0-OUT è progettato per ridurre drasticamente l'uso di plastica monouso a casa e in ufficio e contemporanemente elimina tutte le sostanze dannose consentendo di bere acqua più sana.

 

Perché c’è bisogno di usare un filtro per l'acqua del rubinetto?

Quali sono le principali caratteristiche di 0-OUT?

0-OUT è caratterizzato da una doppia azione di filtraggio:

  • Tecnologia a Spirale: trattiene la maggior parte dei metalli pesanti, previene il retrogusto metallico dell'acqua del rubinetto e ne migliora la qualità filtrando il 99% dei contaminanti;
  • Carboni attivi: rimuovono cloro, particelle e composti organici, bloccando le microplastiche fino a 10 volte in più rispetto alle dimensioni standard, rendendo l'acqua del rubinetto fresca e inodore.
  • App mobile per IOS e Android: abbiamo sviluppato anche un'app mobile, che consente di monitorare in tempo reale il consumo dei filtri e il risparmio di bottiglie di plastica e di denaro.

 

Design e colori del filtro 0-OUT

 

 

Caratteristiche del prodotto:

  • MATERIALE BPA FREE
  • Spirale Ionix brevettata
  • Sistema di contalitri Bluetooth
  • Doppia azione filtrante
  • Materiale filtrante in argento medicale

Il filtro 0-OUT è disponibile in 4 diversi colori: cromato, bianco, nero e arancione.

Scegli il tuo preferito!

 

Specifiche del prodotto

Peso: 450 GR
Pressione: 3 BAR
Durata della cartuccia: 1000 LT
Costo di sostituzione della cartuccia: € 25
Colori disponibili: ARANCIONE / CROMO / NERO / BIANCO
Connettività wireless: BLUETOOTH
Durata della batteria: 3 mesi con utilizzo Bluetooth 2 volte al giorno
Sistema operativo compatibile: ANDROID / IOS

 

Quante e che tipo di specie chimiche filtra 0-OUT?

 

Il dispositivo 0-out consente di purificare l'acqua da oltre 140 sostanze, come ad esempio:

  • PESTICIDI (glifosato, bentazone, ecc.),
  • METALLI PESANTI (mercurio, cadmio, arsenico, rame, nichel, ecc.),
  • microplastiche,
  • CLORO.

Queste sostanze vengono ridotte secondo gli standard NSF 42, NSF53 e NSF401.

 

Come si installa e utilizza 0-OUT?

Usare 0-OUT è facile come bere un bicchiere d'acqua!
Il filtro può essere facilmente installato in meno di 10 secondi, senza l'aiuto di un esperto.
Si adatta a qualsiasi tipo di rubinetto, è piccolo e leggero.
Una volta installato, grazie al sistema a doppia uscita, è possibile scegliere tra l'utilizzo di acqua filtrata o non filtrata, evitando lo spreco di acqua pulita.

 

Perché conviene?

Considerando che una famiglia di quattro persone consuma circa 830 LT all'anno, abbiamo calcolato che l' uso di 0-OUT può far risparmiare fino a $ 1.000 e 500 bottiglie d'acqua ogni tre anni!

Perché non usare i soldi risparmiati per andare in vacanza ?!

Quali sono le principali differenze tra 0-OUT e altri filtri per l'acqua del rubinetto?

 

Quali sono le caratteristiche tecniche del filtro?

 

  • Materiali antibatterici: il blocco di carbone attivo è implementato con argento per evitare la proliferazione di batteri e microalghe dopo lunghi periodi di inattività, ma non ha alcun effetto sull'eliminazione di potenziali batteri presenti nell'approvvigionamento idrico.
  • Filtro a doppia azione, resine chelanti: le resine chelanti riducono la presenza di metalli pesanti, tra cui ferro e rame, che alterano il sapore dell'acqua.
  • Filtro a doppia azione, filtro a carbone attivo: i filtri a carbone attivo riducono il cloro ed eliminano odori e sapori. Inoltre, blocca le microplastiche fino a dieci volte in più rispetto alle dimensioni standard.
  • Materiale privo di BPA: interamente realizzato con materiale privo di BPA (bisfenolo A). Il materiale privo di BPA viene solitamente utilizzato per realizzare biberon.
  • Passaggio acqua filtrata / non filtrata: se non necessario, si può facilmente passare in modalità acqua non filtrata per risparmiare i filtri.
  • Trattiene le microplastiche: i carboni attivi filtrano microplastiche fino a 0,5 micrometri: dieci volte più piccoli delle dimensioni standard.
  • Aggiornamento in tempo reale sullo stato dei filtri: il sistema intelligente monitora lo stato di usura dei filtri e ti aggiorna quando è necessario sostituirli.
  • Connessione Bluetooth: si collega al telefono tramite la tecnologia bluetooth.
  • App mobile: monitora lo stato del filtro, permette di sostituirlo accedendo al nostro negozio online, controlla quanto stai risparmiando.

 

Quando e dove è possibile utilizzare 0-OUT?

 

 

0-OUT è nato per essere utilizzato ovunque tu voglia:

  • Cucina e casa: può essere montato in meno di 10 secondi su ogni tipo di rubinetto della cucina. Con poche semplici mosse può cambiare per sempre il modo di consumare l’acqua del rubinetto, fornendo direttamente a casa l’acqua più fresca e pura mai avuta;
  • Ufficio e ambiente di lavoro: uno dei nostri obiettivi è quello di eliminare i costi ambientali ed economici dell'acqua in bottiglia. Una volta implementato all’interno degli ambienti di lavoro, aziende e istituzioni, il filtro aiuterà a risparmiare denaro promuovendo ambienti di lavoro sostenibili.

 

Com'è nato 0-OUT?

 

Abbiamo sviluppato un prodotto che filtra sostanze dannose, metalli pesanti, cloro, microplastiche e batteri, rendendo l'acqua più buona e sana.
Per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo, abbiamo lavorato a fianco del Dott. Claudio Minero, professore di Chimica analitica all'Università di Torino, con il quale abbiamo collaborato per monitorare i risultati della nostra ricerca e progettare un efficiente filtro a lunga durata con tecnologia brevettata.

Vuoi scoprire di più su 0-OUT?

Scopri di più su 0-OUT qui.

Clicca qui e scarica ora il nostro kit digitale!

 

Perks

 

 

Partner e Social Proof

 

Parlano di noi

                       

 

                     

 

                     

 

                                               

 

                                  

 

Chi siamo?

Per oltre 45 anni, PEA&Promoplast ha creato prodotti innovativi e sviluppato campagne promozionali ed editoriali per le più grandi multinazionali europee. Negli ultimi anni, abbiamo attraversato una trasformazione industriale e digitale, il cui obiettivo è quello di ridurre l’impatto ambientale della nostra azienda e di quella di milioni di consumatori. . 
Nell’ottica di questa priorità, ci stiamo concentrando sulla creazione di dispositivi sostenibili che potrebbero avere un impatto positivo sul nostro pianeta.
0-Out è uno di quei dispositivi rivoluzionari che abbiamo creato per ridurre il consumo di bottiglie di plastica, fornendo al tempo stesso acqua del rubinetto buona e pulita.

 

Rischi e sfide

Il nostro obiettivo è creare un prodotto che:

  • filtri metalli pesanti, sostanze nocive, microplastiche, cloro e batteri, rendendo l'acqua del rubinetto più buona e sana;
  • sia leggero, piccolo e facile da installare;
  • aiuti le persone a ridurre il consumo di plastica e risparmiare denaro.

Come azienda che ha realizzato la maggior parte dei suoi prodotti in plastica, vogliamo essere promotori di un cambiamento radicale e fare qualcosa di importante per sostenere la causa plastic free.

Carboni attivi: rimuovono cloro, particelle e composti organici, bloccando le microplastiche fino a 10 volte in più rispetto alle dimensioni standard, rendendo l'acqua del rubinetto fresca e inodore.

App mobile per IOS e Android: abbiamo sviluppato anche un'app mobile, che consente di monitorare in tempo reale il consumo dei filtri e il risparmio di bottiglie di plastica e di denaro.

 
Design e colori del filtro 0-OUT

 
 
Caratteristiche del prodotto:

MATERIALE BPA FREE
Spirale Ionix brevettata
Sistema di contalitri Bluetooth
Doppia azione filtrante
Materiale filtrante in argento medicale

Il filtro 0-OUT è disponibile in 4 diversi colori: cromato, bianco, nero e arancione.
Scegli il tuo preferito!




 
Specifiche del prodotto
Peso: 450 GRPressione: 3 BARDurata della cartuccia: 1000 LTCosto di sostituzione della cartuccia: € 25Colori disponibili: ARANCIONE / CROMO / NERO / BIANCOConnettività wireless: BLUETOOTHDurata della batteria: 3 mesi con utilizzo Bluetooth 2 volte al giornoSistema operativo compatibile: ANDROID / IOS
 
Quante e che tipo di specie chimiche filtra 0-OUT?

 
Il dispositivo 0-out consente di purificare l'acqua da oltre 140 sostanze, come ad esempio:

PESTICIDI (glifosato, bentazone, ecc.),
METALLI PESANTI (mercurio, cadmio, arsenico, rame, nichel, ecc.),
microplastiche,
CLORO.

Queste sostanze vengono ridotte secondo gli standard NSF 42, NSF53 e NSF401.
 
Come si installa e utilizza 0-OUT?

Usare 0-OUT è facile come bere un bicchiere d'acqua!Il filtro può essere facilmente installato in meno di 10 secondi, senza l'aiuto di un esperto.Si adatta a qualsiasi tipo di rubinetto, è piccolo e leggero.Una volta installato, grazie al sistema a doppia uscita, è possibile scegliere tra l'utilizzo di acqua filtrata o non filtrata, evitando lo spreco di acqua pulita.
 
Perché conviene?
Considerando che una famiglia di quattro persone consuma circa 830 LT all'anno, abbiamo calcolato che l' uso di 0-OUT può far risparmiare fino a $ 1.000 e 500 bottiglie d'acqua ogni tre anni!
Perché non usare i soldi risparmiati per andare in vacanza ?!

Quali sono le principali differenze tra 0-OUT e altri filtri per l'acqua del rubinetto?

 
Quali sono le caratteristiche tecniche del filtro?

 


Materiali antibatterici: il blocco di carbone attivo è implementato con argento per evitare la proliferazione di batteri e microalghe dopo lunghi periodi di inattività, ma non ha alcun effetto sull'eliminazione di potenziali batteri presenti nell'approvvigionamento idrico.

Filtro a doppia azione, resine chelanti: le resine chelanti riducono la presenza di metalli pesanti, tra cui ferro e rame, che alterano il sapore dell'acqua.

Filtro a doppia azione, filtro a carbone attivo: i filtri a carbone attivo riducono il cloro ed eliminano odori e sapori. Inoltre, blocca le microplastiche fino a dieci volte in più rispetto alle dimensioni standard.

Materiale privo di BPA: interamente realizzato con materiale privo di BPA (bisfenolo A). Il materiale privo di BPA viene solitamente utilizzato per realizzare biberon.

Passaggio acqua filtrata / non filtrata: se non necessario, si può facilmente passare in modalità acqua non filtrata per risparmiare i filtri.

Trattiene le microplastiche: i carboni attivi filtrano microplastiche fino a 0,5 micrometri: dieci volte più piccoli delle dimensioni standard.

Aggiornamento in tempo reale sullo stato dei filtri: il sistema intelligente monitora lo stato di usura dei filtri e ti aggiorna quando è necessario sostituirli.

Connessione Bluetooth: si collega al telefono tramite la tecnologia bluetooth.

App mobile: monitora lo stato del filtro, permette di sostituirlo accedendo al nostro negozio online, controlla quanto stai risparmiando.

 
Quando e dove è possibile utilizzare 0-OUT?
 

 
0-OUT è nato per essere utilizzato ovunque tu voglia:


Cucina e casa: può essere montato in meno di 10 secondi su ogni tipo di rubinetto della cucina. Con poche semplici mosse può cambiare per sempre il modo di consumare l’acqua del rubinetto, fornendo direttamente a casa l’acqua più fresca e pura mai avuta;

Ufficio e ambiente di lavoro: uno dei nostri obiettivi è quello di eliminare i costi ambientali ed economici dell'acqua in bottiglia. Una volta implementato all’interno degli ambienti di lavoro, aziende e istituzioni, il filtro aiuterà a risparmiare denaro promuovendo ambienti di lavoro sostenibili.

 
Com'è nato 0-OUT?

 
Abbiamo sviluppato un prodotto che filtra sostanze dannose, metalli pesanti, cloro, microplastiche e batteri, rendendo l'acqua più buona e sana.Per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo, abbiamo lavorato a fianco del Dott. Claudio Minero, professore di Chimica analitica all'Università di Torino, con il quale abbiamo collaborato per monitorare i risultati della nostra ricerca e progettare un efficiente filtro a lunga durata con tecnologia brevettata.
Vuoi scoprire di più su 0-OUT? 
Scopri di più su 0-OUT qui.
Clicca qui e scarica ora il nostro kit digitale!
 
Perks








 
 
Partner e Social Proof

 
Parlano di noi
                       
 
                     
 
                     
 
                                               
 
                                  
 
Chi siamo?

Per oltre 45 anni, PEA&Promoplast ha creato prodotti innovativi e sviluppato campagne promozionali ed editoriali per le più grandi multinazionali europee. Negli ultimi anni, abbiamo attraversato una trasformazione industriale e digitale, il cui obiettivo è quello di ridurre l’impatto ambientale della nostra azienda e di quella di milioni di consumatori. . Nell’ottica di questa priorità, ci stiamo concentrando sulla creazione di dispositivi sostenibili che potrebbero avere un impatto positivo sul nostro pianeta.0-Out è uno di quei dispositivi rivoluzionari che abbiamo creato per ridurre il consumo di bottiglie di plastica, fornendo al tempo stesso acqua del rubinetto buona e pulita.
 
Rischi e sfide
Il nostro obiettivo è creare un prodotto che:

filtri metalli pesanti, sostanze nocive, microplastiche, cloro e batteri, rendendo l'acqua del rubinetto più buona e sana;
sia leggero, piccolo e facile da installare;
aiuti le persone a ridurre il consumo di plastica e risparmiare denaro.

Come azienda che ha realizzato la maggior parte dei suoi prodotti in plastica, vogliamo essere promotori di un cambiamento radicale e fare qualcosa di importante per sostenere la causa plastic free.

story:
Introduction

Happy staying at home

According to AARP, nearly 90% of seniors want to stay in their own homes as long as possible. It is not only a natural desire but also much better from an economic standpoint because of the high cost of assisted living accommodations. Yet we know that accidents and sudden illness can strike even healthy older people in the home and that family members may be concerned that such an incident may go unnoticed. The red tulip system has been designed to address this concern. Inconspicuous sensors strategically placed in the home track normal activity detected and provide alerts if abnormal activity, such as not going to the kitchen in the morning, is detected. Immediate alerts are activated by the fall detection sensors.

 

Wireless sensors around the house send messages to the Internet gateway device at a central location in the home which is in contact with the cloud. If anything is abnormal, a ringtone alert at the gateway occurs. If the ringtone alert is not cleared, an alert message is sent to the cloud via the gateway. If not answered, caregivers are alerted by email, text message or phone. No cameras or microphones are present to insure privacy. Caregivers are not contacted without prior permission of the homeowner.     

Wireless sensors around home transmit to gateway

The Gateway

Gateway

The gateway or bridge receives the wireless messages from the sensors around the house. Normally they are sent on to the cloud via WiFi for later analysis but if there is an immediate alert, such as a fall, a ringtone will sound and a LED will flash on the gateway. The home occupant will have a short time to cancel the ringtone alert before the message is sent to the caregivers.

                                 

Sensors     

All sensors are wireless with a long life battery.

  • Armband--The waterproof armband has two functions: fall detection and tap alert. If the band is tapped twice, a beep is heard, a call is made (cancelled by 2 taps). If a person falls, an alert is send unless cancelled. Regretfully a fall sensor is needed because there is a 30% chance of an elderly person falling in their home annually and 25% of these require assistance.

  • Occupancy-- A sensitive E-field motion/proximity sensor detects passing people.

    It is intended to track normal activity around the house such as going into the kitchen. The sensor is mounted in the back of a picture and not recognizable. It also has temperature and room light sensors. A motion/ proximity sensor is behind the picture.

     

  • Motion sensor detects door opening / closing

    Door Movement-- The sensor is mounted on the door. This vibration/accelerometer sensor detects movement. This may be placed on an outside door or cabinet.

 

  • Movement/Displacement-- This capacitance based sensor detects motion of nearby objects. It may be used to detect opening of a window or pill box (a stretch goal sensor).

     

  • Appliance Use-- Clips onto appliance cord. Detects the current flow when an appliance (e.g. TV) is turned (a stretch goal sensor).

     

  • Sound sensor detects smoke alarm alerts

    Audible Sound-- Detects loud sounds such as a smoke alarm, carbon monoxide detector or doorbell. It does not respond to speech (a stretch goal sensor).

 

 

Alert Sequence   

The sequence of notifications is designed to avoid false alarms but also provides immediate response when needed. The steps are:

1. Gateway Alert-- If a fall or tap call is made, the gateway is first activated and responds by turning on a ringtone and flashing light. The householder can clear the alert for a certain period of time by pressing a button on the gateway or by tapping the armband. The monitor can be turned off if needed (e.g. vacation).

2. Cloud Monitor Service-- If the alert is not cleared, a message is sent to the Internet or cloud via WiFi where the alert is confirmed. Then the cloud service  (smart) system sends out the series of calls.

Cloud monitor service by Red Tulip

3. Home Phone Call-- The first call is to the home phone to verify that the alert is valid. If the homeowner does not answer or does not cancel the alert (press 1 to cancel, press 2 to continue), the cloud monitor service moves on to the next step.     

 

 

4. Caregivers-- The caregivers (family, friends, neighbors – up to 8) are called in a preset order by email, text message or phone. They can take action or cancel the alert. Caregivers can check the home status at any time.  

 

5. Emergency service option-- In the unlikely event that the list of caregivers is exhausted, the call is routed to a emergency response call center (paid subscription service) where operators will attempt to resolve the problem or call 911 if needed.      

Specifications

Sensors are normally on standby to conserve battery power but wake up to transmit message wirelessly to the nearby gateway upon detection.

Wireless Sensors

  • SubGHz (433 MHz) transceivers with internal antenna
  • 1 km range (free space)
  • Coin (3v) battery operation, over 1 year operating life
  • Paired with specific gateway
  • No switches or controls needed          

Gateway 

Wireless reaches outside house into garden

  • Plugs into standard 120 v receptacle, always on
  • Has wireless transceiver for communication with sensors (limit 32)
  • Push button call and clear
  • Convenient nightlight
  • Up to 32 sensors
  • Up to 4 gateways per household 
  • Has WiFi for communication to the Internet with encryption
  • Selectable ringtones and flashing LED for different types of alerts
  • Push button call and clear

Internet access (WiFi) is already available to 66% of US homes with occupants over 65 years of age.

 Timeline  

Production and Marketing Plans 

While the engineering design is being done entirely in the USA, production will be done overseas as well as the USA. It is intended that, following the crowdfunding development project, that  the gateway and sensors will be offered on a monthly lease basis with emergency telephone response and other services included with costs in the $20 to $60 per month range. It will be sold on the Internet. Hardware will be available for those who wish to set up their own system, including resellers.

More Information

Website: http://www.redtuliphouse.com

Benefits: http://www.redtuliphouse.com/docs/RT_paper1.pdf

Technical Plans:  http://www.redtuliphouse.com/docs/RT_paper2.pdf

Project Description (PPT): http://www.redtuliphouse.com/docs/RT_paper3.pdf

Stretch Goals

Goal # 1

If the pledge level reaches $60k, the audible sound sensor for the detection of smoke alerts (as described above) will be developed and tested. 

Goal # 2

If the pledge level reaches $80k, the motion/displacement sensor and current sensor for the detection of appliance use will be developed and tested.

Goal # 3

 Planned sensor detects stove overheating
before this happens

If the pledge level reaches $100k, a novel 3-way cooking stove overheating monitor will be developed. We consider this an important sensor for the elderly at home because reports of fires and damage due to unattended stoves are common. The monitor would consist of  three sensors: (1) hot air temperature, (2) hot surface (IR) temperature sensor and (3) burning odor gas sensor. A pre-alert button buzzer on the monitor will allow the alert to be cleared to reduce false alarms. Further sensors developed will focus on house damage prevention, including flood/water sensors and on power monitoring for the smart grid. 

 

An prototype example is the gateway printed circuit board. The sensor wireless link, WiFi to Internet and ringtones have been demonstrated.    

Project Status

The Red Tulip Home Monitor (www.RedTulipHouse.com) startup is a subsidiary of Esensors Inc (www.eesensors.com),  a company specializing in networked IoT sensors for industrial applications. Darold Wobschall, semi-retired, is president of both. Because the design is based on an extensively tested industrial devices, there is little risk that the system will not be successful or that there will be problems with production. The day to day development work is being done by a team of experienced electrical engineers and engineering graduate students (interns) led by Dr. Wobschall.

Prototype testing


Completed gateway boards under test

 

Prototypes of the gateway and all the sensors have been tested individually but not as a system. For this reason we classify this development as a concept rather than a prototype.  

The gateway section is the most advanced. It was first tested on a prototype board and then converted to a printed circuit version which is now undergoing tests. The following was observed:

  • The microprocess functioned properly. It was able to transfer sensor data from the wireless transceiver to the WiFi. Also the ringtone and LEDs were tested.
  • Wireless transmission (433 MHz) between the gateway and sensor has a range of 25 meters (more expected with better antennas)
  • The WiFi data was transmitted to a website on a laptop which displays the sensor data on a screen.

 E-field motion sensor
implemented on printed circuit board

The unique E-field motion sensor was originally developed under a government SBIR contract (see below). It combines high sensitivity,  low power (battery) requirements, low cost and a convenient planar (flat) geometry.  The green square is the electric field pickup electrode. It has been thoroughly tested and the next task is to transfer the printed circuit to the back of the picture and verify the desired detection range of 8 feet.

 

The door motion or vibration sensor was also previously developed and tested. It has a low cost and long battery life. It utilizes a piezofilm vibration sensor. It also requires only a layout of the circuit to fit the chosen case which attaches to the door to finish the development of this sensor. 

The current sensor will be adapted from a WiFi version which is in production and requires only a change of the wireless from WiFi to 433 MHz, a task we consider routine.

Resume

Dr. Wobschall is President at Esensors Inc. and a member of the faculty of the Department of Electrical Engineering at the State University of New York at Buffalo.  He has worked in the areas of electronic instrumentation, sensor development, and bioengineering.  He is the inventor of the ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometer and has a number of patents in the sensor area. Courses taught emphasize the design of sensors and electronic instruments, including microprocessor-based devices. He has given seminars on sensor-related topics at national meetings. He is the author of “Electronic Instrument Design” published by McGraw-Hill, several patents and over 60 technical papers. As owner and founder of several businesses, he has attained experience in the applied aspects of electronic instrument design and manufacture.  He has developed a series of networked IoT sensors for industrial applications. Currently he is working on the design of sensors for monitoring the elderly at home.

story:
Kimba Housing Cooperative

Sick of the rat race and still want to maximize property returns?

  • Sustainable lifestyle
  • Something for everyone
  • Eco-Friendly

Governments can only do so much and corporations have every right to profit for their stakeholders.  Co-operatives are about people working together, sharing resources, equality and equity.  Kimba is leading the way with a hybrid model that meets the needs of the savvy property investor (active or passive), with a new collaborative model that not only builds ecologically sustainable communities but also makes people happy.

Our Mission:

Kimba Housing Cooperative will be a not-for-profit trading organisation which creates ecologically sustainable communities comprising residential and commercial properties in regional and remote areas of the World.

  • Kimba properties are in a community’s title scheme which means all occupants on lots share services including solar / wind power, water, and broadband and sewage treatment.
  • Most Kimba developments will provide facilities for health (Medical Clinics) and education kiosks, to support key workers like teachers and doctors.
  • Kimba Commercial properties support professionals, shop keepers and manufacturing industries. E.g. Baker, Dairy and other Cottage

All Kimba members are entitled to vote on issues concerning how their community is to be managed.

What We Need & What You Get

As a member you are funding the establishment of the cooperative community with any further investment surplus plus your original investment returned to you (A disclosure statement will be sent to you on request). Surpluses are a result of property sales and rental income received less expenses.

Investment funds are used to purchase land from struggling owners in regional and remote areas. Kimba sells some properties off the plan and leases the remainder to members for the short or long term with the option to buy any time.

The Impact

Kimba Housing Cooperative provides affordable solutions that get anyone into ecologically sustainable housing and employment whilst also offering a low risk and above average return to the passive property investor.

And don’t forget Indiegogo has some great tools which will help you to share our campaign - so please use them!

As a member you are funding the establishment of the cooperative community with any further investment surplus plus your original investment returned to you (A disclosure statement will be sent to you on request). Surpluses are a result of property sales and rental income received less expenses.
Investment funds are used to purchase land from struggling owners in regional and remote areas. Kimba sells some properties off the plan and leases the remainder to members for the short or long term with the option to buy any time.
The Impact
Kimba Housing Cooperative provides affordable solutions that get anyone into ecologically sustainable housing and employment whilst also offering a low risk and above average return to the passive property investor.
And don’t forget Indiegogo has some great tools which will help you to share our campaign - so please use them!

story:
Campaign Update

On December 2, 2019, Bee Fortress USA, Inc. launched an Indiegogo campaign to raise funding for production of an innovative bee hive and accessories that address the numerous problems associated with beekeeping with a Langstroth hive. These problems work against honey bees’ preservation in myriad ways, some can even kill them. There is always an element of mystery involving a new product launch, and one can’t always predict if the product will be a success, or not. We presented our products to see if they were in line with what beekeepers are willing to pay for a top-quality, innovative hive. For lack of substantial backers, thus far, we’ve curtailed further attempts to sell this product line-up in its present form. All backers who did support our first crowdfunding campaign will be refunded 100% of their donation following the expiration of the campaign.

As a serial inventor with 22 years-experience - with many commercial successes and failures - I anticipated that I might not hit a home run the first time at bat with a beekeeping product. So, at the time of the launch of this campaign, I was already finishing the prototype of a hive design that is simpler and cheaper to produce, and includes all of the positive attributes of its Honey Bee Defender predecessor. We will re-launch, in early 2020, with this less expensive model we call the Honey Bee Defender II.

Bee Fortress is making a limited production run of the Honey Bee Defender II to give away to experienced beekeepers who wish to put our hive into practice and collect data on its performance in the field, then, provide an unbiased critique of this new hive design. If you are interested in becoming part of this program, we invite you to contact us. We are seeking candidates who are experienced beekeepers - ones who’ve mastered the fundamentals of beekeeping - so we can more precisely assess the value that the Honey Bee Defender II offers them, and its outcome in service of providing an advanced home for honey bees.

We are aware that most causes of honey bee colony deaths aren’t hive-related. We are also aware that Varroa Destructor mite infestations is the biggest issue in beekeeping today, which is why I have been working on a solution that will soon be ready for action. I believe that my developing solution can eradicate mites infecting a colony at the rate of one colony per hour. Naturally, we want to get this invention into the hands of apiarists with a large collection of infected colonies, to see if I am correct, or if another result is found. If you wish to participate in this program, please contact us. We will be shipping a limited number of our Honey Bee Hospitals to beekeepers to use and critique, in 2020.

In summary, 2020 is shaping up to be an exciting time for Bee Fortress USA, Inc., and, hopefully, for those who become a part of our programs to defend honey bees. We hope you will check out our upcoming Indiegogo campaign launches.

Thank you for the part that you play in the perpetuation and preservation of honey bees!

John Rocheleau

President, Bee Fortress USA, Inc.

john@beefortressusa.com

www.BeeFortressUSA.com

story:
REMOVU P1






The REMOVU P1 is a device that allow GoPro users to enjoy the Wi-Fi live view capabilities while you are in action. It can control all functions remotely on the go with a single touch. The World’s First Device to turn your LCD BacPac into a Wearable Live Viewer + Remote for GoPro Hero 3, 3+ and  Hero 4!!




Key Features


Wi-Fi Live View + Remote Control on Your Wrist


View what the GoPro sees without having to remove the GoPro from its mounted position, No matter what kind of risk you are taking, the REMOVU P1 will get the shot you desire. The wireless remote with touch capability will allow you to have full control of the camera while you are in action.


Full Remote Functions with Touch


The REMOVU P1 perfectly controls all GoPro functions with the latest GoPro Hero 4 touch User interface. The touch capability of the LCD BacPac allows you to change camera settings in the easiest way.



Play The Scenes Right On Your Wrist

Many GoPro users purchased the LCD BacPac for the playback function. With REMOVU P1, you won’t have to take the camera off from the mount and alter the optimal angle that you have coordinated. Play the scenes instantly on your wrist with a single touch. Check the scenes to get the shot you desire. The REMOVU P1 will let you record and play your scenes up to 3 straight hours.



Waterproof!  Dustproof!  Shockproof! 

With the body that protects the LCD BacPac from splashes, dust, and shocks, the REMOVU P1 will completely free your motions . No matter what you love to do, how extreme you may be, you can take your GoPro into the most extreme activities and get the exact scenes from your imagination.



Get started – 

Just Connect and Go Extreme!



Mountable to other GoPro Accessories

REMOVU P1 can be mounted to many GoPro accessories with our innovative Cradle.    


Referral Rewards Program

We are having REMOVU Referral Rewards Programs to reach out to our potential supporters to bring REMOVU P1 to life. Please read the instructions to participate and get yourself a discount or a free REMOVU!




How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn the rewards listed above. You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."

The reward winners will be posted on our updates section throughout the campaign. The rewards will be processed at the end of this campaign. 


Perks



Shipping Charge
We can ship to our supporters in the USA & South Korea free of charge. If you are supporting us from Canada, please add $10 to your contribution by adding the Shipping to Canada perk. All other regions, please include the international shipping perk in your contribution which is priced at $25 worldwide. 
 

Stretch Goals

$100K - New Color: White

With 100K, we can produce REMOVU P1 in white. 


$200K - Laser Marking for Customization

If we raise $200K, we will provide laser engraving customization on P1 for a limited number of supporters.  More details will be provided when we are close to reaching the goal.


$300K - Advanced Strap

When we hit $300K, a more advanced strap that is equipped with multiple features will be developed.  More details will be provided when we are close to reaching the goal.



Where we are in development

The REMOVU P1 is at its last stage of development, and soon we will have our first fully functional samples. We have all of the materials and technologies ready, and are in the process of user interface optimization, final finishes, and production processes to ensure that the REMOVU P1 is up to our high standards.



Hardware Specification

Display

Not built-in (using GoPro LCD BacPac)
 * GoPro LCD BacPac is not included.

Video Streaming

HLS | 432×240 @ 30fps

WiFi

IEEE 802.11b/g/n
Distance: 20m ~ 60m (Max)

Antenna

Well designed built-in PCB antenna

Power
and Battery

3 hours of continuous video streaming
Built-in Rechargeable Li-polymer Battery 1,050mA

Interface

Micro USB (Charging & F/W update)

Weight and
Dimensions            

Height: 2.0 inches (52 mm)
Width: 2.8 inches (72 mm)
Depth: 1.0 inch (26 mm)
Weight: appx. 2.1 ounces (60 grams)
                (w/o LCD BacPac weight)

Compatibility

GoPro Hero3/3+ (White, Silver, Black)
and GoPro Hero 4 (Silver, Black)

Certificates

CE, KC, FCC, RoHS


Production and Delivery Schedule




Where The Money Goes?

1) Validation Testing

2) Mass Production

3) Certificates (FCC,CE)

With your support we expect to have the first production of REMOVU P1 in your hands by end of January. We appreciate your support and please share REMOVU P1 with other GoPro users around you.


The Patented Technology

We’ve filed several patents for the technology and hardware behind REMOVU, and we are in the process of getting more patents for our future technologies.

On Sep. 03, 2014  US Design Patent Application filed.  (application No. 29/501,276)

On Sep. 03, 2014  KR Patent Application filed.  (application No. 10-2014-0117170)

On Sep. 26, 2014  US Patent Application filed.  (application No. 14/497,841)


Where is REMOVU produced? 

The REMOVU P1 is produced in South Korea by highly skilled workers in our own factory.  

It is our passion to deliver the finest and the most stable product to our valuable customers and ensure 100% satisfaction.   


Frequently Asked Questions


1. When will REMOVU be shipped
The REMOVU P1 will be shipped from Jan 2015.   

2. What is in the package? Do I have to buy the strap separately?
The strap is included in the package. You can also buy extra straps on our website.

3. Does it support GoPro Hero4 as well?
The REMOVU P1 is proven to work with all versions of GoPro 3 and 3+. And we are currently working on the firmware for Hero 4 compatibility.  REMOVU P1 will be compatible with Hero4 Silver/Black.

4. Is there a time gap between GoPro and REMOVU P1?
The REMOVU uses the GoPro App functions to stream the live view, thus depending on the working environment, delay of  1 ~ 1.5 seconds can be expected.  

5. I usually use multiple cameras to shoot my scenes. Is it possible to switch between cameras?
You can switch cameras by switching to different SSID on the Wi-Fi SSID list.

6. What color is the REMOVU P1?
We only have the  black version at this time, but with your support, we can expand our color variations. If we reach our $100K goal, we will be able to make the REMOVU P1 in white. 

7. Can I use REMOVU P1 under water?
Absolutely NO!  REMOVU P1 is only splashproof so it can be wet but not under water.  Also Wi-Fi signal does not work under water. 

8. Does REMOVU P1 work with other action camera brands other than GoPro?
The REMOVU only supports GoPro at this time, but we will try to expand our compatibility with other brands/cameras in the future. 

9. What is the charging time? 
If charged with computer USB port, it takes about 2 hours.

10. Can I use any standard Micro USB cable for charging REMOVU?
Yes, you can use a standard Micro USB cable.  But we strongly recommend you to use our provided Micro USB cable for charging REMOVU for more stable

11. How often can we expect firmware updates?
We will constantly pursue to add more features and make the product better. The firmware will be updated at least once a week. 

12. Is there a warranty for the REMOVU P1?
Yes, the REMOVU P1 comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

13. What is the live-view distance of the REMOVU P1?
It can stream live-view up to 200 feed away from GoPro camera depends on Wi-Fi noises and environment. 


Risk & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you the finest product, and won't settle for anything less. Quality control will be at the top of the list and the most important issue. We will work closely with our manufacturing partners to ensure that the REMOVU comes to fruition in perfect form and function in a timely manner.

We are dedicated to our project timeline and will keep you informed on the status of our progress on a regular basis. We really appreciate your consideration.


Press

For press inquiries, please contact ashton@essel-t.com



Legal Notice

REMOVU is a trademark of Essel-T Co., Ltd., registered in the U.S. and other countries.  

REMOVU P1 is made for working with GoPro's Hero® camera.

GOPRO and the GoPro logo are trademarks of GoPro, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

story:
What is it ?

 

LighVe lights up your room in sync with music. Provided is a light strip with a control device. Advanced signal processing techniques and wireless communication, makes this product stand out from the rest. Our android app connects to the light strip wirelessly. Now, you can just play any music over speakers or on your phone and start the app to seamlessly create visualizations and light up the strip. In the app, controls are provided for the visual speed and the brightness. So just play your favourite playlist, sit back and enjoy the show.

Also, we will provide a audio-in device where you can plug in your aux out cable and will not require a smartphone.

Features

  • Wireless sync to ANY MUSIC you play on ANY DEVICE.

 

  • Advanced beat detection

​

  • Beautiful visualizations

​

  • Sleek, waterproof design

​

  • App controlled

​

​

 

  • So many colors!!

​

How we do it ?

Visualization is generated based on identifying dynamism in live music. We have developed proprietary algorithms that finds peaks/beats and another algorithm to label them. The visual speed is adjusted based on the parameters for the peak detection. With every such peaks, we apply a new display pattern to the strip while fading out the old patterns. These computations are required to happen in real time, so have been coded with Native Development Kit on Android to achieve maximum speed and have no latency. The audio-in device is a single board computer based on CHIP and has the same algorithm.

The controller on the light strip has a Nordic Semiconductor NRF51822 chip with Bluetooth Smart capability and an ARM Cortex processor. The light strip has a series of WS2812 controller based LEDs with a serial protocol. A driver is implemented on the NRF51822 chip to communicate to these LEDs in that serial protocol. Every few milliseconds, illumination patterns are transmitted to the chip and the light strip is updated instantaneously.

 

Where the funding will go?

MASS PRODUCTION

We want to provide the best quality to our customers at best price. Hence, mass production is a must. The funding will be utilised as follows for mass production:

60% Components Purchase
20% Product Assembly
20% Import & Export

 

Status

We are all set for mass production.

Certified and advanced components Selected
Circuit & hardware Tested rigorously
Software Tested, working smoothly
Arrow Electronics certification Obtained
Manufacturers who can provide quality service for production and testing Selected, quotations ready

 

So, now we just need your help to complete the final step: "Bring it to your doorstep". Fund us, help us make our dream come true and we will deliver you yours!!

 

Timeline

January 2017 Idea conceived
March Components finalized, proof of concept
April Initial development over
June Prototype developed
August Fully functional, all bugs fixed
September Campaign starts
November Final refinements
December Mass production+Order fulfilment

 

Why we did  it?

We love music. Yet, it's only in discotheques and concerts that we see music come to life with all the reactive lighting. So we decided to bring the same synced lighting indoors. We found that existing solutions to be lacking in creativity as they require pre-programming. So, we set out to use machine learning to develop an advanced automatic synced lighting solution. Now, our parties have become much more lively.

 

How you can help

We have committed long hours to this project and now we have a fully functional solution. To finally be able to bring this to you, we will need funds or favorable feedback from you. So, if you like this, please back us in any of the ways listed alongside. Also, if you have any suggestions, drop them at the suggestion box. And spread the word, by sharing this in your social media.

If you want your space to light up with music, back us!  

Who we are ?

We are mechatronics engineers from India, with aspirations to make many more products in the IOT space.

Sankho Turjo is a fan of machine learning and strongly believes that AI will bring delight  to the world when it’s not saving it. He wishes to travel the world someday and experience its music from every corner.
Surbhi is a robotics+AI enthusiast and likes to play with electronics. She likes to make dumb electronic systems smarter.She can get into the mood of dancing anytime, on any music.

 

Specifications

Each product unit consists of:

Sankho Turjo is a fan of machine learning and strongly believes that AI will bring delight  to the world when it’s not saving it. He wishes to travel the world someday and experience its music from every corner.



Surbhi is a robotics+AI enthusiast and likes to play with electronics. She likes to make dumb electronic systems smarter.She can get into the mood of dancing anytime, on any music.

story:
Imagine you had a luminaire that radiated exactly the right light for every occasion.

 

Soft and supple with a warm light colour for a romantic dinner, perfectly tuned brightness, optimal colour rendering and freedom from glare for a game of poker or stylish and spectacular lighting for a festive spread.

 

XMOOVE can also be extended to nearly five times its folded length – from around 30cm to a maximum 1.4m!!! It is as versatile as you, and adapts to every situation in your life.

 

 

 

The Story about XMOOVE

I have worked as a designer and creator in the lighting industry for more than 20 years. Luminaires with surprising features and flexibility are my passion. "If the concept and design are right and smart control is incorporated for good lighting quality, I reckon you have a perfect product – and that is how I feel about XMOOVE".

 

 

 

 

 

Easy to adjust from 30x32 cm to 1.4m x 0.14m

My team and I believe we have created a thrilling, exclusive luminaire series – one that will impress you with its design and performance. We aim to deliver uniqueness and individualityrather than a product suitable for the mass market.

 

 

Manufacturing

This unique XMOOVE is patent pending. XMOOVE table and pendant luminaires form a small product family made to the very highest design and quality standards.

XMOOVE is made by laser sintering, which permits fabrication of a pre-drilled unit complete with working joints and cable conduits in a single operation. The luminaire housing is created layer by layer, using laser technology to fuse particles of a high-tech polyamide powder. The distinguishing features of this material include long-term stability, resistance to wear, light-weight construction and translucency. A layer density of 120 µm makes for optimal mechanical properties, surface quality and precision. The high-quality printing operation and the assembly of the LED boards take place in Germany.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Technical specifications

 

 

XMOOVE Pendant Luminaire

 

 

    • 100-240VAC / 50-60 Hz / 0,9A
    • Output 12V / 3,0A
    • Osram LEDs 20 x 1,2W / 3.100K / 2450 Lumen, CRI ~83
    • Osram coloured LEDs 20 x 1,2 W / 585 nm / 840 Lumen
    • Light switch for dimming
    • Casambi Modul / Tunable white (~1700 K – 3100K)
  •  

XMOOVE Desk Lamp

    • Desk Luminaire Height: from 330mm to 510mm
    • Desk Luminaire Width: from 330mm to 565mm
    • 100-240VAC / 50-60 Hz / 0,5A
    • Output 12V 1500mA
    • Osram LEDs 8 x 1,2W / 3.100K / 980 Lumen, CRI ~83
    • Osram amber coloured LEDs 8 x 1,2 W / 585 nm / 336 Lumen
    • Light switch for dimming
    • Casambi Modul / Tunable white (~1700 K – 3100K)


    •  

Enjoy:


 

 

 




To make the XMOOVE dream come true, we need your support ... and you will soon be able to hold the best and most flexible XMOOVE light in your hands.

 

The team behind XMOOVE

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Thank you for supporting XMOOVE!

All other product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners.

It is as versatile as you, and adapts to every situation in your life.   The Story about XMOOVEI have worked as a designer and creator in the lighting industry for more than 20 years. Luminaires with surprising features and flexibility are my passion. "If the concept and design are right and smart control is incorporated for good lighting quality, I reckon you have a perfect product – and that is how I feel about XMOOVE".     Easy to adjust from 30x32 cm to 1.4m x 0.14mMy team and I believe we have created a thrilling, exclusive luminaire series – one that will impress you with its design and performance. We aim to deliver uniqueness and individualityrather than a product suitable for the mass market.  
 XMOOVE is made of of high-tech polyamide, a white-translucent and valuable material
 

Manufactured in one piece

The luminaire is delivered completely and ready-to-use fully operational, pre-drilled and and wired for connection – manufactured in one piece with a selective sintering laser machine. It took one and a half year to develop this luminaire which is characterized by its interlocking shape.Noother production method would made it possible to manufacture such an exquisite luminairewhose design / is not disturbed by any screws.
3D printing finally enables us to produce this new kind of aesthetics.

 
 Just Perfect Light: "Tunable White" and "Amber-Special"
 

You can select your perfect light by simply installing the free Casambi App on your smartphone/tablet (Android or IOS). With the "tunable-white" you can select a cool bright light for work and concentration, ... or you can tune in a warm "amber light" for a cozy mood.
 
The pendant luminaire and the desk luminaire are both adjustable from 3.100 Kelvin through 2.500 Kelvin to an orange warm-tone light colour (about 1.700K and about 585nm)!!!
With XMOOVE you can tune your light from a white to a warm orange.
The custom-made LED boards are fitted with OSRAM high-quality LEDs. The combination with amber LEDs enables the light colour to be changed to produce a very homely and agreeable warm-tone light. Brightness is infinitely dimmable irrespective of light colour.
 
A control app is available free of charge for all mobile devices (Android and IOS). 
If you don´t want to use your smartphone - just use the switch. The pendant luminaire and the table luminaire are both equipped with a switch to control the brightness or to switch the light on and off. For adjusting the amber tone, please use your smartphone.
 Desk Luminaire

 
XMOOVE flexible desk luminaire with walnutbase Personalize!
XMOOVE can also be personalized. Be the designer!  The pendant lamp has 20 surfaces to design, the desk lamp 8.  Here we can print for you for example personal messages, love poems, single words or just  company logos or slogans. Propably you will design a "wedding lamp" as an unforgettable present, ...
 

Example: The desk luminaire featuring the word ‚Light‘ in 8 diffenrent languages. The letters are three-dimensional inside the sidewall. When you turn on the light these words are emphasized by a higher brightness.

The distinguishing features of this material include long-term stability, resistance to wear, light-weight construction and translucency. A layer density of 120 µm makes for optimal mechanical properties, surface quality and precision. The high-quality printing operation and the assembly of the LED boards take place in Germany.

 
High quality 3D Lasersinter production 
 

The luminaire is delivered completely and fully functional – in one piece – from a selective sintering laser machine. Production of PCBs 
 
Osram high quality LEDs
