story:
GoBot, as a learning toy, demands imagination and logical reasoning. It inspires children to create their unique robot and think structurally with coding blocks. We conducted year-long field research with more than 500 children, and the result shows that 20% children learned the core concepts of programming in less than 30 minutes.

FAQ

Q: Where is the idea of GoBot coming from?

A: GoBot is an extended work from Seymour Papert’s LOGO and the open source project Cubetto.

Q: What is the education theory behind GoBot?

A: GoBot is based on the constructivism learning theory from MIT Media Lab & AI Lab founder Prof. Seymour Papert and his mentor Jean Piaget. Constructivism suggests that most effective learning happens when children are autonomously engaging with the environments. 

 

Q: Does GOBOT include building blocks?

A: No. We don't provide building blocks. 

Q: Do I need to know code or math to teach my kids?

A: No. We will provide guidebook, video, live streaming for your kids (And you). 

Q: Where can I find ideas for I can play with GOBOT?

A: Visit our fan page first. The official website would be online soon.

Q: How is GoBoT different from other competitors?

A: It's the only product makes 7-year-old-children understanding the core knowledge of programming in 30 minutes.

Q: Is that all?

A: Definitely NOT, this is just the start! 

------
LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which do not sponsor, authorize or endorse this site

story:
Wireless Temperature, Humidity & Air Pressure Sensing:

 

Tempy is a low-power sensing system that wirelessly monitors and reports its' surrounding temperature, humidity, and air pressure conditions to your smartphone, tablet or computer. The collected sensor data is sent to the cloud where it’s instantly accessible through the Tempy Web App from anywhere in the world. Using the Tempy Web App, you can monitor live data, receive alerts, and manage sensors directly from your phone, tablet, or computer. Tempy sensors have an impressive 10-year battery life with readings being taken every two minutes. Ready for both indoor and outdoor use, Tempy is a fully weatherproof sensor solution that’s fit to report in any environment.

Protect your home, garden, and perishables from unforeseen fluctuations in temperature and humidity, in turn protecting yourself from the unexpected expenses associated with frozen pipes, mold, spoilage, maintenance calls, and more.

 

 

Why Tempy?

 

  • All perks include everything you need to get Tempy up and running in minutes
  • Temperature sensing from -40°F to 140°F (-40°C to 60°C) with an accuracy of ± 0.5°F (0.25°C) *See FAQs for more information.
  • Humidity sensing from 0% to 100% with a reading accuracy of ± 3%
  • Atmospheric pressure sensing from 300 to 1100 hPa with an accuracy of ± 0.12 hPa
  • Unlimited access to Tempy’s online management, notification, and data visualization tools
  • Wireless connectivity range of up to 4000 ft (1200 m) from Tempy sensors to gateways (in optimal conditions)
  • 10-year battery life with sensor readings taken in two-minute intervals (two AA batteries included)
  • Configurable text message and email alerts that can be delivered to multiple recipients
  • Unlimited free access to all historical data for online viewing and downloading (CSV file)
  • Scalable - Add an unlimited number of Tempy sensors and gateways to your remote sensing networks
  • Built for both indoor and outdoor use, the Tempy sensor is IP65 certified protecting it from the elements

 

 

Tempy Use-Cases:

 

Are you wanting to monitor the heat distribution in your home, or own a secondary residence that's unattended for 6 months out of the year? With Tempy installed in your home or cabin, you can rest at ease knowing that your fridge and furnace are running, plants are growing, waterlines are intact, and pets are comfortable while you’re away.

 

 

With home and office monitoring being the Tempy systems' most popular methods of employment, there are dozens of additional use-cases in which Tempy can save on power, heating, and damage costs. Below are a few supplementary examples of what Tempy can be used for:

 

 

How Tempy Works:

 

Tempy consists of sensors and gateways. Tempy sensors are an all-in-one, wireless sensing device that collects temperature, humidity, and air pressure data and “passes” it to a Tempy gateway. The Tempy gateway is a wired, internet connected device that receives the data collected by the Tempy sensors then sends it to the cloud. Once in the cloud, all Tempy sensor data can be accessed and visualized through our online web application. Tempy sensors have a communication range of up to 4000 ft (1200 m) with Tempy gateways in optimal conditions and will automatically start transmitting data once in range.

 

 

Tempy Sensors:

 

Tempy sensors are an ultra-low-power sensing device that lasts for up to 10-years on two AA batteries (included) with readings being taken every two minutes. Adding sensors to an existing Tempy solution is quick, easy, and can happen at any time. There are no scalability limitations pertaining to the number of sensors you can add to a Tempy use-case. There are 2 types of Tempy sensors available:

  • Tempy: Senses temperature only
  • Tempy+:  Senses temperature, humidity, and air pressure

 

 

Tempy Gateways:

 

Tempy gateways are a wired, internet connected device that bridges the communication of Tempy sensors to the internet by delivering their collected data to the cloud. Tempy gateways can facilitate communication with up to 1000 Tempy sensors and have a connectivity range of up to 4000 ft (1200 m) in optimal conditions. In scenarios where there are more than 1000 Tempy sensors in use or you need additional coverage, you can add additional gateways to balance the connectivity and data loads. Adding gateways to an existing Tempy solution is quick, easy, and can happen at any time.

 

 

The Tempy Web App:

 

 

The Tempy web application is a cloud portal that allows you to access your Tempy data, register sensors, create custom alerts, and more. This online service is accessible through a web browser from anywhere in the world and is desktop, tablet, and mobile friendly.

 

 

Notable advantages include:

  • Custom alerts and notification messages
  • Sensor registration and management
  • Beautiful charts for data monitoring and analysis
  • Unlimited access to live and historical data
  • Downloadable historical data
  • No subscription fees

 

Installing Tempy:

​
Step 1:

Power the Tempy gateway and connect it to the internet using a wired ethernet connection (USB power adapter and Cat6 ethernet cable included).
 

 

Step 2:

Visit Tempy’s online web application (soon to be tempy.io) to create your account, register sensors and create alerts.
 

 

Step 3:

Install your Tempy sensors and start receiving live temperature and humidity data instantly.
 

 

Tempy Timeline:

 

Tempy's team consists of a tight-knit group of experts specializing in hardware, firmware, software, and manufacturing. We are committed to the successful launch of Tempy and the ongoing maintenance required post-launch to guarantee its continued success and growth. Manufacturing of the Tempy devices is done in-house eliminating all risks and delays brought on by outsourcing product production to a 3rd party.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

 

  1. Are there subscription fees associated with Tempy?

    No. Tempy comes with unlimited free access to our online web application and data logging services.
     
  2. Is a smartphone required to use Tempy?

    No. A smartphone is recommended for mobile access to our web application and text alerts but is not required. Tempy can be accessed and fully managed through a web browser from anywhere in the world.
     
  3. Will Tempy work anywhere in the world?

    Yes. Tempy uses the 2.4GHz ISM band (same as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth) and will work anywhere in the world.
     
  4. Can I add additional Tempy sensors to my Tempy sensor network?

    Yes. Additional Tempy sensors can be added to your account at any time. There is no limit to the amount of Tempy sensors you can have, and they will always be managed through a single account.
     
  5. What powers the Tempy sensor and gateway?

    - The Tempy sensor is power by two AA batteries (included)
    - The Tempy gateway is powered by a 120V wall outlet (USB power adaptor included)
     
  6. What if I don't have an available ethernet port to connect the Tempy gateway?

    No problem. Affordable multiport ethernet switches can be found and bought through Amazon.
     
  7. What is the Tempy sensor’s battery life?

    Tempy sensors will last up to 10 years using alkaline batteries (household batteries) and over 10 years when using lithium batteries (required when Tempy sensors are deployed in sub-zero temperatures).
     
  8. How can Tempy last for 10 years on batteries when most Wi-Fi sensors only last up to a few months?

    Although Tempy sensors use the 2.4GHz ISM band for wireless communication, they do not use the Wi-Fi communication protocol. Tempy uses a proprietary low-power wireless communication protocol which allows them to last for 10 years on batteries.
     
  9. Some Wi-Fi sensors claim 6-8 months of battery life. How is this possible?

    It is likely that these Wi-Fi sensors save power by transmitting data in one-hour intervals. This is much less (30x) than Tempie’s two-minute intervals.
     
  10. What makes the Tempy sensor low-power?

    Tempy sensors send very small messages to the gateway. Because of this small message size, both the data transmission duration and power consumption requirements very low.
     
  11. What is Tempy’s communication range?

    In optimal conditions, Tempy sensors have a wireless communication range of up to 4000 ft (1200 m) with the Tempy gateway. In less optimal conditions Tempy still has an impressive communication range that outperforms both Bluetooth and Wi-Fi.
     
  12. What gives the Tempy its vast communication range?

    Tempy’s proprietary low-power wireless communication protocol that grants the Tempy sensors with such a long battery life is also what gives Tempy its' extensive communication range.
     
  13. Will Tempy sensors work in extreme temperatures?

    Yes. Tempy sensors have an operational temperature of between -40°F and 140°F (-40°C and 60°C). This makes Tempy ideal for monitoring fridges, freezers, and other perishable storage units. Please keep in mind that lithium batteries are required to power electronics with temperatures below 23°F (-5°C).
     
  14. Can Tempy sensors be used outdoors?

    Yes. The Tempy sensor is built for both indoor and outdoor use and is IP65 certified protecting it from dust ingress and low-pressure water jets.
     
  15. How do Tempy sensors measure humidity through the IP65 certified casing?

    Tempy sensors have a Gore-Tex vent allowing for airflow to the internal humidity sensor, while at the same time stopping water from penetrating the casing.
     
  16. What is the purpose of the Tempy gateway?

    Because Tempy sensors are not connected to the internet they need to “pass” all the data they’ve collected to an internet connected gateway, which in turn delivers it to the cloud.
     
  17. Are Tempy sensors paired with one specific gateway?

    No. Tempy sensors operate in the same way that a cell-phone communicates with cell towers. They will connect to any Tempy gateway that's within range and start transmitting data automatically with no configuration needed.
     
  18. Will I ever need more than one Tempy gateway?

    In a consumer setting, unlikely. In a business setting, maybe. The need for more than one gateway will arise when over one thousand Tempy sensors are being used within a single use-case (1 gateway per 1000 sensors), or you're wanting to extend Tempy's connectivity range.
     
  19. What are the dimensions of the Tempy sensor and gateway?

    - Tempy sensor: 4 in. x 2 in. x 1.1 in. (10.3 cm x 5 cm x 3 cm)
    - Tempy gateway: 4.1 in. x 2.2 in. x 1 in. (10.4 cm x 5.5 cm x 2.5 cm)
     
  20. How do you mount a Tempy sensor?

    Tempy sensors are lightweight and screw mountable. They can also be temporarily installed with the use of 3M (available at any hardware store) or Velcro tape (included).
     
  21. How accurate are Tempy sensor measurements?

    Tempy’s temperature sensor has an accuracy range of ±0.5°F (±0.25°C), and the relative humidity sensor has an accuracy range of ± 3% RH (max), 0-80% RH.


     
  22. Can Tempy sensors be calibrated?

    No. Tempy sensors are factory-calibrated.
     
  23. Are more accurate temperature sensors available?

    Yes. Please message us for more information.
     
  24. Can I export my Tempy data?

    Yes. All historical Tempy data can be accessed and downloaded through our online web application (CSV file).
     
  25. Can I set Tempy to °C or °F?

    Yes. This is an account setting manageable through the online web application.
     
  26. What type of alerts can I set up through the online web application?

    - Temperature above/below a specified threshold
    - Humidity above/below a specified threshold
    - Connectivity error between the Tempy sensor and gateway
     
  27. When are Tempy alerts sent?

    Instantly. If more than 4 temperature or humidity readings are missed (20 minutes) a connectivity error alert is sent.
     
  28. Can I send alerts to more than one contact?

    Yes. You can assign up to 5 contacts to a single alert.
     
  29. Can I customize my Tempy alerts?

    Yes. Messages are constructed using text and data. For example, the string “The {Name} went above {Temp} at {Time}.” would produce the message: “The Basement Freezer Tempy went above 4°F at 3:15 AM 03/21/2017.”
     
  30. Does Tempy come with a warranty?

    Yes. Tempy has a one-year manufacturer warranty guaranteed to be free both material and workmanship defects one-year from the date of activation.
     
  31. Are there other variations of the Tempy sensor available offering more sensor capabilities?

    Yes. Please message us for more information.
     
  32. Is Tempy scalable?

    Yes. Additional Tempy sensors and gateways can be added/removed at any time and are all managed through one account.
     
  33. I need a high-volume order of Tempy sensors and gateways. What should I do?

    Please message us for more information as prospective discounts and custom hardware often apply to high volume orders.

 

Customs and Duties
 

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or any other country taxes. Please make sure you are aware of all customs and duty fees you will incur based on your country of residence prior to the June 2018 Tempy ship date.

Is a smartphone required to use Tempy?No. A smartphone is recommended for mobile access to our web application and text alerts but is not required. Tempy can be accessed and fully managed through a web browser from anywhere in the world. 

Will Tempy work anywhere in the world?Yes. Tempy uses the 2.4GHz ISM band (same as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth) and will work anywhere in the world. 

Can I add additional Tempy sensors to my Tempy sensor network?Yes. Additional Tempy sensors can be added to your account at any time. There is no limit to the amount of Tempy sensors you can have, and they will always be managed through a single account. 

What powers the Tempy sensor and gateway?- The Tempy sensor is power by two AA batteries (included)- The Tempy gateway is powered by a 120V wall outlet (USB power adaptor included) 

What if I don't have an available ethernet port to connect the Tempy gateway?No problem. Affordable multiport ethernet switches can be found and bought through Amazon. 

What is the Tempy sensor’s battery life?Tempy sensors will last up to 10 years using alkaline batteries (household batteries) and over 10 years when using lithium batteries (required when Tempy sensors are deployed in sub-zero temperatures). 

How can Tempy last for 10 years on batteries when most Wi-Fi sensors only last up to a few months?Although Tempy sensors use the 2.4GHz ISM band for wireless communication, they do not use the Wi-Fi communication protocol. Tempy uses a proprietary low-power wireless communication protocol which allows them to last for 10 years on batteries. 

Some Wi-Fi sensors claim 6-8 months of battery life. How is this possible?It is likely that these Wi-Fi sensors save power by transmitting data in one-hour intervals. This is much less (30x) than Tempie’s two-minute intervals. 

What makes the Tempy sensor low-power?Tempy sensors send very small messages to the gateway. Because of this small message size, both the data transmission duration and power consumption requirements very low. 

What is Tempy’s communication range?In optimal conditions, Tempy sensors have a wireless communication range of up to 4000 ft (1200 m) with the Tempy gateway. In less optimal conditions Tempy still has an impressive communication range that outperforms both Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. 

What gives the Tempy its vast communication range?Tempy’s proprietary low-power wireless communication protocol that grants the Tempy sensors with such a long battery life is also what gives Tempy its' extensive communication range. 

Will Tempy sensors work in extreme temperatures?Yes. Tempy sensors have an operational temperature of between -40°F and 140°F (-40°C and 60°C). This makes Tempy ideal for monitoring fridges, freezers, and other perishable storage units. Please keep in mind that lithium batteries are required to power electronics with temperatures below 23°F (-5°C). 

Can Tempy sensors be used outdoors?Yes. The Tempy sensor is built for both indoor and outdoor use and is IP65 certified protecting it from dust ingress and low-pressure water jets. 

How do Tempy sensors measure humidity through the IP65 certified casing?Tempy sensors have a Gore-Tex vent allowing for airflow to the internal humidity sensor, while at the same time stopping water from penetrating the casing. 

What is the purpose of the Tempy gateway?Because Tempy sensors are not connected to the internet they need to “pass” all the data they’ve collected to an internet connected gateway, which in turn delivers it to the cloud. 

Are Tempy sensors paired with one specific gateway?No. Tempy sensors operate in the same way that a cell-phone communicates with cell towers. They will connect to any Tempy gateway that's within range and start transmitting data automatically with no configuration needed. 

Will I ever need more than one Tempy gateway?In a consumer setting, unlikely. In a business setting, maybe. The need for more than one gateway will arise when over one thousand Tempy sensors are being used within a single use-case (1 gateway per 1000 sensors), or you're wanting to extend Tempy's connectivity range. 

What are the dimensions of the Tempy sensor and gateway?- Tempy sensor: 4 in. x 2 in. x 1.1 in. (10.3 cm x 5 cm x 3 cm)- Tempy gateway: 4.1 in. x 2.2 in. x 1 in. (10.4 cm x 5.5 cm x 2.5 cm) 

How do you mount a Tempy sensor?Tempy sensors are lightweight and screw mountable. They can also be temporarily installed with the use of 3M (available at any hardware store) or Velcro tape (included). 

How accurate are Tempy sensor measurements?Tempy’s temperature sensor has an accuracy range of ±0.5°F (±0.25°C), and the relative humidity sensor has an accuracy range of ± 3% RH (max), 0-80% RH. 

Can Tempy sensors be calibrated?No. Tempy sensors are factory-calibrated. 

Are more accurate temperature sensors available?Yes. Please message us for more information. 

Can I export my Tempy data?Yes. All historical Tempy data can be accessed and downloaded through our online web application (CSV file). 

Can I set Tempy to °C or °F?Yes. This is an account setting manageable through the online web application. 

What type of alerts can I set up through the online web application?- Temperature above/below a specified threshold- Humidity above/below a specified threshold- Connectivity error between the Tempy sensor and gateway 

When are Tempy alerts sent?Instantly. If more than 4 temperature or humidity readings are missed (20 minutes) a connectivity error alert is sent. 

Can I send alerts to more than one contact?Yes. You can assign up to 5 contacts to a single alert. 

Can I customize my Tempy alerts?Yes. Messages are constructed using text and data. For example, the string “The {Name} went above {Temp} at {Time}.” would produce the message: “The Basement Freezer Tempy went above 4°F at 3:15 AM 03/21/2017.” 

Does Tempy come with a warranty?Yes. Tempy has a one-year manufacturer warranty guaranteed to be free both material and workmanship defects one-year from the date of activation. 

Are there other variations of the Tempy sensor available offering more sensor capabilities?Yes. Please message us for more information. 

Is Tempy scalable?Yes. Additional Tempy sensors and gateways can be added/removed at any time and are all managed through one account. 

I need a high-volume order of Tempy sensors and gateways. What should I do?Please message us for more information as prospective discounts and custom hardware often apply to high volume orders.

 Customs and Duties Our prices do not include VAT, GST or any other country taxes. Please make sure you are aware of all customs and duty fees you will incur based on your country of residence prior to the June 2018 Tempy ship date.

(Versione italiana in fondo alla pagina)





/////////////////////////////


English version


/////////////////////////////




" Do you know that you can save 33% to 68% on repairs? "


My name is Francesco Gagliano. I am 36 years old. I have been working as an engineer at a phone store/customer support center and I repair mobile devices for 6 years now.
She is my girlfriend and accompanies me in everything I do.

Maybe you're wondering how you can save up to 68%, or start thinking "the usual trickery" but if you keep on reading I will demonstrate that it is not like that. You can verify by yourself that the data that I give you is real. To do that, I have to show a cost analysis, but first, I want to explain which benefits you will have if you decide to contribute.

  • Your donation is not a vain grant but a coupon that you can use on the site to repair your devices and buy equipments (covers, screen protestors, power banks , headphones, etc.)
  • You will get several accessories for free that will be delivered at your home without additional charge.
  • For your future repairs and/or purchases you will receive extra discounts.


As you can see I did not upload any videos trying to assume the public. What I want to do instead is to make you understand how you can have such high savings and why your contribution is fundamental.

When it comes to buying goods or services, the word Internet is synonymous to savings, and it is true, because everything that you buy in a shop, you can find it easily on the internet for a cheaper price, but if you do a quick search as covers repairs of smartphones, tablets, etc .. you realize immediately that the prices are not much different as those of service centers scattered around the city. Then there are the Chinese who are now sprouting everywhere and as always do beneficial prices, but I do not recommend them, because the quality of the spare parts they use, it is often very poor (it happens daily to see the display with different background colors than the original or to see the display stopping working after a few months), often they do not offer any guarantee on the spare parts and often no receipt is issued !!!

Now let's examine how much a replacement display is costing and how much you could save if you are going to make your contribution.

If you go on any website as www.toprepair.it (I take this reference site because it explains prices  clearly and does not ask for a prepayment as on other sites, and I have nothing against, the service center I work for is adopting this price too) or on other similar sites the replacement of the entire display + touch screen for a Samsung S4 costs EUR 179.00 including pickup.


If you go to a service center it is not a big difference cause it is obvious that prices range of prices is almost the same.

But let's see in detail what are the costs that a repairer must face. Anyone can buy an already assembled display on www.ebay.it for €. 75.00.

A repairman or a service center, with its "hooks" and with a good turnover takes in EUR 50.00 (often less). In the case of online repairer must add shipping charges, one for withdrawal and one for the return that amount to about €. 15.00 and everything else is profit. Service centers do not have the shipping so the gain is even greater. So if you do well the accounts to remain well repairman €. 114.00, rising to €. 129.00 Operator offline. It is true that in Italy now the tax burden is around 60% and that the cost of running a business are high, but this does not justify such a lavish gain.



"Change the price policy and let users save money"


This is the purpose of this crowfunding campaign and you'll be the first to benefit. Let's see in detail how much it would cost if you decide to fund me. Keeping unchanged the costing and shipments €. 25,00 for each job performed. Yes, because 25 Euros represents the "right" gain (always €. 100.00 per hour) for a qualified technician. So let's sum up:

€. 50.00 (display) + €. 15.00 (shipments) + €. 25.00 (labor) = €. 90.00

So it’s 50% less.

I evaluated 25 parts (you can do it too for your replacement) as the most frequent display Iphone 4, 5 and 6, the display Samsung S3, 4, 5 and 6, recharger (for any device), Huawei and G7 and P8 different Nokia Lumia, LG, etc ... and what comes out is that for any replacement we speak about, there is a saving ranging from 33% to 68%. I analyzed the Samsung S4 as it represents the average and this is the price that you will find on the site.


Your contribution is valuable - not only for me or for you, but for everyone !!!


In a world that has turned to an exasperated consumer society, a “broken” smartphone is often replaced with another, obviously, if you see the prohibitive costs of repair out of warranty. But with a considerable saving on repairs, you can give a second life to your smartphone, and if you want to replace it with the last Galaxy S7 that still has to come out, you can do it anyway, as your dear old iPhone can be fixed and sold  to some acquaintance or on ebay.  You can recycle it in the family (mom, dad, girlfriend, brother, sister, grandparents, etc ...), often in exchange for something, or give it to whoever you want. 
Apart from this, in Italy, will open a new frontier, those repairs (quality) low cost, so inevitably many in the industry will have to adapt (and I speak not only operators but also online and offline) resulting in low general prices. Do you know how much Italians spend on repairs? It is estimated that only in the year 2014, in Italy, has been spent over 140 million euro (the number is still growing). Try to imagine how much money can remain in the pockets of consumers.


How can this money be used?



In addition to the expenses required for the construction of site, purchase domain, opening a VAT, registration chamber of commerce, etc. (€. 1000/2000), the rest will be used solely and exclusively for the purchase of spare parts, in this way, you can "check" advantageous prices which results in greater savings for you.




Benefits and specifications



Coupon €. 10.00


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.


Coupon €. 20.00 


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.

Coupon €. 30.00 


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.

Coupon €. 50.00 

You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover or screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.
+ 5% discount on your future purchases or repairs.



Coupon €. 100.00


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover and a screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.
+ 10% discount on your future purchases or repairs.




Coupon €. 200.00


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit within the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover, a screen protector and a 8000 mAh power bank so that you never run out of battery.
+ 15% discount on your future purchases or repairs.

The cover and the screen protectors are specific to your models and are subject to change, while the power bank is the one shown on the photo and alone has a value of more than €. 20.00.


Important: Communicate the brand and model of your smartphone or tablet and the shipping address. If you have purchased a €. 200.00 coupon also communicate the power bank color you prefer: black, gold, silver,pink or blue.
The shipment will be made within 30 days following the end of the campaign. Ability to change the model if the shipment has not yet occurred.
International shipments are not included so the value of the shipment (€. 20.00) will be charged to the coupon that you have decided to buy. On this way, you will not have to worry about anything, but you just have to buy the coupons, communicate the address, model and color of the power bank.


Objectives and Risks



The goal of this campaign is to launch a crowdfunding e-commerce site, specialized in economical repairs for smartphones and tablets and the promotion with Google Adwords campaigns, Facebook ads and also always on the portal, it will be able to buy spare parts and accessories. We are going to create a new online store within eBay. 
The site will be accessible and operational with in 60 days.
The only risk if the goal is not reached, is that I will buy spare parts at higher prices, which results in a slightly higher final price. Whatever business you speak about, make a single purchase is not the same thing as buying maybe 20 to 30 or 50 items. It is obvious that for multiple purchases supplier applies a different discount, allowing to get the maximum savings.



Conclusion



We are in Italy, the crisis unfortunately forced everyone to make sacrifices and saving has become for many the only way to move forward. I want to give my contribution, but without yours, all my efforts will be unnecessary and if you understand, it does not cost you anything. The coupon can be used whenever you want and like to buy what you need. And additionally you will get fantastic prese.
If you came up here I can only thank you for your interest, and if you decide to contribute, I will thank you publicly as soon as the site is ready, so a big thanks and see you soon.

Versione italiana


//////////////////////////////////////////






"Sai che puoi risparmiare dal 33% al 68% sulle riparazioni ma nessuno lo dice?"


Mi chiamo Francesco Gagliano, ho 35 anni, sono un tecnico e lavoro presso un negozio di telefonia/centro assistenza, riparo dispositivi mobili ormai da 6 anni.
Lei è la mia ragazza e mi accompagna in tutto ciò che faccio.
 Magari ti starai chiedendo come è possibile risparmiare sino al 68%  oppure inizi a pensare "la solita buffala" ma  se continuerai  a leggere ti dimostrerò che non è così, tu stesso puoi verificare che i dati che ti darò sono reali. Per fare ciò devo mostrarti un'analisi dei costi, ma prima, voglio spiegarti quali benefici avrai se decidi di contribuire.
  • La tua non è una donazione a fondo perduto ma un coupon che potrai utilizzare  all'interno del sito per la riparazione del tuo dispositivo nonché per l'acquisto di accessori (cover, pellicole, vetri,auricolari,dispositivi di ricarica rapida. Cuffie,ecc.)
  • Avrai in omaggio diversi accessori che ti saranno recapitati direttamente a casa senza ulteriori spese. 
  • Aquisirai un extra sconto per le vostre future riparazioni e/o acquisti.


 

Come vedi non ho caricato nessun video cercando di ipotizzare il pubblico, quello che voglio fare invece è farti capire come sia possibile avere un risparmio così alto e perché il tuo contributo è  fondamentale.

Quando si tratta di acquistare beni o servizi,  la parola internet è sinonimo di risparmio, ed è vero, perché tutto quello che tu acquisti in un normale negozio, lo trovi facilmente su internet ad un prezzo minore,  ma se fate una rapida ricerca per quanto riguarda le riparazioni di smartphone, tablet, ecc.. vi accorgete subito che i prezzi non sono tanto differenti dei centri assistenza sparsi per la città. Poi ci sono i cinesi che ormai spuntano dappertutto e come sempre fanno dei prezzi vantaggiosi, ma io sconsiglio sempre  di recarsi da loro,  in quanto, la qualità dei pezzi di ricambio che utilizzano, spesso  è veramente scadente (mi capita giornalmente di vedere display con i colori di sfondo diversi dall'originale o vedere display che smettono di funzionare dopo solo qualche mese), spesso non offrono nessuna garanzia sul pezzo di ricambio e altrettanto spesso non rilasciano nessuna ricevuta!!!

Adesso esaminiamo quando vi costa un ricambio display e quando potreste risparmiare  se decidete di finanziarmi.

Se andate su un qualsiasi sito come www.toprepair.it (prendo questo sito di riferimento in quanto mette i prezzi in chiaro e non chiede come  in altri siti un preventivo e non ho nulla contro, anche il centro assistenza per cui lavoro adotta questo prezzo) o altri siti simili, il ricambio dell'intero display+touch screen per un samsung s4  costa €.179.00 compreso ritiro e riconsegna. 

Se andate in un centro assistenza la cosa non cambia molto, è ovvio che i prezzi oscillano di qualche decina di euro, ma la media è quella.

Ma andiamo a vedere nel dettaglio quali sono i costi che un riparatore deve affrontare.  Un display gia assemblato chiunque può acquistarlo su www.ebay.it a € 75.00.

 Un riparatore o un centro assistenza,  con i suoi "agganci" e con un buon giro d'affari lo prende a €. 50.00  (spesso anche meno).  Nel caso del riparatore online deve aggiungere le spese di spedizione, una per il ritiro e una per la riconsegna che ammontano a circa €.15.00 e tutto il resto è guadagno. I centri assistenza  non non hanno le spese di spedizione quindi il guadagno è ancora maggiore. Quindi se fate bene i conti al riparatore rimango ben €. 114.00, che salgono a €.129.00 per l'operatore offline. Si è vero che in Italia ormai la pressione fiscale si aggira intorno al 60% e che le spese per la gestione di un'attività sono alte, ma tutto ciò non giustifica un così lauto guadagno.



"Cambiare la politica dei prezzi e far risparmiare gli utenti"


Questo è lo scopo di questa campagna crowfunding e tu sarai il primo a beneficiarne.  Andiamo a vedere nel dettaglio quanto ti costerebbe lo stesso ricambio se deciderai di finanziarmi. Mantenendo immutato il prezzo di costo e le spedizioni, aggiungete €. 25.00 per ogni lavoro effettuato. Si, perché 25 euro, rappresentano il "giusto" guadagno  (sono sempre €. 100.00 l'ora) per un tecnico qualificato. Quindi andiamo a sommare:

€. 50.00 (display)+ €.15.00 (spedizioni)+ €.25.00 (manodopera) = €.90.00

Ovvero il 50% in meno.

Ho valutato 25 ricambi (puoi farlo anche tu per il tuo ricambio) fra i più frequenti come display iphone 4, 5 e 6, display samsung s3, 4, 5 e 6, connettore ricarca (per qualsiasi dispositivo),huawei g7 e p8 e diversi nokia lumia,lg, ecc...  e quello che ne esce fuori è che di qualsiasi ricambio si parla, si ha un risparmio che varia dal 33% al 68%. Ho analizzato il samsung s4 in quanto rappresenta la media ed è questo il prezzo che troverai all'interno del sito.



Il tuo contributo è prezioso non solo per me o per te, ma per tutti!!!


In un mondo che il cunsumismo ha raggiunto livelli esasperati, lo smartphone "rotto" spesso viene sostituito con un altro, naturale visto i proibitivi costi di riparazione fuori garanzia. Ma, con un notevole risparmio sulle riparazioni, si può dare una seconda vita al proprio smartphone, e se  vuoi sostituirlo con l'ultimo galaxi s7 che ancora deve uscire, puoi farlo comunque, mentre il tuo caro vecchio iphone puoi ripararlo e venderlo a qualche conoscente o su ebay, puoi riciclarlo in famiglia (mamma, papà, fidanzata, fratello, sorella, nonni,ecc...),spesso in cambio di qualcosa, oppure regalarlo a chi ti pare. Oltre a questo, in Italia, si aprirà una nuova frontiera, quelle delle riparazioni (di qualità) low cost, per cui, nevitabilmente molti operatori del settore dovranno adeguarsi (e non parlo solo degli operatori online ma anche di quelli offline) con conseguente abbasso generale dei prezzi. Sai quanto spendono gli italiani  per le riparazioni?  È stato calcolato che nel solo 2014, in Italia, sono stati spesi oltre 140 milioni di euro (in continua crescita), quindi,  prova ad immaginare quanto denaro può rimanere nelle tasche dei consumatori.



Come verrà impiegato questo denaro?


Oltre alla spese richieste  per la realizzazione del sito, acquisto dominio, apertura partita iva, iscrizione camera di commercio, ecc. (€.1000/2000), tutto il resto servirà solo ed esclusivamente all'acquisto di pezzi di ricambio, in questo modo, si possono "spuntare"  prezzi vantaggiosi il che si traduce in un maggiore risparmio per te. 


Benefici e specifiche



Coupon da €. 10.00


Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.

Coupon da €. 20.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1  pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.

Coupon da €. 30.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1  cover per il tuo smartphone o tablet.

Coupon da €. 50.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover o pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.
+5% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.


Coupon da €. 100.00


Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover + n°1 vetro o pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.
+10% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.


Coupon da €. 200.00


Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover + n°1 vetro o pellicola + n°1 power bank da 8000 mAh per non rimanere mai senza batteria.
+15% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.


Le cover e i vetri sono specifici per per i vostri modelli e possono subire variazioni, mentre la batteria portatile in questione, è quella illustrata nelle foto e da sola ha un valore di oltre €. 20.00

Importante: comunicate marca e modello del vostro smartphone o tablet e l'indirizzo di spedizione, se hai acquistato un coupon da €. 200.00 comunica anche il colore del power bank che preferisci: black, gold, silver, pink o blue.
La spedizione sarà effettuata entro 30 giorni succesivi al termine della campagna stessa. Possibilità di cambiare modello se la spedizione non è ancora avvenuta.
Spedizioni internazionali non sono comprese per cui il valore della spedizione (€.20.00) verrà addebitato al coupon che avete deciso di acquistare. In questo modo, non dovrai preoccuparti di nulla, ma devi semplicemente acquistare il coupon, comunicare indirizzo, modello e colore del power bank.


Obbiettivi e Rischi 


L'obbiettivo di questa campagna di crowdfunding è lanciare un sito e-commerce  specializzato nelle riparazioni a basso costo per smartphone e tablet, promuoverlo  con campagne di google adwords e facebook ads, inoltre,  sempre all'interno del portale, sarà possibile acquistare ricambi e accessori. Creare un nuovo negozio online all'interno di ebay. 
Il sito sarà raggiungibile e operativo entro 60 gg.
L'unico rischio se non si raggiunge il goal è che non avendo un budget importante, acquisterò ricambi a prezzi più alti, il che si traduce in un prezzo finale lievemente maggiore. Di qualsiasi buisness si parli, fare un singolo acquisto non è la stessa cosa che acquistare magari 20-30 o 50 articoli. È ovvio che per acquisti multipli il fornitore applica una scontistica diversa, permettendo così di avere il massimo risparmio. 


Conclusione 

Siamo in Italia, la crisi purtroppo  costringe a tutti fare dei sacrifici e risparmiare è diventata per molti l'unica soluzione per andare avanti, io voglio dare il mio contributo, ma senza il tuo, tutti I miei sforzi non serviranno a nulla, e se hai ben capito , non ti costa proprio nulla, il coupon potrai utilizzarlo quando ti pare e piace per acquistare ciò che ti serve, in più riceverai dei fantastici gudget. Se sei arrivato sino qui non posso che ringraziarti per l'interesse mostrato, e nel caso che decidi anche tu di contribuire, ti ringrazierò pubblicamente non appena il sito sarà pronto.

" Do you know that you can save 33% to 68% on repairs? "

My name is Francesco Gagliano. I am 36 years old. I have been working as an engineer at a phone store/customer support center and I repair mobile devices for 6 years now.She is my girlfriend and accompanies me in everything I do.

Maybe you're wondering how you can save up to 68%, or start thinking "the usual trickery" but if you keep on reading I will demonstrate that it is not like that. You can verify by yourself that the data that I give you is real. To do that, I have to show a cost analysis, but first, I want to explain which benefits you will have if you decide to contribute.


Your donation is not a vain grant but a coupon that you can use on the site to repair your devices and buy equipments (covers, screen protestors, power banks , headphones, etc.)


You will get several accessories for free that will be delivered at your home without additional charge.


For your future repairs and/or purchases you will receive extra discounts.




As you can see I did not upload any videos trying to assume the public. What I want to do instead is to make you understand how you can have such high savings and why your contribution is fundamental.

If you go to a service center it is not a big difference cause it is obvious that prices range of prices is almost the same.

But let's see in detail what are the costs that a repairer must face. Anyone can buy an already assembled display on www.ebay.it for €. 75.00.

A repairman or a service center, with its "hooks" and with a good turnover takes in EUR 50.00 (often less). In the case of online repairer must add shipping charges, one for withdrawal and one for the return that amount to about €. 15.00 and everything else is profit. Service centers do not have the shipping so the gain is even greater. So if you do well the accounts to remain well repairman €. 114.00, rising to €. 129.00 Operator offline. It is true that in Italy now the tax burden is around 60% and that the cost of running a business are high, but this does not justify such a lavish gain.


"Change the price policy and let users save money"

This is the purpose of this crowfunding campaign and you'll be the first to benefit. Let's see in detail how much it would cost if you decide to fund me. Keeping unchanged the costing and shipments €. 25,00 for each job performed. Yes, because 25 Euros represents the "right" gain (always €. 100.00 per hour) for a qualified technician. So let's sum up:
€. 50.00 (display) + €. 15.00 (shipments) + €. 25.00 (labor) = €. 90.00

So it’s 50% less.

I evaluated 25 parts (you can do it too for your replacement) as the most frequent display Iphone 4, 5 and 6, the display Samsung S3, 4, 5 and 6, recharger (for any device), Huawei and G7 and P8 different Nokia Lumia, LG, etc ... and what comes out is that for any replacement we speak about, there is a saving ranging from 33% to 68%. I analyzed the Samsung S4 as it represents the average and this is the price that you will find on the site.

Your contribution is valuable - not only for me or for you, but for everyone !!!


In a world that has turned to an exasperated consumer society, a “broken” smartphone is often replaced with another, obviously, if you see the prohibitive costs of repair out of warranty. But with a considerable saving on repairs, you can give a second life to your smartphone, and if you want to replace it with the last Galaxy S7 that still has to come out, you can do it anyway, as your dear old iPhone can be fixed and sold  to some acquaintance or on ebay.  You can recycle it in the family (mom, dad, girlfriend, brother, sister, grandparents, etc ...), often in exchange for something, or give it to whoever you want. 
Apart from this, in Italy, will open a new frontier, those repairs (quality) low cost, so inevitably many in the industry will have to adapt (and I speak not only operators but also online and offline) resulting in low general prices. Do you know how much Italians spend on repairs? It is estimated that only in the year 2014, in Italy, has been spent over 140 million euro (the number is still growing). Try to imagine how much money can remain in the pockets of consumers.


How can this money be used?


In addition to the expenses required for the construction of site, purchase domain, opening a VAT, registration chamber of commerce, etc. (€. 1000/2000), the rest will be used solely and exclusively for the purchase of spare parts, in this way, you can "check" advantageous prices which results in greater savings for you.


Benefits and specifications


Coupon €. 10.00


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.



Coupon €. 20.00 

You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.



Coupon €. 30.00 

You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.




Coupon €. 50.00 


You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover or screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.
+ 5% discount on your future purchases or repairs.

Coupon €. 100.00

You can use it whenever you want with no time limit on the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover and a screen protector for your smartphone or tablet without additional costs.
+ 10% discount on your future purchases or repairs.


Coupon €. 200.00

You can use it whenever you want with no time limit within the site to buy accessories, spare parts, repairs.
You will receive a cover, a screen protector and a 8000 mAh power bank so that you never run out of battery.
+ 15% discount on your future purchases or repairs.

The cover and the screen protectors are specific to your models and are subject to change, while the power bank is the one shown on the photo and alone has a value of more than €. 20.00.





Important: Communicate the brand and model of your smartphone or tablet and the shipping address. If you have purchased a €. 200.00 coupon also communicate the power bank color you prefer: black, gold, silver,pink or blue.
The shipment will be made within 30 days following the end of the campaign. Ability to change the model if the shipment has not yet occurred.
International shipments are not included so the value of the shipment (€. 20.00) will be charged to the coupon that you have decided to buy. On this way, you will not have to worry about anything, but you just have to buy the coupons, communicate the address, model and color of the power bank.


Objectives and Risks


The goal of this campaign is to launch a crowdfunding e-commerce site, specialized in economical repairs for smartphones and tablets and the promotion with Google Adwords campaigns, Facebook ads and also always on the portal, it will be able to buy spare parts and accessories. We are going to create a new online store within eBay. 

The site will be accessible and operational with in 60 days.

The only risk if the goal is not reached, is that I will buy spare parts at higher prices, which results in a slightly higher final price. Whatever business you speak about, make a single purchase is not the same thing as buying maybe 20 to 30 or 50 items. It is obvious that for multiple purchases supplier applies a different discount, allowing to get the maximum savings.

Conclusion


We are in Italy, the crisis unfortunately forced everyone to make sacrifices and saving has become for many the only way to move forward. I want to give my contribution, but without yours, all my efforts will be unnecessary and if you understand, it does not cost you anything. The coupon can be used whenever you want and like to buy what you need. And additionally you will get fantastic prese.
If you came up here I can only thank you for your interest, and if you decide to contribute, I will thank you publicly as soon as the site is ready, so a big thanks and see you soon.//////////////////////////////////////////Versione italiana//////////////////////////////////////////
"Sai che puoi risparmiare dal 33% al 68% sulle riparazioni ma nessuno lo dice?"
Mi chiamo Francesco Gagliano, ho 35 anni, sono un tecnico e lavoro presso un negozio di telefonia/centro assistenza, riparo dispositivi mobili ormai da 6 anni.Lei è la mia ragazza e mi accompagna in tutto ciò che faccio.
 Magari ti starai chiedendo come è possibile risparmiare sino al 68%  oppure inizi a pensare "la solita buffala" ma  se continuerai  a leggere ti dimostrerò che non è così, tu stesso puoi verificare che i dati che ti darò sono reali. Per fare ciò devo mostrarti un'analisi dei costi, ma prima, voglio spiegarti quali benefici avrai se decidi di contribuire.


La tua non è una donazione a fondo perduto ma un coupon che potrai utilizzare  all'interno del sito per la riparazione del tuo dispositivo nonché per l'acquisto di accessori (cover, pellicole, vetri,auricolari,dispositivi di ricarica rapida. Cuffie,ecc.)

Avrai in omaggio diversi accessori che ti saranno recapitati direttamente a casa senza ulteriori spese. 

Aquisirai un extra sconto per le vostre future riparazioni e/o acquisti.
 
 
Come vedi non ho caricato nessun video cercando di ipotizzare il pubblico, quello che voglio fare invece è farti capire come sia possibile avere un risparmio così alto e perché il tuo contributo è  fondamentale.
Quando si tratta di acquistare beni o servizi,  la parola internet è sinonimo di risparmio, ed è vero, perché tutto quello che tu acquisti in un normale negozio, lo trovi facilmente su internet ad un prezzo minore,  ma se fate una rapida ricerca per quanto riguarda le riparazioni di smartphone, tablet, ecc.. vi accorgete subito che i prezzi non sono tanto differenti dei centri assistenza sparsi per la città. Poi ci sono i cinesi che ormai spuntano dappertutto e come sempre fanno dei prezzi vantaggiosi, ma io sconsiglio sempre  di recarsi da loro,  in quanto, la qualità dei pezzi di ricambio che utilizzano, spesso  è veramente scadente (mi capita giornalmente di vedere display con i colori di sfondo diversi dall'originale o vedere display che smettono di funzionare dopo solo qualche mese), spesso non offrono nessuna garanzia sul pezzo di ricambio e altrettanto spesso non rilasciano nessuna ricevuta!!!
Adesso esaminiamo quando vi costa un ricambio display e quando potreste risparmiare  se decidete di finanziarmi.
Se andate su un qualsiasi sito come www.toprepair.it (prendo questo sito di riferimento in quanto mette i prezzi in chiaro e non chiede come  in altri siti un preventivo e non ho nulla contro, anche il centro assistenza per cui lavoro adotta questo prezzo) o altri siti simili, il ricambio dell'intero display+touch screen per un samsung s4  costa €.179.00 compreso ritiro e riconsegna. 

Se andate in un centro assistenza la cosa non cambia molto, è ovvio che i prezzi oscillano di qualche decina di euro, ma la media è quella.
Ma andiamo a vedere nel dettaglio quali sono i costi che un riparatore deve affrontare.  Un display gia assemblato chiunque può acquistarlo su www.ebay.it a € 75.00.
 Un riparatore o un centro assistenza,  con i suoi "agganci" e con un buon giro d'affari lo prende a €. 50.00  (spesso anche meno).  Nel caso del riparatore online deve aggiungere le spese di spedizione, una per il ritiro e una per la riconsegna che ammontano a circa €.15.00 e tutto il resto è guadagno. I centri assistenza  non non hanno le spese di spedizione quindi il guadagno è ancora maggiore. Quindi se fate bene i conti al riparatore rimango ben €. 114.00, che salgono a €.129.00 per l'operatore offline. Si è vero che in Italia ormai la pressione fiscale si aggira intorno al 60% e che le spese per la gestione di un'attività sono alte, ma tutto ciò non giustifica un così lauto guadagno.

"Cambiare la politica dei prezzi e far risparmiare gli utenti"

Questo è lo scopo di questa campagna crowfunding e tu sarai il primo a beneficiarne.  Andiamo a vedere nel dettaglio quanto ti costerebbe lo stesso ricambio se deciderai di finanziarmi. Mantenendo immutato il prezzo di costo e le spedizioni, aggiungete €. 25.00 per ogni lavoro effettuato. Si, perché 25 euro, rappresentano il "giusto" guadagno  (sono sempre €. 100.00 l'ora) per un tecnico qualificato. Quindi andiamo a sommare:
€. 50.00 (display)+ €.15.00 (spedizioni)+ €.25.00 (manodopera) = €.90.00
Ovvero il 50% in meno.
Ho valutato 25 ricambi (puoi farlo anche tu per il tuo ricambio) fra i più frequenti come display iphone 4, 5 e 6, display samsung s3, 4, 5 e 6, connettore ricarca (per qualsiasi dispositivo),huawei g7 e p8 e diversi nokia lumia,lg, ecc...  e quello che ne esce fuori è che di qualsiasi ricambio si parla, si ha un risparmio che varia dal 33% al 68%. Ho analizzato il samsung s4 in quanto rappresenta la media ed è questo il prezzo che troverai all'interno del sito.

Il tuo contributo è prezioso non solo per me o per te, ma per tutti!!!


In un mondo che il cunsumismo ha raggiunto livelli esasperati, lo smartphone "rotto" spesso viene sostituito con un altro, naturale visto i proibitivi costi di riparazione fuori garanzia. Ma, con un notevole risparmio sulle riparazioni, si può dare una seconda vita al proprio smartphone, e se  vuoi sostituirlo con l'ultimo galaxi s7 che ancora deve uscire, puoi farlo comunque, mentre il tuo caro vecchio iphone puoi ripararlo e venderlo a qualche conoscente o su ebay, puoi riciclarlo in famiglia (mamma, papà, fidanzata, fratello, sorella, nonni,ecc...),spesso in cambio di qualcosa, oppure regalarlo a chi ti pare. Oltre a questo, in Italia, si aprirà una nuova frontiera, quelle delle riparazioni (di qualità) low cost, per cui, nevitabilmente molti operatori del settore dovranno adeguarsi (e non parlo solo degli operatori online ma anche di quelli offline) con conseguente abbasso generale dei prezzi. Sai quanto spendono gli italiani  per le riparazioni?  È stato calcolato che nel solo 2014, in Italia, sono stati spesi oltre 140 milioni di euro (in continua crescita), quindi,  prova ad immaginare quanto denaro può rimanere nelle tasche dei consumatori.


Come verrà impiegato questo denaro?

Oltre alla spese richieste  per la realizzazione del sito, acquisto dominio, apertura partita iva, iscrizione camera di commercio, ecc. (€.1000/2000), tutto il resto servirà solo ed esclusivamente all'acquisto di pezzi di ricambio, in questo modo, si possono "spuntare"  prezzi vantaggiosi il che si traduce in un maggiore risparmio per te. 


Benefici e specificheCoupon da €. 10.00
Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.

Coupon da €. 20.00
Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1  pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.

Coupon da €. 30.00


Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1  cover per il tuo smartphone o tablet.

Coupon da €. 50.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover o pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.
+5% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.


Coupon da €. 100.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover + n°1 vetro o pellicola per il tuo smartphone o tablet.
+10% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.



Coupon da €. 200.00

Puoi utilizzarlo quando vuoi senza limite di tempo all'interno del sito per acquistare accessori, ricambi, riparazioni.
Ti verrà recapitato a casa e senza spese n°1 cover + n°1 vetro o pellicola + n°1 power bank da 8000 mAh per non rimanere mai senza batteria.
+15% sconto sui tuoi futuri acquisti o riparazioni.


Le cover e i vetri sono specifici per per i vostri modelli e possono subire variazioni, mentre la batteria portatile in questione, è quella illustrata nelle foto e da sola ha un valore di oltre €. 20.00


Importante: comunicate marca e modello del vostro smartphone o tablet e l'indirizzo di spedizione, se hai acquistato un coupon da €. 200.00 comunica anche il colore del power bank che preferisci: black, gold, silver, pink o blue.
La spedizione sarà effettuata entro 30 giorni succesivi al termine della campagna stessa. Possibilità di cambiare modello se la spedizione non è ancora avvenuta.
Spedizioni internazionali non sono comprese per cui il valore della spedizione (€.20.00) verrà addebitato al coupon che avete deciso di acquistare. In questo modo, non dovrai preoccuparti di nulla, ma devi semplicemente acquistare il coupon, comunicare indirizzo, modello e colore del power bank.


Obbiettivi e Rischi 

L'obbiettivo di questa campagna di crowdfunding è lanciare un sito e-commerce  specializzato nelle riparazioni a basso costo per smartphone e tablet, promuoverlo  con campagne di google adwords e facebook ads, inoltre,  sempre all'interno del portale, sarà possibile acquistare ricambi e accessori. Creare un nuovo negozio online all'interno di ebay. 
Il sito sarà raggiungibile e operativo entro 60 gg.
L'unico rischio se non si raggiunge il goal è che non avendo un budget importante, acquisterò ricambi a prezzi più alti, il che si traduce in un prezzo finale lievemente maggiore. Di qualsiasi buisness si parli, fare un singolo acquisto non è la stessa cosa che acquistare magari 20-30 o 50 articoli. È ovvio che per acquisti multipli il fornitore applica una scontistica diversa, permettendo così di avere il massimo risparmio. 


Conclusione 

Siamo in Italia, la crisi purtroppo  costringe a tutti fare dei sacrifici e risparmiare è diventata per molti l'unica soluzione per andare avanti, io voglio dare il mio contributo, ma senza il tuo, tutti I miei sforzi non serviranno a nulla, e se hai ben capito , non ti costa proprio nulla, il coupon potrai utilizzarlo quando ti pare e piace per acquistare ciò che ti serve, in più riceverai dei fantastici gudget. Se sei arrivato sino qui non posso che ringraziarti per l'interesse mostrato, e nel caso che decidi anche tu di contribuire, ti ringrazierò pubblicamente non appena il sito sarà pronto.

story:
• It is a lamp with simple look and feel.
  • It is a wooden lamp that is made of the most natural materials.
  • It is a convenient lamp that allows you to control it by simply rotating it.
  • It is a charming lamp that can be a flickering candle for romance, a soft and warm light for all kinds of lifestyle, or just bright for your work and study.
  • It is a smart lamp with unique ability to interact with peers within a certain distance.

 

 

 

Backers all around the world

 

 

 

Proudly featured on

 

 

 

Please allow us to introduce:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dominoes is a family of games played with rectangular "domino" tiles. We've all seen those amazing displays of a multitude of dominoes toppling over one by one.

At the beginning of this project, we decided to assign a unique ability to our lamps to make them interact like dominoes. So we defined a feature named "Domi" and finally we made it. That's exactly why the lamp is called DomiLamp.

 

 

With "Domi" enabled, when two or more lamps are within a certain distance(about 13ft/4m), a light change of one lamp could be easily transmitted to others around it. Then, those lamps which received the change would adjust their light color and intensity to match the first lamp's. This effect would then spread from those lamps to outer lamps if existed.

The amazing thing is that "Domi" could work with any number of DomiLamps, without any configurations.

 

Check out the animation showing how "Domi" works:

 

 


 

 

Handheld Design | Take it anywhere

 

Candles | More than flickering. You've known something called "Domi".

 

Light Show | See the chapter "LIGHT COLORS" for details

 

Bottom View | Don't try to remove the rubber pads. There's no screw underneath.

 

Solid Wood Bases | There's no more natural material than wood.

 

 

 

 

The rotary dimmer is a classic design in industry. It provides an excellent user experience. We learned from it and made DomiLamp's shade as a bigger dimmer. When you need to change the light, all you need to do is to rotate. Additionally, we inventively added vibration feedback. Thus you could get a reminder when you reach the maximum level of the light intensity.

 

360 Degree / Bi-directional Rotation w/ Vibration Feedback

 

 

 

 

 

Light Colors

 

Why didn't we provide the full-color support?

As shown above, DomiLamps don't have the full-color support, which is different from other smart lamps in the market. Intellisn insists to give consumers the simplest experience. Think about it, how often will you make the light turn red, green or blue for the room? 90% of our respondents in the design phase said they would never use it at all. So, we did the subtraction.

 

 

Some special algorithms are applied to ensure that every transition between the continuous or discontinuous steps will keep smooth.

 

 

Candle light imitates the real candle fire which is not stable and flickering all the time. This is very suitable for setting up your romantic atmosphere.

 

Cocktail. We borrowed this word from the pub. It is popular because of its unique look by mixing two or more ingredients without breaking the border of each layer. For our Cocktail - 1 light, we mix the orange light and the warm white light. Mysterious and peaceful.

 

Warm light gives you the soft and warm feeling like the sunshine of spring morning. It could be treated as the main color of all your lights. It shall exist all over the house, decorating every room as a real warm place you would love to stay.

 

Being different from Cocktail - 1, Cocktail - 2 replaces the candle orange light with the bright white light. It gives you an intermediate color between the warm and cool white lights. This is for the time when you want a brighter lighting effect but don't want to see a pure white light around.

 

As told in the name, Cool light provides you with a bright and cold feeling. It is suitable for readings and simple lighting. In this mode, the DomiLamp glows like a traditional fluorescent lamp illuminating the place you want to light up.

 

 

There are many integrated high-power LED chips in the market. We could reduce the LED amount to significantly save the cost by using these chips if we only cared about the brightness. But in this case, the light would be very concentrated. When it goes through the lampshade and arrives in our eyes, we would feel it too glaring. So, here comes our solution:

  • Make light glow from more angles with a leading industrial design;
  • Use more LED chips to increase the glowing area for each angle;
  • Add optical diffusing materials during the process of lampshade injection.

 

 

 

It was a big challenge for us to find a solution of heat sinking without taking up too much space. After many attempts, we came out with this innovative design as shown below: an aluminum pillar with integrated heat sink inside. The pillar is made of a complete metallic material to ensure effective thermal conductivity. The heat is then dissipated through the holes drilled on the lampshade cap.
 

Why is heat sinking important for LEDs?

LEDs are also often considered "cool" because they generate light through a mechanism other than thermal excitation of a substance, such as the tungsten filament in an incandescent lamp. Although LED lighting systems do not produce significant amounts of radiated heat, LEDs still generate heat within the junction, which must be dissipated by convection and conduction. Extracting heat from the lamp using heat sinks and by operating LEDs in lower ambient temperatures enables higher light output and longer life of the device.

 

 

 

A lamp in your bedroom

 

A pair of partners for your work

 

A witness of your dating

 

A night lamp for your pets

 

Running on the way

 

Standing in the grass

 

Glowing by the lake

 

Flickering beside the tent

 

No lamp would feel lonely

 

 

 

 

 

 



 

 

 

Wood being engraved

 

Wood after engraving

 

3D Printings

 

 

Main, Power and LED PCBs

 

All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners

 

Intellisn wants to make DomiLamp a symbol of quality. We insist on selecting well-known component suppliers to ensure that the product quality is highly controllable and to reduce the repair rate.

 

 

 

 

 

What if I want a personalized DomiLamp?

We will provide you with options for submitting your customization requirements.

 

You could:

 

 

 

And/Or:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are Intellisn, a group of dreamers creating excellent products for people's daily life. We are a team of engineers but also enthusiastic designers who focus on details with unique understanding of user experience.

 

 

 

We were colleagues at Microsoft and Motorola. We've known each other for over 7 years. With the same dream of SLIGHTLY CHANGING THE WORLD, in 2016, we gathered together and set up Intellisn in Long Grove, a suburb of Chicago in Illinois.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

While we will be contacting our backers via e-mail, social media and Intellisn website are still important places for us to publish project progress, future plans and promotional activities. Follow us to make sure you don't miss out on any valuable information.

 

 

Thank all the early customers who trust us and love DomiLamp.

Thank all the visitors for knowing us from here.

Thanks to our family and friends.

 

We built this page with some icons from Icons8 and pictures from Pixabay. These are really great websites for designers.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

The project was started in early 2017. Over the past 8 months, we've been through a lot of difficulties, including design conflicts, technical issues and the worst shortage of development funds. Fortunately, we solved all those problems and will eventually have our first generation of DomiLamp released this fall.

We are ready to start the mass production later this year. Most of the engineering details are complete except technical optimization for better user experience. We've being ready to encounter any challenges and turn them into solutions & innovation.

Cocktail. We borrowed this word from the pub. It is popular because of its unique look by mixing two or more ingredients without breaking the border of each layer. For our Cocktail - 1 light, we mix the orange light and the warm white light. Mysterious and peaceful.
 

Warm light gives you the soft and warm feeling like the sunshine of spring morning. It could be treated as the main color of all your lights. It shall exist all over the house, decorating every room as a real warm place you would love to stay.
 

Being different from Cocktail - 1, Cocktail - 2 replaces the candle orange light with the bright white light. It gives you an intermediate color between the warm and cool white lights. This is for the time when you want a brighter lighting effect but don't want to see a pure white light around.
 

As told in the name, Cool light provides you with a bright and cold feeling. It is suitable for readings and simple lighting. In this mode, the DomiLamp glows like a traditional fluorescent lamp illuminating the place you want to light up.
 

 
There are many integrated high-power LED chips in the market. We could reduce the LED amount to significantly save the cost by using these chips if we only cared about the brightness. But in this case, the light would be very concentrated. When it goes through the lampshade and arrives in our eyes, we would feel it too glaring. So, here comes our solution:

Make light glow from more angles with a leading industrial design;
Use more LED chips to increase the glowing area for each angle;
Add optical diffusing materials during the process of lampshade injection.

 

 

 
It was a big challenge for us to find a solution of heat sinking without taking up too much space. After many attempts, we came out with this innovative design as shown below: an aluminum pillar with integrated heat sink inside. The pillar is made of a complete metallic material to ensure effective thermal conductivity. The heat is then dissipated through the holes drilled on the lampshade cap. 

Why is heat sinking important for LEDs?
LEDs are also often considered "cool" because they generate light through a mechanism other than thermal excitation of a substance, such as the tungsten filament in an incandescent lamp. Although LED lighting systems do not produce significant amounts of radiated heat, LEDs still generate heat within the junction, which must be dissipated by convection and conduction. Extracting heat from the lamp using heat sinks and by operating LEDs in lower ambient temperatures enables higher light output and longer life of the device.
 
 


 

A lamp in your bedroom
 

A pair of partners for your work
 

A witness of your dating
 

A night lamp for your pets
 

Running on the way
 

Standing in the grass
 

Glowing by the lake
 

Flickering beside the tent
 

No lamp would feel lonely
 
 


 

 

 

 



 
 


 

Wood being engraved
 

Wood after engraving
 

3D Printings
 
 
Main, Power and LED PCBs
 


All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners
 
Intellisn wants to make DomiLamp a symbol of quality. We insist on selecting well-known component suppliers to ensure that the product quality is highly controllable and to reduce the repair rate.
 
 


 

 

 
What if I want a personalized DomiLamp?
We will provide you with options for submitting your customization requirements.
 
You could:
 

 

 
And/Or:
 

 

 
 


 


 


 


 
We are Intellisn, a group of dreamers creating excellent products for people's daily life. We are a team of engineers but also enthusiastic designers who focus on details with unique understanding of user experience.
 

 

 
We were colleagues at Microsoft and Motorola. We've known each other for over 7 years. With the same dream of SLIGHTLY CHANGING THE WORLD, in 2016, we gathered together and set up Intellisn in Long Grove, a suburb of Chicago in Illinois.
 

 

 

 

 

 



 
While we will be contacting our backers via e-mail, social media and Intellisn website are still important places for us to publish project progress, future plans and promotional activities. Follow us to make sure you don't miss out on any valuable information.
 


 
Thank all the early customers who trust us and love DomiLamp.
Thank all the visitors for knowing us from here.
Thanks to our family and friends.
 
We built this page with some icons from Icons8 and pictures from Pixabay. These are really great websites for designers.
 
 
Risks and Challenges
The project was started in early 2017. Over the past 8 months, we've been through a lot of difficulties, including design conflicts, technical issues and the worst shortage of development funds. Fortunately, we solved all those problems and will eventually have our first generation of DomiLamp released this fall.
We are ready to start the mass production later this year. Most of the engineering details are complete except technical optimization for better user experience. We've being ready to encounter any challenges and turn them into solutions & innovation.

story:
Meet Wallace

Installing shelving and storage in your space can be more hassle than it’s worth. SWENYO decided to design a better shelf to fit your lifestyle. Unlike most shelves on the market, Wallace is easy to install, multi-functional, and extremely durable. With functional accessories like clips, cups, chargers and more, Wallace is so much more than a shelf, it's a solution.

Wallace in the Press

Installing Wallace

     
  1. POSITION the aluminum mount on the wall.
    2.  
  2. HAMMER the included nails through the holes at the top of the aluminum mount, starting at the center. Tap either end of mount to level.
    3.  
  3. SLIDE the plywood french cleat over the mount and hook shelves and small accessories into the french cleat’s center slot. That was easy!


Wallace Anywhere


Each kit is designed with a specific room in mind, like charging your phone in your bedroom. However, it’s up to you where Wallace lives as each kit is modular and can easily adapt to different environments.

Available Kits


Development

SWENYO has already begun sourcing and working with manufacturers to find the most durable materials with timely turnarounds. Even during this campaign, we will be working around the clock to double and triple check every component of the system.

SWENYO has been designing and manufacturing home good products for two years and have ample experience in sourcing and manufacturing. We know what it takes to bring a product to the market and we know there will be challenges along the way. With a product this complex, there is always a chance that some components may be slightly altered for improvement. Although we don’t anticipate any setbacks, the production process sometimes throws you curveballs. However, we will keep you updated every step of the way! Our end goal is that you are completely satisfied the day you put Wallace in your home.

Share Wallace with your followers:

Help us by sharing Wallace with your friends! Know someone with a new apartment that Wallace could be perfect for? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top of our campaign or click on of the buttons below. Express Yourshelf.





Our Team

SWENYO is a new online home goods brand and retailer located in sunny Encinitas, CA. Dedicated to inspiring creative living in personal spaces, our small team of 8 has been working towards bringing you premium products that embrace style and function for today's consumer.

We want to give a big thanks to all of our supporters and backers who stand behind good design, quality products, and cool people doing cool things :) Stay tuned for campaign updates with extra tips, design ideas, and our progress!

Lets be friends, follow us!

Facebook / Instagram / Pinterest / Twitter

SWENYO.COM

Wallace Photography by Kim Marcelo @kmarcelo
Video Music Courtesy Creative Commons T-O.  
Video Editing by Jenny Farhat   http://www.jennyfarhat.com/

Thank you so much for checking out our campaign! If you have any questions at all, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at hello@swenyo.com. #expressyourshelf
