story:
Green Power Solutions Inc. includes a Project Manager, Computer Programmer, Lawyer, and Research and Development Engineer.  Also included in the project is an Electronics Engineer who has designed and built previous solar devices.  We are a team-oriented group of specialists working to design and manufacture Green Energy products that reduce the carbon footprint used by current mobile lighting technology. Our products will be solar based, using the energy nature provides for free to the users of our products.

By capturing the Sun’s radiation and harnessing some of its constant and overwhelming energy, we as a society and as individuals benefit to limits placed on us by nature, governments and political control. Our existence depends on our free ability to not only understand, but to utilize and protect this gift of nature.

Green Power Solutions, Inc. (GPS) presents our first mobile and or stationary solution now to be put to use for the Government and public in the most cost effective way. By combining years of knowledge and experience in the field and in collaboration with many engineers in their specific field, we have discovered many potential products that benefit nature and mankind.

One example:  GPS holds proprietary rights to a unique trailer system designed to house multiple batteries and tools. This becomes a starting base from which many other usable “add-on” products requiring electricity can be stacked. Pumping, filtering, drilling and heating of water, as an example. Additionally, for construction, emergency services, security, lighting and power with a solar panel at the top of our unit brings night into day. Solar generation is of no value at night without some form of storage during the day. The feature of this trailer system is the ability to travel on the highway to location, set-up and remove the
wheels, struts and towing apparatus. This makes the unit stationary and
qualifies for any tax advantage or grants offered to only stationary products. As
stationary replacing roof mount, this should pay for itself in a short period
of time.

The future design calls for a plastic vacuum molded trailer body over steel, to be the base unit housing all the latest, most updated batteries, (up to 12)  meeting GPS’s high quality safety specifications.

A second example:  A telescoping light tower (approximately 20 ft. with the ability to hold two 20,000lumen LED lights) designed for the trailer system above. Its versatility can be shown when applied to the back of a pickup in use at accidents, emergencies or other needed uses. This then can be tied to the battery system of the towing vehicle or with a bank of batteries powered by solar. Again, many other portable uses come to mind.

In the near future, we have cost cutting energy saving changes and additions to housing developed over many years by one of our members. Many of these ideas can be expanded toward commercial applications.  They can even generate necessary power up to 40 or 50 years and be locked in to today’s rates, politics aside.  Further engineering with wind and solar in combination is in progress, which will be the subject of future source funding to speed implementation, patenting and licensing.

The moving force for all this pent up energy and knowledge is, of course, money.  We have expended our funds developing the preliminary trial and error portion of these products and are now ready to “put it all together” and ready for market.  Government compatibility, production costs and sales projections are necessary to start a profitable enterprise. We would also like to expand our proprietary solar/wind products manufacturing and sales system within other States, keeping control at a local level and local workforce. This offers a great way of life for jobs for our returning veterans. 

This request for start-up and prototype assistance is to complete final engineering, testing, qualifying for highway use and simplifying design ready for production. Quality and safety of the product is always part of any item we sell and guarantee, as these should last for many years and do the job that they are expected to accomplish.

A best estimate of cost for the first prototype trailer and tower is $115,000. This covers all labor and material stated above, engineering design, proprietary patient filing fees and battery packs. Shop rental and overhead are estimated at (3) months to prove design ready for the next phase of production.

Once the prototype is built, our future plans are to create additional units (customized for our clients as needed) with additional monetary support by contributors. Also with additional monetary backing, we intend to expand our business into solar array fields, water filtration, and algae power generation.

In summary, the answers to how to replace fossil fuels are in sight. We will do our part by introducing new products in the “Green Fields” and build a cleaner environment, a healthier citizenship and a more comfortable, satisfying way of family life.

Whether or not you can assist us with a contribution, please let you friends and family know about our campaign.

story:
Hey! I hope you are doing well ? Please let me start by saying that there is no multi million £ marketing campaign that goes with this.   I wanted to let you know that I am launching this campaign on Indiegogo. The campaign is to start my personal business where I make luxury lamps that will suit anyone's moods. You can alternate the colour and ambience of your home easily with them. Indiegogo and crowd funding are in essence grass roots of financing by nature and I hope you will help support me in launching my first business. You can also contact me personally and we can talk more. I look forward to hearing from you! (skype simon.watson71)

Dear All Readers, Firstly I really appreciate you taking the time to look at this "Indiegogo" request for funding on my idea. I would like to give you a brief outline of how this idea came about and my circumstances so you understand why I need help to get this project off the ground. Firstly like many people in the world I attended secondary school and gained my GCSE's followed by my A'levels where I studied art and design. Sometimes like all people we drift between employment, enjoying life in my formative years and having fun but sometimes life can be a little cruel. Turning back the clock I had a fall in the garden when i was 27 that left me in hospital for many months a result of blood clots and this left me disabled. Going from a lively energetic young man to being disabled gave me time to reflect upon many things in life and look at what I did know. Not one to feel aggrieved by my circumstances I tried my best to live life with a new direction, as we know it is very difficult for a disabled person to gain employment so I reverted back to my days studying when an idea stuck in My mind. Whilst watching the sunset filter into my small apartment, i thought about the beauty of the sun sending shades of light cascading around my room and then is when my idea was born. If we could replicate the sun in a small form table lamp this would bring the same calming,soothing sensation it brought to myself in my world of disability. So I studied designs and came up with my adjustable shade table lamp. To get this started I obviously , Having very little funds drew what portion I could and contacted a local company who fabricated a sample for me at a cost of £1760, The effects were perfect to that sun cascading that I envisaged. So I went about Patent pending and trying to spread the word on my idea through my website that is now Google ranked No 1 for "stylish lamps" globally. This idea then became a dream, Could I through my education change my circumstance, who could I meet who will believe in me enough to get this product into manufacture and bring the same warmth to adults and childrens rooms alike, Around the world. Obviously having huge amounts of time on my hands I looked at networking, who I could meet and although i have no idea of the magnitude of a worldwide industry I believe someone somewhere will benefit always by having the same serenity i felt when exploring this idea. Once my website was  finished I continued with ideas and now I am at a stage where I want to be able to manufacture this item and see others benefit from the same serenity felt by myself. To start a production and make this item an affordable product to grace every ones homes first a manufacturer must create a BOM (bill of materials) and tooling. The tooling portion is very expensive and why I am seeking through this site to gain funds from wonderful people around the world who I do not wish to feel sorry for me but sympathy and maybe empathy in some respect  towards my situation. Your donation may mean that I can not only fullfill my dream to bring the same relaxing calmness to others through LIGHT but also that I can continue to develop items and change my own circumstances.

The tooling is the major portion of cost and with the networking I have undertaken I have now dialogue with some very clever business people who have understood my situation and are willing to aid in manufacture. Once I reach the magical figure it will be sent for immediate tooling and I can then take a moment to relax and try to gain greater inspiration from the sun filtering into my room. Once the initial idea is tooled then I can start to discuss with the people I have met to add new portions such as more LED versions. I hope we can get this off the ground and others can feel the same relaxing sensation the sun brings to my world. Thanks Simon.

  • I have a selection of perks for you all ranging from sincere thank you all the way through to varying amounts of lamps

  • The impact that your contributions will make quite frankly will be the difference between failure or success. In my past employments i have been the one who provided the service and here i am asking for you all to PLEASE SHOW YOUR GENEROSITY in donating to my campaign

I attended Denstone College where i took seven G.C.S.E's and an A'level in art and design. It was from my designing interest that i brought this idea to fruition.

Although my employment back ground does not really contribute to the concept of this table lamp i guess you could assume from it that i work best when left to my own devices. Before this i was a test driver for J.C.B and the bar manager for a popular hotel. Both requiring long hours and a word which has proven to be key in my adult life. Preparation.

This leads me perfectly into the next point, about my lamp. I had to do a lot of preparation in initializing my grand plan. I first had the patents to contend with which took a lot of time and effort and then there was the dreaded sourcing of the manufacturer. After several expensive and very poor quality samples i finally settled upon a great company who have agreed to make it and even sell some for me themselves, for a commission of course.

I just feel that this lamp will benefit all of its users as you can simply and effectively angle the light to wherever it is wished and there is the added feature of the colour changing aspect by adding or removing the transparent coloured slides that slip easily down grooves on each side of each "side". So if you choose to you can mix and match the colours.

The lamp is also LED so it wont't need to be upgraded any time soon which has to be a positive as the normal (cfl) bulbs as you are probably

aware are being phased out.

Your assistance will be of paramount importance as i have done everything i can. I have now hit the proverbial brick wall and can do no more until i pay for manufacture.

Please, if for whatever reason you just cant contribute, even after reading this then could you please share instead as the more people who see my campaign the greater my chances of success

Please donate to my campaign.

It would be so amazing of you all and would be greatly appreciated

story:
Eatense is the world’s first customizable plate. You can create your own plate with the smartphone app. Equipped with digital display, it allows you to personalize your plate with tons of unique designs and photos. We want to replace various plates with one plate. Make your own plate!

 

Customization

Eatense can be customized. It allows you to create your own plate with various of designs. You don’t need to prepare dishes for foods. One dish is enough, eatense.

Eatense App

With the eatense app, you can change the plate design instantly. The app is available for download on both Android and Apple smartphone devices.

Water-Resistant

All of eatense’s features come sealed within a waterproof body. It can be washed like other dishes.

Wireless-Charging

It’s easy to charge. Just place it on the wireless charging pad.

New Experience

With eatense, you can plate food like a chef. Plating food that looks delicious and tastes even better!

 

You can change your plate design from the eatense app. You'll find the various design inside the app, which is available for iOS and Android devices. You can download videos and images from your smartphone app to eatense using Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Set the mood with the perfect plate to suit the occasion.

Restaurants

Eatense can display texts or food information on the screen. For instance, you can show your guests what the foods are and where they are from.  It enhances your guests’ dining experience. 

Family / Friends

Surprise your guests with a custom message during their meals and make special occasions even more memorable.  You can leave a message on the screen  such as "Happy Birthday," "Happy Mother's Day," and "I love you."

Food flavors

It enhances food flavors by creating a dining atmosphere that delights your appetites.  Everyone knows that looks as good as it tastes. An attractive plate makes for a tastier dinner. Thoughtful presentation leads to a more enjoyable meal. So, should we learn to make similar efforts at home? No, you don't need to. Just change your plate's design with different meals what you eat today. Enjoy it. 

 

EATENSE is not just made of ABS plastic material. The material of EATENSE is the same as regular plates. We’ve gone through many trials and errors in order to use the same material that normal plate uses. We overcome the problem! You can feel it the same as other plates.

 

Features of EATENSE’ s material

 

  • The surface is strong and stain-free.
  • It has excellent thermal insulation due to low thermal conductivity.
  • It is not easily discolored, and the coated surface is clean
  • It is not deformed because it is a thermosetting product.
  • It’s easy to clean and store.
  • It’s solid and light to use.

 

The material of EATENSE is harmless to the human body under normal use environment. For example, if you think about baby silicone bottle, you will understand it. This safe material is also used for waterproofing. We plan to receive a safety certification before shipping EATENSE.

 

EATENSE has a Patented Feature found on no other plates.

(PCT/KR2018/016128, # 10-1927494).  

 

Dining Plates have been on the market for thousands of years, however, the plates have not changed ever since. There are many new designs of plates, but there are no technical elements. We started with the idea that Why plates can’t change. Plates meet technology. Eatense has developed the most customizable dining plate.

 

 

Risk & Challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a completely new concept to life. This is our first Indiegogo, but we are not novices at product launches. We have been designing and manufacturing innovative products for 2 years.

We know that the most important part of our process is the commitment we made to you and to deliver eatense to you on time! We are confident in our supply chain management and production capability. However, if there are any uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages, we are confident that our team has planned meticulously to preclude these issues or problems.

We are excited to bring eatense to life!

story:
Short Summary

 *Please check gallery for better pictures and more information!

Here it is boys! Finally a high end kit. Need a summer amp that isn't a heater? Been looking for something a little more efficient than class A, but not snoozing you like some class D?

I knew the amp was wonderful with things you can't get at it's price, that I've heard, anywhere... Then I spent almost the last year testing and developing a full born kit. The only expense spared is the lack of Teflon input capacitors! Honestly, I simply decided to go with the best sounding parts within reason. I've done a lot of listening with different input caps, many different variations on the Kmultiplier, and gone through multiple transformers.

What We Need & What You Get

Here it is, I need to sell 44 kits to break even to order the parts for 100 kits.. Without achieving that goal I simply can't offer kits at a reasonable price (I can't get a big enough discount on buying parts for 10 kits)

  • Each kit costs $200 Shipped Priority USPS, so only donate in multiples of $200 for how many kits you want! (Contact me if you're not in the USA, I can adjust for shipping)
  • I'm suppose to tell you about the perks... How about an R&D'd kit! It's Not your average willy-nilly mess of ground problem ridden DIY board.
  • The DIY7297 board and Antipole PSU come with every part you need. But you also get a transformer that has been selected for it's quality in multiple areas such as regulation, RF, and ease of use (Hammond 185 series). These parts are very nice. And luckily there's not too many so the cost doesn't become such a burden to afford the good stuff!
  • I do recommend 91db efficient or better speakers for the best performance, but at 87db it's quite enjoyable
  • *Information will be included on how to raise the operating voltage but it'll be done at the expensive of not knowing how long the chip will last. *Resistors for this not included.



  • Some Details on Parts:
    The amplifier features Panasonic SEPF 330uf 25v OSCON power capacitors (12x), Rifa (now Kemet) PHE450 input capacitors (selected over many others including Orange Drops and Wima), and a special Kmultiplier that provides voltage regulation with a TL431 and two transistors; including a heatsink for the power transistor that can be mounted vertical/horizontal.

    The PSU features Coilcrafts combination Common Mode & Differential choke filter that combined with EPCOS's naked MKT Silver capacitors greatly increase the filtration of RF on low inductance copper pour planes right at the rectifiers (MSR860). The large capacitors are the CK version of the Nichicon KG series, the best they make, and chosen for their transparent lack of sound that capacitors such as Panasonic FC/FM simply cannot touch in any configuration. This in combination with the benefits of a dual bobbin transformer (Hammond 185) makes for a low noise, very nice power supply.

    The PCB boards are also quite nice, each one featuring orientation for the capacitors to have canceling fields, free of ground problems (star ground for for amp board connections, then to a copper pour), and very low inductance because of the copper pours. *Copper pours simply means that instead of a trace that's the size of a wire running, it's a plane of copper that extends as far as possible under and around all the vias (holes) that it can. It greatly reduces inductance created in tracings so that every piece that acts as a filter or path for noise will perform better, giving you much more pleasant music.

What if it doesn't reach the goal?

  • I'm not taking any funds if I don't reach my goal! At that time I'll consider a simple Campaign for just the PCB's being printed. But I'm hoping at least 100 kits sell! I'd love to re-launch this several times because if I can make anything on it it then I'll get to develop more new kits/PCB's!

Other Ways You Can Help

The tour, I'd like to build a list of people whom can have a decent turn around time, and feature some comparable equipment. By that I definitely mean it's fantastic on things like Piega's Premium speakers. *Regulars on forums whom are known, are preferred for safety and publicity.

*Anyone is welcome to contribute, but I don't have T-shirts or anything like that for lower price points

story:
What kind of mugs do you use to drink water and coffee?

○ Paper cups: The paper cup has a layer of plastic, which contains plasticizer.

○Metal mugs: Metallic elements will be released from metal mugs when you drink acidic beverages.

○Plastic mugs: Plastic mugs easily deform when filled with hot beverages, and toxic chemicals will be released from them. They are easy to get dirty because of the internal microstructure of plastic.

○Glasses: Glasses can’t withstand high temperature, and they have very poor heat preservation effect. Many glasses contain heavy metals.

For your health, it is important to choose right mugs. Mugs are the origins of many diseases and harms. According to medical experts, on the basis of health science, china mugs are healthier than other mugs.

However, do you know how many germs are there on ordinary china mugs?You might never imagine! Ordinary china mugs include ceramic mugs and bone china mugs. Both of them are easy to get dirty, and germs easily grow on them because of water absorption and rough surface.

These health risks make us come up with an idea of producing healthier china mugs. We have been looking for healthier materials and exploring innovative methods to make better china for several years. 

The abundant seashell resources on the beach attracted the attention of the Duca Team and inspired our creation. Then, we came up with a daring idea. We try to use seashells to make china. After years of research and numerous experiments, we combined modern firing technology with traditional craft to create a new china made of seashell. We call it ‘seashell china’.

Duca fine seashell china mug is the world’s healthiest mug. It overcomes all the defects of ordinary china mugs. Duca is natural, antimicrobial, healthy, hygienic and eco-friendly. It can improve the water quality effectively, and it is totally lead-free and cadmium-free. Duca is lighter than an ordinary china mug. Our product is easy to clean, and no detergent is needed.

Why Duca fine seashell china mug is the world’s healthiest mug? Five characteristics protect your health:

○Natural and eco-friendly materials: Duca is made of natural seashells and contains pearls. Both the materials and the product are healthy and eco-friendly.

○Rich calcium: The major ingredients of seashells are CaCO3. Seashell china contains more than 60% of calcium, which doubles the bone china. Calcium and pearls can improve the water quality.

○Nano-antibacterial enamel: The enamel of Duca is nano-antibacterial. Scientific tests show that its antimicrobial rate is 99%. In comparison, ordinary china mugs use ordinary enamel with porous structure. Therefore, dirt and germs easily stick to the surface.

○Lead-free and cadmium-free: Duca is free from heavy metals. Authority test shows that it is safe without lead and cadmium, while ordinary china mugs may contain lead and cadmium.

○Lowest water absorption rate: Duca doesn’t absorb any water. It avoids dirt and overcomes the defect of ordinary china mugs. The ordinary ones have rough surfaces because of its materials and low firing temperature. Their water absorption rate is from 0.3% to 0.5%. Water absorption results in dirt and germs. 

 

Duca fine seashell china mug has another five advantages over ordinary china mugs:

○Easy to clean: Just use water to clean it without any detergent. In comparison with ordinary china mugs, Duca is more exquisite and smoother, so it is easier to clean.

○Light weight: Duca is 40% lighter than an ordinary one.

○Exquisite: Seashell china contains pearls and has no impurity, so our product is exquisite. On the contrary, ordinary one has much impurity, which results in its roughness.

○Wear-resistant and durable: Our product is wear-resistant and durable. Rich CaCO3 makes it harder than ordinary ones.

○Fadeless: Duca is fadeless. Different from ordinary ones, it has soft whiteness and extraordinary brightness. This is because it has been fired at 1350℃.

 

The scientific design philosophy

○All-natural from the sea: ‘All-natural from the sea’ is our design principle. Duca has two sea elements, which are ‘seashell’ and ‘jellyfish’.

○Drawing on the product: The sea and the swimming jellyfishes bring us visual enjoyment. Science shows that watching jellyfishes can help calm our brains. When you use the mug and watch the jellyfishes, you will forget your tiredness and feel relaxed.

○Practicability: The shape design of the product is based on ergonomics. The scientific design of the shape, size and handle will make you feel comfortable.

 

Production

○Natural material and scientific formula: We choose high-quality washed seashells to make seashell powders, which then scientifically mix with a bit of feldspar, quartz and Kaolin.

○Extremely high firing temperature: Compared with ordinary ones’ 1000-1200℃ firing temperature, our product needs 1350℃ firing temperature. In the process of firing, the change of the temperature is limited to 5℃. Higher temperature can’t shape it and lower temperature will damage its fineness.

 

How to get Duca

Become a backer of this campaign. To do that, click on the perk you want and enter your payment info. We will start to ship orders on September 1st of this year. We expect all Indiegogo orders to be shipped by 30 October 2017. 

 

Timeline

 

Thank you for your support

Dear friends, we worked incredibly hard to bring Duca to life, but now we need your help to take the final step and get this fantastic new product into your hands. Please back this campaign, be involved in this innovation and promote healthy living today. Thank you.

 

F A Q

Where do you ship your product?

USA, UK, Japan, Australia, Germany, Canada, France, Italy, Austria, Belgium, Hungary, Denmark, Finland, Norway, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Poland, Russia, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Ireland, Saudi Arabia, Hong Kong, New Zealand, Malaysia, Ukraine, Brazil, Israel, South Korea, Mexico, Singapore, Turkey.

I’m having trouble contributing. What should I do?

Indiegogo accepts most cards with a Visa, Mastercard, Discover or American Express logo. If you have trouble contributing, please contact Indiegogo.

I have a different question.

Please email us at: ducateam@126.com

story:
I come from Slovenia, a very hospitable country. When a person comes into our house it is a costum to take off shoes and then you are given little slippers so you can feel at home.
But ever since I was a little girl I could see the hurt in my stepfather's eyes when we went for a visit. He is in a wheelchair and he cannot take off his tires. People in wheelchairs not only face this barrier at home, but their reality can prevent them from engaging in various social settings. 


Imagine how bad you would feel if you go on a visit on a rainy day and you cannot take your shoes off when you enter the hosts' house; you leave dirt marks which leaves a mess in the whole house. Now think about disabled people, do you think anyone of them would go to visit somebody when is raining outside?
This is a sad reality of how the world gets just a little bit smaller when you have a disability. Zoks wanted to change that. 
That is why I and my mom created tire covers for my stepdad. It was a significant gift for him because it has opened up a way for him to socialize.
One morning, not long after that, in a school parking lot I met Dennis, a diabled man. After the discussion about Zoks, he saw a real solution and immediately ordered a pair. A few days later, it was an unforgettable experience when I saw the happiness in Dennis' eyes after placing the Zoks in his hands.  

That was the moment I knew I wanted to continue producing Zoks, to bring joy into the lives of disabled people and provide them with equal opportunities.

story:
Prototype Functionality: so far we have a fully functioning prototype as shown below.  It has not been designed into the final form factor shown in the video which serves to demonstrate the look and feel of the end product.  To do this we need custom-made components such as the heating element and reservoir which requires minimum order quantities.  That's why we're here.

To view a time-lapsed video showing how our prototype can brew a cup of coffee using only battery power, watch the below GIFs or the full YouTube video here: http://bit.ly/2cPnbft

1) Load the Jolt with any temperature water, hot or cold:

2) Once the Jolt reaches the perfect brewing temperature and the light turns green, insert the coffee packet (not shown in this earlier prototype is the reusable stainless steel coffee pod which can house your own coffee grounds or our eco-friendly packets): 

3) After the brewing timer ends and the light turns blue after approximately 4 minutes of brew time, remove the coffee pod, toss out the coffee grounds or packet and enjoy your coffee or tea!

 





Jolt Indiegogo Technical FAQ

1. What is the brewing method and how does it work?

Our current functional prototype uses an expanding packet of fresh coffee that fills a stainless steel reservoir while brewing.  This allows the coffee to float freely in the water, similar to a French Press except without the press. Instead of pressing the grounds to the bottom like a French Press, the grounds are pulled and extracted from the coffee via removing the reusable coffee pod. This in combination with a gentle swirling motion produces a robust, smooth cup of coffee.  Friends, family and baristas are loving it!  And in addition to coffee you can make tea, hot chocolate, soup, oatmeal, and more!

2. How does the packet work?

The packet is constructed from a porous material that allows water to flow through while the coffee grounds remain inside; this makes cleanup a breeze!  This biodegradable material’s basic component is plant starch and will not alter the drink’s flavor in any way.  

The packets will be available pre-filled with many types of coffee, or empty to be filled by you with your own coffee.  Note: The final packet size is still being adjusted in order to optimize the brewing method.

3. How do I charge the battery?

A battery charger is included in all Jolt bundles; we estimate it will take between 2-3 hours to charge.  The battery is removable from the device and is not required in order to enjoy your finished beverage.  You can charge one battery separately while using a second.  

Unfortunately, there is currently no way to charge the Jolt via USB or a car power socket due to the relatively low power available through these jacks.

We are thinking about a faster charger / docking station design that we've been able to get working in the lab.  This would charge the battery in 30 minutes and it would also allow you to “brew & charge” at the same time!  If there is significant interest in this feature we may choose to add a fast charging station as a future additional priced upgrade.

4. How and when do I add milk and sugar?

Milk and sugar can be poured directly into the inner reservoir after the steeping stage is complete. 

We are also considering incorporating compartments directly into the device to house and administer these items. While this isn’t guaranteed, if time and cost allow, it may be added to the final design.

5. What temperature does the water reach?

Unlike other portable brewers the Jolt is capable of reaching the true industry-accepted brewing temperature of 203°F (95°C).  This value will be configurable, allowing you to select the desired set point using the device’s physical button(s).  We will define these values within the device’s software as we hear feedback from our backers on desired temperature ranges.  Fun fact: during testing we confirmed our device is even capable of boiling water, which is in fact not the same temperature for brewing coffee!

6. How long will my drink stay warm? Is there a warming function?

The Jolt is insulated using a double-walled design that should keep your drink warm for hours. We have tested it and found the Jolt only dropped 10 degrees Fahrenheit multiple hours after brewing. Because of these great results, we decided to not include a warming function in order to keep the battery as light and low cost as possible.

7. How heavy is the Jolt?

With a battery and full reservoir we expect the Jolt to weigh less than 2 lbs.

8. Can I make tea?

Absolutely!  Jolt's single-reservoir design is especially suited to making tea.  We have added the ability for you to adjust and optimize the steeping temperature for perfectly brewing different varieties of tea.

9. How much liquid can it hold?

The Jolt is targeted to produce 8-10 oz of coffee or tea. The size of the reservoir and the resulting volume of water to be heated directly affects the required battery size and how long it takes to heat the water.  We’ve experimented with reservoirs as large as 20 oz but opted to focus on a smaller form factor as shown in our video.

10. Am I supposed to drink directly out of the lid like a travel mug or should I be pouring the beverage into a cup?

The opening at the lid was designed to do both but we expect most people to drink directly out of the Jolt.

11. How many times can I brew on a single charge?

Right now we are targeting a single brew per charge to keep battery manufacturing costs as low as possible.  If there is significant interest, we may explore designing a larger capacity battery pack as an additionally priced upgrade which would be capable of brewing two cups off of a single charge.

12. Can I bring it on a plane?

The largest battery we’ve built so far currently resides in our functional prototype and has a capacity of 90 watt-hours, but the final version of this product will have a smaller battery.  The FAA limit is 100 watt-hours, so you should have no problem bringing any version of this product on a plane.

13. Can the Jolt operate or charge off a 12 Vdc automobile power socket?

Our heating design currently requires voltage-matched heating coils; this allows our device to come up to temperature faster than a Keurig!  An automobile socket is typically not capable of providing the current necessary to do this so we've opted to leave out a 12 Vdc coil.  For this reason the Jolt cannot be operated directly from a 12 Vdc source.  However, we may explore the possibility of a 12 Vdc charger for the battery depending on level of interest.

14. Can I use other pre-made coffee pods such as K-cups or Nespresso Pods?

Although we considered accommodating existing pod designs, we wanted to unchain the Jolt from the single, proprietary packet paradigm.  Thus we are giving you the ability to purchase our eco-friendly pre-filled packets for on-the-go convenience or use your own coffee.  Choice is yours.

15. Can I brew without the battery?

Possibly.  We have a patent-pending dual-coil heating element design that contains one coil for use with a battery and a second for use with a wall outlet.  This style of heating element takes up additional space inside the device and may cause the outer diameter of the cup to increase, however this would allow you to plug the device directly into a wall outlet and brew without the use of a battery. Our original prototypes did have this functionality but in order to keep the price of the device low, we chose to pursue a battery-only final design. If there is significant interest, we may include this as a new product model with a slightly higher price.

16. Can the Jolt charge my phone?

Potentially.  This would require adding a USB port to the side of the Jolt and is a feature we have built and tested in the lab. If there is significant interest, this may be included as a feature on a new product model with a slightly higher price.

17. Once brewing is complete can I detach the battery?

Yes!  Once brewing is complete the battery is no longer needed and can be detached from the cup.  This makes the Jolt no larger than a typical travel mug!

18. What do I do with the used coffee packet?

To ensure a perfect brew most people will prefer to remove the packet from the reservoir after the steeping stage.  It can then be disposed of in a trash can and due to the biodegradable material is completely broken down by microorganisms.

19. Can the Jolt be used to heat up other foods?

The Jolt contains a stainless steel reservoir that is capable of heating other items such as soup, oatmeal or hot chocolate!

20. You mentioned the word software, can I adjust settings and create my own brewing profiles?

We’re exploring adding Bluetooth so the device can be paired to a phone or tablet, however iOS and Android app creation is not currently planned.  If there is significant interest, this may be included in a new product model with a higher price.

21. You have mentioned a lot of new features in these FAQs and in the Community Design Team section, will these be included with the current model I purchase with the existing perks? Can I upgrade to these new features with the pledge I give today?

The current model included in the perks is what we envision to be the widest reaching set of features needed by the most amount of people. So the current perks do not account for any of these additionally mentioned features. However, if we receive significant feedback asking for these features, we may introduce a new model that you can upgrade your existing pledge to. Because our existing model is our simplest, lowest cost design, a new model would likely be a higher priced model. Therefore, you would be able to upgrade your pledge by paying the additional amount needed.


Jolt Community Design Team

We have way too many ideas and simply not enough time to incorporate them all. That’s where you come in. We want to know what features YOU think are important. The existing campaign price of $85 does not include any of these additional features. However, these are all features we have considered and some we have even tested and proven in the lab. If there is significant interest and feedback from the community, we may integrate these into a new, higher-priced model which you may upgrade your pledge to. Read on to discover all the brainstorming we’ve done throughout the last few years and why we pursued some ideas and not others.  We’re hoping this will spark your imagination and we look forward to hearing your suggestions. Welcome to the Jolt Community Design Team!

  1. Brewing Mechanism - Over the last 3 years we’ve considered many coffee brewing methods such as drip, vacuum, pour-over, and more.  We knew that controlling size and simplicity would be the best way to achieve the lowest cost and fastest time-to-market.  Ultimately we decided that a single reservoir was an important early design decision to keep the size as small as possible and that led us to focus on steeping methods for brewing coffee such as French Press.  However, we also considered using the drip method by incorporating a small pump that would pull water from the bottom of the reservoir and disburse it over a coffee-filled conical filter at the top.  We chose not to pursue this because the pump could re-circulate coffee through the grounds a second time and because of the design complexity of this type of system.  We’d love to hear feedback from the community on this and any other brewing methods you think might work in our design!

  2. Battery - our battery design uses 10 lithium-ion cells to provide 37 Vdc.  Depending on the size and capacity of each individual cell, the battery can be capable of one or two brews on a full charge.  Battery capacity is synonymous with physical size, so a battery capable of 2 brews will roughly be 1.5x to 2.0x the size.  For those who envision needing a second brew via battery, we’d love to hear your feedback and preference here.  Would you rather have a larger battery pack or just carry two smaller batteries?

  3. Brew & Charge - are you interested in a docking station that allows you to both brew coffee or tea AND charge the battery at the same time?  If so, how many of these stations would you need and use?

  4. Milk & Sugar - how useful would you find dedicated compartments for milk and sugar packets?  Do you mind carrying these items separate from the Jolt and pouring them in yourself?

  5. Warming Function - how important is this function to you?  How long do you plan on leaving your beverage in the Jolt before finishing it?

  6. Other beverages - what else can you envision making in the Jolt?

  7. Existing Coffee Pods - would you prefer to use existing coffee pods with the Jolt ?  How important is this to you?

  8. Packet Disposal - some of our early concepts included a tray that allowed you to put the packet inside the reservoir but kept it out of the water.  A mechanism, either a knob or slide, would have to be operated in order to drop the packet into the water.  This same mechanism could then be used to lift the packet out of the water, effectively stopping the brewing process.  It could be left inside the reservoir indefinitely since the coffee would be designed to bypass it while pouring or drinking.  Does this interest you?  Would you mind if the device grew in size to accommodate this feature?

  9. Software - if made available would you adjust brewing settings and create your own profiles?  Or are you okay with using preset profiles?

  10. USB - some of our prototypes have an external USB port for charging mobile devices.  This is a natural addition to any device with a sizable battery, but we wonder how many people would actually use it.  Can you envision yourself in a scenario where your only option would be to charge your phone from the Jolt?

story:
Sorry, I missed the goal!

And it is all my responsibility. I did not put enough efforts in promoting the campaign.

A heartfelt thank you to all of you who advised me and to the 2 generous contributors.

Of course the kakehashi project continues with direct contacts with the designers and concept developers interested in this beautiful inside and outside, traditional and contemporary ofuro.

Please contact me by email/facebook/phone etc.

All the Best//

iacopo - sep/25/2017.

 

Who

Hi, my name is iacopo torrini and i am an Italian architect living and working in Japan for the past 20 years.
Some of you know me also as the founder, manager and designer of bartok design japan, a company specialized in the design and production of traditional Japanese bathtubs made with hinoki wood and other Japanese conifers (asnaro, sawara, koyamaki).

I love Japanese hot springs and the feeling of peace and fullness while relaxing in the hot and aromatic water.
I feel I have a mission as a "bridge"  to connect the master Japanese craftsmen with the expats and Japan-lovers worldwide who are able to appreciate these artifacts.

Experience

For this reason I have been producing and exporting over 300 bathtubs in the past 14 years.
As a designer I like to apply the Japanese proverb which states that it is not by chance that men have one mouth and two ears. I like to listen to the requests of my clients and customize, adapt the shapes and details of my Ofuros to match the space and the functionality that is needed, case by case.

Thanks to your inquiries I have been developing new details such as top rim overflow cuts, removable seats, reversible covers, slanted walls, sloped bottom plank and more.
These new details have been implemented within the traditional techniques to prove that we are not ready yet for the reliquary of a museum: the handmade wooden tubs are a live product in harmonic evolution from its beautiful history.

New Technology

I am now ready to write a new chapter of this evolution and it has been a few years now that I am caressing this new project. What strikes about Japanese bathtubs is their minimalist design. They are very modern while being traditional.
For those who are attracted by the naturalism and the historical heritage behind the Ofuro, than our present custom order bathtubs produced by bartok design are perfect for you.

But if you are looking for even more sleek and revolutionary shapes you are ready for this new product.
I will call it "KAKEHASHI" which means "bridge",  because this idea connects and conjugates the tradition with the innovation, natural materials with cutting edge technology, and the Japanese sensibility with a world of sensuous curved shapes.

With the traditional techniques it is possible to create circular, oval shapes or round cornered rectangles with the limitation of having to cope with the metal bands which are needed to keep together the barrel type construction.
 
With the new "KAKEHASHI" technique I am presenting here, I will be able to make any convex curve and even concave shapes! The curved walls can be straight or even slanted in and out, free as a freehand sketch.
The "KAKEHASHI" technique does not have exposed metal parts and the look is very organic and natural.
Eventually I am planning to create triangular tubs, flower shaped, fan shaped, eggplant shaped tubs. Anyway the first one, the protagonist of this very crowdfunding campaign will have the shape of a crescent. Perfect for 2 people, the moon shaped ofuro is a tribute to the lunar side of the japanese aesthetics and is suitable for a flexible layout as you can encroach it with a plant, a table or whetever you want to keep by your side while you are enjoying your bath.
The "KAKEHASHI" tubs will have a pneumatic controlled popup drain and overflow system concealed inside the walls.

The technological breakthrough of the KAKEHASHI Ofuro is its laminated structure.
The walls are made by a fiberglass mold coated inside and outside with a 7-15mm layer of real solid quarter-sawn Japanese lumber.
I will make tubs with premium hinoki from the Kiso Valley or asnaro wood from aomori prefecture.
The fiberglass core will assure stability and partially compensate for the dilatation and contraction of the wood fibers while the wood finishing layer will provide the same pure aroma and soft touch of a wooden ofuro build with the traditional technique.

As you can see from the picture above the KAKEHASHI Ofuro is completely handmade and hand finished so there is actually less use of powertools compared to the making of a traditional Ofuro.

What you get

There is a lot of work involved in creating these ofuros and the price of the "KAKEHASHI" tubs will be more expensive compared with traditional tubs.
As I am launching the new product and are eager to create a range of different shapes and a series of examples of actual installations, I decided to use a crowdfunding campaign to promote the launch.


If you like the idea, it is a unique opportunity for you as well. You will be able to own a kakehashi bathtub for about half of the price. The "tsuki-buro" (moon-shaped-bathtub) with ext. sizes of 1950x1000x700mm and int. sizes of 1800x900x600mm will sell for 4,400,000 JPY plus shipping costs.

During the campaign it can be yours for 25,000 USD (about 2,640,000 JPY) plus shipping costs! That is about 40% off.

Of course, since it is a large amount of money anyway, you are welcome to contact me for any question before hitting the "BACK IT" button. You can contact me by email (japan<at>bartokdesign.com), or even better by posting a comment on the indiegogo campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like the idea but do not have space for a 2x1 meter bathtub in your studio apartment, do not forget to share the campaign on your social media!

Let me share a phrase that always inspire my work from A to Z:  "Tradition is the tending of the fire, not the worship of the ashes" (Thomas More).

I like to think of tradition as an large old tree: its deep roots are absorbing the wisdom of the past but its branches are blooming fresh flowers every springtime because ... life is about the enthusiasm in always looking ahead.

By helping us making this project take off, you are also helping preserving the Japanese traditional crafts to be transmitted to the next generation.

Traditional crafts are in a difficult conjuncture and if we do not find alternative markets and products suitable for the contemporary demand the handcrafts will be abandoned.

The KAKEHASHI project is also meant to bridge the knowledge of the traditional carpenters towards a stable and bright future.

Enjoy the hot water and sayonara!

iacopo torrini//

I am now ready to write a new chapter of this evolution and it has been a few years now that I am caressing this new project. What strikes about Japanese bathtubs is their minimalist design. They are very modern while being traditional.For those who are attracted by the naturalism and the historical heritage behind the Ofuro, than our present custom order bathtubs produced by bartok design are perfect for you.
But if you are looking for even more sleek and revolutionary shapes you are ready for this new product.I will call it "KAKEHASHI" which means "bridge",  because this idea connects and conjugates the tradition with the innovation, natural materials with cutting edge technology, and the Japanese sensibility with a world of sensuous curved shapes.

With the traditional techniques it is possible to create circular, oval shapes or round cornered rectangles with the limitation of having to cope with the metal bands which are needed to keep together the barrel type construction. With the new "KAKEHASHI" technique I am presenting here, I will be able to make any convex curve and even concave shapes! The curved walls can be straight or even slanted in and out, free as a freehand sketch.The "KAKEHASHI" technique does not have exposed metal parts and the look is very organic and natural.Eventually I am planning to create triangular tubs, flower shaped, fan shaped, eggplant shaped tubs. Anyway the first one, the protagonist of this very crowdfunding campaign will have the shape of a crescent. Perfect for 2 people, the moon shaped ofuro is a tribute to the lunar side of the japanese aesthetics and is suitable for a flexible layout as you can encroach it with a plant, a table or whetever you want to keep by your side while you are enjoying your bath.The "KAKEHASHI" tubs will have a pneumatic controlled popup drain and overflow system concealed inside the walls.

The technological breakthrough of the KAKEHASHI Ofuro is its laminated structure.The walls are made by a fiberglass mold coated inside and outside with a 7-15mm layer of real solid quarter-sawn Japanese lumber.I will make tubs with premium hinoki from the Kiso Valley or asnaro wood from aomori prefecture.The fiberglass core will assure stability and partially compensate for the dilatation and contraction of the wood fibers while the wood finishing layer will provide the same pure aroma and soft touch of a wooden ofuro build with the traditional technique.

As you can see from the picture above the KAKEHASHI Ofuro is completely handmade and hand finished so there is actually less use of powertools compared to the making of a traditional Ofuro.
What you get
There is a lot of work involved in creating these ofuros and the price of the "KAKEHASHI" tubs will be more expensive compared with traditional tubs.As I am launching the new product and are eager to create a range of different shapes and a series of examples of actual installations, I decided to use a crowdfunding campaign to promote the launch.
If you like the idea, it is a unique opportunity for you as well. You will be able to own a kakehashi bathtub for about half of the price. The "tsuki-buro" (moon-shaped-bathtub) with ext. sizes of 1950x1000x700mm and int. sizes of 1800x900x600mm will sell for 4,400,000 JPY plus shipping costs.
During the campaign it can be yours for 25,000 USD (about 2,640,000 JPY) plus shipping costs! That is about 40% off.
Of course, since it is a large amount of money anyway, you are welcome to contact me for any question before hitting the "BACK IT" button. You can contact me by email (japan<at>bartokdesign.com), or even better by posting a comment on the indiegogo campaign.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you like the idea but do not have space for a 2x1 meter bathtub in your studio apartment, do not forget to share the campaign on your social media!
Let me share a phrase that always inspire my work from A to Z:  "Tradition is the tending of the fire, not the worship of the ashes" (Thomas More).

I like to think of tradition as an large old tree: its deep roots are absorbing the wisdom of the past but its branches are blooming fresh flowers every springtime because ... life is about the enthusiasm in always looking ahead.
By helping us making this project take off, you are also helping preserving the Japanese traditional crafts to be transmitted to the next generation.
Traditional crafts are in a difficult conjuncture and if we do not find alternative markets and products suitable for the contemporary demand the handcrafts will be abandoned.
The KAKEHASHI project is also meant to bridge the knowledge of the traditional carpenters towards a stable and bright future.
Enjoy the hot water and sayonara!
iacopo torrini//

story:
A better switch for today's home

There’s a lot to like about a light switch: in any room, no matter how unfamiliar, you can quickly find a switch, even in the dark. The interaction is simple and clear; your hand knows what to do. The switch gives a satisfying click, the lights come to life, and the room is transformed.

We are extending this same familiarity, simplicity, and convenience beyond lighting to the other devices in our homes, giving more power to shape the mood of our living spaces.

The interaction is simple and clear; your hand knows what to do. The switch gives a satisfying click, the lights come to life, and the room is transformed.We are extending this same familiarity, simplicity, and convenience beyond lighting to the other devices in our homes, giving more power to shape the mood of our living spaces.

story:
The Game-Changing Mini 4k Projector: Peak power. Stream Anytime, Anywhere.

 

Welcome to the next generation of on-the-go entertainment. Xenoni is a powerful 4k wireless projector that turns your average media viewing into a cinematic experience. With features like built-in WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, Hi-Fi speakers, screen mirroring, offline storage, and over 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, you’ll be able to enjoy a full 4k cinematic experience from anywhere. And when you’re finished, you can stick it in your pocket.

 

 

Xenoni’s innovative design is compact, durable, and intuitive to use. Other “portable” projectors are big and clunky, and still need cables and adapters to work. Xenoni was designed to be the first projector that could be effortlessly taken from place to place. Now, you’ll have cinematic power and Hi-Fi speakers with you wherever you go. 

Brilliant, cinema-quality colors and deep blacks deliver strong contrasts while staying sharp at up to 240 inches thanks to Xenoni’s 800 ANSI lumens of projection power. Whether it’s day or night, you’ll enjoy a 4k viewing experience in stunning clarity.

With 800 ANSI lumens, Xenoni surpasses all other mini-projectors on the market with superior picture brightness and unbeatable contrast levels and clarity so every seat is the best seat in the house.

Xenoni’s built-in Hi-Fi speakers eliminate any need for portable audio devices to enjoy your favorite movies, shows, and music on the go. Enjoy crisp audio with nuanced mid-range tones and deep bass that rivals the speakers in many TVs.

Oversized speakers lets you immerse yourself completely like you're in the theaters, or doubles as a speaker for any party or occasion!

Using Wifi or Bluetooth, Xenoni can cast anything from any of your devices onto any surface. Access your favorite photos and videos from your phone or iPad and wirelessly cast them for all of your friends and family to enjoy. Or, control your work presentation from your phone while casting it on the wall for the office to see.

Intuitive and touch-sensitive, you can do anything on Xenoni with one finger. Its touchscreen allows you to select your media, apps and more with drag-and-click simplicity.

Xenoni’s quick charge feature ensures that you’ll never be left without projection power. Just 15 minutes of charge time can power Xenoni up for an hour of video playback.

Xenoni is compatible with 5 million apps and counting on the Google Play Store. Stream or download your favorite shows from Netflix or YouTube, play Candy Crush, manage your calendar and more — all in 240-inch widescreen!

 

Windows, Android, iOS—whatever your device, Xenoni can connect to it seamlessly and instantly. Xenoni is powered by Android 8.0 Oreo. Connect to your phone or computer for work, video chatting, or creative projects. Connect to your favorite gaming console for insane 240-inch multiplayer action. Connect to your tablet and cast YouTube on your bedroom wall before going to sleep. Xenoni can connect wherever you are.

Xenoni has WiFi Connectivity, but when no internet is available, you still have access to all your media via Xenoni’s internal memory. You can even download shows and movies from YouTube and Netflix for offline viewing.

 

 

Xenoni is meant to be taken everywhere and placed on all types of surfaces. This is why it’s equipped with state-of-the-art gravity sensors that allow for automatic angle adjustments no matter what surface you’re using. Place it on a flat table, an uneven tent floor, or a lawn chair. With the touch of a button, the projector will correct its own angle. 

4k Video, apps, gaming, internet, screen mirroring—and that’s just the beginning. Your TV was built to be a media player. Xenoni was built to be a powerful multimedia center that does it all. Never before has there been a more versatile projector in such a small package.

 

 

See Xenoni in Action

 

 

 

 

Our Story

 

The founders of Xenoni have been in the entertainment technology space for years and boast more than 40 years of combined experience specifically working with consumer and commercial grade projectors in Asia, Europe, and North America. Each part and design has been meticulously and specifically picked out, piece by piece, guaranteeing you something truly unique and powerful.

Founded in 2013, in Los Angeles, California. At Xenoni Technology, Our Mission is to inspire the world with our innovative technologies, products and design that enrich peoples lives and contribute to social prosperity by creating a new future forward.

The Vision 2020 is at the core of our commitment to create a better world full of richer digital experiences, through innovative technology and products.

The goal of the vision is to become a beloved brand, an innovative company, and an admired company. For this, we dedicate our efforts to creativity and innovation, shared value with our partners, and our great people.

We have delivered world best products and services through passion for innovation and optimal operation. 

We look forward to exploring new business areas, and continue our journey through our history of innovation. 

Xenoni Technology will welcome new challenges and opportunities with joy.

 

We fully believe that with the support of Indiegogo and all of our loyal backers we are bringing the world the best mini projector available.

 

 

Technical Specs

 

Dimensions:  5.6 x 2.7 x 0.7in

Two 3.0 USB Ports

One Ultra-Fast Lightning HDMI Port

USB-C Charging Port (bottom side left)

Wireless Charging Compatible

Micro USB Port

Bluetooth 5.0

Micro SD Card Slot 

Wi-Fi 2.4 GHs - 5.0 GHs

Projector OS: Android 8.0 Oreo

800 ANSI Lumens

Projector Lamp: 5,800 hours

Battery Life: 24 hours

Offline Storage Space: 500 GB SSD

Tri-Pod Port

What's in the Box: Xenoni 4k Mini Projector, Power Cable (USB-C), Instruction Manuel, and a 4 Year Unlimited Warranty. 

 

Limited Quantity Available

The Xenoni Wireless 4k Mini Projector will be shipping on Friday, November 1st, 2019. We our only accepting the first 500 pre-orders for The Xenoni Wireless 4k Mini Projector. Once they’re gone, you won’t be able to get your hands on one, until after Friday, November 1st, 2019.

story:
2 billion pairs of jeans are produced annually, and most of them up disposed in landfills.

A single denim jeans requires almost 1 KG of cotton, up to 10,000 liters of water and countless hours of labour and skill to fabricate. That doesn't sound very eco-friendly, doesn't it? 

What if we tell you that we can change the situation by transforming it into something that gives you comfort, warmth and wrap it all up in designer's aesthetics? 

Presenting, The Nomad Blanket.

WHY CHOOSE THE NOMAD BLANKET?

We work with certified suppliers on recycled, wearable, good condition denim jeans to deconstruct and reconstruct them into a daily product - The Nomad Blanket. In order maintain sustainability, we ensure that the entire manufacturing process from designing, material sourcing, production to packaging is made and done in Malaysia. 

Through our sustainability process, creating a blanket made from denim could extend the lifetime of jeans from 1 to 2 years to another 5 years; with consideration that we do not dispose a blanket frequently. Nomad is a hand-sew product that applies the technique of patchwork inspired by the Chinese tradition - "Bai Jia Bei". The sustainability of Nomad is not only about the material, but also the continuity of a traditional craftsmanship. 

Nomad can be a blanket, a throw blanket, and also a pillow. It is a versatile product that can accompany you anytime and everywhere you go. Nevertheless, Nomad is the best convertible blanket you can own; enhancing your lifestyle as each blanket is unique on it's own; no two Nomad blankets will have the exact same texture colour combination. 

 

WHAT MAKES NOMAD SO SPECIAL?

1) Versatile & Flexible

The Nomad Blanket can transform from a super single blanket into a comfy, cushion pillow depending on your needs. Use it for long trips in the car, pack it up for your midnight flight, or simply have a warm snooze in the comfort of your bed! It's that simple! 


 

2) Eco-friendly & Sustainable

Made from recycled denim jeans, The Nomad Blanket helps in reducing wastage of fabric. All Nomad Blankets are hand sewn from the best quality pre-loved jeans to ensure that jeans deserve a second chance too. 


 

3) Tough, Robust & Built To Last

Let's face it, jeans are probably the toughest types of bottoms that we wear. Remember when you got your first pair and you would wear it for years until it becomes your go to comfort pants? The Nomad Blanket brings back the tough and the comfort. 


 

4) Wishy Washy

Our Nomad Blankets are machine washable; just like any normal jeans! Just load it up, tumble turn, sun dry and you're good to go! 


 

5) Heavily Comfortable

Imagine having your sweet bedtime dreams, to wake up with your blanket sprawled on your bedroom floor. We find that mildly irritating. The Nomad Blanket has that sweet weight spot; weighing around 7 - 8 lbs. This makes the Nomad not too heavy & not too light. Just nice to keep you warm at night. 



6) Comfort With A Dash Of Aesthetics
The Nomad Blanket is a must have for those who want to have a unique looking sleep-ware. It's not everyday you find a denim comforter blanket around; that brings whole new look and feel to your home. 

 

NOMAD Is There For You; Anytime & Anywhere!


Your Fur-kids Will Love It Too!

 

Behind The Sheets

Hundred Stories is a student project launched by a Raffles's graduate; Hee Joo Yee. Joo Yee is a Year 3 Bachelor's Degree student majoring in Fashion Marketing and Management . In order to accomplish her studies, she is tasked to launch a real-life business concerning a sustainable lifestyle. From research design to manufacturing, Joo Yee has worked with different professionals for the sake of bringing together a top quality and sustainable product; The Nomad Blanket

 

FAQ.

1. Where is The Nomad Blanket from?

The Nomad Blanket is designed, sourced, and manufactured in Malaysia. We have worked with trusted suppliers that abide under fair trade management.

2. How much does Nomad weigh?

We ensure that every Nomad weighs between 7 - 8 lbs, as the weight of denim fabric may vary.

3. What are the measurements for The Nomad Blanket?

The size of Nomad is 59" x 71".

4. Is Nomad machine washable?

Yes. Just like how you clean your jeans, Nomad is machine washable and does not require frequent washing.

5. How much is the shipping fees?

Do not worry about the shipping fees. We will cover it no matter which corner you are living around the world!

story:
Cinco 4k Cinema Screen

The Cinco's advanced laser cinema technology, allows you to get exceptionally more screen for the ultimate cinema experience.  With Cinco, get up to a 300" perplexing 4k cinematic display, anywhere, from any device.  

     Cinco- Taking extreme cinematic experience to a whole new level, High-Quality 4K Resolution, from anywhere you are, any time. 

Cinco 4k HD Cinema Resolution 

The Cinco Mini-Projector projects in full 4K resolution with HDR 10+. This means you get ultra-clear & perplexing 4k images with insane cinematic pixel depth. 

 

Cinco's Cinema Laser Lens

Cinco's laser blub life is rated up to 30,000 hours, this means you can use for more than 10 years.

Cinco Design: High-Quality Parts

Cinco is designed and equipped with high-quality industry grade metals and parts. 

 

Samsung 860 QVO Series SSD

 

Cinco comes with an integrated Samsung 860 QVO Series 1 TB Solid State Drive.   

With Samsung QVO 860 SSD performance in your Cinco, you can enjoy lightning-fast bootup speeds, terabyte-level storage, and trusted reliability– all at an incredible value.

Fast read/write speeds of up to 550/520 MB/s*
Store hours of 4K videos and thousands of photos with terabyte-level storage.

Terabyte-level capacity lets you store hours of your favorite 4K movies, tons of games, and thousands of photos, all without compromising speed.

The Samsung 860 QVO features a solid state design, meaning there’s no moving parts to wear down and break. You’ll enjoy peace of mind knowing all your movies, games, and photos are safe and sound.

 

ALPD 4.0

Cinco's 4K tri-color laser fluorescent projection, is equipped with the most advanced ALPD 4.0 technology, which has stable picture, low light attenuation and lasts 30,000 hours long.

HRD10+ Intergration

HDR10+ is an HDR (High Dynamic Range) format created by Samsung designed to expand on the HDR10 format by allowing for dynamic metadata to continuously tweak the display settings so that you're always seeing the most and best color possible.

Our Team

     Our Vision is at the core of our commitment to create a better world full of richer digital experiences, through innovative technology and products.
     The goal of the vision is to become a beloved brand, an innovative company, and an admired company. For this, we dedicate our efforts to creativity and innovation, shared value with our partners, and our great people.

We have delivered world best products and services through passion for innovation and optimal operation. 

We look forward to exploring new business areas such as healthcare and automotive electronics, and continue our journey through history of innovation. 

Cinco Technology will welcome new challenges and opportunities with joy.

story:
Risks and challenges

Having visited the factory we know they can do what they say. We sent the funds for them to make the 3D Prototype which they did on time. They made an exact working model that we disassembled and examined from the inside out and outside in! It worked perfectly.

The making of the molds is something the factory has done many times and will be able to do it as required once we reach our funding goal. They are all set to go when they see that milestone reached.

The small production batch (100-300 units) testing happens next and if any problems are found can be quickly fixed with tweaks.

The factory can then go into full-scale ramp-up production and assembly with their experienced workforce.

We would expect any delays in this manufacturing stage to be in the range of a week or two at most.

Ocean shipping from their port on the coast is fast and efficient as we are plugging into a logistics system with our freight forwarder and customs brokerage into the fulfillment center in LA. They will be able to get the products out fast once they arrive. The unit boxes will be already packed inside a brown shipping carton, only needing a shipping label to go.

All estimates have been made with the wide experience from the factory in producing and getting new products to market, as well as from the professional fulfillment center getting the product to you.

We will be in China to examine the products coming from the first testing batch as well as at the fulfillment center to ensure all is smooth.

We are committed to getting your American Bidet to you as quickly as possible as this is just the first stage for us in bringing The American Bidet to the market and CHANGING HOW AMERICA WIPES!

They made an exact working model that we disassembled and examined from the inside out and outside in! It worked perfectly.The making of the molds is something the factory has done many times and will be able to do it as required once we reach our funding goal. They are all set to go when they see that milestone reached.The small production batch (100-300 units) testing happens next and if any problems are found can be quickly fixed with tweaks.The factory can then go into full-scale ramp-up production and assembly with their experienced workforce.We would expect any delays in this manufacturing stage to be in the range of a week or two at most.Ocean shipping from their port on the coast is fast and efficient as we are plugging into a logistics system with our freight forwarder and customs brokerage into the fulfillment center in LA.
