story:
If you answered yes to any of these questions then you are throwing money away on excess water and damaged landscaping.  Peak 8 Connected wants to develop a solution for you and needs your help!

 

Meet DoodleBug.

noun  |  doo * dle * bug

"a device (as a divining rod) used in attempting to locate underground gas, water, oil, or ores"

DoodleBug is a small but powerful device that measures the volumetric water content of the soil at the optimal root zone for your landscape and garden.  With two versions measuring at depths of 5" and 10",  you can gain great insights into the performance of your irrigation system and whether you are delivering the right amount of water for your landscape to thrive, while eliminating excess.

 

How it Works.

The divining rod is inserted into the ground, keeping the cap at or above ground level. The DoodleBug cap is slightly smaller than a typical sprinkler head making it lawnmower friendly. You can install it in turf without worrying about damaging or tripping over it.

And if we hit our stretch funding goals we can make options available to spice up your garden such as the Toadstool option shown below.

 

At periodic intervals DoodleBug will take measurements of the soil moisture content at the deep root zone, temperature at the surface, and battery level. DoodleBug then shares these measurements wirelessly by one of two modes; point-to-point or IoT mesh network.

 

Take Control of your Irrigation.

In point-to-point mode, you can connect to your Doodlebug device directly via Bluetooth and view intuitive reports to gain an understanding of how much moisture is actually making it to the deep root zone.  Modify your irrigation settings and schedule and watch the impact to each zone. 

 

In IoT Mesh Network mode, you can view reports from all your DoodleBug devices at once, from anywhere in the world, using one or more of our Gateway devices. Gateway is a border router that establishes a Thread compliant WLAN and securely bridges the network to your WiFi router. 

Once your DoodleBug devices are enrolled with the Gateway you can begin to receive a number of useful alerts on your mobile device when there are conditions that warrant your attention.  

 

Sign up for one or more of the following alerts:

With a connected irrigation controller, you can respond to alerts by adjusting your irrigation schedule right from your mobile device.  Peak 8's future product roadmap includes wireless valve control modules, but there are several connected controllers available today from other fine manufacturers.

 

 Or Turn Over Control to Conductor.

 

Peak 8 Connected is developing Conductor, a cloud-based learning engine engineered to manage your irrigation system using data obtained from your DoodleBug devices, weather forecasts, and information you provide about soil type, plant type, and more.

Conductor builds on this and other knowledge and works with your irrigation controllers to maintain soil moisture content levels appropriate for your landscape. To help Conductor learn and make better decisions, enable and reply to the periodic Landscape Health Queries. Your input will help to fine tune the performance of your irrigation system.

 

Accessories.

 

Why DoodleBug?

Peak 8 Connected was founded by a small group of engineers in Colorado who are alarmed at the impact of the drought in California and our own states seemingly short memory regarding the pain and cost of our last drought a decade ago.

Populations have increased but water reserves have not kept pace. Even states like Florida with subtropical climates are experiencing strains on fresh water reserves due to explosive population growth that has averaged a 42% increase every 10 years since it joined the union!

It stands to reason that if we don’t take steps to use water more efficiently, the next drought will be more painful and costly than the last. Peak 8 Connected wants to do its part by developing products that allow homeowners, landscape managers, municipalities, and corporate/education campuses manage their irrigation to the landscapes needs while cutting waste and reducing average consumption.

Some Interesting Facts.

  • The EPA estimates landscape irrigation accounts for 30% to 60% of a households water usage depending on geography. And as much as 50% of that is waste due to inefficient irrigation methods and systems.
  • Water rates in 30 major cities across the U.S. increased more than 40% between 2010 and 2015.  Projections are for even higher increases as populations increase and water delivery infrastructure continues to age.
  • In 2015 California passed a law forcing cities and water districts to reduce usage by as much as 25% and allowing them to fine water wasters up to $500 a day. Similar rules and fines are in place throughout much of the country.
  • According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, the American mountain west region has been in a drought 11 of the last 14 years.
  • Climate change is projected to result in more severe droughts leading to stress on already over stressed fresh water resources.

 

Perk Options.

Note: International contributors may incur a VAT tax. If so, you should receive a notice from your local carrier or post office to pay the tax before the perk is released.

 

What We Need.

Peak 8 Connected is a startup technology company focusing on IoT wireless solutions and DoodleBug is our first product launch.  Along with Gateway and Conductor, our goal is to develop hardware and software platforms designed to optimize water usage and protect landscape investments.  At the completion of the project, we would have the beginnings of a robust platform to launch us into other useful smart home and building applications as well. 

Your support will employ as many as a dozen engineers and technicians on this project as well as supporting manufacturing firms (CO, CA, ID, IN, and WI) in a burgeoning new IoT industry. Our minimum funding level is $125,000.  This amount will cover all expenses associated with development and manufacturing of the DoodleBug and Gateway devices including tooling, materials, assembly, testing, and obtaining FCC/CE and Bluetooth SIG certifications.  There is risk at this level of funding as it doesn't leave much room for error. However, our founder and team collectively have several decades of experience developing and manufacturing embedded electronic products and we have confidence that if we hit this target we will be able to meet our obligations.

We are setting a stretch goal of at least $450,000 to fund the development of Conductor. This level of funding will also allow more margin for error in all of our activities, add staff to mitigate development risks, build stronger supplier partnerships, and move into improved facilities. Your support is very much appreciated!

Where Does Your Donation Go?

Minimum funding goal

Stretch funding goal

 

Where We Are At.

DoodleBug is completing the prototyping stage and ready for early production.

Major accomplishments so far

  • Sensor design complete and ready for field tests
  • Network communications and RF performance verified with development kits
  • Mechanical design complete and tested with 3-D prints
  • Mobile app mockups and proof of concept complete
  • Initial cloud application proof of concept and mockups started
  • Preliminary manufacturing review and quotes complete, partners identified 

Whats next

  • Finalize schematics and printed circuit boards
  • Produce manufacturing tooling, develop processes, and set up supply chain
  • Obtain product certifications such as FCC/CE, Bluetooth SIG, Thread
  • Finalize DoodleBug and Gateway firmware and mobile application
  • Begin development on Conductor cloud application
  • Test, test, and more testing

Timeline

Field trials will suspend for winter months but development on Conductor will continue on a monthly release schedule until field trials resume in the spring.

 

What Keeps Us Up At Night.

There is risk in any new endeavor and this project is not without its fair share.  DoodleBug measures soil moisture content by measuring the dielectric of the soil which increases significantly when water is added. We use the capacitance technique which is fairly straightforward and one of the most widely used methods but accuracy can be affected by a variety of factors, most notably soil type and salinity.  We have taken steps to mitigate these factors but require data from field trials in order to train Conductor to compensate.  Peak 8 will be conducting a number of field trials in homes, municipalities, and corporate campuses in the Colorado Front Range area, and if Gateway contributors elect to share their data, we can use that data to increase our sample size and regional footprint.  You can be part of the process to help teach Conductor by sharing your data and responding regularly to landscape health alerts.

A list of key technical risks:

  • DoodleBug is powered by a single AAA battery with a power budget that is designed to last 2 to 3 years when used in IoT Mesh Network mode and 1 year in Bluetooth mode.  At this time our prototypes are built from circuits with debugging features that draw power so we have only been able to calculate a battery life estimate.  Live device testing is required to see if we can hit our target.
  • DoodleBug will be exposed to temperature extremes ranging from -20 F to +120 F.  In many regions like Colorado the average temperatures can swing more than 40 F from Spring to Summer to Fall and there can be routine temperature swings of 30 F in a single day.  In addition to reducing battery life, these temperature fluctuations can also affect the accuracy of the circuits measuring soil capacitance.  We have taken steps to mitigate this in the sensor and Conductor will be designed to correlate measurements to temperature and compensate for any changes, but we won't know more until field trial data is obtained.
  • 2.4GHz radios used for Bluetooth, Zigbee and Thread are quite common place today but still require a great deal of expertise to manufacture consistently and obtain certifications. Delays are quite common, even with experienced teams.

Some other risks:

  • Conductor can only be delivered with DoodleBug if stretch funding goals are achieved. Otherwise, delivery of Conductor will be delayed until we can secure further investment later in the year. 

 

Our Partners.

Peak 8 Connected products are manufactured by our friends at Clear Blue Engineering, located in Lafayette, CO.  

Arrow Electronics is supporting us with design and manufacturing reviews and component supply chain.

Siren Video, located in Boulder Colorado, did our video production.

TechrIoT, located in Englewood Colorado, is providing support for emerging startups in the IoT space.

Thank you!

story:
After my first as well as last Kickstarter campaign ended on March-2018 about 100% linen bedding, the brand Luxneptune was officially launched. Today we are here to bring it to Indiegogo at 15-30% discount for 2nd round pre-order.  

 

Most people haven’t tried pure-linen bedding, 

Linen – The true noble fiber!

The Bible mentions Solomon bringing linen yarn from Egypt. About 5000 B.C. Egyptians made linen clothes and it was the symbol of wealth & social class. In ancient Greece linen clothes were a privilege of priests. In ancient Romans Linen named as textus ventilus, which meant “woven wind”. During the Renaissance of Europe, linen became a symbol of luxury, once known as the noble fiber that only afforded by noblemen and aristocrats, representing social class and royalty. Now linen is still the British Windsor Castle & Buckingham Palace’s choice for some home textile. 

Made from flax, linen has long been a covetable fabric. But flax is a temperamental crop, and hand-picking the fibers off of the stalk are a laborious process. As a result, linen is typically more expensive than cotton and its fabric cost per meter is around a double of 100% Egyptian cotton or 100% USA Supima Cotton. (the linen fibers in this campaign is imported from Euro) 

10 facts about linen: 

1. Breathable: linen fibers are hollow and woven more loosely to promote airflow and a better night sleep (this is also why linen is never measured in thread count). 

 2. Heat conductivity of linen is 5 times as high as that of wool and 19 times as that of silk 

3. 30% less likely to cling to skin than cotton and heat also escape quickly from it 

4. Reduce skin surface temperature: In hot weather, those dressed in Linen clothes are found to show the skin temperature 3-4 degrees below those wearing silk and cotton. 

5. Outstanding moisture absorbance: can absorb up to 20% of its own weight in moisture before it feels damp, and easily releases moisture to the air to remain cool and dry to the touch; perspiration evaporates off quickly by then 

6. Getting softer and softer after use and wash 

 7. Good to your body & healthy: Non-allergenic, Resistant to moths and mildew, Repellent to micro-organisms and insects, Prevent bacteria grow, Natural pH balance 

8. Eco-friendly & Green: do not require intensive irrigation in growing, need 60% less water & 18% less energy than cotton to grow, needs 5 times less fertilizers and pesticides than cotton to grow (Thus please don’t ask if it is organic or not, not much difference between organic and non-organic) 

9. Can be recycled and biodegradable 

10. Very durable: Strength of Linen is twice as high as that of cotton and 3 times as that of wool, fiber last 12 times longer than cotton, born long-staple hence is anti-pilling and no lint, resistant to abrasion and stretch, dirt & stain washed off easily. 

 

Wrinkles and slub 

Wrinkle is part of the elegance of it, they just perfectly rumpled and textured and wrinkled. Not messy wrinkled; sumptuously wrinkled. Another part of the charm is its irregularity. You'll often notice small knots in linen and these are known as "slubs" which occur randomly along the fabric. Relatively rough fabric surface stimulates blood flow and promotes relaxation. 

About Stonewash Technology - Why add it? 

It is a garment washing process that commonly applied in denim (esp. jeans) 

The process

Large pumice rocks are placed within washing machines together with linen fabric and get washed for 2-3 times. As the wash cylinder rotates, it causes the bed linen items to be repeatedly pounded and beaten by stones riding up and down inside the drum, ride up the paddles inside the drum and fall back down onto the fabric. After removing pumice stones, the fabric goes through several rinsing cycles. 

Benefits

The result is a slightly faded fabric color with a vintage feel, increase the softness and flexibility, become even more water absorbent, and acquire a shabby chic style that are so appreciated by modern educated shoppers. 

Pre-shrunk & Physical Softening

Softening is a textile finishing process aim at better hand. Textile mills used to apply Chemical softener to do it. But industrial softeners contain silicone oil which will reduce fabric hydrophilic property (water absorbability) and make the texture less crisp. To maintain a good balance, we applied Physical softening.

The Perks

You can now pre-order your linen bedding, highly recommend you to experience a Flat Sheet at least once in your life, it is a great opportunity at $79 (30% OFF)!!!

Please remember to select your size, color.

Color Choices

  1. Midnight (Dark Blue),
  2. Sky (Light Blue),
  3. Jade (Green),
  4. Natural (Linen Khaki), and
  5. Blush (Light Pink)

Mix & Matches

You can choose different colors and sizes within a sheet set or bundle. For example:

Twin Duvet Cover in Sky + Full Fitted Sheet in Linen + Pillow Cases in Stone

Size Chart

Timeline

European flax fibers possess better quality. Imported French linen had been woven into fabric in advance, and once the campaign get funded we will start dyeing (coloration), cutting into your sizes and sewing up with our coconut buttons and labels. The whole process will be done in Shandong, Eastern China, a vertically integrated factory with 15 years experience in making 100% linen textiles. Finally the stonewashing and pre-shrinkaging process will be done nearby.

About Luxneptune's logo

It is the presser foot of sewing machine, hoping people respect the sewing workers: Bedding is much larger and heavier than garment, sewing on it 8 hours a day is really a hard job, please respect them. 

Funding Goal 

Just keep sharing the story to get more and more !!

Risks and challenges

During last time Kickstarter, luckily everything was within schedule. In fact last time I had faced  late arrival of funding, late reply of color & size choices, delayed production due to factory's urgent export orders, and the most difficult hard job is to maintain the mix-and-matches from placing order, cut and sew, to washing and packaging.

Backers had received their Fedex/DHL tracking number already and some of them started enjoy their bedding!

The experience helps me to do better this time in Indiegogo. 

Action Now

Start ordering yours at 15% OFF now! Promotion time is limited before 5/31~

https://igg.me/at/luxneptune/x/15691187

Links

- Facebook

- Instagram

Imported French linen had been woven into fabric in advance, and once the campaign get funded we will start dyeing (coloration), cutting into your sizes and sewing up with our coconut buttons and labels. The whole process will be done in Shandong, Eastern China, a vertically integrated factory with 15 years experience in making 100% linen textiles. Finally the stonewashing and pre-shrinkaging process will be done nearby.About Luxneptune's logoIt is the presser foot of sewing machine, hoping people respect the sewing workers: Bedding is much larger and heavier than garment, sewing on it 8 hours a day is really a hard job, please respect them. Funding Goal Just keep sharing the story to get more and more !!Risks and challengesDuring last time Kickstarter, luckily everything was within schedule. In fact last time I had faced  late arrival of funding, late reply of color & size choices, delayed production due to factory's urgent export orders, and the most difficult hard job is to maintain the mix-and-matches from placing order, cut and sew, to washing and packaging.Backers had received their Fedex/DHL tracking number already and some of them started enjoy their bedding!The experience helps me to do better this time in Indiegogo. Action NowStart ordering yours at 15% OFF now! Promotion time is limited before 5/31~https://igg.me/at/luxneptune/x/15691187Links- Facebook- Instagram

story:
Beautiful and useful – what more could you ask for?

Using Ekokamu® is a simple and hygienic way to recycle biowaste – and its elegant design does not need to be hidden from view.

Ekokamu’s concept is based on an integrated air pump system that prevents the decomposition of biowaste. Stylish design and beautiful colours are an important part of the concept: we wanted to create a biowaste container that is so hygienic and stylish that you can keep it on the kitchen table, where it is easy to use. No additional odours or liquids are created in the container. With Ekokamu you can say goodbye to smelly and ugly biowaste bags in your kitchen. Ekokamu keeps its contents dry and fresh.

Ekokamu was invented to meet a real need. Most of us want to do the right thing, and recycle biowaste, don’t we?

Ekokamu’s operating mechanism, based on vacuum technology, was invented by Ph.D. Annukka Pakarinen. She was inspired by an everyday problem we all know: handling biowaste is not easy and it’s not pleasant. This is the problem Ekokamu addresses. Ekokamu makes doing the right thing easy and pleasant!

Pakarinen, a mother of four living in a single-family house, spotted the problem as something she wanted to fix for herself. Pakarinen has a Master’s degree in chemistry and a Doctorate in agricultural biotechnology. Her interest in utilising the biowaste created in the food chain arises from a combination of strong professional expertise and a desire to solve the problems she encounters in her own everyday life, and this has resulted in the Ekokamu biowaste container, which makes possible the almost odour-free handling of biowaste without any extra moisture.

The key idea of Ekokamu is to make recycling easy and stylish. We want to make the user experience as smooth and simple as possible. There is only one switch to open and close the Ekokamu!

Ekokamu keeps biowaste fresh 1-2 weeks. When the container is full, biowaste is disposed of in the way that is suitable for you, depending on where you live and how it is organized in your city. It can be placed for example in your condominium’s biowaste container or you can put it in your compost if you have one.

Watch the video and let us show you how easy Ekokamu is to use!

As a product, the Ekokamu biowaste container is still in its infancy, but the method itself is already mature. Ekokamu's operating method is based on extensive research and testing. The vacuum method used by Ekokamu enables a completely new way of handling household biowaste.

The method for improving the preservation of waste is based on a biological mechanism that prevents the action of harmful microbes and enables the activity of the desirable microbes living in biowaste. Removing nearly all the oxygen from the waste container prevents the activity of microbes that need oxygen, such as mould and decomposers. Thus creating an anaerobic environment, where organisms such as lactic acid bacteria work to produce lactic acid. The lactic acid acidifies the organic material, lowers the pH and creates the conditions that promote preservation. To make it simpler: for example the production of silage and sauerkraut, among other things, is also based on the same mechanism. This process slows down the decomposition and the container does not need to be emptied as often.

Ekokamu is unique -  there is no other vacuum based solution to collecting biowaste at home!

Technical details of the first Ekokamu:

Ekokamu’s goal is to make recycling simple and offer you a new way of handling biowaste. Ecological issues are also important to us and we want this product to promote a more extensive use of household biowaste. How many of us realize how valuable ordinary household biowaste can be as a raw material for energy production? By using the Ekokamu, you are helping the environment in a smart and effective way.

Ekokamu Oy is a Finnish start-up company established in 2017. We are a small team of passionate people who want to create something new - something useful, beautiful and ecological. This is Ekokamu's campaign team. We are happy to help you with any questions you might have!

Ekokamu's campaign team

  • CEO and co-founder Elina Voutilainen keeps things running. Voutilainen has M.Sc. in engineering and a strong background in product development and project management in large organisations, first with the Finnish Defence Forces and later with the KONE Corporation. For the last few years, she has run her own consulting company which offers services related to project management and the commercialisation of new products for technology companies.
  • Chair of board and Head of Innovation, Ph.D (biotechnology) Annukka Pakarinen is the inventor of Ekokamu. She has conducted extensive research in the area of ensiling organic material.
  • Head of Marketing and partner Riikka Krenn is a communication professional specialized in digital marketing. She has M.A. in communication sciences.
  • Project manager Leo von Hertzen takes care of sourcing, supply chain management, and logistics.
  • Marketing assistant Ira Matilainen manages our social media channels and customer communication.

Ekokamu’s product development partner is Jalaka Oy, a professional design company, which has collaborated with Ekokamu to create the first prototypes as well as the visual appearance of the product.

We are sure you'd like to know what is happening at Ekokamu right now and why are we here at Indiegogo.

So far Ekokamu has been financed by company owners and with the support from several institutions. We have received funding from Business Finland (Finnish public funding for innovations), Keksijöiden tukisäätiö (a Finnish foundation to support innovations and inventors), and LinkRoom (an initiative of Hämeenlinna city to support entrepreneurs and startups). In addition, Ekokamu's owners have spent hundreds of hours to make things work. We have also secured a loan from Finnvera to enable future investments.

This picture summarizes what has been achieved so far:

We are now very close to starting production. But at this point it is necessary to make investments that are not possible without further financial support. This is the reason we decided to launch on Indiegogo. We know that out there, there are people who find Ekokamu as cool as we do and who, hopefully, are willing to help us fund it.

We need your help to start Ekokamu's production!

Let's discuss price and colour. How much does it cost? The normal retail price for one Ekokamu container is 149 €, including VAT. Your price here at Indiegogo depends on how early you hop on board with us. We offer three colour options: grey, blue, and green.

For the first 100 backers we offer Ekokamu for a special price of 119 €, including VAT. For the and next 200 backers the price is 134 €, including VAT. After that the normal price of 149 € applies. If you want to save some money, be ready for quick decisions!

What happens after the campaign?

Funding will be used to source best possible components for Ekokamu and finance the special tools (e.g. molds) that are needed for production. We will also have to recruit some new people to help us with manage our growing company.

Manufacturing the tools takes approximately 3 months. After that, it takes roughly 2–3 weeks to manufacture the first 1000 bins. If you back us here at Indiegogo, one of them will be yours!

Ekokamu containers will be manufactured in Finland by our subcontractor. The container meets all European standards and EC directives.

Watch our campaign video! 

What is Ekokamu? 

Ekokamu is a stylish Finnish innovation that makes collecting biowaste easy and hygienic. Ekokamu’s concept is based on an integrated air pump system that prevents the decomposition of biowaste. No additional odours or liquids are created in the container and no biowaste bags are needed. Once full, you can empty the biowaste and clean the container in your dishwasher. Ekokamu® is a registered trademark.

How does the Ekokamu container work?

The method for improving the preservation of waste is based on a biological mechanism that prevents the action of harmful microbes and enables the activity of the desirable microbes living in biowaste. Removing nearly all the oxygen from the waste container prevents the activity of microbes that need oxygen, such as mould and decomposers.

What is the capacity of the Ekokamu container?

The basic model holds four litres.

Does Ekokamu use electricity?

The Ekokamu container uses mains current. Ekokamu's energy consumption is very low: less than 0,7 kWh per year. Ekokamu is delivered with a non-rewireable CEE 7/7 plug, compatible with "Schuko" (Type F) and French Type E.

How can I clean my Ekokamu container?

You can easily clean Ekokamu in a dish washer or wash it by hand.

Where should I put the biowaste when the container is full?

When the container is full, biowaste is disposed in the way that is suitable for you. It can be sorted for example in your condominium’s biowaste container or in a compost.

What does "Ekokamu" mean?

Ekokamu is a friendly product and so is its name. Ekokamu is Finnish and it is a compound word of two words, eko (eco) and kamu (a pal or a friend). Ekokamu is biowaste's best friend!

story:
THE SIMPLEST VACUUM OVEN EVER

There are only two options for vacuum ovens on the market. One is clunky, expensive, and hard to use. The other doesn't come with an integrated heating unit, has low levels of heating accuracy, and is hard to reach into. We've engineered a new vacuum oven with a focus on being the simplest unit to use while being performant in all of the important areas. 

 

PRODUCT FEATURES​

​Modular Heating Unit: We specifically designed the heating portion of the Bhoulder to work independently of the lid. Just remove the lid and you have a hot plate optimized for a low temperature range. 

​Optimized For Low Temperature Ranges: Our vacuum was engineered from the beginning to be optimized around the 80-120F temperature range. The Bhoulder keeps tight temperature tolerances over long periods of time with our custom PID temperature controller to ensure you a top quality purging process.

Easy To See Contents: Our clear lid allows you to easily see into the center to watch your contents as you vacuum purge.


Simple Controls: Simplicity is one of the most important aspects to us when it comes to the Bhoulder. We selected the vacuum and temperature controls specifically to have as few options as possible to reduce complexity so you can get to what matters.

​Connects To Any Vacuum Pump: Hook up any vacuum pump of any strength with our 1/4" connector. We've gone through extensive testing of our custom chamber walls and lid to handle the most common high power vacuums used.

Easy To Access Contents: Our lid was designed so you can easily access the contents during your purging process. 

HOW TO USE

 

1. Plug Bhoulder into standard outlet.

2. Place contents on top of heat plate and cover with lid.

3. Turn heater on and set to desired temperature.

4. Connect vacuum pump and turn it on.

5. Your done!!

Beta Feedback

"The Bhoulder provides stable results and consistent and even heat. I refuse to use any other vacuum chamber." -- John Wilson
"I really like the consistency of the temps. Holds a vacuum very nice when the valves are closed and vacuum pump is not running." -- Chad Morgan

Why We're Raising Money

We need to raise funds so we can cover the manufacturing costs of the Bhoulder. The unit has been tested and works as expected, but we don't have the money to build our first batch. This money would mean a tremendous amount to us and allow us to develop High Simple into a company that makes other fantastic innovations in the industry. 

EXTRAS

Risks & Challenges

Our unit has been engineered, tested, and optimized over the last year. We are finally at a point where we are comfortable releasing it to the public and wouldn't have released it if it wasn't ready. The only challenges in front of us are working with the manufacturers to line up the assembly and distribution of the product, but we already verified all of the manufacturers we want to go with for launch.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please contact us at hello@highsimple.com if are a part of a blog, magazine, or media outlet interested in a press for the Bhoulder.

Please contact us at hello@highsimple.com if are interested in wholesale of the Bhoulder.

Special thanks to Mecchania for helping with sourcing and manufacturing of the Bhoulder.


Special thanks to Goal Engineering for their outstanding engineering work on the Bhoulder and making it work just right.

-- Thank you from High Simple!!!

story:
WHAT IS WiFi Drop?

WiFi Drop is a very tiny open source micro-controller board equipped with a powerful ARM Cortex-M3 controller and a 802.11 b/g WiFi module. The micro-controller is programmable directly via USB. There is no need for an additional programmer.  All the project related things will be public.

Very high performance programs can be implement with C or C++. We will provide hardware abstraction libraries to make the low-level programming of applications easier and faster. 

And finally, 10 programmable I/O pins are available to use the module in your very own application. They are easy to access via standard pin headers on both sides of the module. The pin header spacing is perfectly aligned to use the WiFi Drop board with breadboards and perfboards.


 We are also going to make the board compatible to the very well-known and commonly used Arduino platform.
All project related software will be open source. It will be public on a public GIT repository.
The schematics and layout files will be open hardware. Feel free to integrate it into your own project.

WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH WiFi Drop?

You may have heard from the Internet-of-Things (IoT). 
The IoT describes a scenario where every 'thing' is connected to an 'Internet'-like network. 
The WiFi Drop is a micro-controller board which can be used to build the IoT. You can connect everything to your network and furthermore to the global Internet. This gives you the unique ability to control everything from everywhere in the world. 

The Internet-of-Things is in your hands.


We also want to make your design process easier and faster. Therefore, we think about extending the functionality of the WiFi Drop board by plugging it into another board which adds some new features. It's like the shields for Arduino.

But we want you involved in this. If you have a great idea for an extension board, just drop us an email and tell us about your idea.


APPLICATIONS WE THINK OF

  • Wireless Light switch/dimmer
    Control the lights in your home from everywhere in the world. Let's assume you are on holidays and you want to check if the lights in your living room are really off.
    This can be combined with your smartphone too. So, you can control the lights in your home with a single tap on your phone.
  • Long term temperature measurement
    Connect a temperature sensor to the board and transmit the temperature every minute to an online service like ThingSpeak. This is how you can track the temperature over a long period.
    But this is not restricted to temperature. You can measure anything you want: Temperature, Humidity, Brightness, or anything else you can think of.
  • WiFi Weather station
    Build your very own weather station and transmit all the data to the Internet
  • ...

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We have already built a working prototype of the board as proof of concept. But prototypes are expensive and they are basically just used to show that the hardware is really working as expected.

What we want to achieve with this campaign and with your help:
  1. We want to get the board to the market at a reasonable price. Therefore we need to produce at least 200 boards.
  2. We need to invest much more time to implement the hardware abstraction libraries and to adapt the Arduino framework to work with our micro-controller.
And this is where you come into it.

If you think our idea is great and you want to be part of this project, we would be happy if you bought one of the perks.

Anyway, please spread the word about the project. Tell your family, your friends, your colleagues, share it on Facebook and Twitter.


SHIPPING

The WiFi Drop will be produced in Germany. And we are going to ship the units from Austria. 

The perks of this campaign already include the shipping fees for countries in Europe. If you live outside Europe, please add another 5 EUR to the price.
This price does not include the custom fees, duties or any import taxes you may need to pay when you are importing products into your country. We are not able to pay these fees for you.

TECH SPECS

Board:

  • Dimension: 42mm x 25mm (1.65inch x 0.98inch)
  • Pin headers: 2.54mm / 20.32mm (0.1inch / 0.8inch) spacing
  • 10 programmable I/O pins (analog and digital)
  • Powered over USB

Microcontroller:

  • 64 MHz ARM Cortex-M3
  • 128 kByte Flash memory
  • 32 kByte RAM
  • In-system programmable over USB

WIFI:

  • Texas Instruments CC3000 WIFI module
  • 802.11b/g

CONTACT

If you have any questions feel free to contact us. Comment directly on the campaign or write us an email: wifidrop@emicrotec.at


DEMO APPLICATIONS

A Wireless RGB LED strip control application. 

This demo shows how you can connect to the WiFi Drop and communicate with it. I implemented a minimalistic HTTP server which serves a small website (the color picker from the video) with some Javascript code. When you click on the color wheel, the RGB color code is sent with an AJAX request to the WiFi Drop. The micro controller is processing the request and adjusts its three channel PWM output to control the color of the LED strip.



FAQ

Can you indicate the power supply requirements of the module?

At this time, we haven't measured the exact power consumption of the module. According to the CC3000 datasheet, the WIFI module can consume a maximum of 275mA. If I have to guess, the over all power consumption of the module will be around 350mA.

The module can either be powered directly over USB or with an external 5V power supply over the external pin header.

Are there interfaces like SPI, I2C, UART available?

All controller pins on the pin headers can be used as GPIOs. Additionally, there are some hardware features available.

  • 3 independent PWM channels
  • 2 UARTs (Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter)
  • 1 USART (Universal Synchronous Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter) which can also be used as SPI interface
  • 4 ADC channels

Very high performance programs can be implement with C or C++. We will provide hardware abstraction libraries to make the low-level programming of applications easier and faster. 

And finally, 10 programmable I/O pins are available to use the module in your very own application. They are easy to access via standard pin headers on both sides of the module. The pin header spacing is perfectly aligned to use the WiFi Drop board with breadboards and perfboards.







We are also going to make the board compatible to the very well-known and commonly used Arduino platform.





All project related software will be open source. It will be public on a public GIT repository.




The schematics and layout files will be open hardware. Feel free to integrate it into your own project.

WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH WiFi Drop?

You may have heard from the Internet-of-Things (IoT). 
The IoT describes a scenario where every 'thing' is connected to an 'Internet'-like network. 
The WiFi Drop is a micro-controller board which can be used to build the IoT. You can connect everything to your network and furthermore to the global Internet. This gives you the unique ability to control everything from everywhere in the world. 
The Internet-of-Things is in your hands.

We also want to make your design process easier and faster. Therefore, we think about extending the functionality of the WiFi Drop board by plugging it into another board which adds some new features. It's like the shields for Arduino.
But we want you involved in this. If you have a great idea for an extension board, just drop us an email and tell us about your idea.




APPLICATIONS WE THINK OF



Wireless Light switch/dimmerControl the lights in your home from everywhere in the world. Let's assume you are on holidays and you want to check if the lights in your living room are really off. This can be combined with your smartphone too. So, you can control the lights in your home with a single tap on your phone.

Long term temperature measurementConnect a temperature sensor to the board and transmit the temperature every minute to an online service like ThingSpeak. This is how you can track the temperature over a long period.But this is not restricted to temperature. You can measure anything you want: Temperature, Humidity, Brightness, or anything else you can think of.

WiFi Weather stationBuild your very own weather station and transmit all the data to the Internet
...



WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We have already built a working prototype of the board as proof of concept. But prototypes are expensive and they are basically just used to show that the hardware is really working as expected.
What we want to achieve with this campaign and with your help:

We want to get the board to the market at a reasonable price. Therefore we need to produce at least 200 boards.

We need to invest much more time to implement the hardware abstraction libraries and to adapt the Arduino framework to work with our micro-controller.

And this is where you come into it.
If you think our idea is great and you want to be part of this project, we would be happy if you bought one of the perks.
Anyway, please spread the word about the project. Tell your family, your friends, your colleagues, share it on Facebook and Twitter.



SHIPPING

The WiFi Drop will be produced in Germany. And we are going to ship the units from Austria. 
The perks of this campaign already include the shipping fees for countries in Europe. If you live outside Europe, please add another 5 EUR to the price.
This price does not include the custom fees, duties or any import taxes you may need to pay when you are importing products into your country. We are not able to pay these fees for you.



TECH SPECSBoard:

Dimension: 42mm x 25mm (1.65inch x 0.98inch)
Pin headers: 2.54mm / 20.32mm (0.1inch / 0.8inch) spacing
10 programmable I/O pins (analog and digital)
Powered over USB


Microcontroller:

64 MHz ARM Cortex-M3
128 kByte Flash memory
32 kByte RAM
In-system programmable over USB

WIFI:


Texas Instruments CC3000 WIFI module
802.11b/g


CONTACT
If you have any questions feel free to contact us. Comment directly on the campaign or write us an email: wifidrop@emicrotec.at





DEMO APPLICATIONS

A Wireless RGB LED strip control application. 
This demo shows how you can connect to the WiFi Drop and communicate with it. I implemented a minimalistic HTTP server which serves a small website (the color picker from the video) with some Javascript code. When you click on the color wheel, the RGB color code is sent with an AJAX request to the WiFi Drop. The micro controller is processing the request and adjusts its three channel PWM output to control the color of the LED strip.





FAQ

Can you indicate the power supply requirements of the module?

At this time, we haven't measured the exact power consumption of the module. According to the CC3000 datasheet, the WIFI module can consume a maximum of 275mA. If I have to guess, the over all power consumption of the module will be around 350mA.

The module can either be powered directly over USB or with an external 5V power supply over the external pin header.
Are there interfaces like SPI, I2C, UART available?

All controller pins on the pin headers can be used as GPIOs. Additionally, there are some hardware features available. 


3 independent PWM channels
2 UARTs (Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter)
1 USART (Universal Synchronous Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter) which can also be used as SPI interface
4 ADC channels

story:
Summary: http://www.kevinbobolskygroup.com/

For the first time ever, we're taking a multi-tens-of-millions-of-dollars property and breaking down the purchase by making it accessible to a lot of people in vacation-sized chunks:

  • This incredible, inspiring place deserves to be shared by many people.  The property, called the Cerro Pelon Ranch, is located in the Galisteo Basin near Santa Fe, New Mexico, covers over 20,000 acres, and includes a landing strip, equestrian facilities, and an old west town that has been used as a set in such movies as Lonesome Dove, All The Pretty Horses, and Wild Wild West.
  • World class design in the middle of the jaw-dropping landscape gives way to sweeping views and once-in-a-lifetime experiences of southwestern beauty.
  • And you, your friends, and your family can all experience it without having to shell out $75MM for the property.
  • I am mainly looking forward to acheiving the impossible and sharing this beautiful, incomparable place with all of you.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $75,660,000 to fund the purchase of the ranch and the initial staff (chef +cleaning) that will take care of all of you.
  • By claiming the $97,000 perk, you get access to one week in the ranch's stunning main house + staff.  You can purchase multiple perks and spread your weeks out or combine them however you like, depending on availability.  Early supporters will have first choice of when they use their week over later supporters.
  • Your weeks are all transferable to others, such as your children, friends, or other family.
  • NONE of the money will be accessible to us unless we reach our goal, so we need you to spread the word to your friends who may be interested to make this a reality for all of us!

Risks & Challenges

Of course, our biggest challenge will be raising the sum of money we need to purchase the property, but it's a simple equation: if we get enough money quickly enough to buy the property, you get your week(s).  All reserved weeks will be protected by written agreement.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!  You may not be able to claim the perk, but you may know somebody who can--and they may just bring you along as a thank-you for the great tip!

And that's all there is to it.  I can't wait to achieve something incredible with all of you and see the looks on your faces as you set foot on this incredible ranch.

VIDEO AND ALL IMAGES VIA http://www.kevinbobolskygroup.com/

story:
Banshee: The Pry Knife Project

We are Last Room Standing, LLC and this time, we are bringing you a project that we really like.  HD Tools brought us a design that we really wanted to have in our hands, so we offered to handle their campaign for them. The Designer of the Banshee is an Engineering Student that we know very well and helped us out with our last campaign (Axis Micro Project).

The Banshee is 3" long and has a blade about 1" long. Not only does the banshee have a very functional blade, it also features a pry bar on the top of the blade for light pry work.. It will be s30v steel that is hardened and tempered. The knife was designed to be pocket size and if you have your own method for making a sheath, the $90 perk is perfect for you! The $120 perk provides you with our leather sheath, that we lovingly named the Bansheath.

Our last campaign exposed us to the metal fabrication world and this campaign will help expose us to the knife production world. This U.S.A. made Pry Knife will fuse together our new founded interests and help us bring more exciting products to you. We have sourced all the parts of this production, so there won't be any wasted time between raising and producing. All we need now is your help to bring this product to life.

 

Perks

 

What We Need 

For this project we would need enough funding for Material, Machining Cost, and Shipping.  The material that we are looking to use is s30v Stainless Steel. Machining Cost come into play since we do not have our own CNC Mills.  We need to hire someone to mill this amazing product for us and hire someone else to do heat treating and sharpening. Shipping will be included in the overall price of the product for the Continental United States, International Shipping will be an extra $15.

*Please understand your local laws and regulations regarding knife ownership and carry, as we art not liable for knowing your local law.

 

What You Get

With your pledge to this project you will receive the following:

  • Card of Authenticity - Includes production number
  • Banshee
  • Bansheath (Not included in Standard Perk)

Your Impact

Your pledge will help bring down the cost of not only this product, but future projects to come.  A percentage of the profit will go back to the original designer at HD Tools.

 

Risks & Challenges

Some of the Challenges that we may face are:

Delayed production (due to third party milling and heat treatment)

We are a two man team which comes with the difficulty that a two man team may face.  If we end up with more orders than we foresee our original prediction may end up longer.

Realistically the only challenges that we might face will be time related.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can make a pledge.  We will appreciate if you share our page with friends that may be interested.  We know that there are groups out there that we might not know about, please get the word out about us! Visit us at https://www.facebook.com/groups/lastroomstanding & https://www.facebook.com/groups/961828720594597

story:
Jason Garcia is a former Amazon Delivery Driver and now a High School Teacher.

“Follow your dreams because I’ve been fortunate enough to see many of mine come true! Who said teachers can’t also be inventors right? The Smart Bench is a much-needed product for a booming industry and I am so grateful for your support! My door is always open so if you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact me.”

 

The Smart Bench Digital Keypad and App

 

The Smart Bench mobile app 

Not only is the Smart Bench a beautiful addition to your porch, but it comes with smart technology to secure and protect delivery packages from theft and damage or loss.

This Smart Bench allows delivery drivers to Easily Secure Packages with a One-time Access Code. Made of Beautiful the Smart Bench also adds Stylish Outdoor Seating to your front porch. We've even added some bells and whistles to this awesome Smart Bench.

  • The keypad provides 3,000 to 4,000 Locks/Unlocks before batteries need to be replaced.  That’s 8 to 10 Years Before Battery Replacement is Needed!
  • Key pad uses 4 AA 6V batteries
  • Activation time of less than 0.1 Seconds
  • Keypad material is Zinc Alloy Outside and Plastic Inside
  • Comes in Silver and Black
  • Operational temperature from -20°C to 70°C
  • Operational humidity from 10% to 95%

  • Made of Solid, Weather-Resistant Natural Wood
  • Smart Bench Receives Deliveries and Provides Beautiful Outdoor Seating
  • Provides Durable Long-Lasting Use
  • Sleek and Beautiful Design
  • Digital Pin Pad with Customized Access Key
  • Includes FOB
  • Smart Bench App, Unlock from Your Phone
  • Apps for iPhone and Android

 

 

 

 

Let the Smart Bench App Save the Day! The Smart Bench App works with your Smart Bench to allow delivery drivers to deliver your packages safely and securely, with just one tap. 

   

If you're trying to avoid package delivery theft with ugly lock boxes, clumsy pad locks, unstable blinder panels like shown above, there's a better way! Trying to hide your delivery packages just doesn't work! Delivery packages can still get stolen and you may be the next  victim! 

Nobody wants to come home to an unattractive entrance that does nothing to thwart delivery theft. Nobody wants to find their deliveries stolen, lost, or misplaced after being alerted their packages were delivered. Now you can have the beauty of an All-natural Wood Bench with the Security and Technology of the Smart Bench Digital Keypad and App.

 

Use the secure, easy-lock digital keypad of the Smart Bench to Securely Receive Your Packages! With a tap of the app or a swipe of the FOB Make Stolen Packages a thing of the Past.

 
  • Keeps deliveries hidden and secure from theft
  • Provides protection from inclement weather
  • Prevents damage done to packages by animals
  • Enhances the home with attractive seating and secure storage
  • Can be used for any delivery service

 

 

Every Smart Bench is Carefully Packaged for Protection during shipment. Delivery by Smart Bench is Guaranteed. Your package will arrive at your door in perfect condition.

 

     

    Smart Bench Bundle 1

    $349 (expected retail $599)
    *See Perk Item Details for more information about items.

    • 1 Smart Bench
    • 1 Insulated Bag
    • 1 Hoodie
    • 1 T-shirt
    • 1 Coffee Mug
    • 1 Drink Koozie
    • 1 Keychain
    • 1 Bottle Opener

     

    Smart Bench Bundle 2

    $399 (expected retail $699)
    *See Perk Item Details for more information about items.

    • 1 Smart Bench
    • 1 Seat Cushion
    • 1 Insulated Bag
    • 1 Hoodie
    • 1 T-shirt
    • 1 Bottle Opener
    • 1 Coffee Mug
    • 1 Drink Koozie
    • 1 Keychain

     

    Smart Bench Bundle 3

    $449 (expected retail $799)
    *See Perk Item Details for more information about items.

    • 1 Smart Bench
    • 1 Insulated Bag
    • 1 Seat Cushion
    • 2 Hoodies
    • 1 T-shirt
    • 1 Bottle Opener
    • 1 Drink Koozie
    • 1 Keychain
    • 1 Coffee Mug

     

    Details for Perk Bundle Items

    Insulated bag

    • Capacity - 16W x 14H x 6D Suitable For Larger Items Or Multiple Small Items
    • Durable - Refined Zipper And Reinforced 'No Tear' Handles
    • Practical - Perfect For Food Deliveries
    • Sturdy - Thick & Extra-Strength Thermal Materials
    • Design - Easy To Carry & Stow
    • Thick insulation throughout the thermal shopping bags hold contents at their original temperatures for longer
    • Shoppers will appreciate keeping food at the right temperature during the journey home
    • Delivery businesses can improve customer experiences by using these bags for transporting orders
    • Durable sidewalls ensure the insulated shopping grocery bags stay erect when loading and unloading
    • Easily rearrange contents without having to hold the bag open
    • Check goods you have in the bag at a glance
    • Wipe down or gently hand wash to keep bags free from harmful bacteria making them clean & odor-free
    • Transport or store food with confidence knowing that inside the versatile tote grocery bags provide a sanitary environment

    Gildan T-Shirt

    • 60% Combed Cotton, 40% Polyester
    • Imported
    • Pull-On closure
    • 4.3 oz.
    • Fabric laundered for reduced shrinkage
    • 1x1 baby rib-knit set-in collar

    Gildan Hoodie

    • 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
    • Pull-On closure
    • Double-needle stitching throughout
    • 1x1 ribbed cuffs and waistband with spandex
    • Double-lined hood
    • Compliant with ANSI - ISEA 107 Standards
    • Pill-resistant air jet yarn

    Coffee Mug

    • This 11-ounces coffee mug has high-definition printing that wraps around to both sides, perfect either for right or left-handed users.
    • Made with the best quality ceramic, this will last for many years.
    • Safe for the whole family, it can be put in the dishwasher
    • 100% safe for the microwave.
    • This ceramic is commercial grade.

    Drink Koozie

    • MULTIPURPOSE CAN COOLERS: These beer and soda can coolers are great for BBQs, outdoor parties or festivals, branding fundraisers or events, DIY projects, camping or fishing, enjoying beach picnics, and much more.
    • INSULATED DRINK PROTECTION: Crafted with a thick polyurethane foam these can coolers help retain hot or cold drink temperatures and prevent condensation to protect your hands when you’re enjoying your favorite beverage.
    • PORTABLE, DURABLE, AND COLLAPSIBLE: Ideal for home, outdoor, or travel use our beer can coolers boast reinforced seam stitching for a snug water bottle, can, or glass bottle fit. They also collapse to fit in a travel bag or party tote.

    Keychain

    • MATERIAL: made from soft and durable material, not fade, even can be used for a long time
    • FUNCTION: no worry about Losing your car keys and home keys, this wrist strap lanyard can easily attach your key rings and keychain buckle
    • GOOD GIFT: you can send this to your wife, sisters, mothers, daughter, friends, or any other relatives

    Magnetic Bottle Opener

    • A BOTTLE OPENER TO RULE THEM ALL - This wall-mounted bottle opener is more than your average bottle opener. Thanks to the magnet inside, you will no longer litter your caps across your porch! Just open the bottle and watch the cap snap right back to the opener!
    • PERFECT FOR OUTSIDE, PERFECT FOR INSIDE - This Bar-Style Bottle Opener has no problem being mounted on your Smart Bench, or your favorite outdoor spot. It not only features a stylish, rustic design but is also rustproof!
    • NEVER BUY ANOTHER BOTTLE OPENER AGAIN - Made of durable zinc alloy and designed with longevity in mind, this Wall Mounted Bottle Opener is absolutely unbreakable. Just install it on your Smart Bench and use it for life!
    • MOUNTING HARDWARE INCLUDED - You have no excuse not to mount your bar-style bottle opener on your smart Bench when you receive it. Just open the box and use the included matching hardware. Pop a beer, or open a soda and enjoy your favorite beverage on your new Smart Bench!

    Smart Bench Cushion

    • DURABLE PATIO CUSHION: Cushion measures 42"W x 18” D x 3”Thick
    • MONTLAKE FADESAFE FABRIC SYSTEM: Montlake FadeSafe solution dyed fabric is both stylish and engineered to resist fading
    • WATER-RESISTANT COATING AND BACKING: Resists stains and helps keep rain out and your cushion foam protected
    • DOUBLE-STITCHED CONSTRUCTION: Double-stitched seams ensure strength under stress while piping adds a sophisticated look. Bound interior seams are engineered to provide strength and durability at the most demanding joints. Box stitched construction is modern but classic, providing a lasting shape and durability that is superior to cushions with knife-edged and bull-nosed construction methods


    We support : 

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We have trusted manufacturing and supply partners and are confident with our production process and schedule for Smart Bench. However, we know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we have backup plans to help us overcome these. If anything happens that would impact our schedule, we promise to keep our backers informed of the steps we will take to resolve the issues. We won't let you down. That's our promise to you!

PORTABLE, DURABLE, AND COLLAPSIBLE: Ideal for home, outdoor, or travel use our beer can coolers boast reinforced seam stitching for a snug water bottle, can, or glass bottle fit. They also collapse to fit in a travel bag or party tote.

Keychain

MATERIAL: made from soft and durable material, not fade, even can be used for a long time
FUNCTION: no worry about Losing your car keys and home keys, this wrist strap lanyard can easily attach your key rings and keychain buckle
GOOD GIFT: you can send this to your wife, sisters, mothers, daughter, friends, or any other relatives

Magnetic Bottle Opener

A BOTTLE OPENER TO RULE THEM ALL - This wall-mounted bottle opener is more than your average bottle opener. Thanks to the magnet inside, you will no longer litter your caps across your porch! Just open the bottle and watch the cap snap right back to the opener!
PERFECT FOR OUTSIDE, PERFECT FOR INSIDE - This Bar-Style Bottle Opener has no problem being mounted on your Smart Bench, or your favorite outdoor spot. It not only features a stylish, rustic design but is also rustproof!
NEVER BUY ANOTHER BOTTLE OPENER AGAIN - Made of durable zinc alloy and designed with longevity in mind, this Wall Mounted Bottle Opener is absolutely unbreakable. Just install it on your Smart Bench and use it for life!
MOUNTING HARDWARE INCLUDED - You have no excuse not to mount your bar-style bottle opener on your smart Bench when you receive it. Just open the box and use the included matching hardware. Pop a beer, or open a soda and enjoy your favorite beverage on your new Smart Bench!

Smart Bench Cushion

DURABLE PATIO CUSHION: Cushion measures 42"W x 18” D x 3”Thick
MONTLAKE FADESAFE FABRIC SYSTEM: Montlake FadeSafe solution dyed fabric is both stylish and engineered to resist fading
WATER-RESISTANT COATING AND BACKING: Resists stains and helps keep rain out and your cushion foam protected
DOUBLE-STITCHED CONSTRUCTION: Double-stitched seams ensure strength under stress while piping adds a sophisticated look. Bound interior seams are engineered to provide strength and durability at the most demanding joints. Box stitched construction is modern but classic, providing a lasting shape and durability that is superior to cushions with knife-edged and bull-nosed construction methods





We support : 
 


Risks & Challenges
We have trusted manufacturing and supply partners and are confident with our production process and schedule for Smart Bench. However, we know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we have backup plans to help us overcome these. If anything happens that would impact our schedule, we promise to keep our backers informed of the steps we will take to resolve the issues. We won't let you down. That's our promise to you!

story:
Check out our past Campaign, we are back again on Indiegogo. Our featured Early Bird Perk will be shipped end of funding shown below. 

We know our backers want technology now.


What is the LDG Bulb?


The LDG Bulb represents a new paradigm in lighting that will completely revolutionize the way you think about light, for home, commercial and even industrial applications. LDG is an acronym for Laser Diffraction Grating. This new lighting technology uses laser light requiring less than 1 watt of power to create what we refer to as destination lighting. The light bulb spread is no longer confined to a small area like a campfire, the light reaches distant, hard to reach areas in a way that traditional lighting simply couldn't.


The LDG bulb is designed with a GU7 bayonet mount but what good is that if you want to experience 21st Century destination lighting straight out of the box. For our backers we will provide a standalone lamp which uses this blue technology as a reward. This lamp works on batteries also so you can take it outside.

Figure 1a

Figure 1b

The lamp comes with a plug in adapter but will also run on two/four AAA batteries.  Using inexpensive alkaline batteries (2 dollar store) you can achieve more than 10 hours of operation. Great use for this Swiss Gear tent below.  One benefit of the unique laser pattern is the elimination of shadows for privacy.  You can control lighting to avoid spill over to other campers. There is actually a 12 year old in the tent holding the blue laser lamp.


We have been using this technology in the field as a green product for our research, development and test. The night light actually has one special quality about it. It can penetrate smoke and help you navigate to exit.

90% of all fires are smoke filled room and rescue That night light just might save your life. Many people do not invest in fire safety infrastructure and so with the LDG and the Firefly night light concept you might just have more safety infrastructure seamlessly integrated into your life.


This Bulb itself will be offered as a limited reward in the form of one of our fully functional prototypes. 

The project is to fund the manufacturing infrastructure (mold and packaging and assembly jigs) for the LDG bulb for general availability in stores. With a GU7 mount you can easily start to use it with your track lighting or incorporate it into a Cafe, Media Room, Pub or Club.


Figure 1. Traditional "Point-Source" Lighting Model

Figure 1. The Diagram in Figure 1. shows the functionality and efficiency of traditional point-source lighting models. The light bulb pools the light's intensity just around its source where it is literally wasted, lighting the ceiling of the room. You can see how this model is very inefficient, using indirect illumination to light the intended part of the space.

Figure 2. LDG "Destination" Lighting Model

Figure 2. The Diagram in Figure 2. shows the functionality and efficiency of the brand-new LDG Bulb. The laser light provides direct illumination to the destination area of the room, wasting no light or energy on the ceiling. The observer would not even be aware of where the light source is located. The destination lighting model of the LDG Bulb has more control, efficiency and passiveness to boot.


Practical Example: Stairwell Lighting

Figure 3. The observer sees the light source at the brightest point, with light intensity reducing outward from the source. The light is less effective to illuminate lowest stairway. 

In this model, the photons are pooled at the source (the bulb or candle), with a stronger source being able to create a bigger pool of illumination based on feet. This model could be compared to painting a room by exploding a paint can. Most of the paint remains at the source – the location of the can.

Figure 4. The observer would not see the light at the source. The destination areas are lit with more brightness than the source. The Light reaches deep down the stairs.

In this model, the photons are thrown out from the source, with one lamp lighting hundreds of yards of space. In contrast to the exploding paint can example, this model would instead be a paintball gun spraying directed photons that splat against the destination for reflective lighting from that surface

Photo sample of the Destination Lighting effect

You can actually read the sign with the Destination Lighting. An excerpt of the full size picture.



Home Lighting

When used in a home theater the LDG Bulb does not effect viewing flat screen televisions. One aspect of a traditional movie theater is to recreate the ambient lighting atmosphere. The LDG provides a somber lighting environment and ability to outline walls and indicate corners without disturbing the movie atmosphere.


Commercial Lighting

The LDG Bulb is most suited to provide lighting where you need. Destination lighting has more control to throw the light where you need it. The LDG can light behind a working area such as a bar or an entrance way such as a washroom hallway.

Industrial Lighting

 When used in a crowded area such as piping, the LDG Bulb helps light behind pipes and eliminates shadows. It provides more details to reveal hidden objects or persons.

Lighting of piping and other hard to reach industrial spaces


Where will the Funding Go?

It is no secret that thinking outside the box takes a lot of time, trial and error and maybe even some lighting-in-a-bottle. Here at Parhelion we have carefully developed the state-of-the-art passively cooled laser technology that lives inside the LDG  Bulb. This Crowd-Funding project is to fund the manufacturing infrastructure (mold and packaging and assembly jigs) for the LDG bulb for general availability in stores. We truly appreciate your support of this project.

Manufacturing

Getting this technology manufactured will be the last stretch in bringing this project to the world. The LDG Bulb has gone through various phases of preparation to reach this point. 

  • Zoisite Blue Laser Module
  • Thermal and Power Circuitry
  • Conceptual Design 
  • Concept Finalization 
  • Prototyping 
  • Engineering 
  • Refinement Documentation for Fabrication


Risks and challenges

The LDG Bulb is a true marriage of art and technology, it's striking a balance between these two elements that has been a challenge we face everyday. Both sides come with their unique struggles and complications, but our team at Parhelion has learned to take challenges in our stride and use it to our advantage. Whether it be something as technical as manufacturing or something as organic as designing the smooth curves of the LDG's housing, it's truly all part of the process and never comes easy. We have learned a great deal during the development of our laser module and prototyping for the LDG housing, this has prepared us to deal with all obstacles that present themselves moving forward.

We are very confident we can fulfill early bird perks to our backers as we will be working towards this immediately. And for the later awards we have lessons learned from our previous crowd-funding project and have secured suppliers needed. As soon as we reach our goal, we will be ready to get the perks out as promised.

story:
1) Single Grain

As a successful digital marketing company, Single Grain knows how important it is to set the SEO and brand-building foundation with amazing content marketing. That’s why we make an omnichannel content strategy a huge priority.

Every customer has their platform of choice, whether it's getting their content from Twitter, Instagram influencers, Facebook groups, Quora, blogs, email newsletter roundups, podcasts… the list goes on.

Single Grain, and CEO Eric Siu, is all about omnipresence. Eric has a daily bite-size marketing podcast (co-hosted with Neil Patel) called Marketing School, as well as the weekly Leveling Up podcast and a YouTube channel. On the Leveling Up podcast, he interviews world-class entrepreneurs and on the YouTube channel, he gives tactical tips and strategies for fellow marketers, entrepreneurs and business owners:

story:
Short Summary

Manufacturing upcycled wooden indoor lamps made with the wood from the flameholder of Olympic Winter Games PyeongChang 2018! For the most special piece of world peace and sustainability on your cozy bedside!

Celebrating Winter Olympic Games PyeongChang 2018 hosted in South Korea and making an attempt for it to be the most sustainable Olympic ever, the very first upcycling brand in S.Korea, TOUCH4GOOD, finally opens a crowdfunding campaign on indiegogo.

Hurray!

 

  • TOUCH4GOOD, Who we are

    We are TOUCH4GOOD, a social enterprise pursuing better environment, - as well as the very first upcycling brand in South Korea established in 2008. Since then, we have been pursuing TOUCHING people’s mind and letting them think of environmental issues by TOUCHING waste and turning them into upcycled goods.

     

    A fe examples of what we have done …

1) Bags and pouches made with used placards and banners

2) Blankets made with self-developed fabric from used PET bottles

3) Crayons made of used/expired lipsticks

4) DIY catch-ball playing sets made with used tubes

5) Bags made with abandoned fire hoses

and the list goes on…

(TOUCH4GOOD on Arrirang TV, a Korea broadcast)
 

We try everything we can to  to decrease waste and boost up the life cycle of things for a better environment in the world.

 

  • Why We Are Here, 

We have a great event being held in Korea right now, the Olympic Winter Games, so as a S.Korean upcycle brand, we set a new goal, touching wastes from Olympic to decrease the amount of them.

Thus, we carefully researched on what going to be thrown away carefully the Olympic period, and the nice flameholder on top of the stadium jumped into our eyes. We found out that the parts made of iron are going to be reused after being disassembled, and then the parts made of wood is going to become trash. Think of it, a splendid flameholder that faces inevitable tragic fate, being thrown away!

(The image of the flameholder before the opening ceremony)

So we have decided to upcycle them to save them and let them revive. How? We can make this happen, indeed, with our know-how of ten years.

And for this time, we will willingly be a Prometheus for you.

 

LET YOU SHINE,

as everyone and this flame light shine

We believe that our job, upcycle things, is basically digging deep to look for things that have potential but  not found yet, discovering and bringing out the potential, and letting them shine.

Thus, we are in wholehearted agreement with the title of the theme song for this Olympic, ‘LET EVERYONE SHINE’.

 

  • Who and what is 'EVERYONE' for us?

As the phrase says, we really wish you, I, we and even the things continue to shine. We thought the most proper symbol for our wish is ‘Sacred Olympic Flame’.

(Picture from http://www.sportsnet.ca)

Believe or not, the sacred fire is referred never to be exhausted. The Scared Olympic Flame of PyeongChang will also not to be exhausted and rather be delivered to your place and continue to shine in your sweet home as a symbol of your shining life.

Standing for our wish for you and us, we put our all the best and cheer in this product we propose you below.

 

< The spirit of the Sacred Fire > in Your Home,

The flame from PyeongChang

You may have already figured out our intention, we prepared lamps. Nothing can be more suitable than lamps to embody the spirit of the flame. Right?

Here are three version of wooden table mood lamps with a classic bulb on them, symbolizing the Scared Olympic Flame from Olympia. We desire that our passion, our sportsmanship, and our spirit shines and goes on in your life, just like the Flame.

 

  • Design

1) The Pedestal

The designs are pretty simple yet modern.

We have three versions of pedestal. Two have shapes originated from the Korean alphabet, and the other one has high-slide shapeof the flameholder in PyeongChang.

 

option #1: < The spirit of Sacred Fire > on ㅍ

option #2: < The spirit of Sacred Fire > on ㅊ

option #3: < The spirit of Sacred Fire > on the top tier

 

[Option#1, 2: ㅍ & ㅊ]

The shape of the pedestal that looks like a rectangle and star each are from the Korean alphabet ㅍ and ㅊ, which makes the sound of P and Ch, the sounds from PyeongChang. (You might easily find out that these shapaes are also similar with the emblem of this Olympic.)

(FYI, here is the additional official video about the emblem)

We carved a hole to arrange electric wire neatly, put the switch in the middle of the cable so that you can easily switch on and off.

 

- Dimensions: option #1 : 130mm X 140mm X 29mm (approx 175mm include bulb)
                            option #2: 150mm X 1500mm X 29mm (approx 200mm include bulb)
- Bulb Spec : 220V, 60Hz, 40W

 

[Option#3:On the top tier]

The last one is unlike other options, modeled as the shape of the fireholder of PyeongChang with combined sheets of plywood. If you are a person who loves to endeavor, strive, achieve and be top-tier, you will love the attracts of this design.

 

(There is no slogan on the top-tier design in the picture above, but there will be engraved slogan at the curved side on the finished goods.)

- Dimensions: option #3 : 100mm X 200mm X 101.5mm (approx 121.5mm include bulb)
- Bulb Spec : 220V, 60Hz, 40W

 

2) The Phrase

On every pedestal, there is a phrase ‘LET _____ SHINE’.  You can interpret the blank in your own way. Put your own name, your beloved people and favorite things.

3) The Bulbs

We have chosen classic bulbs to express the movement of the flame through the shape of filaments. There are two types of bulbs, a sphere shape for ㅍ and a teardrop shape for ㅊ.

 

  • Material

    If we made these lamps with wood by cutting down more trees or have brought the wood from somewhere else, it would not be meaningful.

    However,

    we will REALLY make them with the wood of the flameholder that is NOW in PyeongChang. For the sake of sustainability and green growth. Remember, We are the first ‘upcycling’ brand in S.Korea.

    Yes, it is definitely the flameholder you have seen on the TV last Friday, 9th Feb, 2018.

 

(Yes, the scene right above!)
 

Risk & Challenges

  • We are qualified to make this happen

We are not the only people who is trying to make this Olympic & Paralympic sustainable. There are many people working in Olympic Organizing Committee, construction companies, Gangneung City government & the Korean government.

Despite the hustle, they are cooperating to make the Olympic eco-friendly & green. We have already had several meetings with the stakeholders mentioned above, and have shook hands on this project.

Thus, the feasibility of this project is very high, so no worries.

 

  • Caution : the nature of upcycled goods

Naturally, the upcycled goods​ have their own characteristic. The samples you have seen on this page were all made with not-upcycled material so that there is a possibility that the color of woods used on the final goods is not totally same with the pictures above. Also, the shape of the cross section can be a bit different.

However, we will try to make the final goods in high quality, by careful checking out the materials we use and putting on additional post-processing.

 

Timeline

Just a day after the end of the Paralympic, 19th, Mar., we are going to head to PyeongChang ourselves to pick up the wood and take it to our workspace to manufactue right away.

Since, we do not have enough warehouse space to conserve all the wood thrown away during the whole event, we will just take as much as we need for this project before the remaining wood is burnt.

 

It means that the more backers we have, the more wood we can save.

Join our journey to make a sustainable Olympic as well as let everything, everybody, everyone shine with this lamp !

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • There are some ways that you can be along with us as our ally, though you cannot join to this campaign right now! Please share this campaign to other people you know who might be interested in this project!
