We have chosen classic bulbs to express the movement of the flame through the shape of filaments. There are two types of bulbs, a sphere shape for ㅍ and a teardrop shape for ㅊ.
 

Material
If we made these lamps with wood by cutting down more trees or have brought the wood from somewhere else, it would not be meaningful.
However,
we will REALLY make them with the wood of the flameholder that is NOW in PyeongChang. For the sake of sustainability and green growth. Remember, We are the first ‘upcycling’ brand in S.Korea.
Yes, it is definitely the flameholder you have seen on the TV last Friday, 9th Feb, 2018.



 

(Yes, the scene right above!)
 
Risk & Challenges
We are qualified to make this happen
We are not the only people who is trying to make this Olympic & Paralympic sustainable. There are many people working in Olympic Organizing Committee, construction companies, Gangneung City government & the Korean government.
Despite the hustle, they are cooperating to make the Olympic eco-friendly & green. We have already had several meetings with the stakeholders mentioned above, and have shook hands on this project.
Thus, the feasibility of this project is very high, so no worries.
 
Caution : the nature of upcycled goods
Naturally, the upcycled goods​ have their own characteristic. The samples you have seen on this page were all made with not-upcycled material so that there is a possibility that the color of woods used on the final goods is not totally same with the pictures above. Also, the shape of the cross section can be a bit different.
However, we will try to make the final goods in high quality, by careful checking out the materials we use and putting on additional post-processing.

 
Timeline
Just a day after the end of the Paralympic, 19th, Mar., we are going to head to PyeongChang ourselves to pick up the wood and take it to our workspace to manufactue right away.
Since, we do not have enough warehouse space to conserve all the wood thrown away during the whole event, we will just take as much as we need for this project before the remaining wood is burnt.
 
It means that the more backers we have, the more wood we can save.
Join our journey to make a sustainable Olympic as well as let everything, everybody, everyone shine with this lamp !
 

Other Ways You Can Help
There are some ways that you can be along with us as our ally, though you cannot join to this campaign right now! Please share this campaign to other people you know who might be interested in this project!

story:
Pet Cam + Food Tosser all-in-one, Lovoom is the ultimate virtual pet sitter that will change the way you interact with your pet when you’re away. From your smartphone, control how, when  and where you toss food to your pets, making meal time more fun and keeping your dog active even when you’re not around.

 

 

 
 

Lovoom lets you control the distance and direction of your food launch, keeping your pet entertained for hours. Toss food from approximately 3 to 10 feet (1 to 3 meters) and rotate 180 +/- 90 degrees to keep you pet on its toes, never knowing where the next snack is coming from. This helps keep dogs on the lazier side from becoming couch potatoes.

 

 
Lovoom tosses food at a 60 degree angle. While that number might at first sound random, it’s anything but that. It was actually specifically chosen to mimic how humans actually toss, making it a more natural and enjoyable activity for your pet.

 

Lovoom works with dry, small pet food. There’s an adapter available for food that’s really tiny. By tossing just one piece at a time, you control the fun and ensure there is no mess. Plus, no one gets too spoiled or chubby.

 

Stuck in a meeting with no access to your smartphone? Your pets can still play happily while you’re busy and not looking at the Lovoom app. Set a schedule advance so that Lovoom launches food on a timer even when you can’t manually do it yourself.

 

 
Lovoom features full HD 720p* video, so you’ll see your pet nearly as clearly as you would if you were in the same room, up to 180 degrees, so you can truly see it all. You can record videos or take photos of adorable pet moments from your phone and store them on the cloud. Share with your friends or your social media followers so everyone can get a daily dose of your pet’s cuteness.
 

(*Please note that we have chosen HD 720p in order to provide you with a better camera view. Depending on the internet or Wi-Fi speed, HD 1080p may cause significant delays or lagging. Without much difference in video quality, HD 720p will swiftly transmit the video to your smartphone.)

 

Two-way audio enable you to hear what’s going on in your home while you’re away, keeping an ear out for barking or noises that might be upsetting to your pet. You can also speak to your pet from your phone, letting them know you’re watching over them and giving them praise along with their food.

 

Lovoom is flexible with how you can use it. It connects via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi (unlike most devices which only work with Wi-Fi). It’s also compatible with Android and iOS smartphones. Smartphones not your thing? Don't worry. Lovoom can also be operated via a remote control, which you can purchase separately.

 

Lovoom was designed with purpose by one of the best car designers in the field. It fits anywhere and looks like a small piece of luxury furniture rather than something designed for a pet.

 

 

The idea for Lovoom was born from our personal experience. We wanted a way to keep our pets company even when we’re not around. 

We tried other pet cameras and found them all lacking the level of interaction we wanted. So, we decided to just make the ideal device ourselves. 

Built by an electrical engineer, the first Lovoom prototype was a camera stuck to a Lego. Needless to say, we’ve come a long way since then. 

With Lovoom, we wanted to create a level of interaction you just don’t get with a product that simply drops treats or catches your pet being naughty on camera. With Lovoom, you control the play, keeping your pet engaged and active even when you have to be apart.  

 

 

 

Small, dry pet food works best for Lovoom. If your pet is extra small,

you can use an adaptor to accommodate even the tiniest bites.
 

Download the free Lovoom app for IOS or Android smartphones.

 

When Lovoom is on, a the light will let you know it’s ready to go. 

 

 

The team behind Lovoom is Hodu Inc. Hodu is the name our CEO's best friend and Lovoom was inspired by this friendly fellow.

We were established in 2017 in Korea. We’re a team of dedicated, hard working pet lovers.

 

 

A. Yes. If you want to use smaller pet food, 
Lovoom comes with an adaptor 
that can be switched out easily. 

A. You can download the free Lovoom app and 
control it through your Android or IOS device.
Or if smartphones aren’t your thing,
you can use the Lovoom IR remote control. 

A. Yes, you can. But you will need to cut it to
fit with Lovoom, that is normal dry pet food size
ranging from 5mm to 11mm. We would recommend
though not to offer treats often to your dogs for 
it may cause some health issues due to its strong
flavor that some dogs could lose their appetite
for normal pet food. 

A. Yes, Lovoom does help your dogs exercise
who have to stay indoor while you are out.
Lovoom tosses up to 170 pellets, rotating up to
 30 degrees to the left and to the right. The 
amount of exercise that your dogs will do 
catching these tossed pellets is equivalent to 
the recommended minimum daily exercise of 
walking a mile per day. 


A. Tossing one pellet at a time stimulates the 
prey drive that is in your dog, which makes him
 more focused and actively responsive with 
more interest. Your dog will jump and run after
 the pellet, enjoying catching and eating the 
food like a game.

A. No, it works only with normal-sized dry food
 from 5 to 11mm in diameter.


Lovoom offers full HD720P in order to minimize
 the buffering and lagging that could happen 
depending on the internet speed and the data
 volume. A full HD 720P requires 7.5mb per 
minute or 1 mbps per second. 

A. We provide 1-year warranty, which covers all 
defects in material and workmanship, exempt 
the following:

- Damage caused by accident, misuse, abuse, 
disassembly, unauthorized modification or neglect.
- Damage caused by liquid contact.
- Damage resulting from failure to follow instructions 
contained in the instruction manual.
- Damage resulting from the performance of
 repairs by someone not authorized by Lovoom.

A. Yes, Lovoom works with all mobile phones 
and tablets whose operating systems are 
android 4.2 and later / iOS8 and later.
 We do not offer interface for PCs and 
our team is working on the PC version of Lovoom App. 

 

LOVOOM PRESS KIT

Follow Lovoom at:

story:
Abuse Prevention and Education Centre is the leading non-profit organization in the Republic of Croatia for the development and provision of technical support to other organizations within and outside Croatia. It works on numerous projects to prevent violence and educate people, especially children and youth, on the topics needed to successfully manage life through personal development by acquiring knowledge, skills and abilities.

EduKamp is the largest academy of this kind for children and youth in the world and as such is open for participants from all over the world. It will be entirely made of natural materials (stone and wood) to be environmentally friendly and to keep children and youth safe in it.
The idea is conceived as an entertaining educational academy located in the very nature on 35,000 m2. It is a camp that provides additional education according with the students' age, motivates them for lifelong learning, teaches co-operation and numerous skills.
Students would stay in nature, learn about it and how to use its resources in an appropriate and responsible ways. Through various educational activities, students will gain life skills. The activities of the camp would include education on how to get along with nature, scouting, fishing, crafting of various items with hands using natural materials (wood, stone), small cooking academy, various art workshops, foreign language learning etc. All activities would be based on mutual co-operation between students and students and leaders of education.
The total cost of running the EduKamp project is USD 2,6 million, of which USD 2,3 million is intended for the construction of the camp. The rest of the money is provided to equip camp with the materials needed for education, carrying out various activities and additional costs.

 

THE IMPACT
Today children and youth spend very little time in nature and they are not familiar with it, nor do they coexist with it. They spend more and more time on mobile phones and computers and increasingly disconnect from the real world, which negatively affects their development and society as a whole. EduKamp provides children and youth the opportunity to develop life skills that are important to answer the demands and challenges of everyday life in acceptable ways with the preservation of mental and physical health.
Through the stay in nature and numerous educational activities, students will develop

  • ability to make decisions,
  • ability to solve problems,
  • divergent and critical thinking,
  • communication and social skills,
  • self-awareness,
  • empathy,
  • ability to recognize and express emotions,
  • ability to respond appropriately to specific situations,
  • ability to prevent violence,
  • verbal and nonverbal expression skills,
  • skills of working with own hands,
  • skills needed for orientation in nature.

 

They will gain knowledge about

  • natural laws,
  • flora and fauna,
  • the impact of humans on nature,
  • the importance of respecting nature,
  • sustainable development,
  • environmental issues,
  • coexistence of humans, plants and animals,
  • healthy eating,
  • planting and cultivation of plants.

EduKamp's activities are designed for children and youth in a fun way, with pedagogical and psychological grounds. Students will explore, discover, search for information, perform a series of tasks that will lead them to the final solution. In addition to numerous educational activities, EduKamp will provide students with activities such as reading stories by the campfire, solving mysterious stories, sports games, introducing traditional games of our ancestors, planting and cultivation fruits and vegetables, cooking, etc.
The full development of a person involves the development of the head (cognitive area - knowledge), heart (affective area - emotions, experiences) and hands (psychomotor area - skills and abilities). If we want full individuals who will successfully work in the personal life and life of society, we need to work in all three areas. This is what provides EduKamp.
Acquiring pure factual knowledge is not enough to realize all the potential of a person. It is necessary to know how to apply that knowledge.
What I hear, I forget. What I see, I remember, What I do, I understand. - Confucius

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES
The challenges we might encounter are material. We need funding that will cover the costs of realizing this camp. Since the Center for Education and Violence Prevention in its twelve-year work, successfully collaborated with many schools, organizations, ministries and have their support in the implementation of its projects, additional risks and challenges are not expected.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
The greatest help in realizing this project would be financing. However, people, organizations and companies can also help in other ways, such provision of consumables for conducting educations and workshops, printing brochures, educational books, picture books, production of promotional material, etc. Any help is more than welcome.

story:
Inspired by Professor Masahiro Chatani, the originator of this origamic architecure art, I employed the use of stark white paper & acrylic as the main identity of KIRUMA, which to borrow Professor Chatani's words, emphasizes the shadowing effects of the cuts and folds under natural lighting environment to create a “dreamy scene” that invites the viewer into a “fantasy world."

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

* Now also available in BLACK!

 

SHIPPING

All KIRUMA rewards will be shipped internationally via registered article with tracking number. Estimated shipping time differs for every country, but roughly it should take 2-4 weeks time.

Since every country has its own regulation when it comes to importing taxes, any kind of tax/duty is backers' responsibility. Please check with your local custom offices to avoid any potential confusion regarding this matter.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

A significant part of the production processes is going to be handled in-house, by myself with some help under my direct supervision. So, there is no need for any overseas manufacturing involved since everything can be done locally, which should simplify the whole production process and keeping things more predictable.

With more than 3 years of experience in delivering laser craft products, I have already anticipated potential issues that might come, and have multiple alternative solutions ready at hand should there comes any unforeseen circumstance. At this point, the only thing uncertain is timing, due to the partly handmade nature of the product, there might be a slight delay for some late backers.

story:
HiveyPie is Wi-Fi enabled power strip that allows control of connected devices from a mobile application through a secure connection.  

Operate your HiveyPie and all the devices you connect to it from anywhere in the world with the HiveyPie mobile app for Android and iOS and with Alexa Voice commands. Use your HiveyPie as a SmartHub to control Philips and Belkin devices through your Wi-Fi Connection.

HiveyPie gives Power of IOT to the legacy devices plugged into HiveyPie, remote monitoring and control, remote firmware updates.

Reduce your idle power consumption with HiveyPie's intelligent power management and save money in power costs.  

Secure your attached devices through HiveyPie's integrated TLS 1.2 security encryption and the rules-driven access features of the HiveyPie mobile app. HiveyPIE is powered by PAASMER IoT Platform.

Users can control HiveyPie power sockets using Voice commands given to Amazon Echo by adding HiveyPie skills in the Amazon Alexa Mobile application.

Users can setup HiveyPie seamlessly to work with Home Wi-Fi and to Amazon Echo and use both HiveyPie mobile application and voice commands for sockets controls.

Users can turn on/off sockets from anywhere in an office or in car using their Internet connection.

Users can use HiveyPie mobile app and HiveyPie as SmartHub and control all the features of devices like Philips Hue, Cree or Belkin WeMo without the need to use individual mobile application.  

Users can power on/off the sockets individually or collectively and make their existing legacy devices smart to turn on/off.

HiveyPie automatically detects idle power or power wastage based on preset thresholds and alerts the user for appropriate action to reduce wastage. HiveyPie mobile application also shows power prediction for the week/month based on the power consumption trend. 

HiveyPie mobile application loads a bunch of security features that allows application & device access to others based on user roles defined by the home owner. 

All communications between HiveyPie and the HiveyPie mobile application are encrypted with TLS 1.2 Encryption to ensure highest level security to users.

HiveyPie's Smart Hub feature ensures that the HiveyPie mobile app acts as single point of control without the need for any other individual applications.  

HiveyPie users can discover smart devices from Philips or Belkin using its built in Wi-Fi communication. The HiveyPie can change the color, intensity, and the hue of Philips wireless bulbs, giving users the ability to change their ambiance!

Turning devices on and off using the HiveyPie mobile app is easy and can be done from anywhere. Another great feature is that users have the control to power devices on or off while they are connected to the HiveyPie . HiveyPie mobile app has scheduling feature which allows to pre-configure when the devices should turn on/off.

HiveyPie the smart power strip that allows you to connect 4 devices at a time and transform them into a smart device allowing for control from anywhere.

Place it in your living room and control the lights, tv and other devices in your living room from anywhere.

Perfect fit for a kitchen counter top where you can connect your coffee maker, mixer. Use Scheduling feature and set when your coffee should be ready before you wake up or return from office.

If you do not want your kids to turn on TV without your knowledge set the access control on your app and control who can turn on/ off the devices.

Use it in your home office and shut down the power to the chargers when not in use.

If you have left your home without turning off a device get the message on your mobile and turn it off from anywhere without any hassles.

A value for money for a small office setup where you have you can connect device like printer, fax machine or servers and control turning off the device from home. Use pre-set timer to turn off the device during weekend. Get the power consumption report of the device consuming more power on your mobile and optimize it for power saving.

Right fit for a bar/restaurant where many electrical appliances are connected to HiveyPie and can be turned on/off remotely at the same time get the energy wastage report on your app.

 HiveyPie is designed with highest security for consumers in our mind. We want to ensure that consumers have the highest peace of mind to securely use their connected devices.

The HiveyPie has the ability to securely Discover, Connect and Control other smart devices in the near field (Wi-Fi).

With HiveyPie 's SmartHub feature, you no longer need multiple apps to control your devices. Your HiveyPie mobile app acts as a single point of control without the need to install and use individual applications from Philips, Belkin and others.

  • Discover other smart devices from Philips and Belkin via Wi-Fi.
  • Turn on/off these devices directly, or schedule on/off times using the HiveyPie mobile app.
  • Control the color changes/intensity of Philips bulbs, all through the same app.

The HiveyPie mobile application is available for Android and iOS.

HiveyPie can detect idle power consumption and can send notification of power wastage to mobile app alerting users to turn off devices which are not in use.

Users can control HiveyPie power sockets using Voice commands given to Amazon Echo by adding HiveyPie skills in the Amazon Alexa Mobile application.

Users can setup HiveyPie seamlessly to work with Home Wi-Fi and to Amazon Echo and use both HiveyPie mobile application and voice commands for sockets controls.

Users can turn on/off sockets from anywhere in an office or in car using their Internet connection.


Users can use HiveyPie mobile app and HiveyPie as SmartHub and control all the features of devices like Philips Hue, Cree or Belkin WeMo without the need to use individual mobile application.  


Users can power on/off the sockets individually or collectively and make their existing legacy devices smart to turn on/off.


HiveyPie automatically detects idle power or power wastage based on preset thresholds and alerts the user for appropriate action to reduce wastage. HiveyPie mobile application also shows power prediction for the week/month based on the power consumption trend. 


HiveyPie mobile application loads a bunch of security features that allows application & device access to others based on user roles defined by the home owner. 


All communications between HiveyPie and the HiveyPie mobile application are encrypted with TLS 1.2 Encryption to ensure highest level security to users.
HiveyPie's Smart Hub feature ensures that the HiveyPie mobile app acts as single point of control without the need for any other individual applications.  HiveyPie users can discover smart devices from Philips or Belkin using its built in Wi-Fi communication. The HiveyPie can change the color, intensity, and the hue of Philips wireless bulbs, giving users the ability to change their ambiance!Turning devices on and off using the HiveyPie mobile app is easy and can be done from anywhere. Another great feature is that users have the control to power devices on or off while they are connected to the HiveyPie . HiveyPie mobile app has scheduling feature which allows to pre-configure when the devices should turn on/off.HiveyPie the smart power strip that allows you to connect 4 devices at a time and transform them into a smart device allowing for control from anywhere.Place it in your living room and control the lights, tv and other devices in your living room from anywhere.Perfect fit for a kitchen counter top where you can connect your coffee maker, mixer. Use Scheduling feature and set when your coffee should be ready before you wake up or return from office.If you do not want your kids to turn on TV without your knowledge set the access control on your app and control who can turn on/ off the devices.Use it in your home office and shut down the power to the chargers when not in use.If you have left your home without turning off a device get the message on your mobile and turn it off from anywhere without any hassles.A value for money for a small office setup where you have you can connect device like printer, fax machine or servers and control turning off the device from home. Use pre-set timer to turn off the device during weekend. Get the power consumption report of the device consuming more power on your mobile and optimize it for power saving.Right fit for a bar/restaurant where many electrical appliances are connected to HiveyPie and can be turned on/off remotely at the same time get the energy wastage report on your app. HiveyPie is designed with highest security for consumers in our mind. We want to ensure that consumers have the highest peace of mind to securely use their connected devices.The HiveyPie has the ability to securely Discover, Connect and Control other smart devices in the near field (Wi-Fi).With HiveyPie 's SmartHub feature, you no longer need multiple apps to control your devices. Your HiveyPie mobile app acts as a single point of control without the need to install and use individual applications from Philips, Belkin and others.
Discover other smart devices from Philips and Belkin via Wi-Fi.
Turn on/off these devices directly, or schedule on/off times using the HiveyPie mobile app.
Control the color changes/intensity of Philips bulbs, all through the same app.
The HiveyPie mobile application is available for Android and iOS.HiveyPie can detect idle power consumption and can send notification of power wastage to mobile app alerting users to turn off devices which are not in use.

story:
If you had your own moon, what would it look like?

Lunevis is a premium-quality floating moon lamp.

It is more than just a lamp. It is designed to make your own space even more special.

You will be able to see a real-like moon right in front of your eyes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

"we choose to go to the moon"  J,F Kennedy
 

 

 

The moon, which is the only natural satellite of our planet Earth, has shined upon us and lighted the night sky for thousands of years. It has been watching over us as our civilization endured, achieved, and evolved for an inconceivable time-span.
The moon, while we have reached and landed on its surface, we merely understand its existence.  
The moon, reachable yet inexplicable, we can only look up to the night sky and appreciate its mysteriousness and beauty.
But with our invention, you can now have our own moon.
Float and feel the moon that you have imagined in your childhood.
Fulfill your imagination and fill your room with the moonlight.
This is how the civilization of 21st century utilizes the moonlight

 

 


 

The moon is originally a celestial object that
floats in the night sky and travels throughout space.
Let your moon be free, just like The moon in space.
Your own moon should be on the air.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Detailed Surface and Painting

Lunevis is printed by a 3D printer using highly accurate 3D modeling which is provided by NASA's moon exploration satellite "LRO". 
It features every precise detail of the moon's surface by displaying
not only the shadows, but the craters as well. 
So it will serve as a tasteful lamp at night and as a splendid interior accessory during daytime.

 

Premium Quality Wooden Base
The base is made of solid wood and specially designed metal dials for a classic and stylish design.
Magnetic levitation technology and wireless power transmission and communication technology allows you to dial to control the brightness and color of the moonlight.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Connect the adapter to the wooden base and plug it into the outlet.

2. Place the wooden base and moon light to a flat surface.

3. Hold the moon light carefully with your two hands.

4. Put the moon light vertically to the center of the base slowly.

5. Let the moon light go when you feel magnet connected correctly.

6. Turn the dial on the right side to turn on the light.

Please do not hold the moon light too tight.
If you fail to float the moon light too many times, please try it again later. So that the magnet module could get cool.

 

 

 

 

 

 

- Complete Restoration of The Whole Moon

- Changeable Brightness and Colors (White & Yellow)

- Proven Levitation System

- Moon Light Material: PLA

- Wooden Base Finish:

   Solid - Walnut / Oak / Walnut & Oak / Oak & Walnut

- Power: 15V Power Adapter with World-Wide Kit

- Lifetime: 25,000hours (About 17 years based on 6 hours a day)

 

 

 

We have organized the production planning with the verified suppliers and manufacturers, and have improved the way to mass production by means of several times of prototyping.

However, the plan can be delayed by unexpected issues,
especially by the issue caused by 3D printing, an electronic authentication process, packing, and delivery. But please kindly understand that the delay may be caused in order to deliver a more stable and safe product to our customers.

We have prepared this project for a long time, and we are convinced that we can overcome the possible unexpected problems as soon as possible to successfully manufacture the product and deliver the beautiful moonlight to your bedroom.

story:
Also for about the price of a normal crate, you can get a years worth of InfaCrates. You can expect to see 2-6 items in every crate, and the number of these items can go up to 12 (Seriously, our genius monkeys told us this).

This is why we brought InfaCrates to life.

With the ability to vote and the amount of items in each crate, we are sure that there will be at least a few items that will make you happy. InfaCrates is suitable for everyone no matter if they are a boy, girl, geek, tech savvy, an alien, or anything. During some months we will even ask you for your favorite character in this movie, or your favorite color, or something that we are able to add to the crate to make your InfaCrate unique.

Each month will include the awesome and cool prizes that you have ordered. You will also receive a QR code which you can view our online newsletter (Trying to stay green). On the crate you will also see who is the person who packed your crate and they will have there sign, which makes your crate unique and surprising. Can you collect them all? We will be sure to add 2-6 items per each crate. Each crate can consist of games, puzzles, exclusive items, gaming accessories, stickers, and more. We will be sure to make you happy when you get it. Due to surveys, we are also planning on letting you reuse the envelope to send funds if you would like and the funds will go to a charity that you will be aware of.

If we greatly exceed our goal, we will try to purchase a office or warehouse depending on the order quantity. We will also not use any funds on advertisements, however, we do have thought out plans on ways to advertise and earn customers. We will also be using the money to purchase bulk items namely, the crates itself, and creating a mobile application as well as a website. Lastly, we will be using the money to try to make the price of the crate lower in the future.

When deciding what to add in the crate, we want to interact with the community while not ruining the surprise. We may also ask you for a gender, favorite color, or favorite character from a movie to make the crate experience better for you. On the crate, the person that packages it will sign their name so each box will be unique. Got to collect them all! There will always be giveaways to win items just simple tasks such as posting a youtube video or saying hi. More secrets and surprises will be happening, however that will all be announced on a later date.

I believe this is the most important part of everything. I just want to say Thank You! Yes you, the person reading this, for even having a bit of interest in this project! Also, thank you Thomas. Thank you <3!
story_txt: Over time, we realized that crates are usually based on the decision of the creator, not the customer. While still keeping the surprise in the crates, we also allow customers to vote and be given a hint for what they want. We want to treat InfaCrates as a human. It takes money to be born, and overtime we spend more money for it to grow, and it will never stop growing. We want each month to have a new addition and a surprise that not only the customer can enjoy but it can be a awesome thing for both the customer’s friends and family.Also for about the price of a normal crate, you can get a years worth of InfaCrates. You can expect to see 2-6 items in every crate, and the number of these items can go up to 12 (Seriously, our genius monkeys told us this).This is why we brought InfaCrates to life.With the ability to vote and the amount of items in each crate, we are sure that there will be at least a few items that will make you happy. We will also not use any funds on advertisements, however, we do have thought out plans on ways to advertise and earn customers. We will also be using the money to purchase bulk items namely, the crates itself, and creating a mobile application as well as a website. Lastly, we will be using the money to try to make the price of the crate lower in the future.When deciding what to add in the crate, we want to interact with the community while not ruining the surprise. We may also ask you for a gender, favorite color, or favorite character from a movie to make the crate experience better for you. On the crate, the person that packages it will sign their name so each box will be unique. Got to collect them all! There will always be giveaways to win items just simple tasks such as posting a youtube video or saying hi. More secrets and surprises will be happening, however that will all be announced on a later date.I believe this is the most important part of everything. I just want to say Thank You! Yes you, the person reading this, for even having a bit of interest in this project! Also, thank you Thomas. Thank you <3!FAQIs it actually a crate?For only $2.50, we can't really afford to actually make it a crate, however it will be in a envelope which we are still able to fit stuff inside.Will I like the stuff?That's the problem with most crates, some people pay $25 and find out they don't like the stuff. If you don't like the stuff here, you can request a cancellation and we won't continue with the service. In the end, you only lose $2.50, and there has to be at least one thing you liked!Umm wait... Free Shipping?Yes, Free Shipping!You sure about that Free Shipping part?Positive!Any other questions that are asked will be listed here!

story:
Thank you for your great support and amazing feedback. We learned a lot. Now we will review all input and implement some of your great ideas.


We will be back soon with an optimized and better DasEgg! ;-)




In an increasingly fast world DasEgg is a way to escape the stress of everyday life and enjoy a piece of nature in the comfort of your home.

We are passionate about plants, design and technology. Together, we had a great idea and created a beautifully designed high tech indoor greenhouse to breed and grow plants. 

 Have a look at DasEgg and enjoy!


What is inside of DasEgg ?

We asked ourselves what needs to be included in DasEgg to take best care of your plants fully automatically? A fusion of German Engineering, High Design Standards and a "No Compromise" mindset. 
Every DasEgg includes:

  • A design housing in highest quality 
  • LED plant light with timer and adjustable light spectrum (pretty cool stuff)
  • Smartphone interface 
  • Humidity sensor
  • Water Tank with plenty of water for your plants 
  • Water sensor to provide the right amount of water
  • Temperature sensor
  • Airflow System with integrated fan
  • M5 Pollen filter for allergy sufferers
  • Carbon filter for clean air
  • HD Camera to check on your plants remotely
And we wanted the ordering process to be as simple as possible. Therefore the costs for global shipping are included in the price of each perk.

Technical specs of DasEgg:

  • Height: 32 in. (80 cm ) 
  • Width: 24 in. (60 cm)
  • Maximum Plant size: 28 in. (70 cm)
  • Material of DasEgg: Highest quality, food safe plastic
  • Power: 110-240 Volts AC - EU, UK or US plugs are included
  • Power Consumption: 35 W


DasEgg will be available with transparent and solid white front doors. We will ask for your preference before shipping your personal DasEgg to you.


DasEgg makes your live better

DasEgg provides people with the freedom to grow everything wherever they live.

Many of us live in flats and have no garden anymore. A lot of houses do not even have balconies. Often there is also no time to look after plants regularly. 

But most of us love nature and would like to grow their own plants, be it veg like tomatoes or chillies, special herbs for the kitchen or for your wellbeing, or a beautiful plant that means a lot to you because it reminds you of something or somebody. 


DasEgg offers many other advantages: If you have a plant that is prickly or contains substances that are dangerous for children or animals, you can use DasEgg to make sure, that they cannot get in touch with the plant. 

If you go on a holiday, this special greenhouse can help you to look after the plant without having to ask somebody to water it. And of course, you can use DasEgg also for multiplying your plant by making cuttings or growing your plants from seeds.


We need you as contributor 

To make our dream of this design greenhouse come true and to make DasEgg available for you and others, we need your help. 

Mainly for these 3 main areas we need your financial support:

  • To produce DasEgg we need to invest into moulding forms for plastic manufacturing - which is by far the largest investment of our project. 
  • To build our special LED Panel. You can set the timer and light spectrum individually for the requirements of your plants for its growing and flowering phase. 
  • To finalize our Control Unit which is the heart of DasEgg. Everything from Light, Temperature, and Humidity to the right amount of Water is controlled by this unit.

On top there are some further investments necessary like for Software Interfaces, Certifications, Packaging and Logistics. We calculated all costs very carefully and once we reach our funding goal of 180,000 USD than we can produce and deliver DasEgg.

We already invested a lot of our own money and with your help we can finally produce DasEgg for you! 



Risks & Challenges

We don´t believe in market studies or the latest megatrends. But we do believe that DasEgg is a great product, which deserves to be made in a professional way.

We are a small team of enthusiastic plant and technology lovers. And we all have been working in various projects before, but this greenhouse is something completely new. Together we discussed, tried, discarded, learned and developed. Nevertheless, despite being experts in different fields we met a lot of challenges on the way and definitely there will be more. 

If this campaign fails we cannot afford to make the necessary investments to finish the product for you. It would be very sad if DasEgg cannot be delivered to make you and your plants happy!

We are sure that DasEgg will be a great device and we are 100% committed to deliver on our promises. 


Other ways to support us

You like our idea but cannot support the project financially? 

There are many other ways how you can help us. 

  • Please send us your feedback of what you think of DasEgg - Especially what you don´t like and what you like: Hello@dasegg.com
  • And please mention DasEgg on Facebook, Twitter or other Social Media, you can tell your friends about it. 
  • Stay in touch with us via Indiegogo and see, what happens during the next weeks
Thank you for supporting us! Let´s get DasEgg into as many homes as possible!

deliver on our promises. 


   Other ways to support us
You
like our idea but cannot support the project financially? 
There are many other ways how you can help us. 


Please send us your feedback of what you think of DasEgg - Especially what you don´t like and what you
like: Hello@dasegg.com


And please
mention DasEgg on Facebook, Twitter or other Social Media, you can tell your
friends about it. 

Stay in touch with us via Indiegogo and see, what happens during the next weeks


Thank
you for supporting us! Let´s get DasEgg into as many homes as possible!

story:
Short Summary

Imagine that you have your car parked outdoors and it's a rainy day, so you take your umbrella out and go from point A (your house for example) to point B (your car) or vice versa. So after you've walked to your car you face the apparently simple task of getting inside the car, but if you are trying to avoid getting wet and keep water away from your car's interior it's not as easy as it sounds. You have to close the umbrella just the right way, quickly enough so that you don't slam it with the door (not to mention your hand or foot). Even if you avoid all these you still have a very wet umbrella inside your car, which will soak your seats, clothes or papers in your door holder.

It is also a problem while trying to get out of the car in a rainy day, as you try to open your umbrella in a hurry, through the tiny opening you left as to not let any water inside the car and then rapidly shut it closed.

The Solution

What we offer is an easy do it yourself (DIY) installation product that solves this problem.

We are able to incorporate a tent-like umbrella inside the doorframe of your car. So when you open the door a special fabric (attached from one end to the frame and from the other to the inside of the door) unrolls itself from the topside of the doorframe creating a rain shield. This allows the driver or passenger to get in their seats without hassling about rainwater. You can calmly sit or stand beneath the rain guard, set your belongings inside, shake the excess water off the umbrella and close it, get in your seat and finally close the door. The Rain Smart will store itself inside the car's doorframe seamlessly.

The Rain Smart will follow the shape of the doorframe (pilot and copilot) so that the water collected slides towards the front of the door and on to the ground. It consists of a self-winding cylinder (using various spring rollers) that will roll and unroll the fabric as the door opens and closes. We will use a proprietary fabric that is lightweight, thin, flexible, waterproof, non-absorbent, resistant against the elements, resistant to corrosive chemicals, resistant to abrasion, has a low friction coefficient and has an ability to conduct heat. The device would be attached to the car's frame and door by replacing the factory rubber seal (OEM).

What We Need & What You Get

How we'll put the money to use:

We need $75,000:

  • $22,000 for R&D
  • $15,000 legal (patents, contracts, etc)
  • $18,000 cost of labor
  • $10,000 materials
  • $10,000 marketing 
  • This is a fixed campaign so if the goal is not reached the money will be returned to the contributors.
You get:
  • $10 thank you note
  • $29 Rain Smart T-Shirt


  • $39 Rain Smart Rain Coat

  • $49 Rain Smart Rain Coat Pro

  • $59 Rain Smart Branded Umbrella


  • $79 Rain Smart Umbrella Combo ( T-Shirt + Umbrella)
  • $89 Rain Smart branded umbrella + rain coat
  • $99 Rain Smart Pilot
  • $159 Rain Smart Pilot + Shotgun (Co-Pilot)


The Impact

We are providing the world with a sophisticated life hack. Rain Smart is a clever but simple solution to a problem that we're sure most (if not all) car drivers have encountered several times. It may not be a lifesaver but it sure saves a lot of headaches.

  • Never again go through the hassle and discomfort that is getting into your car in a hurry caused by rain.
  • Avoid humidity in your car.
  • Don't mess up your clothes nor your hair in the rain.

Risks & Challenges

The primary challenge is to design our mechanism in a way that it is as compact as possible and well functioning regardless of spacial constraints. Another issue is to be able to manufacture accessories that fit cars individually, to create a universal fitment or at least reduce options to a few specific sizes.

  • We are a capable group of young entrepreneurs with track record in design, consumer behavior, business strategy and retail.
  • Research and Development (R&D) is our top priority and the core of our business, this is where most of the money will be allocated in order to anticipate any shortcomings that we may encounter.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project there are many ways you can help us make our product a reality and a recognized marquee.  

  • CONTRIBUTE!!
  • Get the word out!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share the love with friends, family, your entire community! 

And that's all there is to it.

if you avoid all these you still have a very wet umbrella inside your car,
which will soak your seats, clothes or papers in your door holder. 
It is also a problem
while trying to get out of the car in a rainy day, as you try to open your
umbrella in a hurry, through the tiny opening you left as to not let any water
inside the car and then rapidly shut it closed.

The Solution
What we offer is an easy do it yourself (DIY) installation product that solves this problem.

We are able to incorporate a
tent-like umbrella inside the doorframe of your car. So when you open the
door a special fabric (attached from one end to the frame and from the other to
the inside of the door) unrolls itself from the topside of the doorframe
creating a rain shield. This allows the driver or passenger to get in their
seats without hassling about rainwater. You can calmly sit or stand beneath the
rain guard, set your belongings inside, shake the excess water off the umbrella
and close it, get in your seat and finally close the door. The Rain Smart will
store itself inside the car's doorframe seamlessly.


The Rain Smart will
follow the shape of the doorframe (pilot and copilot) so that the water
collected slides towards the front of the door and on to the ground. It
consists of a self-winding cylinder (using various spring rollers) that will roll and
unroll the fabric as the door opens and closes. We will use a proprietary fabric that is lightweight, thin, flexible, waterproof, non-absorbent, resistant against the
elements, resistant to corrosive chemicals, resistant to abrasion, has a low
friction coefficient and has an ability to conduct heat. The device would be attached
to the car's frame and door by replacing the factory rubber seal (OEM).


   What We Need & What You Get How we'll put the money to use:
We need $75,000:

$22,000 for R&D
$15,000 legal (patents, contracts, etc)
$18,000 cost of labor
$10,000 materials
$10,000 marketing  This is a fixed campaign so if the goal is not reached the money will be returned to the contributors. 
You get:


$10 thank you note
$29 Rain Smart T-Shirt







$39 Rain Smart Rain Coat



$49 Rain Smart Rain Coat Pro



$59 Rain Smart Branded Umbrella






$79 Rain Smart Umbrella Combo ( T-Shirt + Umbrella)
$89 Rain Smart branded umbrella + rain coat

$99 Rain Smart Pilot
$159 Rain Smart Pilot + Shotgun (Co-Pilot)






   The Impact We are providing the world with a sophisticated life hack. Rain Smart is a clever but simple solution to a problem that we're sure most (if not all) car drivers have encountered several times. It may not be a lifesaver but it sure saves a lot of headaches.  Never again go through the hassle and discomfort that is getting into your car in a hurry caused by rain. Avoid humidity in your car. Don't mess up your clothes nor your hair in the rain.    Risks & Challenges  The primary challenge is to design our mechanism in a way that it is as compact as possible and well functioning regardless of spacial constraints. Another issue is to be able to manufacture accessories that fit cars individually, to create a universal fitment or at least reduce options to a few specific sizes.  We are a capable group of young entrepreneurs with track record in design, consumer behavior, business strategy and retail. Research and Development (R&D) is our top priority and the core of our business, this is where most of the money will be allocated in order to anticipate any shortcomings that we may encounter.    Other Ways You Can Help If you like our project there are many ways you can help us make our product a reality and a recognized marquee.    CONTRIBUTE!!
Get the word out! Use the Indiegogo share tools!
Share the love with friends, family, your entire community! 
   And that's all there is to it.

story:
More Info and FAQs

 

Timeline

August 2016 - Our 'light bulb' moment happens and prototyping begins.

Nov 2016 - The prototype was finalized and working so it was good to go for filming.

Jan 2017 - Launch our Indiegogo campaign and answer all your questions. Try and make the product even better from your feedback.

Mar 2017 - Buy all the components and setup the local micro manufacturing site in Seattle. Then build, build, build!

Oct 2017 - We’re shipping as we go according to geography. We will ship the last Sunlight in October. So expect yours early.


 

Tech Specs

Here's the tech specs. For sizes and dimensions see the perks.
• 2200K - 4000K color temperature range
• 900MHz transmitter and receiver 
• Output - 1500 lumens Sunlight LED Window and 750 lumens for the Mini
• Average usage calculated at 12 hours per day at 10w/5w average
• Window Sensor uses lithium battery with solar and USB charging

Lastly... We aren’t comfortable unless you are comfortable, so we tortured our engineer through mudslides and heavy rains to get Sunlight through the Arrow Certification program.  This means Sunlight has been given the coveted support and approval of the design and production experts at Arrow Electronics.

 

Budgeting

We have costed all components and labour and have a little left over just in case. When we move to direct retail sales we’ll raise the MSRP and aim for profit. But for now we’re keeping it as cheap as we can as a way of saying we appreciate your support helping us get Sunlight off the ground.

Components - 45%
Software and hardware development - 15%
Labour and admin - 25%
Plus contingency - 15%

TOTAL - 100%

 

SAD (Seasonal Affective Disorder)

Here’s some more info and helpful links on this debilitating illness that more people suffer from than any of us realize. You or someone you know probably suffers to some degree. Increased light exposure has been proven to increase productivity for people. Like feelings and mood, productivity means energy, vitality and light.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seasonal_affective_disorder
http://www.webmd.com/mental-health/tc/seasonal-affective-disorder-sad-topic-overview
https://www.psycom.net/depression.central.seasonal.html
https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/two-takes-depression/201110/seasonal-affective-disorder-trends-and-tips

 

After embarking on the Sunlight LED Window project we found this book.
Beating Seattle’s Grey by Heather McAuliffe
https://www.amazon.com/Beating-Seattles-Grey-Living-Twilight/dp/1518693830

It provided inspiration and understanding about how much of a problem SAD is.
Thanks Heather - We think you’re awesome!!!


Beating Seattle’s Grey

Excerpts from Beating Seattle’s Grey by Heather McAuliffe we found inspiring!! (Note: some paraphrasing included to help with context)

“Long periods of clouds and rain are typically blamed for contributing to people feeling depressed and less able to function, to feel motivated and to experience joy and ease every day.”

“Most of us are living a primarily indoor lifestyle. Even when it is sunny, many people are not exposed to enough bright light.”

“I wrote Beating Seattle’s Grey from a compassionate viewpoint, having struggled with depression in the wintertime and successfully overcome it by using light therapy.”

“Since then, many people have noticed and commented on my abundant energy and zest for life.”

“I became aware that light deficiency can happen from a dark workplace or home. It is not necessarily related to the weather.”

Illuminance at most offices - 50-500 LUX
Illuminance at twilight in the summer - 50-500 LUX
Illuminance during the day in the summer - 13 000 LUX

“We’re living in an indoor twilight. We are spending most of our time indoors all year, it is possible to suffer from depression from light deficiency not only in the winter but also during the rest of the year.”

“We need to find creative ways to add more light to our daily routines which leads to a positive mood and helps us live with more energy each day.”



FAQs

How do I contact the team?
You can contact us directly through our Indiegogo page or via email getsunlight.com@gmail.com

 

Where do we ship?
Anywhere UPS or FedEx does. Click the link below to see if you’re included, but in short everywhere. However, costs are dependent on your location. Shipping from Seattle, WA - USA.


Do I have to plug the Window Sensor in or is it battery powered?
There are batteries in the sensor but we charge via solar and they take care of themselves. You’ll never need to change them.

 

What countries does it work in?
Sunlight includes a standard universal charger that takes worldwide 110v - 240v input power. If this means nothing to you then don’t worry it’s a fancy way of saying it works in all countries.


What if the light outside is grey and overcast?
By default Sunlight LED Window will mimic this light. It will look like a normal window but we’ve got you covered if it looks a little too grey outside. There is an ‘enhance’ dial on the Sunlight LED Window and the Mini to make it look like a sunny day. So when it’s raining or cloudy you can still have Sunlight look like.... sunlight.

 

Does it have an on/off switch like a lamp?
Absolutely! There is a switch the allows you to turn it on and off like a normal light - but by default it's switched to auto mode which will mimic the light coming into the window where you placed the sensor. You flip between these modes with a simple switch on the side of the panel.

 

What if I had a street light outside my window which is really bright and makes the Sunlight LED Window glow all night?
We also have a sensitivity dial on the Window Sensor so you can adjust it so the Sunlight LED Window responds exactly the way you want it to. We got you covered here!

 

How do I plug it in?
You can either plug it into any wall outlet. (110v - 240v universal adapter included) or wire the adapter in directly, similar to a wall light. (You will need an electrician to do this) The Window Sensor is battery powered and charges via solar cells so no need to wire it in. Just stick it on your favorite window and you’re good to go.

 

How far can the sensor be from Sunlight?
It depends on a number of factors but typically this is 100 feet (30 meters). In short it’s much better than typical WiFi. The technology we’re using is 900MHz wireless radio frequency antennas and transmitters.

 

How many Sunlight Windows or Minis can I control?
You can control up to 10 sunlights with one window sensor. Great for large homes that need lots of light or even an office.

 

How much does Sunlight LED Window cost to run?
Sunlight LED Window is energy efficient... like really energy efficient. Sunlight only costs about $6.50 per year to run. This is based on 12 hours use per day and $0.126 per kilowatt cost of electricity and an average usage of 10 watts of power. Sunlight Mini costs about $4.50 per year to run.

story:
short description

 

Hello, we are the urban Chili team. urban Chili is also an innovative growbox which exists since the beginning of 2017 and was presented in the german Playboy magazine (September issue).

In our first year we also collected customer feeback. Some of them would prefer a higher and cheaper Box.

With my TOMATO we want to fulfill these wishes too. my TOMATO is the most energy saving and the most silent growbox ever. Plus, you can now choose between 9 designs.


 

What you give us & what you get

 

Now you can help to create the high performance growbox for everybody with your financial Support.

We need 20.000 € to produce the first series. Through our network of urban Chili we have already cooperations with producing partners, and will be able to deliver after a positive conclusion in 4 -5 months.
 

Perks:

  • my TOMATO – white - complete system
  • my TOMATO – design - complete system
  • my TOMATO – T Shirt - BE INDEPENDENT

my TOMATO is a complete system with hightech LED + a new carbon filter solution



be independent - and grow your own plants

my TOMATO is made from  experts, so everyone can be a professional grower

It does not matter how much power you put in. It’s important how much you get out. Smart is the new sexy.


The consequences

 

my TOMATO is not only a cool solution for you. Imagine what it means when everyone grows his highly potent flowers / fruits himself.

You decide what you are growing, and what is added. And you can enjoy every variety in absolute top quality, anytime you want.


Risks & challenges


After the first positive year with urban Chili, we are very confident that we are able to inspire more grower on earth if we also bring my TOMATO on the market.
Did I already mention that urban Chili was in the german Playboy, and from our customers we have received only positive feedback? :)

 

Other ways to help us
 

If you are interested in our project, you can also help us by talking about my TOMATO. It also helps if you share this site or www.mytomato.eu. Or get a my TOMATO - BE INDEPENDENT - T Shirt. :)

 

History Bonuses

 

  • Once we exceed 40.000 €, everyone who supports a my TOMATO complete system, gets a my TOMATO tub for free.
     
  • At 70.000 € we donate 4 pots to the tub.
     
  • From 80.000 € we donate a wireless thermo - hygrometer  (2 values inside and outside).


FAQ

1. How can I lower the lamp?
You do not have to lower the lamp, drinks crates fit into the my TOMATO,
this can be stacked to the desired distance to light source.

2. What should I do if my plants are wider than my TOMATO.
Simply cut off the interfering lateral branches. The plant also gains more power for the main branches.

3. my TOMATO is too high, what can I do?
The point 1 describes how to get closer with young plants. Simply insert drinks crates.

4. How do I dry my crop?
The trick with the drinks crates is very practical when you need a well-ventilated room to dry certain parts of the plants. You can hang them in the drinks crates. As a result, my TOMATO can be used continuously without any drying Equipment.

Thank you for your interest



GERMAN:


Kurzbeschreibung


Hallo, wir sind das urban Chili Team. urban Chili ist ebenfalls eine innovative Growbox, die es    seit Anfang 2017 gibt und es sogar in den deutschen Playboy geschafft hat.

Nun haben wir in unserem 1. Jahr oft gehört, dass sich einige Kunden eine höhere und günstigere Ausführung wünschen würden.

Mit my TOMATO wollen wir auch diese Wünsche erfüllen. Wir legen aber auch gleich noch was drauf: my TOMATO wird auch die energieeffizienteste und leiseste Growbox ever!
Zusätzlich kann man jetzt zwischen 9 Designs wählen.


 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst
 

Du kannst jetzt mit deiner finanziellen Unterstützung die high performance Growbox für alle ins Leben rufen.

Wir benötigen 20.000 € um die erste Charge zu produzieren. Durch unser Netzwerk von urban Chili haben wir schon alle Partner im Boot, und werden bei positivem Abschluss nach 4 -5 Monaten lieferfähig sein.
 

Perks:

my TOMATO – white – Komplettsystem

my TOMATO – design – Komplettsystem

my TOMATO – T Shirt – BE INDEPENDENT

my TOMATO ist das Komplettsystem inklusive neuester LED und Belüftungstechnik mit modernsten Aktivkohlefiltern



Sei unabhängig und bestimme selbst, was bei dir Zuhause wächst

my TOMATO ist von Profis, damit jeder ein Profi sein kann.

Es kommt nicht darauf an wieviel Watt man rein steckt, sondern wieviel man zum Schluss rausbekommt. Smart ist das neue Sexy.
 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann:


Falls du gefallen an unserem Projekt hast kannst du uns auch helfen in dem du über my TOMATO sprichst. Es hilft auch wenn du diese Seite oder www.mytomato.eu teilst. Oder du holst dir ein my TOMATO - BE INDEPENDENT - T Shirt.


 

Verlaufsangaben Bonus Beigaben

  • Sobald wir 40.000 €, gesammelt haben bekommt jeder, der ein  my TOMATO Komplettsystem sponsert eine passende my TOMATO Wanne dazu.
     
  • Bei 70.000 € spendieren wir 4 Töpfe Passend zur Wanne.
     
  • Ab 80.000 € spendieren wir ein Funk Thermo- Hygrometer (2 Werte innen und außen).

Vielen Dank für dein Interesse

story:
About this project

The idea for Drinkware Stacker was born due to my living circumstances. When living in NYC it's typical to have a tiny apartment and never enough space. My apartment is very well organized so reorganizing wasn't a space saving option and there just wasn't any storage space available. Since I needed more space in my kitchen cabinets I knew I had to do something different, which is, tap into any unused real estate available. I saw an opportunity in the airspace between the drinkware I had and the shelf, the space was just wasted, so I got to the drawing board (where I spent over a year of my time :) btw) and was able to create just the perfect product for it.

 

Drinkware Stacker & Coaster is an adjustable stacking device which doubles as a coaster to help you easily and conveniently store and organize your drinkware.  

 

Taking advantage of all that unused airspace between your drinkware and the shelf, the Drinkware Stackers lift your cups, mugs and glasses on top of each other without the risk of chipping or breaking them, utilizing the area that would normally go to waste. It’s like discovering a whole new cupboard.

The Drinkware Stackers are totally adjustable, so no matter what size your drinkware happens to be, it’ll give you space for more dishes, more glasses, more of whatever you need to stash.  

It’s very easy to use, just place one Stacker on top of a glass, mug or cup, then set another one upside-down, right on top. Give the Stacker a little squeeze to adjust to the size, and your drinkware is safe and sound, in just the right amount of space.  


 

You can even use them as coasters. With its colorful high-tech look and three patented expandable feet, the Drinkware Stackers & Coasters keep your drinks safely away from furniture without scuffing, scratching or marring the finish.

 

Short Summary

Hello,

My name is Adnan Lekic and I'm and inventor / entrepreneur, my company is ELYPRO and this is the second product I invented, my first product, of which I'm very proud was The Belt Organizer.

I have a passion in inventing products that can make people's lives easier and more fun, which is my way of making a difference in the world. Unfortunately, inventing and developing products is not cheap, it is very costly, and sometimes we need help to make it happen. I was able to produce the first batch, which was not the quantity I wanted to bring the price down enough to make any profit. With enough funds I'll be able to make a large production run that will make it possible for me to scale this product and help a lot of kitchens with their space. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $4000 to make this happen, but getting more would help us scaling with other colors as well, we will start with orange color. All the funds will go into inventory, all other work is done.

What you get from this campaign is first hand on the product, discounted price and also you get to make me happy :)

 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
About this project
The idea for Drinkware Stacker was born due to my living circumstances. When living in NYC it's typical to have a tiny apartment and never enough space. My apartment is very well organized so reorganizing wasn't a space saving option and there just wasn't any storage space available. Since I needed more space in my kitchen cabinets I knew I had to do something different, which is, tap into any unused real estate available. I saw an opportunity in the airspace between the drinkware I had and the shelf, the space was just wasted, so I got to the drawing board (where I spent over a year of my time :) btw) and was able to create just the perfect product for it.

 
Drinkware Stacker & Coaster is an adjustable stacking device which doubles as a coaster to help you easily and conveniently store and organize your drinkware.  
 
Taking advantage of all that unused airspace between your drinkware and the shelf, the Drinkware Stackers lift your cups, mugs and glasses on top of each other without the risk of chipping or breaking them, utilizing the area that would normally go to waste. It’s like discovering a whole new cupboard.

The Drinkware Stackers are totally adjustable, so no matter what size your drinkware happens to be, it’ll give you space for more dishes, more glasses, more of whatever you need to stash.  

It’s very easy to use, just place one Stacker on top of a glass, mug or cup, then set another one upside-down, right on top. Give the Stacker a little squeeze to adjust to the size, and your drinkware is safe and sound, in just the right amount of space.  


 
You can even use them as coasters. With its colorful high-tech look and three patented expandable feet, the Drinkware Stackers & Coasters keep your drinks safely away from furniture without scuffing, scratching or marring the finish.


 
Short Summary
Hello,
My name is Adnan Lekic and I'm and inventor / entrepreneur, my company is ELYPRO and this is the second product I invented, my first product, of which I'm very proud was The Belt Organizer.
I have a passion in inventing products that can make people's lives easier and more fun, which is my way of making a difference in the world. Unfortunately, inventing and developing products is not cheap, it is very costly, and sometimes we need help to make it happen. I was able to produce the first batch, which was not the quantity I wanted to bring the price down enough to make any profit. With enough funds I'll be able to make a large production run that will make it possible for me to scale this product and help a lot of kitchens with their space. 
 

What We Need & What You Get
We need at least $4000 to make this happen, but getting more would help us scaling with other colors as well, we will start with orange color. All the funds will go into inventory, all other work is done.
What you get from this campaign is first hand on the product, discounted price and also you get to make me happy :)
 

The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Make it real for people and build trust.


Risks & Challenges

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Rydon Pixio

At Rydon we believe that your bicycle light should always be there, just like your handlebar or saddle. It has to be permanently mounted on your bicycle and should always work, so you never have to worry about it. With this concept in mind we started the development of the Rydon Pixio about 5 years ago. We have designed and tested a lot of ideas until we could fit it all together in one unique product.

We have finished all the production tools and tested the first production samples. We are ready to put the Rydon Pixio on the market.

To produce the lights at a competitive price, we need to order a minimum quantity of 1000 pieces. We will use the earnings from this campaign to produce the lights and build a small stock of lights. Then we will also have the financial means to start marketing activities to make the lights available in the stores.

What's in it for you?

As a backer of our project you will be one of the first to get a your very own Rydon Pixio from the very first production batch and the satisfaction of knowing you were one of the individuals who helped us make the Rydon Pixio a success.

This campaign is a fixed funding campaign, which means we need to reach our goal of 20.000 euro. For backers, this means that you either get a really cool product if we reach this goal, or we refund your money if we don't reach it.

For US customers, the prices are in euro, below is an overview for the prices in  US dollars:

Thanks                € 5   = $ 6

Single                  € 30 = $ 39

Set                     € 55  = $ 73

Set deluxe           € 60  = $ 79

Family pack         € 250 = $ 332

Family deluxe      € 275 = $ 365

Reseller pack      € 777 = $ 1032

Product

The Rydon Pixio contains several unique features:

Always charged

One of the smart features is the integrated solar panel, which will convert every beam of sunlight into energy and stores it in the batteries, so you will never have to replace your batteries.

The special batteries hold 75 hours worth of light, which is sufficient for roughly two years of use without sunlight. With only 5 days of sunlight, the batteries are fully charged again and ready for another 2 years of use.

The Rydon Pixio uses the sunlight in the summer to charge the batteries for the winter. Just riding your bike in the summer gives enough energy to get you through the winter. You don’t have to put your bicycle in the sun all the time, you can park it anywhere you want, even in a garage with no light.


Mounting

Installation is very easy with the included special installation tool. The light can be mounted permanently on tube diameters between 10 and 25,4 mm. The included adapter can be used for tube diameters smaller than 16 mm. The included installation tool allows you to mount your Rydon Pixio tightly on your bicycle. The locking mechanism is theft proof. Only with the included tool it is possible to release it. If you buy a new bike in the future, you can use the same special tool to dismount the light and install it again on your new bike.

 

 

Light

The Pixio has a regulated light output, resulting in a constant brightness, even when the batteries are low. The light output is moderate and non-blinding for oncoming traffic, as the main goal of the Pixio is to be seen at night. On top is a small window to let you know if the light is on or off.

Sustainable

Cheap disposable bicycle lights use valuable natural resources, such as oils to make plastics and are only used for a limited time. Changing the batteries cost more than buying a new bicycle light, so most people just buy a new bicycle light. The Rydon Pixio also uses these valuable natural resources, but the superior design lets you enjoy it for years. Therefore the total amount of valuable natural resources that are used, is much lower.  The Pixio uses rechargeable batteries that are automatically charged by sunlight, so you’ll never have to replace your batteries and don’t have to dispose of them.

Options

The Rydon Pixio is available in a front and rear light, the outside looks the same, just the color of the light is different. You can select a perk for a single light or a set. You can also select the deluxe set, in which case you will receive a back and front light and 5 colored sleeves.

 

Team

Rydon consist of 3 members:

Koen - Electronic Design/Founder

Jelle - Industrial Design/Founder

Hugo - General Manager/Founder

 

When can I expect my products?

Production of the first order will take approximately 12-14 weeks after the campaign has been ended successfully. After production, the shipping time will take between 2 - 15 days, depending on your location.

Pricing information

Shipping and tax in Western Europe is included (unless stated otherwise). If you are outside the Western Europe please add 10 euro shipping for a single or set of lights. (you might be liable for local taxes and import duties, that depends on local customs).

 

Please like us on facebook

www.facebook.com/RydonNL

www.rydon.eu

 

 

FAQ

Can I store my bicycle in my garage?

Yes you can, riding your bicycle in the summer will give you enough sunlight to recharge the batteries.

 

Do I need to remove the Rydon Pixio if I park my bicycle?

No, it’s not recommended. Leave the Rydon Pixio mounted on your bicycle, this way you can never forget it and the Pixio can use the sunlight to recharge the batteries. The strap can only be removed with the special included tool.

 

What if I forget to turn the light off?

This can accidentally happen of course. That is why we used high capacity batteries that can hold up to 75 hours of light. If it happens for a longer period of time, or multiple times, just place your bicycle in the sunlight so your light can recharge.

 

Can I get a custom color sleeve?

The Rydon Pixio is available in 5 colors. Special colors are an option, but this would require a minimum order quantity.

 

Is the Rydon Pixio waterproof?

The Rydon Pixio is fully sealed and covered with a rubber sleeve. It is not suited for diving, but you can leave it on your bicycle 24/7.

story:
Do you have a hard time waking up? 

Hate the sound of your alarm clock in the morning? 

 

Whether you rely on a beeping digital clock or a marimba-playing iPhone to wake you up, chances are the sound of your alarm is an unpleasant interruption to your peaceful slumber.

Gone are the days of suffering the dreaded morning ringtone that sends a shiver down your spine while catapulting you into sudden darkness.

Thanks to a ton of research into the science of sleep and how people wake up, we’ve designed a 4 in 1 aromatherapy alarm clock to help you get to sleep, stay asleep during the night, and then wake up easily. 

This device may be small but it is mighty, where the effect of a slow sunrise encourages your body to stop producing the sleep hormone melatonin in favor of the mood-enhancing, feel-good hormone serotonin.

 

Start Happy

We’re Youngdo, a brand dedicated to creating a better tech-life balance for people everywhere.

We design things that make you feel optimally rested, relaxed, and refreshed. Happy. 

And now, with a little help from you, we’re out to retake slumberland. 

One good night's sleep at a time.

Sleep tech meets aromatherapy

Starting your day off with a pleasant aroma rather than an unpleasant or jarring sound can help set a positive tone for the day.

Imagine you wake up naturally and even before opening your eyes could appreciate the bright light. The experience didn’t end there, because of the essential oils you put inside the clock, a gradual awakening to the uplifting scent of citrusy lemon replaced your usual wrestle with the snooze button.

At night, the Youngdo Alarm Clock became a part of your bedtime ritual that you looked forward to. Being multi-functional you could use it as a bedside light. It was soothing to have the gentle glow of the clock lighting the way for your night time read. Even better was drifting off to sleep with the smell of lavender in the air.

When our bodies or environment changes (e.g. season changes, shift work, schedule changes, time zone travel, pregnancy, medications, changes in routine, etc.), the need for circadian rhythm maintenance becomes even more important. The Youngdo Natural Wake-Up System helps you maintain this natural and healthy circadian rhythm throughout the year.

 

Quotes 

“Gentle-wake alarm clocks are designed to ease the users into wakefulness instead of jolting them awake with an alarm,” says Janet Kennedy, a clinical psychologist and founder of NYC Sleep Doctor. Studies have demonstrated that using a gentle alarm clock — in this case, a dawn-simulating one — can even reduce the risk of morning cardiac events.

“We know that we need light to be able to see, but the light is also very important for your mood, level of alertness, and sleep patterns. Light in the morning when you first wake up is particularly effective as this will not only boost your mood and alertness for the day ahead but also help to set your body clock which is involved in regulating your sleep patterns.” Dr. Victoria Revell, School of Biosciences and Medicine, University of Surrey.

 

How It Works

  1. In the wake-up mode, the light starts to brighten 30 minutes before your alarm time.
  2. If you have aroma in the container, the aroma is diffused as the light brightens.
  3. At your selected alarm time, a gentle chime alarm starts to play.

The unique combination of scent, sound, and sunrise simulation light to help you wake up naturally in the morning.

Light Therapy

  1. Clinically proven light therapy
  2. Simulates a natural sunrise for a more energetic wake-up
  3. Helps you maintain a natural and healthy circadian rhythm throughout the year

Aromatherapy

Enjoy the aroma scents for increased relaxation or stimulation.

Sound Therapy

3 natural sounds –Imagine the comfort pictures that being waken up by the sounds of nature instead of boring morning alarm.

 

The alarm clock for non-alarmists

Sunrise Simulation:

Wake-up light alarm clocks help you start your day a more peaceful with gradually glowing light. Clinically proven light therapy simulates a natural sunrise for a more energetic wake-up

Sleep quickly and soundly:

Add nature sounds for a full sleep experience: Natural sounds are a proven, healthy sleep aid. Studies have shown that we sleep better and relax easier when we can block out distracting noise and listen to natural sounds.

Built-in Bluetooth Music Player:

It has a built-in Bluetooth speaker, which you can connect to your smartphone, and thus relax to your favorite Podcast or music. It is 10 meters barrier-free transmission, compatible with mainstream mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, and other devices.

7 LED Programs and Unlimited RGB Color Setting:

Unlimited RGB colors change automatically or you can fix one color as you desired to meet your current atmosphere.

You could set in cycling color, fix in one color, or turn light off only using the mist function.

Adjustable mist settings:

While many diffusers have one static setting for diffusion, this device allows users to choose from 2 different mist modes and 4 timers modes. Perfect for when using the diffuser in different settings with variable environments.

Weight and Dimensions

  1. Product dimension : 208mm x 211mm x130mm
  2. Product weight: 3.14 lbs

Manufacturing

Oh my goodness. You're still reading. We're honored.

If you've made it this far down the page, you just might be interested in hearing about what we're working on now and what the next several months hold. 

Though our project is currently listed on Indiegogo as being in the "Prototype" stage, we have in fact begun the production process and are working with our manufacturer already. Here's what we're working on and what comes next...
